text2: Haˈ ton huntekˈan tuˈ chietanto anma yul sat Comam Dios , yaj wal huneˈ yet mach chicotxˈah cokˈab yet chon ̈ oc waˈoj , ischejbanil ebnaj winaj yehi , mach chetato janma yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin isto Comam Jesús yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Tiro yeb txˈotxˈ Sidón .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Bey tuˈ ay huneˈ ix ix ah Cananea , mach Israeloj . Apni ix yilaˈ Comam Jesús , yalni ix yin ̈ caw ip : ― Mamin , hach yuninal iscˈahol naj David , tzˈayojab hacˈul win ̈ an . Ay huneˈ nichˈan wuninan caw chietalax yu ischejab naj matzwalil , caw xin chiecˈyaˈ yanma ix yu naj , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Yajaˈ xin machi takˈwi Comam tet ix , yuxin hitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ iscˈatan ̈ , yalni ebnaj : ― Mamin , hal tet ix paxojabto ix haxinwal chisbej ix yel yaw jin ̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Tetn ̈ e anma Israel chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , yuto lahan anma tuˈ hacaˈ noˈ meˈ cˈaynatoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Yajaˈ hitzico ix , yay jahno ix sata Comam , yalni ix : ― Mamin , colwahan ̈ nino win ̈ an , ẍi ix .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ix : ― Mach cˈulo ta chˈilaxilo tzet chislo ebnaj uninale cat yakˈlax tet metx txˈiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Yalnipaxo ix : ― Hoˈ Mamin yeli , yajaˈ metx txˈiˈ tuˈ chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ yican ̈ metx iskˈal istiˈ ebnaj uninale chiaycˈay yalan ̈ meẍa yet chiwaˈ ebnaj , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yalni Comam tet ix : ― Miyay , caw ayco hawanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , yuxin yubojab hacaˈ choche hacˈul , ẍi Comam . Yin ̈ n ̈ ena tuˈ xin iscawxican ̈ nichˈan yunin ix tuˈ .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Yel Comam Jesús bey tuˈ , isto Comam istiˈ haˈ lago Galilea , haˈ tuˈ xin ahto Comam yin ̈ huneˈ won ̈ an , yay tzˈon ̈ no Comam bey tuˈ .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma apni iscˈatan ̈ Comam . Ay mac ikˈn ̈ e anma yaˈay yeb ay mac ikˈn ̈ e anma mach chu yeqˈui , yeb anma mach chu yilni , yeb anma txˈoj ye iskˈab , yeb anma mach chu istzoteli ; yalaxayo sunil anma tuˈ yich yoj Comam . Sunil anma tuˈ xin cawxicanocan ̈ yu Comam .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Hayet yilni anma huneˈ tuˈ caw cˈaycanilo iscˈul yuto yakˈ tzotelo Comam anma maẍticˈa chu istzoteli , yebpaxo anma txˈoj ye iskˈab watxˈicaniloj . Isbelwipaxocan ̈ anma maẍticˈa chu yeqˈui , yeb anma maẍticˈa yu yilni hajlocanocan ̈ issat yu Comam . Yu huneˈ tuˈ caw sunil anma yakˈ tzalaho iscˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios , isDiosal Israel .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yawtenti Comam ebnaj iscuywom iscˈatan ̈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Caw chitzˈay incˈulan yin ̈ huntekˈan anma tiˈ yuto isyoxebxa tzˈayic yehicˈo incˈatan ̈ an , matxa xin tzet chislo . Mach chisje incˈulan inchejatojan yatut yuto tato mach chiwaˈi , chalotaxca ispaxilo yip yulaj beh , ẍi Comam .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam tet : ― Mamin , caw txˈiˈal anma lah , ¿ baytuˈwal xin chon ̈ tohan ̈ jikˈatijan ̈ tzet chislo anma tiˈ ? Yuto bay ayon ̈ tiˈ machi teˈ n ̈ a , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Hayeb ixim pan coxol tiˈ ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Hujebchˈan ixim yeb haycˈon ̈ noˈ niẍte cay , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Yalni Comam tet anma tato chiay tzˈon ̈ no sat txˈotxˈ .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yinican ̈ Comam ixim hujeb pan yeb haycˈon ̈ noˈ cay tuˈ , yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios . Lahwi tuˈ iskˈaxponayo Comam ixim , yakˈni Comam ixim yeb noˈ cay tuˈ tet ebnaj iscuywom , yoc ebnaj yitxkˈanto yin ̈ anma .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Caw sunil anma waˈi hantaticˈa yoche iscˈul , caw xin hujebto motx nohcan ̈ yin ̈ ixim matxa lahwi yu anma .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Xol sunil anma waˈ tuˈ can ̈ eb mil isbisil ebnaj winaj , machi xin oc ebix ix yeb niẍte unin istzˈajo yin ̈ huneˈ isbisil tiˈ .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Lahwi istakˈlicano Comam Jesús tet anma , yahto Comam yul huneˈ teˈ barco , isto Comam yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Magdala .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Ay huntekˈan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo apni ilno Comam Jesús yun ̈ e yilwen ebnaj Comam . Yalni ebnaj tet Comam ta chisye hunu cˈaybalcˈule chiyeniloj tato caw yeli haˈ Comam Dios chejn ̈ eti Comam Jesús .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ kˈejbiyalil yet cheyilni istzˈay moyan , cheyal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Wal tinan ̈ yeloxa hajan , yuto lan ̈ an istzˈay moyan , ” quexchi .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Taca yet sacˈayal xin cheyal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Wal tinan ̈ yocxa haˈ n ̈ ab yuto caw kˈej moyan , ” quexchi . Hex tiˈ caw helanex hetxumni yin ̈ tzet chute isba tiempo , ta chakˈ haˈ n ̈ ab maca machoj . Yajaˈ wal yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal bay ayex tiˈ , mach chitxumchalo heyu .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Anma yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tiˈ , caw txˈojcanoj yeb caw mach yijemoj . Chiskˈan cˈaybalcˈule yilaˈ , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ echˈan cˈaybalcˈule chiakˈlax yilaˈ , hacaˈ huneˈ isye Comam Dios yin ̈ naj Jonás , ẍi Comam Jesús . Lahwi tuˈ yel Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj , isto Comam .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Yet yecˈ apno Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ lago isnaniti ebnaj tato mach yito tzet chislo .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Cheyil heba tet yan ̈ al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo , ẍi Comam .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj huneˈ tuˈ , yichico ebnaj yalni tet hunun : ― Chal Comam huneˈ tiˈ yumi machi majiti tzet chicolo , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Yet yabenilo Comam huneˈ tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin cheyala ta machi hepan ikˈbil heyu ? Caw mach chicawxi hecˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: ¿ Tom mach chinachalo heyu ? yeb ¿ tom matxa chitit yul hecˈul yin ̈ ixim howeb pan yabe yin ̈ howeb mil ebnaj winaj ? Tijab yin ̈ henabal hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma .

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Yeb xin , ¿ tom matxa chenati yin ̈ ixim hujeb pan yabe yin ̈ ebnaj can ̈ eb mil ? Yeb xin , ¿ tom matxa chenapaxtij hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma tuˈ ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin machi matxumchalo heyu tato maẍtaj yin ̈ ixim pan mantzotelan yet mawalnihan teyet ta cheyil heba tet yan ̈ al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo ? ẍi Comam .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ istxumnilo ebnaj tato maẍtaj yin ̈ yan ̈ al ixim pan tzotel Comam , to yin ̈ cuybanile chakˈ ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Yet yapni Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Cesarea yul ismajul Filipo , iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ¿ mac anmahilinan yalni anma ? ẍi Comam .

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Ay mac chalni ta hach tiˈ naj Juan anican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma , aypaxo mac chalni tato Elías hach , aypaxo mac chalni tato hach tiˈ naj Jeremías , maca to hunuxa ischejab Comam Dios ecˈlena yet payat , ẍi ebnaj .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo Comam tet ebnaj : ― Haxaca hex tiˈ , ¿ mac anmahilinan heyalni ? ẍi Comam .

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Simón Pedro : ― Hach tiˈ , Cristo hach , Iscˈahol Comam Dios itzitz , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Simón , iscˈahol naj Jonás , caw sakˈal hawet yuto huneˈ maxawal tiˈ mach anmaho chiyenilo tawet . Walxinto haˈ Inmaman ay yul satcan ̈ , haˈ chiakˈni hatxumuˈ .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Haquinpaxtuˈan chiwalan tato Pedro chijcano habi . Yiban ̈ huneˈ chˈen niman chˈen tiˈ chiwacan ̈ an wiglesiahan , machi xin chikˈoji camical istan ̈ tzeniloj .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Chiwacanicojan lawe tawet yun ̈ e chu yoc anma yul iskˈab Comam Dios . Haˈ tzet mach tˈin ̈ ano yeco yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ hawalni , mach tˈin ̈ ano chucano yul satcan ̈ . Haxa tzet tˈin ̈ an yeco sat txˈo txˈotxˈ tiˈ hawalni , huneˈ tuˈ tˈin ̈ an chucano yul satcan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Lahwi yalni Comam huntekˈan tuˈ xin , yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tato machi bay chalicˈo ebnaj tato haˈ Comam Jesús haˈ ton Cristo .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ ichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj iscuywom tato yilal yul isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ , yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Caw yilal intohan bey Jerusalén , cat xin yecˈyaˈ wanmahan yu ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob Israel , yeb yu ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés . Chinispotxˈan ebnaj , yajaˈ yin ̈ yox tzˈayic cat witzitzbican ̈ an hunelxa , ẍi Comam .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Hayet yaben naj Pedro huneˈ tuˈ , yawtenilo naj Comam Jesús , iscachwa naj yin ̈ Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , ¡ haˈojab Comam Dios chachcolni yin ̈ huneˈ isyaˈtajil tuˈ ! Machojab chachyaco yul iskˈab , ẍi naj .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Istˈan ̈ xico Comam yin ̈ naj , yalni Comam : ― Ach matzwalil , elan ̈ yin ̈ insatan yuto chachoc quinhawakˈaˈ aycˈayojan , wal xin maẍtaj haˈ tzet nabil yu Comam Dios chiecˈ yin ̈ hanabal , walxinto hacaˈ tzet chisna anma haˈ chiecˈ yin ̈ hanabal , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : ― Tato ay hunu mac choche chioc incuywomojan , caw matxahojab yeto isba ischuquil , yeb xin caw hinanojab yaben isyaˈtajil win ̈ an . Ta hinan yetan yanma hacaˈ tuˈ ecˈojab tzujtzun wintajan .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Yuto haˈ mac mach hinan iscam win ̈ an yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chiscˈayto iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Wal mac chishin isba iscam win ̈ an xin chischah iskˈinal yin ̈ huneln ̈ e .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay hunu mac chikˈoji ismajnilo sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yaj ta chiscˈayto iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , ¿ tzettaxca chischah huneˈ mac tuˈ selelo iskˈinal chiscˈayto tuˈ ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinhulan yeb iskˈakˈal yip Inmaman yeb ebnaj ángel , cat wakˈnihan ispaj selel tet hunun anma , hataticˈa tzet chiswatxˈe .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli , chiwalan teyet , ay haywan ̈ mac texol tiˈ maẍto chicami masanto chiyil wulan cat wocan Yahawoj , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Wajebxa tzˈayic xin , ishecˈnilo isba Comam Jesús xol anma yinito Comam naj Pedro , naj Jacobo yeb yuẍtaj , haˈ ton naj Juan , yin ̈ iswiˈ huneˈ witz caw nahat yecan ̈ .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Haˈ bey tuˈ xin ishel isba yillax yin ̈ Comam , caw toxan ̈ e chitzejtzon sat Comam hacaˈ tzˈayic . Wal xil iskˈap Comam xin , caw sajhopon ̈ e elicoj .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin yilni ebnaj naj Elías yeb naj Moisés , lan ̈ an istzotel ebnaj yeb Comam .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Yalnican ̈ naj Pedro tet Comam Jesús : ― Mamin , caw cˈul ta wal je bey tiˈ , ta chisje hacˈul chu cowatxˈenan ̈ oxebo niẍte pat ; hunu hawet , hunu yet naj Moisés , yeb hunu yet naj Elías tiˈ , ẍi naj Pedro .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an yalni naj Pedro huneˈ tuˈ xin , yayilo huneˈ moyan caw sajhopon ̈ e , yoc hoyno yin ̈ ebnaj yeb Comam . Yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ huneˈ yul nukˈe xol moyan tuˈ yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Haˈ naj tiˈ Incˈaholan caw xahan ay wuhan , caw chintzalahan yin ̈ naj ; abewe tzet chal naj , ẍiayti xol moyan .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj oxwan ̈ iscuywom Comam huneˈ tuˈ , caw xiwcan ̈ ebnaj , yaycano xulno ebnaj sat txˈotxˈ .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , ishitzico Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj , yanayo Comam iskˈab yiban ̈ ebnaj , yalni Comam : ― Ahan ̈ wewanoj , mach chexxiwi , ẍi Comam .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Hayet yilniti ebnaj xin , matxa mac lin ̈ ancan ̈ iscˈatan ̈ Comam .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Haxa yet lan ̈ an yayti Comam yin ̈ iswiˈ huneˈ witz tuˈ yeb ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam : ― Machi bay cheyal huneˈ maxeyil tiˈ masanto yet chinitzitzbican ̈ an xol camom , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin chal ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés tato yilal babel chul naj Elías sata naj Cristo ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ : ― Yeli hac tuˈ , yilal yul naj Elías tuˈ babel yun ̈ e isnani isba anma cat yoc yin ̈ istoholal .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Yajaˈ chiwalan teyet tato xahul naj Elías tuˈ yajaˈ mach txumchalo naj yu ebnaj , yuxin iswatxˈe ebnaj baytet yal iscˈul yin ̈ naj Elías tuˈ . Hac tuˈ xin chinutelaxan Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chiecˈyaˈ wanmahan yu ebnaj , ẍi Comam .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , istxumchalo yu ebnaj tato haˈ yin ̈ naj Juan anican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma tzotel Comam .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Yet yayilo Comam yeb iscuywom xol anma xin , ishitzico huneˈ naj iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yay jahno naj sata Comam , yalni naj tet Comam :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: ― Mamin , caw tzˈayojab hacˈul yin ̈ incˈaholtiˈan yuto caw chilow huneˈ yaxcamic yin ̈ naj , caw chiecˈyaˈ yanma naj yu . Txˈiˈalxa el chito naj yul kˈaˈ yeb xol ha haˈ .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Mawitijan naj tet ebnaj hacuywom tiˈ , yajaˈ xin machi yu yakˈni cawxo ebnaj naj , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hex tiˈ , caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , caw txˈojexcanoj . Caw nimanxa tiempo ayinicˈojan texol . ¿ Hantatocˈanab tiempo chextecha wuhan ? Caw yaˈxa wanmahan heyu . Iweti naj bey tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ischejnilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil ayco yin ̈ naj tzeh tuˈ . Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin iscawxilo naj .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Haxa yet ischuquilxan ̈ e Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ , iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mamin , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin machi mayu jinilojan ̈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin ̈ naj tzeh tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yuto hex tiˈ ayto mach chiapni heyanico heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios . Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet ta chicawxi hecˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios waxan ̈ ca txann ̈ e yeco heyanma yin ̈ Comam hacaˈn ̈ e hunu nichˈan yin ̈ atil teˈ mostaza , chu heyalni tet hunu witz hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Heqˈuilo haba bey tiˈ , asiˈ hunuxa bayah , ” ta quexchi , chisyije huneˈ witz tuˈ tzet cheyala . Sunil chu hewatxˈeni ta ayco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Yuto huntekˈan ischejab naj matzwalil tiˈ , machi el yin ̈ anma ta mach chextxahli yeb heyakˈlen wahil hetxahli tet Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Hayet yecˈ Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul ismajul Galilea , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinálaxicojan yul iskˈab anma .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Chinakˈlax camojan , yajaˈ yin ̈ yox tzˈayic xin cat witzitzbican ̈ an hunelxa , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben ebnaj huneˈ tuˈ caw occano biscˈulal yin ̈ yanma ebnaj .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Hayet yapni Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey con ̈ ob Capernaum , yapni ebnaj chiinilo chˈen tohlabal yin ̈ yatut Comam Dios iscˈatan ̈ naj Pedro . Iskˈamben ebnaj tet naj : ― ¿ Chimyakˈ naj chachcuyni istohlabal yin ̈ yatut Comam Dios ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Istakˈwi naj Pedro : ― Hoˈ chitohlawi yaˈ , ẍi naj . Hayet yocto naj Pedro tuˈ yul n ̈ a haˈ Comam babel kˈamben tet naj : ― Simón , ¿ tzet chu hatxumni yin ̈ huneˈ tiˈ ? Mac tet chiskˈan ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob chˈen tohlabal , ¿ ham tet yet con ̈ ob ebnaj , mato tet anma nan con ̈ obal ? ẍi Comam .

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Pedro : ― Haˈ anma nan con ̈ obal , haˈ chˈakˈni chˈen , ẍi naj . Yalni Comam : ― Ta hac tuˈ , haˈ mac yuninalticˈa con ̈ ob yehi mach yilalo chakˈ chˈen .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Yajaˈ yun ̈ e mach chˈoc ishowal ebnaj jin ̈ , asiˈ istiˈ haˈ lago cat hawanayto chˈen ikˈomati cay xol haˈ . Haˈ xin yul istiˈ noˈ babel cay chiahti hawu ayicto huneˈ chˈen melyu cˈuxan iskˈoji istohlan hawet yeb wetan . Chawiti chˈen cat hato hawakˈnocano chˈen tet ebnaj chichahni chˈen tohlabal tuˈ , ẍi Comam tet naj Pedro .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , iskˈambe ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús tet hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Mac ecˈbal yelapno xol anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Yawtenti Comam huneˈ nichˈan unin yanico Comam xolbal ebnaj .

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ta mach chehel hebeybal , yeb ta mach cheyiyo heba hacaˈ nichˈan unin tiˈ , mach chu heyoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yuxin mac chiyiyo isba hacaˈ nichˈan unin tiˈ , haˈ ecˈbal yelapno xol mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Yuxin haˈ mac chichahni hunu nichˈan unin yuto wetan yehi , haninan chinischahan , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Haˈ mac chiakˈni lectaho hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul inkˈaban , cˈul iscˈallaxico hunu niman ischˈenal chˈen molino yet trigo yin ̈ isnukˈ , cat iskˈojlaxayto xol haˈ mar , sata ta chioc yakˈaˈ aycˈayo hunu maca .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Caw biscˈulal yet anma ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yuto hantan ̈ e tzet bay wal yaycˈayi . Wal tuˈ caw yeli , yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ayn ̈ eticˈa yin ̈ bay chaycˈay anma , yajaˈ xin cˈanchˈan mac chiakˈni aycˈayo hunu maca .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Yuxin tato hekˈab maca heyoj chexakˈni aycˈayo yin ̈ istxˈojal , cˈulmi hetzocˈniltoj cat hekˈojnito nahat . Waxan ̈ ca matxa tzˈajano henimanil yet chechahni hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal ecˈbalto cˈul sata ta tzˈajan henimanil yet chexalaxto xol kˈa kˈaˈ mach istan ̈ bal .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Ta isbakˈ hesat chexakˈni aycˈayo xin , cˈulmi heyiniltij cat hekˈojnito nahat , wal xin waxan ̈ ca hunxan ̈ e isbakˈ hesat ayicto yet chechahni hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal sakˈalmi heyet sata ta chexalaxto xol kˈa kˈaˈ yeb iscabil isbakˈ hesat , ẍi Comam .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Nann ̈ e heyu , tajca chehincˈuln ̈ e hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul inkˈaban , chiwalan teyet , ebnaj ángel chitan ̈ en ebnaj tiˈ ayco ebnaj yin ̈ sat Inmaman yul satcan ̈ ,

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: yuto Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , hulnajinan insayaˈan mac cˈaynatoj .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay hunu naj ay cien ismeˈ cat xin iscˈayto hunu noˈ , ¿ mataxca xin mach chacano naj noˈ noventa y nueve , cat isto naj issayno noˈ cˈaynato tuˈ ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Yajaˈ ta chiilcha noˈ yu naj xin , yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet tato ecˈbalto chitzala naj yin ̈ noˈ cˈaynaticˈato tuˈ sata yin ̈ noˈ noventa y nueve mach cˈaynahotoj .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Hac tuˈ Comam ay yul satcan ̈ , mach chisje iscˈul tato ay hunu mac uninto yul inkˈaban chicˈaytoj , ẍi Comam . Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús :

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: ― Ta ay hunu hawuẍta chiwatxˈen hunu istxˈojal tawin ̈ , as tzotelan ̈ tet naj hachuquil , cat xin hacachni naj . Ta chabeto naj tzet chawala , yocxa akˈancˈulal texol chal tuˈ .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Yajaˈ ta mach chabeto naj tzet chawala , awteti hunuj maca cawan ̈ o mac chito tawintaj , haxinwal chiwatxˈicanayo tzet cheyal tuˈ yin ̈ sat cawan ̈ maca oxwan ̈ testigo .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Yajaˈ ta mach chabeto naj yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ , hal tet ebnaj juẍtaj . Taca mach chabeto naj tzet chal ebnaj juẍta tuˈ xin , hacaˈ hunu mac mach ohtan ̈ eho Comam Dios , hac tuˈ chucano naj yul hesat , maca hacaˈ hunu ebnaj chiinilo chˈen tohlabal .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , sunil tzet checˈalba yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ chicˈalbalaxpaxo yul satcan ̈ , yebpaxo tzet chepuhilo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chipuhlaxpaxo yul satcan ̈ .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Chiwalpaxojan teyet : Tato ay cawan ̈ ojex hun chu hekˈanni hunu tzet ye tuˈ yin ̈ hetxah tet Comam Dios yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ chiakˈlax teyet yu Inmaman ay yul satcan ̈ .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Yuxin haˈ bay chiscutxba isba cawan ̈ maca oxwan ̈ mac yu yinayo isba wetan , ayinicojan xolbal , ẍi Comam .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , ishitzico naj Pedro iscˈatan ̈ Comam , iskˈamben naj : ― Mamin , ta ay hunu wuẍtajan chiyaco ismul wetan , ¿ hayelmi chiwakˈ nimancˈulalan yin ̈ , tom hujel mato hantaj ? ẍi naj .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Mach chiwalan tawet tato hujeln ̈ e , walxinto hujel el chielto setenta chawakˈ nimancˈulal yin ̈ hawuẍtaj , ẍi Comam .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin ̈ anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , lahan hacaˈ huneˈ naj rey ilni hanta iscˈas ebnaj ismunlawom .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an yichico naj yilni hanta iscˈas ebnaj tuˈ , yilaxti huneˈ naj caw ismilalxa iscˈas tet naj .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Yajaˈ huneˈ naj tuˈ , mach chikˈoji naj istohlan sunil iscˈas tuˈ . Yuxin ischej naj rey tuˈ txon ̈ laxoto naj yeb yixal , yeb yuninal , yeb sunil tzet aya .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Wal naj ay iscˈas tuˈ xin ay jahno naj sata naj rey , yoc naj yalno tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mamin , caw niman chawute hacˈul win ̈ an hayeboxa tzˈayic , chinkˈuyayojan chˈen cat wakˈnihan sunil incˈastuˈan tawet , ” ẍi naj .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Wal naj rey tuˈ , caw tzˈaycan ̈ iscˈul naj yin ̈ naj , yakˈni tan ̈ o naj iscˈas naj tuˈ sunil , isbejtzolax naj .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Haxa yet yelti naj sata naj rey tuˈ , yilnayo naj huneˈ naj yet munlawomal , ay xin hanicˈ iscˈas naj tet naj . Yoc yachno naj yin ̈ isnukˈ naj , etzaxan ̈ e xin majayto ishakˈo naj yu naj , yalni naj tet naj : “ Tinan ̈ xin chawacanayo hacˈas wetan , ” ẍi naj .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Wal naj ay iscˈas tuˈ ay jahno naj yin ̈ sat naj , yalni naj tet naj : “ Mamin , niman chawute hacˈul , hawechman hayeboxa tzˈayic , chinkˈuyayojan chˈen cat wakˈni incˈastuˈan tawet , ” ẍi naj .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Yajaˈ naj bay ay iscˈas naj tuˈ , mach yabeto naj tzet yal naj , walxinto yito naj naj tet naj alcal , yalaxicto naj yul preso masanto yakˈcano naj sunil iscˈas tuˈ .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Cˈuxan xin ay huntekˈan ebnaj yet munlawomal naj ilni huneˈ tuˈ , caw xin tac iscˈul ebnaj , yuxin to ebnaj yalaˈ tet naj rey yin ̈ tzet yu tuˈ .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Hayet yaben naj rey huneˈ tuˈ , yanito naj yawtemal naj . Yalni naj tet naj : “ Hach tiˈ caw mach hawalil , wakˈ nimancˈulalan yin ̈ hacˈas yuto hakˈan nimancˈulal wetan .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Estam xin matzˈay hacˈul yin ̈ hawet munlawomal tuˈ hacaˈ mayu istzˈay incˈulan tawin ̈ , ” ẍi naj .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Caw xin tit ishowal naj rey tuˈ yin ̈ naj , ischejni naj yalaxocto naj txˈoj tuˈ yul preso masanto istohlacano naj sunil iscˈas tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Hac tuˈ chute Inmaman ay yul satcan ̈ teyin ̈ tato mach cheyakˈ nimancˈulal yin ̈ sunil heyanma yin ̈ heyuẍta chaco ismul teyet , ẍi Comam .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jesús huntekˈan cuybanile tuˈ xin , yel Comam yul ismajul Galilea , isto Comam yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Judea iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ Jordán .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam , hac tuˈ xin yu yakˈni cawxo Comam anma yaˈay .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj fariseo apni iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yoc ebnaj yilweno Comam yun ̈ e yaycˈay yin ̈ hunu ismul , iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mamin , ¿ chimyu ispohni isba hunu naj yeb yixal waxan ̈ ca yu hunu comon tzet ye tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala tato hayet iswatxˈencano Comam Dios anma , iswatxˈe Comam Dios naj winaj , iswatxˈenpaxo Comam ix ix ?

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Yalni Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yuxin chacano naj winaj ismam yeb ismiˈ cat ishunbancano isba naj yeb yixal , hac tuˈ xin hunxan ̈ e anmahil chielcanico iscawan ̈ il , ẍicano Comam .

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Yuxin matxa cawan ̈ o anmahil yehi , to hunxan ̈ e chielcanicoj . Yuxin haˈ mac chishunba Comam Dios machi hunu mac chu ispohni , ” ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo ebnaj fariseo tuˈ tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin yalcano naj Moisés tato chu yakˈlax teˈ hum yet pohlebahil tet ix ixale cat yalaxcano ix yu yichamil ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yu hetxˈojal yuxin yal naj Moisés huneˈ tuˈ ta chu hepohlencano heba yeb heyixal . Wal yet yichebanil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , mach haco tuˈ ye yu Comam Dios .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Yuxin chiwalan teyet , haˈ mac chibejnicano yixal , yajaˈ ta mach taj yu issayni ix hunuxa winaj , cat ismohyipaxo naj yeb hunuxa ix , yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ chaco naj ismul yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Tato matxa chu copohni coba yeb jixal , cˈulmi mach chijikˈ jixal chal tuˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yajaˈ mach sunilo mac chiijcha yu yin ̈ huneˈ cheyal tiˈ , wal xin han ̈ cˈan ̈ e mac yetticˈa yehi .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Ay ebnaj maẍticˈa tzˈajano isnimanil yetticˈa chipitzcˈahi , yuxin mach chu yikˈni ebnaj yixal . Aypaxo ebnaj yet anmahil chiuteni , yuxin mach chu yikˈnipaxo ebnaj yixal . Aypaxo ebnaj xin yu ismunla yin ̈ ismunil Comam Dios yuxin machi yixal . Yuxin haˈ mac chitecha yu , machojab chikˈ yixal , ẍi Comam .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yilaxti haywan ̈ niẍte unin iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesús yu yanayo Comam iskˈab yiban ̈ , yebpaxo yu istxahli Comam yin ̈ . Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam xin , oc ebnaj iscachaˈ anma ikˈn ̈ e niẍte unin tuˈ .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj : ― Mach checach istit niẍte unin tiˈ incˈatan ̈ an , yuto haˈ mac chaco yanma yin ̈ Comam Dios hacaˈ yeco yanma niẍte unin tiˈ yin ̈ ismam ismiˈ , haˈ chu yoc yul iskˈab Comam ay yul satcan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Yanayo Comam Jesús iskˈab yiban ̈ iswiˈ niẍte unin tuˈ , lahwi tuˈ xin isto Comam .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Ay huneˈ naj tzeh apni iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesús , iskˈamben naj tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , ¿ tzet hunu cˈul inwatxˈenan yun ̈ e inchahnihan kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal ? ẍi naj .

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin chakˈambe wetan yin ̈ tzet ye tuˈ cˈul ? Wal xin huneˈn ̈ e mac cˈul . Yaj ta chawoche hachab hakˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , yije chejbanile akˈbilcano yu naj Moisés , ẍi Comam .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Iskˈamben naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Baytet xin huntekˈan chejbanile chawal tiˈ ? ẍi naj . Yalni Comam : ― Mach chachpotxˈwahi , mach chachixli yebpaxo mach chachelkˈawi , yeb mach chahobcan ̈ lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ hawet anmahil .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Yije tzet chal hamam , hamiˈ , yebpaxo xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil hacaˈ hayaˈiln ̈ en haba , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Istakˈwi naj tet Comam : ― Sunil huntekˈan chawal tiˈ yijebilticˈa wuhan yichitaxticˈa inchˈibcan ̈ an . ¿ Tzet hunuxa wal inyijenan ? ẍi naj .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Yajaˈ ta chawoche chachoccano cˈulal , as txon ̈ to sunil tzet ayach , cat hapohnican ̈ istohol yin ̈ anma mebaˈ , haxinwal ay hakˈalomal yul satcan ̈ . Lahwi tuˈ cat hawoccano tzujno wintajan , ẍi Comam .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Hayet yaben naj tzeh tuˈ yalni Comam hacaˈ tuˈ , ispaxto naj yin ̈ biscˈulal yuto caw kˈalomcano naj sicˈlebil .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj iscuywom : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , caw yaˈta yoc anma kˈalom yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Chiwalpaxojan teyet , hacaˈ hunu noˈ camello tinan ̈ , ¿ tom subutaj yecˈto noˈ yul isholanil hunu chˈen acuẍa ? Hac tuˈ ye anma kˈalom , caw yaˈta yoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam huneˈ tuˈ caw cˈayilo iscˈul ebnaj , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : “ Ta hac tuˈ , ¿ mactaxca chicolchahi ? ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yoc tˈan ̈ no Comam yin ̈ ebnaj , yalni Comam : ― Huneˈ tiˈ mach chikˈoji anma iswatxˈeni , wal Comam Dios sunil tzet chu iswatxˈen Comam , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : ― Mamin , han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ bejbilcano sunil tzet ayon ̈ an ̈ yu joc tzujnojan ̈ tawintaj , ¿ yuxin tzet chicochahan ̈ ispajoj ? ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet chiapni istiempohal yet chiacˈbilo sunil tzet ye tuˈ , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinoc tzˈon ̈ nojan yul incapilan caw cˈulchˈancanoj . Haxa hex chexecˈ tzujtzun wintatiˈan , chexoc tzˈon ̈ no yul hunun hecapil , cat heyoc heyilni yin ̈ tzet chielico cablahon ̈ eb majan ebnaj Israel .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Yuxin mac chisbejcano yatut wuhan maca yuẍtaj , yanab , maca ismam , maca ismiˈ , maca yuninal , maca istxˈotxˈ ; huntekˈan mac tuˈ caw ecˈbalto txˈiˈal ispaj selel chiakˈlax tet , yeb chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Haˈ mac caw ay yelapno ye tinan ̈ , yet chiapni huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , caw matxa yelapno chielicoj . Haxa mac machi yelapno ye tinan ̈ chijute jilni , yet chiapni huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ caw aycano yelapno chielcanicoj , ẍi Comam .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús tet ebnaj iscuywom : ― Anma chioc yul iskˈab Comam Dios lahan hacaˈ hunu naj yahaw munil to yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayal issayaˈ iscˈamteˈ chimunla xol teˈ uva .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Hayet yilcha huntekˈan ebnaj yu naj , yalni naj tato huneˈ denario chakˈ naj yin ̈ tzˈayic tet hunun ebnaj , lahwi tuˈ isto ebnaj munlaho xol yuva naj .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Yin ̈ mi chˈen balon ̈ eb yin ̈ yet yalan ̈ chuman isto naj yul txon ̈ bal , yilni naj huntekˈanxa ebnaj mach ismunil .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Yalni naj tet ebnaj : “ Ay munil incˈatan ̈ an , chexintohlahan hacaˈticˈa caw yehi , ” ẍi naj . Istopaxo ebnaj munil xol yuva naj .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Naj yahaw munil tuˈ elpaxto naj yin ̈ chumanil , yeb yin ̈ chˈen oxeb , hacticˈapax tuˈ yute yalni naj tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj ilcha yu .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Yin ̈ xa chˈen howeb xin , istopaxo naj txon ̈ bal hunelxa , yilni naj huntekˈan ebnaj chiecˈ bey tuˈ mach ismunil . Iskˈamben naj tet ebnaj : “ ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin ton ̈ e chiecˈ tzˈayic teyiban ̈ bey tiˈ ? ” ẍi naj .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : “ Mamin , to machi mac chiakˈni yet comunilan ̈ , ” ẍi ebnaj . Yalni naj tet ebnaj : “ Ta chisje hecˈul asiˈwe munil wintajan , chexintohlahan hacaˈ caw yehi , ” ẍi naj . Isto ebnaj munil yinta naj .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ kˈejbiyal xin , yalni naj yahaw munil tuˈ tet naj chiilni ismunil hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Awte sunil ebnaj munlawom cat hatohlan ebnaj . Ebnaj maoc munil yin ̈ islahobal , haˈ ebnaj chatohla babel . Wal ebnaj caw sahab maichico ismunla xin , islahobal chatohla ebnaj , ” ẍi naj yahaw munil tuˈ .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yawtelax ebnaj oc munil yin ̈ chˈen howeb , haˈ ebnaj babel tohlalaxi , huneˈ denario akˈlax tet hunun ebnaj .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Haxa yet yawtelax ebnaj ichico munil yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayal , ham yalni ebnaj tato ecˈbal istohol ebnaj chiakˈlaxi , yajaˈ machoj , huneˈn ̈ e denario akˈlaxpaxo tet hunun ebnaj .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Hayet ischahni ebnaj istohol tuˈ yichico ebnaj isbuchwa yin ̈ naj yahaw munil tuˈ ,

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: yalni ebnaj : “ Ebnaj mahul yet islahobalxa tiˈ hunxan ̈ e hora mamunla ebnaj , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin lahan cotoholan ̈ maxawakˈ yeb ebnaj ? Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ ecˈbal macon ̈ munlahan ̈ , yeb xin caw majakˈ janmahan ̈ xol kˈaˈ , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Istakˈwi naj yahaw munil tuˈ tet huneˈ naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hach wet anmahil , mach chinetlihan tawin ̈ yuto majala tato huneˈ denario chintohlahan hatzˈayic .

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Wal xin mawakˈan hatohol , paxan ̈ toj . Ta chiwochehan ta lahan chikˈ ebnaj lan ̈ oxa maoc munil yebex , mach hawoc yin ̈ huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Hanintiˈan chu wakˈnihan inmelyuhan tet mac bay chiwochehan , ¿ mato chichiwa hacˈul yu cˈul incˈulan ? ” ẍi naj yahaw munil tuˈ .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Yuxin haˈ mac babel tinan ̈ , haˈ chicancano yin ̈ islahobal , wal mac islahobal ye tinan ̈ , haˈ chioc yin ̈ babel . Hantan ̈ e mac awtebil yu Comam Dios , yajaˈ haywan ̈ n ̈ e mac sicˈbililoj , ẍi Comam .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Yet ayxaco Comam Jesús yeb anma yin ̈ isbel bey Jerusalén , yawtenilo Comam ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom , yalni Comam tet ebnaj :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: ― Tinan ̈ xin lan ̈ an coto bey Jerusalén , yajaˈ Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chinálaxicojan yul iskˈab ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés cat iskˈanni ebnaj camical wiban ̈ an .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Chilahwi tuˈ cat quinyanicojan ebnaj yul iskˈab ebnaj mach Israeloj , cat isbuchwa ebnaj win ̈ an , cat quinismakˈnihan ebnaj . Chilahwi tuˈ cat quinyanican ̈ an ebnaj yin ̈ teˈ culus , yajaˈ yin ̈ yox tzˈayic cat witzitzbican ̈ an hunelxa , ẍi Comam .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Yet huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ apni ismiˈ ebnaj iscˈahol icham Zebedeo ilwal yin ̈ Comam Jesús . Tzujan xin ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ yinta ismiˈ , yay jahno ixnam sata Comam yuto ay huneˈ tzet choche ixnam iskˈanaˈ .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ixnam : ― Miyay , ¿ tzet chawoche hakˈanaˈ wetan ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ixnam : ― Mamin , yet chachoc Yahawoj chinkˈanan tawet tato cawan ̈ wunintiˈan chioc tacˈatan ̈ . Hunu naj chioc tzˈon ̈ no yin ̈ hawatxˈkˈab , hunuxa naj chioc tzˈon ̈ no yin ̈ hameckˈab , ẍi ixnam .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hex tiˈ mach heyohtajo tzet chekˈana . ¿ Chimyu heyucˈni huneˈ vaso ha haˈ caw cˈah hacaˈ huneˈ chiwucˈan ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Hoˈ , chu jucˈnihan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : ― Yeltoni chu heyucˈni huneˈ vaso ha haˈ caw cˈah chiwaltiˈan , yajaˈ wal hanintiˈan mach wetojan walnihan mac chiay tzˈon ̈ no yin ̈ inwatxˈkˈaban yeb yin ̈ inmeckˈaban , to han ̈ e Inmaman ohtan ̈ e mac tet chakˈa , ẍi Comam .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj lahon ̈ wan ̈ xa iscuywom Comam , caw tit ishowal ebnaj yin ̈ ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Yet yilni Comam huneˈ tuˈ , yawtenico Comam ebnaj iscˈatan ̈ , yalni Comam : ― Hex tiˈ caw heyohtaj tato ebnaj ayco yahawo con ̈ ob , ay yip ebnaj yiban ̈ con ̈ ob tuˈ . Haxa ebnaj nime winaj yul con ̈ ob yahawxa chute isba ebnaj yin ̈ anma .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Wal texol xin mach cˈuluj tato hac tuˈ cheyute , wal xin ta ay hunu mac ecˈbal yelapno ye chabe , ahojab chioc chejaboj .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Haxa mac choche ecˈbal yelapno chuco texol xin , yakˈabico isba chejaboj .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Hac tuˈ wehan Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , mach hulnajojinan yu inchejnihan anma , walxinto hacaˈ chejab wecojan xol anma , cat wakˈni camo inbahan hac tuˈ xin chu intohlanan ismul txˈiˈal anma , ẍi Comam .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Hayet yel Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con ̈ ob Jericó , caw hantan ̈ e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ay xin cawan ̈ ebnaj mach chu yilni , tzˈon ̈ anayo istiˈ beh . Hayet yaben ebnaj tato haˈ Comam Jesús lan ̈ an yecˈtoj , yahwi ebnaj tet Comam yin ̈ caw ip hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , yuninal iscˈahol naj rey David , caw tzˈayojab hacˈul jin ̈ an ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Yajaˈ xin oc anma iscachaˈ ebnaj yun ̈ e isbejni ebnaj yel yaw , yaj caw islahico ebnaj yahwi , yalnipaxo ebnaj : ― Mamin , iscˈahol jichmam David , caw tzˈayojab hacˈul jin ̈ an ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Yet yaben Comam Jesús huneˈ tuˈ yoc lin ̈ noj , yawtenti Comam ebnaj iscˈatan ̈ , iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet cheyoche chinwatxˈehan ? ẍi Comam .

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Mamin , chijochehan ̈ chawakˈ hajlo cosatan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Istzˈaycan ̈ iscˈul Comam yin ̈ ebnaj ; yanico Comam iskˈab yin ̈ isbakˈsat ebnaj , yin ̈ n ̈ ena tuˈ xin ishajlo issat ebnaj , yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Hayet ayto yapni Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Jerusalén yapni Comam bey Betfagé , iscawilal won ̈ an Olivo . Ischejnito Comam cawan ̈ ebnaj iscuywom ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Asiˈwe bey aldea cosatacˈto tiˈ , yet chexapno bey tuˈ cheyilaˈ huneˈ noˈ miˈe burro xecan , ayco yunin noˈ iscˈatan ̈ ; chepuholo noˈ cat heyinoti noˈ wetan .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Yajaˈ ta ay tzet chihallax teyin ̈ xin , cheyalaˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ay chiocnico noˈ yu Comam Jesús , yajaˈ chon ̈ hulan ̈ jakˈaˈpaxojan ̈ noˈ , ” quexchi , ẍi Comam .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Hac tuˈ yu yijni isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu huneˈ ischejab Comam Dios yet payat hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Halwe tet anma ay yul con ̈ ob Sión hacaˈ tiˈ : Ilwecˈanabi , lan ̈ an yul hereyal texol , huneˈ heyahaw tiˈ caw cˈul iscˈul , ayahto yiban ̈ huneˈ noˈ tzeh burro , yunin huneˈ noˈ miˈe burro ijtzom , ẍiayoj .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Isto ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ , isyijen ebnaj hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Yet yapni ebnaj bey tuˈ ispuhnilo ebnaj noˈ miˈe burro tuˈ , yiniti ebnaj noˈ yeb noˈ yunin tet Comam . Islitxˈbanahto ebnaj xil iskˈap iskˈan ̈ o yichin ̈ noˈ tzeh burro tuˈ , lahwi tuˈ yahto Comam yiban ̈ noˈ .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Caw hantan ̈ e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam , ay mac islebayo xil iskˈap yul beh . Aypaxo mac inilo xaj te teˈ yanayo yul beh bay chiecˈto Comam tuˈ .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Sunil anma babelico sata Comam yeb tzujanico yintaj , ichico yawi yin ̈ caw ip , chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Caw niman yelapno naj tiˈ , haˈ naj tiˈ titna yin ̈ yuninal jichmam rey David ! ¡ Jalaˈwe tzotiˈ cˈul yin ̈ mac chihul coxol yu Comam Dios ! ¡ Jakˈaˈwe yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios ay satcan ̈ ! ẍi anma .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Hayet yapni Comam bey Jerusalén , iswejchacan ̈ anma sunil , iskˈambeni : ― ¿ Mac anmahil huneˈ naj tiˈ ? ẍi anma .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Istakˈwi huntekˈanxa ebnaj : ― Haˈ naj tiˈ Jesús , ischejab Comam Dios ay bey Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yocto Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , istzumbenilti sunil anma chitxon ̈ wi yeb chilokˈwi bey tuˈ . Iswacchancan ̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj helom melyu , ispacˈchanpaxocan ̈ Comam isẍila ebnaj txon ̈ om palamuch .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ watutan yet txah yehi , ” ẍiayoj . Yajaˈ hex tiˈ hacaˈ hunu isn ̈ achˈen elkˈom , hac tuˈ ye heyu , ẍi Comam .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Hayet ayicto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tuˈ yapni huntekˈan ebnaj mach chu yilni yeb ebnaj txˈoj ye yoj ; yakˈni cawxo Comam ebnaj .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Hayet yilni ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ ley huntekˈan cˈaybalcˈule iswatxˈe Comam tuˈ caw tit ishowal ebnaj ; yeb yet yaben ebnaj yalni niẍte unin : “ Jakˈaweco ismay iscˈahol jichmam rey David , ” ẍi ,

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Chimhawabe tzet chal niẍte unin tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ chiwabehan , yajaˈ ¿ tom maẍto bay cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ ? : Haˈ niẍte unin yeb niẍte chi ‑ to ‑ txutxwi haˈ chakˈan bitn ̈ eno habi , ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam .

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yel Comam yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén , isto yul con ̈ ob Betania , bey tuˈ xin cancano Comam huneˈ akˈbal .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Haxa hunxa tzˈayic yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayalil , ismeltzo Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén . Yet ayco Comam yin ̈ isbel tuˈ isn ̈ ohchacan ̈ .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Yilnito Comam huneˈ teˈ higuera istiˈ beh , isto Comam yich teˈ , yilni Comam ta machi sat teˈ , xajn ̈ e teˈ aycoj . Yalni Comam yin ̈ teˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Matxa bakˈinal chachsatni ! ẍi Comam . Yin ̈ n ̈ ena tuˈ xin istajilo teˈ .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam huneˈ tuˈ , caw cˈaycan ̈ iscˈul ebnaj , iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet mayu istajnalo teˈ yin ̈ an ̈ e ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ta caw cheyaco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , machi xin chicabcon hecˈul , maẍn ̈ etaj huneˈ mayu yin ̈ teˈ higuera tiˈ chisje hewatxˈeni . Wal xin tato cheyal tet huneˈ witz tiˈ : “ Heqˈuilo haba bey tiˈ cat hato hawanoyto haba xol haˈ mar , ” ta quexchi , chiyij isba tzet cheyala .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Yuxin ta yin ̈ sunil heyanma chextxahli tet Comam Dios yet chekˈanni hunu tzet ye tuˈ , chiakˈlax teyet , ẍi Comam .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yapni Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén , yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios . Hayet lan ̈ an iscuywa Comam xin ishitzico ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj Israel , iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Mac cachchejni hawatxˈen huntekˈan hawatxˈe yet ewi ? ¿ Mac akˈni hawip ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Haquintuˈan ay huneˈ inkˈambebalan teyet , ta chepajtze wetan chiwalan mac akˈn ̈ e wipan inwatxˈenan huntekˈan tuˈ .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: ¿ Mac chejniti naj Juan yanocan ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma ? ¿ Tom Comam Dios mato haˈ anma ? ẍi Comam . Yichico ebnaj yallen tet hunun hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Tato chijalaˈ ta Comam Dios chejniti naj Juan tuˈ , chimyalaˈ naj jet : “ ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin mach heyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet yal naj ? ” ẍim naj .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: “ Yajaˈ ta chijalpaxoj ta haˈ anma chejn ̈ e naj , chon ̈ xiw jalni yuto sunil anma chianayto yul yanma tato naj Juan tuˈ ischejab Comam Dios ye naj , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yuxin takˈwi ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mach johtajojan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Haquintuˈan mach chiwalan mac akˈn ̈ e wipan inwatxˈenan huntekˈan tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús tet ebnaj hunelxa : ― ¿ Tzet cheyute heyalni yin ̈ huneˈ chiwaltiˈan ? Ay huneˈ naj mame ay cawan ̈ iscˈahol ; yalni naj tet naj babel hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Cˈahol , as munlahan ̈ xol teˈ uva , ” ẍi naj .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Istakˈwi naj : “ ¡ Mach chintohan ! ” ẍi naj . Yajaˈ tzujanxa xin yoc yin ̈ isnabal naj istohi .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yalnipaxo naj mame tuˈ tet naj iscab tato chitopaxo naj munil ; istakˈwi naj : “ Cˈulticˈa mam chintohan , ” ẍi naj . Yajaˈ xin mach to naj .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: ¿ Mac xin najil yijen tzet yal ismam yin ̈ ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Naj babel , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ebnaj ikˈomilo tohlabal yeb ebix ix txˈoj ye iswiˈ haˈ chioc babel yul iskˈab Comam Dios tesataj .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Yuto hulicˈo naj Juan anican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma quexiscuyuˈ yin ̈ iscˈulal , yajaˈ mach heyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet yal naj . Wal ebnaj ikˈomilo tohlabal yeb ebix txˈoj ye iswiˈ yayto yul yanma yin ̈ tzet yal naj . Wal hex tiˈ xin , waxan ̈ ca caw heyil huntekˈan tuˈ yajaˈ mach hehel hebeybal , yeb xin mach heyayto yul heyanma , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Abewe huneˈxa yechel chiwaltiˈan : “ Ay huneˈ naj yahaw munil tzˈunni teˈ uva sat istxˈotxˈ , ispenayo naj istzˈunub tuˈ . Iswatxˈen naj bay chiyatzˈlax yal teˈ , iswatxˈenpaxocan ̈ naj huneˈ n ̈ a nimajal yucan ̈ istel yun ̈ e istan ̈ elax huneˈ peyab tuˈ . Lahwi tuˈ xin , yanito naj istzˈunub tuˈ comonal tet huntekˈan ebnaj . Isto naj yul huneˈxa con ̈ ob caw nahat .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Haxa yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax teˈ uva tuˈ xin , yanito naj huntekˈan ischejab ischahno ismajul tet ebnaj munlawom tuˈ .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Hayet yapni ebnaj chejab tuˈ xin , yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo ebnaj , ismakˈni ebnaj huneˈ naj , hunxa naj makˈbil ispotxˈni ebnaj , haxa hunxa naj xin kˈojlaxcan ̈ naj .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ iscayel ecˈbalxa ebnaj chejab yato naj yahaw munil , yajaˈ xin hacticˈapax tuˈ utelax ebnaj yu ebnaj munlawom tuˈ .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Yin ̈ xa istzujanil xin , haˈ caw iscˈahol naj yahaw munil tuˈ yatoj , istxumni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ‘ Wal tet naj incˈaholtiˈan chimisyije ebnaj , ’ ẍi naj .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Yajaˈ hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj cˈahole tuˈ , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : ‘ Haˈ tet naj tiˈ chicancano huneˈ txˈo txˈotxˈ tiˈ , wal tinan ̈ copotxˈowe camo naj haxinwal jetxa chuco huneˈ istxˈotxˈ naj tiˈ , ’ ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo naj , yilaxilto naj yintalto peyab tuˈ yu ebnaj , ispotxˈni ebnaj naj , ” ẍi Comam .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yet chihul naj yahaw munil tuˈ , ¿ tzettaxca chute naj ebnaj munlawom tuˈ cheyute heyalni ? ẍi Comam .

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Matxa chitzˈay iscˈul naj ispotxˈni ebnaj munlawom txˈoj tuˈ , cat yanito naj istzˈunub tuˈ comonal tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj munlawom tzˈajan chu yakˈni ismajul yet chiuxlax sat teˈ uva tuˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús : ― ¿ Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ ? : Haˈ huneˈ chˈen chˈen mach isje ebnaj watxˈemcan ̈ n ̈ a yakˈaco yin ̈ ismunil , haˈ chˈen caw ecˈbalto cˈul yoc xeˈo n ̈ a . Haˈ Comam watxˈen ̈ e huneˈ tuˈ , caw xin chicˈay cocˈul jilni , ẍiayoj .

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Yuxin chiwalan teyet ta nanxa con ̈ obal chioc yul iskˈab Comam Dios heseleloj , yuto yijem anma tuˈ yakˈni ismajul yin ̈ tzet chiswatxˈe tet Comam .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Wal huneˈ chˈen chˈen tuˈ , ta ay mac chiaycˈay yiban ̈ chˈen hayebtam iskˈahilal chioqui . Yajaˈ ta haˈ chˈen chiaycˈay yiban ̈ , chiquechmoto yalan ̈ chˈen , ẍi Comam .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj iswiˈehal ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj fariseo yalni Comam hacaˈ tuˈ , istxumni ebnaj tato yin ̈ ebnaj yal Comam huntekˈan yechel tuˈ .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Yuxin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam , yajaˈ xiw ebnaj tet anma yuto sunil anma chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios ye Comam Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Yichipaxico Comam Jesús yalni tet ebnaj , yanico Comam huntekˈan yechel yin ̈ cuybanile tuˈ , yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: ― Haˈ anma awtebil yoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios , lahan hacaˈ yakˈle anma yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ yecˈtze huneˈ naj rey yet ismohyi iscˈahol .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Hayet cˈulxa ye sunil , yanito naj ischejab yikˈati ebnaj awtebil yin ̈ huneˈ mohyilal tuˈ . Yajaˈ machi hunu ebnaj isjetij .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yanipaxto naj huntekˈanxa ischejab , yalni naj tet ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Halwe tet anma awtebil tuˈ tato watxˈebilxa itah . Manchejan potxˈlaxo haycˈon ̈ inwacaxan , yeb hunmajanxa no nokˈ caw bakˈich , watxˈebilxa sunil . ‘ Asiˈwe yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ , ’ quexchi , ” ẍi naj rey .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Yajaˈ ebnaj awtebil tuˈ , maẍticˈa cam iscˈul ebnaj istita . Huneˈ naj to ilno ismunil , hunxa naj xin to ilno istxon ̈ .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Haxa huntekˈanxa ebnaj xin , oc ebnaj howal yin ̈ ebnaj chejab tuˈ , ispotxˈlax ebnaj yu ebnaj .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Hayet yaben naj rey huneˈ tuˈ caw tit ishowal naj . Ischejni naj issoldado ispotxˈno ebnaj potxˈwawom tuˈ , isn ̈ uslaxpaxilo iscon ̈ ob ebnaj .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yalnipaxo naj rey tuˈ tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj ischejab : “ Sunil tzet chiocnico yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ tiˈ watxˈebilxa sunil , yajaˈ ebnaj awtebil wuhan mach chisjeti ebnaj , yuxin mach istzano ebnaj yul yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ tiˈ .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ asiˈwe yulaj calle cat hechejniti sunil mac chiilcha heyu yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ tiˈ , ” ẍi naj .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj chejab huneˈ tuˈ , isto ebnaj yulaj calle , yiniti ebnaj sunil anma chiecˈ bey tuˈ . Ay anma cˈul isbeybal , ay anma txˈoj isbeybal . Caw xin nohilo teˈ n ̈ a yu anma yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Hayet yocto naj rey yilno anma cutxanxaco tuˈ , yilni naj huneˈ naj mach ayoco xil iskˈap yet mohyilal .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Yalni naj rey tet naj : “ ¿ Tzet mayu hawocti bey tiˈ , machi xin xil hakˈap yet mohyilal aycoj ? ” ẍi naj . Yajaˈ xin maẍticˈa takˈwi naj .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Yalni naj rey tuˈ tet ebnaj ischejab : “ Cˈalbawe yoj huneˈ naj tiˈ yeb iskˈab naj cat heyanilto naj xol kˈejholo , haˈ bey tuˈ xin chiokˈo naj yin ̈ , cat isn ̈ etxˈlaho yeh naj , ” ẍi naj .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Wal xin chiwalan teyet , caw txˈiˈal mac awtebil yu Comam Dios yajaˈ haywan ̈ n ̈ e mac chissiqˈuilo Comam , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ ishecˈnilo isba ebnaj fariseo , islahtiˈn ̈ en isba ebnaj yin ̈ tzet chu yakˈni aycˈayo ebnaj Comam yin ̈ hunu tzotiˈ , cat yoc ebnaj akˈocˈule yin ̈ Comam yalni .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Yuxin yato ebnaj haywan ̈ ebnaj ayco yin ̈ ispartido , yeb haywan ̈ ebnaj ayco yin ̈ ispartido naj Herodes iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yun ̈ e yilwen ebnaj Comam . Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , caw johtajan ̈ tato hach tiˈ isyelaln ̈ eticˈa chawala , chacuynipaxo anma iswatxˈen hacaˈ choche iscˈul Comam Dios . Machi xin comono chawabeto yin ̈ tzet chal anma , yuto lahan yelapno anma yul hasat .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Yuxin , ¿ tzet chawute hawalni yin ̈ huneˈ tiˈ : Chˈen tohlabal chiel jin ̈ yu naj jahaw ay Roma , cˈulmi jakˈni chˈen mato machoj ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Yajaˈ wal Comam Jesús pet istxumnalo Comam tzet nabil yu ebnaj . Yuxin yal Comam : ― Hex cheyal heba cˈulal tiˈ , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin chesay yin ̈ tzet chu waycˈayan yul hekˈab ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Yewe hunu chˈen melyu cheyakˈ yin ̈ hetohlabal tuˈ wilaˈan nan ̈ , ẍi Comam . Yakˈni ebnaj huneˈ chˈen denario tet Comam .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin ̈ chˈen ? ẍi Comam .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Yechel sat naj jahaw ay bey Roma , yeb xin isbi naj ayco yin ̈ chˈen , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam xin : ― Akˈwe tet naj yahaw Roma , baytet yet naj yehi , cat heyakˈni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi , ẍi Comam .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam huneˈ tuˈ , caw cˈayilo iscˈul ebnaj , isbejnicano ebnaj Comam .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Yin ̈ ticˈa huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ , ay huntekˈan ebnaj saduceo bey ilno Comam Jesús . Ebnaj saduceo tuˈ mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma tato itzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa , yuxin iskˈambe ebnaj tet Comam :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: ― Mam cuywawom , halbilcano yin ̈ isley naj Moisés hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ta chicam yichamil hunu ix ix , machi xin yuninal naj yeb ix , yilal yikˈni ix yuẍta naj camna tuˈ , yun ̈ e ay yuninal naj yeb ix cat yoc yuninalo naj camna tuˈ , ” ẍiayoj .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Yajaˈ yet hunel , coxoltiˈan ̈ ay hujwan ̈ ebnaj yuẍtan ̈ e isba . Naj babel mohyi yeb huneˈ ix yajaˈ cam naj , machi xin yuninal naj yeb yixal tuˈ , yuxin mohyi naj iscab yeb ix .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Yajaˈ campaxo naj , hacticˈapax tuˈ yu naj isyox , masanta apni yin ̈ naj ishuj , sunil ebnaj ikˈlen ix .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ iscampaxo ix .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Yuxin hayet chiitzitzbican ̈ camom , ¿ mac ebnaj hujwan ̈ tuˈ chioc yichamilo ix yuto ishujwan ̈ il ebnaj mohyi yeb ix ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam Jesús tet ebnaj saduceo tuˈ : ― Hex tiˈ , maẍtaj haˈ ye heyu , yuto mach heyohtajo tzet chal yul Yum Comam Dios , yeb mach heyohtajo yip Comam .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Wal xin hayet chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camom matxa chimohyi , yuto lahanxa chielico hacaˈ ebnaj ángel ay satcan ̈ .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Yin ̈ yet chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camom tuˈ , ¿ tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ ? :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
