text2: “ Hanintiˈan isDiosal naj Abraham , naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob , ” ẍiayoj . Yuxin waxan ̈ ca cam ebnaj yajaˈ mach cam ebnaj yin ̈ huneln ̈ e . Yuto mach isDiosalo camom ye Comam Dios to isDiosal anma itzitz , ẍi Comam .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Yet yaben anma huntekˈan cuybanile yal Comam tuˈ caw cˈayilo iscˈul .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tato matxa yu istakˈwi ebnaj saduceo tet Comam Jesús , iscutxbanico isba ebnaj .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Xol ebnaj tuˈ xin ayco huneˈ naj cuywawom yin ̈ ley , haˈ naj oc ilweno Comam , yalni naj :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: ― Mam cuywawom , ¿ baytet chejbanile caw ecˈbal yelapno xol chejbanile aycano yu naj Moisés ? ẍi naj .

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet naj : ― Ochewe Comam Dios yin ̈ sunil hecˈul , heyanma yeb henabal .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Haˈ xin huneˈ chejbanile tuˈ haˈ babel yeb ecˈbal yelapno xol huntekˈanxa .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Haˈ huneˈxa iscab xin , lahan hacaˈ huneˈ babel , chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil hacaˈ hexahann ̈ en heba , ” ẍiayoj .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Hayet chicoyijen cabeb chejbanile tiˈ , lan ̈ an coyijen huntekˈanxa cuybanile akˈbilcano yu naj Moisés , yeb tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Hayet cutxantoco ebnaj fariseo tuˈ ,

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: iskˈamben Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet cheyute hetxumni yin ̈ naj Cristo ? ¿ Mac yin ̈ chitit naj heyalni ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ naj rey David chitit naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Yajaˈ naj David tuˈ , yal naj naj Cristo Yahawoj yet yakˈlax yalaˈ naj yu Comam Espíritu Santo yet yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Yal Comam Dios tet Wahawilan : “ Ayan ̈ tzˈon ̈ no yin ̈ inwatxˈkˈaban masanto chiwacojan mac ayco ishowal tawin ̈ yalan ̈ hawoj , ” ẍi Comam , ẍi naj David .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin yal naj David tuˈ naj Cristo Yahawiloj tato yin ̈ naj titna naj ? ẍi Comam .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Machi hunu ebnaj yu istakˈwi yin ̈ tzet yal Comam . Haˈticˈa yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ xin matxaticˈa hunu ebnaj hitzico iskˈamben hunu tzet ye tuˈ tet Comam .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yalni Comam Jesús tet anma yeb tet ebnaj iscuywom :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: ― Ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ ley , haˈ ismunil ebnaj tuˈ haˈ ton quexiscuyni yin ̈ isley Moisés .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Yuxin sunil tzet chal ebnaj teyet yijewej , yajaˈ mach chebeybaln ̈ eto tzet chiswatxˈe ebnaj , yuto haˈ tzet chal ebnaj mach chisbeybaln ̈ e ebnaj .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Haˈ cuybanil chakˈ ebnaj tet anma , lahan hacaˈ hunu ijatz caw al , machi mac chikˈoji yinican ̈ . Wal ebnaj xin nitam hunu yiximal iskˈab ebnaj chishitzico yin ̈ .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Cˈul yub ebnaj , caw yijem chute isba ebnaj , yajaˈ yun ̈ e yillax ebnaj yu anma . Caw nimej chute ebnaj sat noˈ tzˈum bay tzˈibn ̈ ebilico Istzotiˈ Comam Dios cat yanico ebnaj noˈ yin ̈ iskˈab , maca yin ̈ ispalan ̈ . Chanipaxico ebnaj huntekˈan xil iskˈap nimej ishojo istiˈ .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Yet chiawtelax ebnaj waˈo yin ̈ kˈin ̈ , haˈ huntekˈan tzˈon ̈ obal caw ay yelapnoj haˈ chismajilo ebnaj , hac tuˈ chutepaxo ebnaj yulaj capilla .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Hayet chiecˈpaxo ebnaj yulaj calle yochebal ebnaj caw cˈul chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj , yeb xin caw choche ebnaj yabeˈ tato chihallax cuywawomal yin ̈ ebnaj .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Wal hex tiˈ xin , machojab cheyoche chihallax cuywawomal teyin ̈ , yuto huneˈn ̈ e mac hecuywawom , wal xin heyuẍtan ̈ e heba .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Machi hunu mac cheyal hemamo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yuto huneˈn ̈ echˈan Hemam , haˈ ton Comam Dios ay yul satcan ̈ .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Machojab cheyoche chihallax iswiˈehal teyin ̈ , yuto huneˈn ̈ e mac iswiˈehal yeco teyin ̈ , haˈ ton Comam Cristo .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Wal xin haˈ mac ecˈbal yelapno yehi , yakˈabico isba chejabo texol .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Yuto haˈ mac chican ̈ isba , chiilaxayoj , wal mac chiyiyo isba xin , chiilaxcan ̈ .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: Hex cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal , ¡ caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto checach yoc anma yul iskˈab Comam Dios . Mach cheyaco heba , machi xin chejépaxo chioc mac choche yakˈaco isba yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Hex cuywawom hex tiˈ yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal , ¡ caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto cheyilo yatut ebix hun ix , chilahwi tuˈ caw nimej cheyute yoj hetxah , hacaˈtan ̈ e mach istxˈojal chewatxˈe . Wal xin caw ecˈbalto isyaˈtajil chiay teyiban ̈ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Hex cuywawom yin ̈ ley yeb xin hex fariseo hex tiˈ cheyal heba cˈulal . ¡ Caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yeb yiban ̈ haˈ mar chelahwilo heyeqˈui yun ̈ e hemontenico anma teyintaj . Haˈ mac chimoncha heyu tuˈ xin chisomchacanto yul iswiˈ heyu , cayel ecˈbalto chischah isyaˈtajil xol kˈa kˈaˈ tesataj .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: Hex tiˈ lahanex hacaˈ hunu mac mach chu yilni , yajaˈ cheyaco heba ijbalomal . ¡ Caw cˈanchˈanex ! Cheyalnipax hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ta ay mac chiakˈni binaho yatut Comam Dios yet chistakˈwenico hunu tzet ye tuˈ yin ̈ , mach yilalo chisyije . Yaj ta isbi chˈen oro ayicto yul yatut Comam chakˈ binaho yin ̈ hunu tzet ye tuˈ , caw yilal isyijeni , ” quexchi .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: ¡ Caw suc hex ! Lahanex hacaˈ anma mach chu yilni . ¿ Baytet ecˈbal yelapno yehi ? ¿ Tom chˈen oro mato yatut Comam Dios ? Wal xin , yu yatut Comam Dios yuxin ay yelapno ye chˈen oro ayicto yul yatut tuˈ .

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Cheyalnipaxoj : “ Ta ay hunu mac chiakˈni binaho altar yet chistakˈwenico hunu tzet ye tuˈ yiban ̈ , mach yilalo chisyije . Yajaˈ ta isbi xahanbal ayahto yiban ̈ altar tuˈ chakˈ binahoj , caw yilal chisyije , ” quexchi .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: ¡ Caw lahanex yeb anma mutzˈan sat ! ¿ Baytet caw ecˈbal yelapno yehi ? ¿ Tom haˈ xahanbal ayahto yiban ̈ altar tuˈ , mato haˈ altar huneˈ chianico ismay xahanbal tuˈ ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Wal xin haˈ mac chiakˈni binaho altar yin ̈ tzet chala , haˈ hun tzet ayahto yiban ̈ altar tuˈ chakˈ binahoj .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ mac chiakˈni binaho yatut Comam Dios yin ̈ tzet chala , haˈ hun Comam Dios ay bey tuˈ chakˈ binahoj .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ mac chiakˈni binaho satcan ̈ yin ̈ tzet chala , haˈ hun istzˈon ̈ obal Comam Dios chiyakˈ binahoj , cat yakˈnipaxo binaho Comam tzˈon ̈ an yul yehobal tuˈ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Hex cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal . ¡ Cˈanchˈanex ! cheyakˈ isdiezmohal teˈ alawena , teˈ aniẍ , yeb teˈ comino , yajaˈ machi cam hecˈul heyijen chejbanile caw ay yelapno aycano yu Comam Dios ; haˈ ton hewatxˈen istoholal , yeb istzˈay hecˈul yin ̈ heyet anmahil , yeb xin heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , yeb heyanico heyanma yin ̈ Comam , haˈ ton huntekˈan tiˈ yilal heyijeni , machi xin chebejpaxo heyijen huntekˈanxa tuˈ .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: ¡ Hex tiˈ lahanex yeb anma mutzˈan sat , yajaˈ cheyaco heba ijbalomal yin ̈ hunuxa maca . Hex tiˈ caw cheyila tato machi hunu noˈ nichˈan us chito xol heyitah , yajaˈ mach cheyabe hebikˈnito noˈ camello !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: Hex cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal , ¡ caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto caw cˈul cheyute hetxˈahni yinta hevaso yeb hesecˈ , yajaˈ wal yul xin , nohnayto yu istzˈilal heyelekˈ yeb yu heyecˈnajil .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Hex fariseo hex tiˈ , lahanex hacaˈ hunu mac mutzˈan issat . Wal xin txˈahwe babel yul hevaso yeb hesecˈ , haxinwal saj chielpaxico yintaj .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: Hex cuywawom hex yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal . ¡ Caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto lahanex hacaˈ hunu panteón caw cˈul yehico istxohal ; caw cˈulchˈan jilni , yajaˈ wal yul xin , nohna yu isbajil camom yeb tzˈil .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Hacaˈ huntekˈan panteón tuˈ haquex tuˈ . Han ̈ e yin ̈ sat anma caw cˈul cheyute heba , wal heyanma xin nohna yu lekˈtiˈal yeb yu istxˈojal .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: Hex cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés yeb hex fariseo hex tiˈ , cheyal heba cˈulal . ¡ Caw cˈanchˈanex ! yuto checayen ̈ e hetzantencan ̈ bay mujan ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios . Chetzantenpaxo bay mujan ebnaj cˈul iswatxˈe ,

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: cheyalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Tato ayon ̈ icˈo yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal yet ispotxˈlax ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yu ebnaj jichmam , mach chimjaco coba copotxˈni ebnaj , ” quexchi .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Hayet cheyalni hacaˈ tuˈ , hex caw ex cheyaliloj tato yin ̈ yuninal ebnaj potxˈni camo ebnaj ischejab Comam tuˈ quextita .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: ¡ Wal xin haˈ tzet ichebilxa yu ebnaj heyichmam tuˈ , lahwecanoj !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Hex tiˈ , lahanex yeb noˈ laba yuto caw helanex yin ̈ istxˈojal . ¿ Tzettaxca chu hecolni heba tet isyaˈtajil xol kˈa kˈaˈ mach istan ̈ bal ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Chinchejtojan ischejab Comam Dios texol yeb mac itzˈat iswiˈ yin ̈ yet Comam , yeb ebnaj cuywawom . Yajaˈ xin ay ebnaj chepotxˈ yul hecapilla , ay ebnaj cheyacan ̈ yin ̈ culus , aypaxo ebnaj chemakˈ yul hecapilla , yeb xin ay ebnaj chetzumbecˈo yul hunun con ̈ ob .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Teyiban ̈ xin chititcano isyaˈtajil yu iscamical sunil ebnaj potxˈbil ; ebnaj cˈul tzet iswatxˈe chiichiti yin ̈ iscamical naj Abel masanta yin ̈ iscamical naj Zacarías , iscˈahol icham Berequías , potxˈbil xolbal yatut Comam Dios yeb bay chiakˈlax xahanbal .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , chititcano isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ anma yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tiˈ yu iscamical ebnaj tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― ¡ Hex ah Jerusalén tiˈ chepotxˈ camo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , cat hekˈojni camo ebnaj ischejti Comam texol ! ¡ Txˈiˈal el quexwawtecojan yul inkˈaban , hacaˈ chu yawtenico noˈ miˈe chiyo niẍte yunin yalan ̈ isxicˈ , yajaˈ machi heje !

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Abewecano tzet chiwaltiˈan , huneˈ hecon ̈ ob tiˈ chebejaˈcanoj , chicancano man ̈ anmahil .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Tinan ̈ xin chiwalcanojan teyet tato matxa chinheyilan masanto yet cheyalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¡ Jakˈawe tzalaho cocˈul yin ̈ mac chul coxol yu Comam Dios ! ” quexchi , ẍi Comam .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yelti Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios . Hayet lan ̈ an yelti Comam tuˈ xin ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam iscˈatan ̈ , yichico ebnaj isyeni huntekˈan teˈ n ̈ a yetbi isba yeb yatut Comam tuˈ .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , huntekˈan cheyil tiˈ chiapni istzˈayical bay chiuchcˈalaxtoj . Machi hunu chˈen chˈen latzˈbil tiˈ chican yiban ̈ yet chˈenal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ isto Comam Jesús yin ̈ istzalanil won ̈ an Olivo , yay tzˈon ̈ no Comam bey tuˈ , ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam iscˈatan ̈ . Hayet ischuquil ebnaj yeb Comam tuˈ iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mamin , hal jetan ̈ , ¿ bakˈin chu huntekˈan maxawal tuˈ , yeb baytet huntekˈan yechel chisye isba yet toxa chaẍhuli yeb yin ̈ yet chilahwi yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Yichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj : ― Caw cheyil heba , machojab mac chexakˈni subchahoj .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Yuto txˈiˈal ebnaj chuli cat isbalnico ebnaj inbihan yin ̈ , cat yalni : “ Hanintiˈan Cristo inan , ” ẍi ebnaj . Caw xin txˈiˈal mac chisubcha yu ebnaj .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Cheyaben yichican ̈ howal bey tiˈ , yeb yul huntekˈanxa con ̈ ob . Yajaˈ mach chexxiwi yuto yilal yul huntekˈan tuˈ , yaj maẍto istan ̈ balo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Chakˈlecan ̈ howal ej txˈotxˈ nimeta con ̈ ob yeb huntekˈanxa txˈotxˈ nimeta con ̈ ob , cat yanipaxico howal huneˈ con ̈ ob yin ̈ huneˈxa con ̈ ob . Caw txˈiˈal howal yeb yabil chuli , chulpaxo wahil yeb chixcab yul hunun con ̈ ob .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Yajaˈ yichebaniln ̈ e isyaˈilal ye huntekˈan tuˈ .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Hex tiˈ , chexilaxto sata ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob yu yakˈlax ecˈoyaˈ heyanma , cat xin quexispotxˈni camo ebnaj . Sunil anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ chexcajni yuto tzujanex wintajan .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , txˈiˈal mac chiyilo yanma yin ̈ Comam Dios . Chioc ishowal anma yin ̈ hunun , cat ishobnican ̈ anma lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ hunun .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Txˈiˈal ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios , caw xin txˈiˈal mac chisubcha yu ebnaj .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Caw chiahcan ̈ anma iswatxˈen istxˈojal , yuxin matxa xahano chil anma yet anmahil .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Haˈ mac chitecha yu masanto yin ̈ islahobal , haˈ chicolchahi .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Yajaˈ wal Tzotiˈ cˈul yin ̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul iskˈab Comam Dios , yilal ispujbalaxicˈo yul hunun con ̈ ob yun ̈ e yohtan ̈ encanilo anma , lahwi tuˈ cat yul islahobal tzˈayic .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu huneˈ ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Daniel yin ̈ huneˈ naj chihul etanoto yatut Comam Dios yu istxˈojal chiswatxˈe naj . Mac chiilni huneˈ tiˈ istxumabiloj .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Yuxin maquex ayexicˈo yul con ̈ ob Judea tiˈ yet chiyuni huneˈ tuˈ yilal heyelcan ̈ cat heto iswiˈla witz .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Haˈ mac ayahto yiban ̈ yacˈalil yatut , matxa chiayti yikˈalti hunu tzet ye tuˈ yul yatut , to beh yelcan ̈ .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Wal mac ayto xol ismunil xin , matxa chimeltzo yikˈalti xil iskˈap yul yatut .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Cˈanchˈan ebix ix ayxa tzet yehi , yeb ebix chi ‑ to ‑ txutxwi niẍte yunin yet chiyuni huneˈ tuˈ !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Yuxin kˈanwe tet Comam Dios , haxinwal machojab yin ̈ n ̈ abil chu huneˈ tuˈ , machojabpaxo yin ̈ istzˈayical xewilal chiyuhi .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Yuto huneˈ isyaˈtajil chul yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , caw nanxa islowi , maẍto hunelo chu yichitax iswatxˈi yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , matxa bakˈinal chupaxoj yet chilahwi yecˈcanoj .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Yajaˈ tato mach chiscˈotzba Comam Dios yoj huneˈ tiempo tuˈ , machim hunu mac chicolchahi . Wal xin chiscˈotzba Comam yu iscolni macta sicˈbilxa yu .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet : “ Ay naj Cristo bey tiˈ , lah , ” maca “ ay naj Cristo bey tuˈ , lah , ” ta ẍi , mach cheyayto yul heyanma .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Yuto ay ebnaj chisbalico isba Cristohal , yeb ay ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios . Chisye ebnaj huntekˈan yechel yeb cˈaybalcˈule yun ̈ e issubcha anma yu ebnaj . Etza xin chisubchapaxo mac sicˈbilxa yu Comam Dios yu ebnaj .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Wal xin , ayto chiwalnicanojan huntekˈan tiˈ teyet .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet : “ As ilwej , ay naj Cristo bey txˈotxˈ desierto , ” ta ẍi , mach chextohi . Maca ta chihallax teyet : “ Ewan ye naj bey tiˈ , lah , ” ta ẍi , mach cheyayto yul heyanma .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Yuto hacaˈ jilni isjebla cˈuh bay chiahilo tzˈayic , cat isjeplapaxo bay chito tzˈayic , hac tuˈ chu wulan Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Haˈticˈa bay ayayo isnimanil hunu camom , haˈ tuˈ chiscutxba isba noˈ usmij , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Chin ̈ elahwi yecˈto huntekˈan nimeta isyaˈtajil tuˈ , cat iskˈejholilo yoj tzˈayic , wal ixahaw matxa chimujli , cat istitcˈay txˈumel ay satcan ̈ , cat xin istzicobtan ̈ elax sunil tzet ay yip yul satcan ̈ .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ cat isyenican ̈ isba yechel wulbalan yul satcan ̈ , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . Wal anma ay yul hunun con ̈ ob yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chixiwcan ̈ cat yoc okˈoj yet chiyilni wulan xol moyan . Chinhulan yeb iskˈakˈal wipan .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Hayet chiokˈ chˈen trompeta yin ̈ caw ip , chinchejnicojan ebnaj ángel iscutxbaco sunil macta sicˈbilxa wuhan yul yiban ̈ kˈinal . Caw xin sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal chiecˈ ebnaj iscutxbacan ̈ anma sicˈbilxa tuˈ .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Txumwecˈanab yin ̈ teˈ higuera , hayet chiyaxbilo ischon iskˈab teˈ cat yelilo niẍte xaj teˈ , cheyohtan ̈ eloj ta toxa chioc haˈ n ̈ ab .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ xin yet cheyilni yijni isba sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan , cheyohtan ̈ eloj tato cawilxa wetijan , hacaˈ hunu mac lin ̈ anxaco sat pulta .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , sunil huntekˈan tiˈ chij isba yalan ̈ to maẍto chicam huntekˈan anma ayicˈo yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tiˈ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Haˈ satcan ̈ yeb txˈo txˈotxˈ chitan ̈ iloj , yajaˈ wal intzotiˈan xin machi ecˈto yet yijni isba tzet chala .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Yajaˈ wal yin ̈ tzet tzˈayical yeb tzet orahil chinhultuˈan , machi mac ohtan ̈ e , nitam ebnaj ángel ay satcan ̈ . Mach wohtapaxojan hanin Iscˈahol Comam Dios intiˈan , walxinto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e Inmaman ohtan ̈ e .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Hacaˈ yu anma yin ̈ istiempohal naj Noé , hac tuˈ chu anma yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal yet chinhulan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Yuto yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chihul haˈ niman yaxn ̈ ab , caw matzet chal iscˈul anma yin ̈ tzet yal naj Noé , caw xin han ̈ e waˈoj yeb ismohyi ayco yin ̈ iscˈul masanto yet yocto naj Noé yul teˈ barco .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Hayet tona nahul ay anma tuˈ , yul huneˈ niman yaxn ̈ ab yiban ̈ , istan ̈ ilo anma sunil . Hacaˈ yu anma yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , hac tuˈ chu anma yet chinhul lemnahan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay cawan ̈ o ebnaj winaj huneˈn ̈ e chimunlahi yet chiyuni huneˈ tuˈ , huneˈ naj chiilaxtoj , huneˈxa naj xin chicancanoj .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Yeb xin ta ay cawan ̈ ebix huneˈn ̈ e lan ̈ an iscawni , huneˈ ix chiilaxtoj huneˈxa ix chicancanoj .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Caw majwahan ̈ wej , yuto mach heyohtajo tzet tzˈayical chinhulan , hanin Heyahaw intiˈan .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Kˈinalo ta yohta hunu naj yahaw n ̈ a tzet orahil chul hunu naj elkˈom yin ̈ akˈbalil , chimyilo naj iswayan ̈ . Hac tuˈ xin mach chiocto naj elkˈom tuˈ yelkˈalti tzet ay naj .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Haˈ quexpax tuˈ hex tiˈ , helan cheyute heba , yuto yet matxa nano heyu cat wul lemnahan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Kˈinalo ta ay hunu naj yahaw munil ay haywan ̈ o ischejab , ham naj yijem yeb caw helan chacano naj seleloj yu yakˈni tzet chislo ebnaj ismunlawom yet chicˈayayoj .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Sakˈal yet naj chejab ta lan ̈ an isyijen naj tzet halbilcano tet yet chiapni naj yahaw tuˈ .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , naj yahaw munil tuˈ chaco naj naj yijem tuˈ yahawo yin ̈ sunil tzet aya .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Yajaˈ ta mach cˈuluj chute isba naj , cat yoc naj yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yaˈ wahawtuˈan , ¿ bakˈintam chul yaˈ ? ” ta ẍi naj .

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Cat yoc naj ismakˈni ebnaj chejab tuˈ , cat yoc naj waˈoj yeb xin ucˈu xol ebnaj ucˈum teˈ .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Haxa yet istzˈayical mach echmabilo yahaw naj tuˈ yu , hayet tohna nahul ay naj cat yul lemna yahaw naj tuˈ .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chiakˈlax ecˈoyaˈ yanma naj yu naj yahaw tuˈ , hacaˈ yakˈlax ecˈoyaˈ yanma huntekˈan ebnaj chal isba cˈulal . Haˈ tuˈ xin chiokˈ naj cat isn ̈ etxˈla yeh naj yu isyaˈtajil , ẍi Comam .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Yet chioc Comam Dios Yahawo bey tiˈ , lahan chakˈle anma hacaˈ yu lahon ̈ wan ̈ ebix kˈopo to yin ̈ huneˈ mohyilal yin ̈ akˈbalil . Yito ebix iscantil , isto ebix chahwal yin ̈ naj mohyom tuˈ .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Yajaˈ xin ay howan ̈ ebix mach helanoj , wal howan ̈ xa ebix xin caw helan ebix .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Ebix mach helano tuˈ , han ̈ e teˈ aceite ayayto yul iscantil ebix , han ̈ e teˈ yito ebix .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Wal ebix helan xin isnohtze ebix iscantil , yinipaxto ebix yakˈbilxa yaceite yul islimeta .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Yajaˈ xin ecˈto yorahil yulbal naj chimohyi tuˈ , caw xin kˈahan yechman ebix , matxa chitecha wayan ̈ yu ebix yuxin waycan ̈ ebix sunil .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ chuman akˈbal , yaben ebix yallax hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¡ Ahan ̈ wewanoj ! ¡ Lan ̈ an yul naj chimohyi lah ! Elan ̈ weti hechaba naj , ” ẍi .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Yet yaben ebix huneˈ tuˈ yahwano ebix , yanico ebix kˈaˈ yin ̈ iscantil .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Yalni ebix howan ̈ mach helano tuˈ tet ebix helan hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Akˈwe nino heyaceite jetan ̈ yuto lan ̈ an istan ̈ ilo kˈaˈ yin ̈ cocantilan ̈ lah , ” ẍi ebix .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Istakˈwi ebix helan tet ebix mach helano tuˈ : “ Mach chu jakˈnihan ̈ heyet , yuto ta chijakˈan ̈ hanicˈo heyet mach chimchabe hanicˈ tiˈ teyin ̈ , mach chimchabepaxocan ̈ jetan ̈ . Wal xin , cˈul ta chexto helokˈo heyet , ” ẍi ebix .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Yet ayto ebix howan ̈ lokˈo aceite tuˈ , yapni naj chimohyi . Wal ebix caw helan tuˈ octo ebix yinta naj yin ̈ mohyilal tuˈ , lahwi tuˈ xin ispebalaxcanilti teˈ pulta .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Hunepxaticˈa xin yapni ebix howan ̈ to lokˈo aceite , yoc ebix awocto sat pulta , yalni ebix : “ Mamin , Mamin , haj pulta jetan ̈ , ” ẍi ebix .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Istakˈwilti naj mohyom tuˈ tet ebix : “ ¡ Machoj ! Yin ̈ caw yel chiwalan , mach quexwohtajojan , ” ẍi naj .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Yuxin chiwalcanojan teyet , caw helan cheyute heba yuto mach heyohtajoj tzet tzˈayical yeb tzet orahil chinhulan , ẍi Comam .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Yet chul Comam Dios Yahawoj , lahan chakˈle anma hacaˈ yu ebnaj ischejab huneˈ naj yahaw munil . Oc yin ̈ isnabal naj isto bey huneˈxa nan con ̈ obal caw nahat , yajaˈ yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chito naj , yawten naj ebnaj ischejab yu yanicano naj ismelyu yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Tet huneˈ naj , howeb mil quetzal yacano naj yul iskˈab naj , wal tet hunxa naj xin , cab mil quetzal yacano naj , haxa tet hunxa naj xin mil quetzaln ̈ e yacano naj . Hataticˈa ishelanil hunun ebnaj , hac tuˈ yu yanicano naj chˈen tet ebnaj . Lahwi tuˈ isto naj .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Naj chejab chahnicano chˈen howeb mil quetzal , oc naj munil yeb chˈen , caw xin howebto mil chˈen yikˈ naj yiban ̈ ilo chˈen howeb mil tuˈ .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ naj chahnicano chˈen cab mil , cab milto chˈen yikˈpaxo naj yiban ̈ ilo chˈen cab mil tuˈ .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Wal naj chahnicano chˈen huneˈ mil , ishol naj txˈo txˈotxˈ ismujni naj chˈen alaxcano tet yu naj yahaw tuˈ .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Yet caw nimanxa tiempo chielto xin , yul naj yahaw melyu tuˈ , yawten naj ebnaj ischejab yu yilni naj hantaxa ismelyu .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Naj chahnicano chˈen howeb mil , haˈ naj oc babel yin ̈ sat naj yahaw melyu tuˈ . Yanicano naj chˈen howeb mil akˈlax tet yeb chˈen howeb mil yikˈ naj , yalni naj : “ Mamin , howeb mil chˈen hawacano wetan , yajaˈ xin howebxa mil chˈen chiwikˈan yiban ̈ ilo chˈen , ” ẍi naj .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Yalni naj yahaw melyu tuˈ tet naj : “ Caw cˈul mayu hamunlahi , yeb caw yijem maxawute haba . Yu caw cˈul maxawute haba yin ̈ hanicˈ wacanojan tawet , yuxinto caw hantan ̈ eto tzet chiwacanicojan yul hakˈab . Tinan ̈ xin ocan ̈ , akˈ tzalaho hacˈul incˈatan ̈ an , ” ẍi naj tet naj .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yapni naj chahnicano chˈen cab mil , yalni naj tet naj yahaw melyu tuˈ : “ Mamin , cab mil chˈen hawacano wetan , yajaˈ xin cabtopaxo mil chˈen wikˈan yiban ̈ ilo chˈen , ” ẍi naj .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Yalni naj yahaw melyu tuˈ tet naj : “ Caw cˈul mayu hamunlahi , yeb caw yijem maxawute haba . Yu caw cˈul hawute haba yin ̈ hanicˈ wacanojan tawet , yuxin caw nimanto tzet chiwacanojan yul hakˈab . Wal tinan ̈ ocan ̈ , akˈ tzalaho hacˈul incˈatan ̈ an , ” ẍi naj .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Haxa yet yapni naj chahni chˈen huneˈ mil xin , yalni naj tet naj yahaw melyu tuˈ : “ Mamin , wohtajan tato hach tiˈ caw how hach , yuto chahatxˈ tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajach tzˈunn ̈ e ; chawinipaxocan ̈ tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajach watxˈen ̈ eloj .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Wal xin quinxiwan , yuxin inmujan hamelyu yalan ̈ txˈotxˈ , yajaˈ tinan ̈ xin chiwakˈcanojan chˈen tawet , ” ẍi naj .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Yalni naj yahaw melyu tuˈ tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hach tiˈ caw mach cˈulo hamunlahi , caw isa hach . Ta hawohtaj tato chinhatxˈcan ̈ an tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajinan tzˈunn ̈ e , yeb ta chiwican ̈ an tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajinan watxˈen ̈ eloj ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: estam hawacto inmelyutiˈan yul banco . Hayet maquinhultiˈan xin , manchahnihan chˈen yeb yal , ” ẍi naj tet ischejab tuˈ .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yalni naj tet ebnaj ischejab : “ Iwelo chˈen mil quetzal tet naj cat heyakˈni chˈen tet naj ikˈn ̈ e chˈen lahon ̈ eb mil .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Yuto haˈ mac ay tzet aya chiakˈlax yakˈbil tet , hac tuˈ xin caw ecˈbalto tzet ay huneˈ mac tuˈ . Wal mac matzet ay xin , haˈ nichˈan ay yul iskˈab tuˈ , chiilaxilo tet .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Huneˈ naj chejab matzet chiel yin ̈ tiˈ hawelto naj xol kˈejholo , haˈ bey tuˈ xin chiokˈ naj yin ̈ , cat isn ̈ etxˈla yeh naj yu isyaˈtajil , ” ẍi naj yahaw tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chinhulan Yahawilo yeb iskˈakˈal wipan , cat yulpaxo ebnaj ángel wintajan , cat way tzˈon ̈ nojan yul incapilan .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Wal anma ay yul hunun con ̈ ob yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chicutxico insatajan , cat inpohnihan xol , hacaˈ chu ispohni naj tan ̈ em meˈ , noˈ meˈ xol noˈ chiw .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Noˈ meˈ tuˈ yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab naj chaco noˈ , wal noˈ chiw xin yin ̈ ismeckˈab naj chˈoc noˈ .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Hanin Yahawil intiˈan chiwalan tet anma ayco yin ̈ inwatxˈkˈaban hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hex xahechah iscˈulal Inmaman , ocan ̈ we yul huneˈ ehobal watxˈebil teyet yu Inmaman . Huneˈ tiˈ watxˈebil yettax iswatxˈi huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Yuto hayet inn ̈ ochahan , heyakˈni tzet chinlohan . Yet istaj intiˈan heyakˈni haˈ wucˈuˈan , yet wecˈan inkˈanaˈan bay chinwayan , heyakˈni bay quinwayan .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Yet lan ̈ anxa wel tˈilnojan , heyakˈni xil inkˈapan ; yet yaˈayinan , hebey quinhetuclenojan . Yet ayinictojan yul preso , hebey quinheyilnojan , ” quinchin ̈ eticˈahan tet anma tuˈ .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Haˈ anma watxˈen istoholal tuˈ xin , chiskˈambe wetan hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mamin , ¿ bakˈini cachn ̈ ohcha tuˈ jakˈnihan ̈ tzet chalo ? yeb ¿ bakˈini taj hatiˈ jakˈnihan ̈ haˈ hawucˈu ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: ¿ Bakˈini xin hakˈan bay cachway jetan ̈ , jakˈnihan ̈ bay cachwayi ? yeb ¿ bakˈini matxa xil hakˈap , jakˈnihan ̈ xil hakˈap ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: ¿ Bakˈini cachyabilnipaxoj , cobeyan ̈ cachcotuclenojan ̈ , yeb yet hawocto yul preso , con ̈ beyan ̈ cachjilnojan ̈ ? ” ẍi anma tuˈ .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Chiwalnihan tet hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet hecolwa yin ̈ hunu ebnaj wuẍtajan , waxan ̈ ca caw comon yeqˈui , win ̈ an hewatxˈe sunil huntekˈan tuˈ , ” quinchin ̈ eticˈahan tet .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin chiwalnihan tet anma ayco yin ̈ inmeckˈaban : “ Elan ̈ we yin ̈ insatan hex tzˈactiˈn ̈ ebilexxa tiˈ , asiˈwe xol kˈa kˈaˈ mach istan ̈ bal watxˈebilxa tet naj matzwalil yeb tet ebnaj ischejab naj .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Yuto yet inn ̈ ohchahan , maẍticˈa heyakˈ nino tzet inlohan , yet istaj intiˈan , maẍticˈa heyakˈ nichˈano haˈ wucˈuˈan .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Yet wecˈan inkˈanaˈan bay chinwayan , maẍticˈa heyakˈ bay quinwayan . Yet matxa xil inkˈapan maẍticˈa heyakˈ hunu xil inkˈapan . Yet yaˈayinan yeb yet ayinictojan yul preso , maẍticˈa quinhetuclehan , ” quinchin ̈ eticˈahan tet .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Yajaˈ chiskˈambe anma tuˈ wetan : “ Mamin , ¿ bakˈini cachn ̈ ohchahi , yeb istaj hatiˈ , cachecˈpaxo hakˈanaˈ bay cachwayi , yeb yet matxa xil hakˈap , machi xin con ̈ colwahan ̈ tawin ̈ ? Yebpaxo , ¿ bakˈini cachyabilni yeb hawocto yul preso ? ¿ Machi xin con ̈ colwapaxojan ̈ tawin ̈ hawalni ? ” ẍi anma tuˈ .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Yajaˈ chintakˈwihan tet : “ Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet mach quexcolwa yin ̈ hunu ebnaj wuẍtajan , yeb ebix wanaban , waxan ̈ ca caw comonn ̈ e yeqˈui , win ̈ an mach quexcolwa tuˈ , ” quinchin ̈ eticˈahan tet .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Haˈ huntekˈan anma tuˈ xin , chitocano yin ̈ isyaˈtajil yin ̈ huneln ̈ e . Wal anma watxˈen iscˈulal , chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jesús huntekˈan tuˈ xin , yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: ― Hex tiˈ heyohtaj tato cabexan ̈ e kˈin ̈ Pascua , yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ xin chinalaxicojan yul iskˈab anma cat walaxcan ̈ an yin ̈ culus , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Yin ̈ ticˈa huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ xin , ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj yul con ̈ ob tuˈ , iscutxbaco isba ebnaj bey yatut naj Caifás , naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Islahtiˈn ̈ en isba ebnaj yin ̈ tzet lekˈtiˈal chal ebnaj yin ̈ Comam Jesús , yun ̈ e istzabnayo ebnaj , cat yakˈni camo ebnaj Comam yalni .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet hunun : ― Yajaˈ mach yin ̈ o kˈin ̈ , haxinwal mach chiah bulna anma , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Yet ayxa Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob Betania xin , isto Comam yatut naj Simón , naj ayticˈaco yabil chiyij lepra yin ̈ .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Yet ayco Comam waˈo sat meẍa , yapni huneˈ ix ix iscˈatan ̈ Comam . Ikˈbil huneˈ chˈen limeta yu ix , alabastro isbi , nohna chˈen yu huneˈ an ̈ caw xukˈ sam , yeb caw ay istohol . Isjobnayo ix yiban ̈ iswiˈ Comam .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam huneˈ tuˈ istit ishowal ebnaj yin ̈ ix , yalni ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin ton ̈ e chietalaxto huneˈ an ̈ tiˈ ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Huneˈ an ̈ tiˈ caw ay istohol , majaltam matxon ̈ laxtoj , cat ispohlaxcan ̈ istohol yin ̈ anma mebaˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Hayet yaben Comam Jesús huneˈ tuˈ , yalni Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin cheyiti hehowal yin ̈ ix ? Huneˈ maswatxˈe ix win ̈ tiˈan , caw cˈul .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Anma mebaˈ ayn ̈ eticˈaco texol , walinan xin mach sunilbal tiempo ayinicˈojan texol .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Huneˈ ix tiˈ masjobayo ix huneˈ an ̈ caw xukˈ sam wiban ̈ an yun ̈ e cˈulxa ye innimanilan yet chinmujlaxan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , bajxan ̈ etuˈwal chihallax Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile chihallaxpaxo huneˈ maswatxˈe ix tiˈ , hac tuˈ xin chiakˈlax binaho ix , ẍi Comam Jesús tet ebnaj iscuywom .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Naj Judas Iscariote , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom Comam Jesús , to naj iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: yalni naj tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Hanta cheyakˈ wetan , chiwacojan naj Jesús yul hekˈab ? ẍi naj . Yalten ebnaj treinta melyu naba plata tet naj .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu yichico naj issayni yin ̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Haxa yet yayilo babel tzˈayic kˈin ̈ Pascua , yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan ̈ al , ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam iscˈatan ̈ , iskˈamben ebnaj : ― Mamin , ¿ baytuˈwal chawoche chicowatxˈehan ̈ tzet chicolo yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Asiˈwe yul con ̈ ob , yet chexapnoj cat heto bey yatut huneˈ naj , cat heyalno tet naj : “ Macon ̈ ischejtijan ̈ Comam cuywawom jalan ̈ tawet tato hanicˈxan ̈ e tiempohal aycˈo coxolan ̈ , yuxin haˈ bey hawatut tiˈ chon ̈ hulan ̈ jecˈtzehan ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tiˈ yeb Comam , ” quexchi , ẍi Comam .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , isto ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús , isyijen ebnaj hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam . Yoc ebnaj iswatxˈen tzet chilolax yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Haxa yet yah akˈbal xin , yoc Comam waˈo sat meẍa yeb ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom tuˈ .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an iswaˈ Comam yeb ebnaj tuˈ , yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ay huneˈ mac texol tiˈ chinanocojan yul iskˈab camical , ẍi Comam .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj huneˈ tuˈ , caw oc biscˈulal yin ̈ iscˈul ebnaj . Yoc ebnaj iskˈambeno tet Comam yin ̈ hununtajil : ― Mamin , ¿ machmitajinan ? ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ hununtajil .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Haˈ huneˈ mac huneˈn ̈ e chu wanaytojan inkˈaban yul plato yebi haˈ chinanocojan yul iskˈab camical .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , yilal wecˈan yin ̈ camical , hacaˈ yalni yul Yum Comam Dios . Yajaˈ , ¡ cˈanchˈan naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical ! Ayxicˈa mach pitzcˈa naj yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Naj Judas naj chianico Comam yul iskˈab camical tuˈ , iskˈambe naj : ― Mam cuywawom , ¿ tom haninan ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ , hachtoni , ẍi Comam .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an iswaˈ Comam , yinican ̈ ixim pan , yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios , iskˈaxponayo Comam ixim . Lahwi tuˈ yakˈni Comam ixim tet ebnaj iscuywom ; yalni Comam : ― Wawej , huneˈ tiˈ yechel innimanilan yehi , ẍi Comam .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Yinipaxocan ̈ Comam chˈen vaso , yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios . Lahwi tuˈ yakˈni Comam chˈen vaso tuˈ tet ebnaj , yalni Comam : ― Ucˈwe huneˈ tiˈ hesunil ,

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: yuto haˈ huneˈ tiˈ yechel inchiqˈuilan chimalto yu istan ̈ ismul txˈiˈal anma , yun ̈ e yijnicano isba istrato Comam Dios .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Chiwalpaxojan teyet tato matxa chiwucˈan yal teˈ uva masanto yet chioc Inmaman Yahawilal catto wucˈnihan yin ̈ yacˈtohal hunelxa , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Hayet lahwi isbitn ̈ encano ebnaj bit tet Comam Dios , isto Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj bey won ̈ an Olivo .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ : ― Yin ̈ huneˈ akˈbal tiˈ chicabconocan ̈ heyanma win ̈ an hesunil , yuto tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Chinpotxˈan naj tan ̈ em meˈ , cat ispujnacanto noˈ meˈ tuˈ , ” ẍiayoj .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Yajaˈ yet chinitzitzbican ̈ an xin , chinbabitojan tesata bey Galilea , ẍi Comam .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : ― Mamin , waxan ̈ ca sunil mac chicabconcan ̈ iscˈul tawin ̈ , yajaˈ walinan , machoj , ẍi naj .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan tawet , yin ̈ huneˈ akˈbal tiˈ oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan yet chiokˈocan ̈ noˈ icham chiyo , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Pedro : ― Waxan ̈ ca chinakˈlax camojan tawinta Mamin , yajaˈ mach chu walnihan ta mach cachwohtajojan , ẍi naj . Hacaˈticˈa yu yalni naj Pedro tuˈ , hac tuˈ yu yalnipaxo ebnaj sunil .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey huneˈ peyab chiyij Getsemaní , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Canan ̈ wecano tzˈon ̈ no bey tiˈ , chintohan txahlo cosatato tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Yinito Comam naj Pedro yeb ebnaj cawan ̈ iscˈahol icham Zebedeo yintaj . Yoc huneˈ niman biscˈulal yin ̈ yanma Comam , caw xin yaˈ yuco yin ̈ yanma .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Caw chiwabehan isyaˈil isbiscˈulal camical yin ̈ wanmahan . Canan ̈ wecano bey tiˈ ; ¡ iwelo hewayan ̈ wintajan ! ẍi Comam .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin ishitzilo Comam hanicˈ yin ̈ ebnaj , yay jahno Comam , yay xulno sat txˈotxˈ . Yichico istxahli : “ Mam , ta chisje hacˈul colinan tet huneˈ isyaˈtajil chul wiban ̈ tiˈan ; yaj mach hacaˈ chiwochehan , to hacaˈojab tzet chal hacˈul , ” ẍi Comam .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yul Comam bay cancano ebnaj oxwan ̈ , caw xin chiway ebnaj yet yapni Comam , yalni Comam tet naj Pedro : ― ¿ Tom mach chitecha heyu heyinilo hewayan ̈ hunu orahil wintajan ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Iwelo hewayan ̈ , txahlan ̈ we tet Comam Dios haxinwal mach chexaycˈay yul iskˈab istxˈojal . Wal heyanma hinan isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , yajaˈ wal henimanil xin mach chitecha ilwebal yu , ẍi Comam .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Istopaxo Comam txahlo hunelxa , yalnipaxo Comam yin ̈ istxah : “ Mam , ta mach chiecˈayo huneˈ tiˈ wiban ̈ an , yuhojab hacaˈ chal hacˈul , ” ẍi Comam .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Ismeltzopaxo Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj , caw xin yexn ̈ e isway ebnaj yuto caw mach chitecha naj wayan ̈ yu ebnaj .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ istopaxo Comam txahlo yin ̈ yoxel , hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam yin ̈ babelal yeb yin ̈ iscayel , hacticˈapax tuˈ yu yalni Comam .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin ismeltzo Comam bay ay ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom yexn ̈ eto hewayi , yeb hexewi ? Wal tinan ̈ maapni yorahil walaxicojan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , yul iskˈab anma mulum .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Ahan ̈ wewanoj , ton ̈ wej yuto lan ̈ an yul naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an istzotel Comam Jesús tuˈ , yapni naj Judas , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom Comam . Caw xin hantan ̈ e ebnaj tzujan yinta naj , ikˈbil yespada yeb isteˈ ebnaj yu ; chejbil ebnaj yu ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob Israel .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Wal xin halbilxa tet ebnaj yu naj Judas tuˈ yin ̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj , yet yalni naj : ― Haˈ naj chintzˈohan iskˈotx , haˈ naj chetzabayoj , ẍi naj .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Yuxin hayet ishitzico naj iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yalni naj : ― ¿ Hanicˈ hawe Mam cuywawom ? ẍi naj . Istzˈohni naj iskˈotx Comam .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Hach amigo , haˈ tzet chihul hawub watxˈe tinan ̈ , ẍi Comam . Istit bulna ebnaj istzabnoyo Comam .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Yajaˈ ay huneˈ naj iscuywom Comam yihti yespada yul yatut , ispitnilto naj istxiquin huneˈ ischejab naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj : ― Ayto hawespada yul yatut yuto haˈ mac espada chakˈa , espada chipotxˈnipaxo camoj .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: ¿ Tom mach chu inkˈannihan cablahon ̈ eb majan ebnaj ángel tet Inmaman tinan ̈ ta chiwochehan ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Yajaˈ ta hac tuˈ , machim chiyij isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios win ̈ an bay chala tato yilal yuni huntekˈan tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj apni tuˈ : ― ¿ Tom elkˈominan teyet yuxin ikˈbil heyespada yeb heteˈ win ̈ an chexhul quinhetzabnoyojan ? Hunun tzˈayic inbeyan cuywal yul yatut Comam Dios texol , yajaˈ mach quinhetzabayojan .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Yajaˈ tinan ̈ , yilal yuni sunil huntekˈan tiˈ yun ̈ e yijni isba sunil tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , ẍi Comam . Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam xin elcan ̈ ebnaj , yanicano ebnaj Comam ischuquil .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinito ebnaj Comam Jesús bey yatut naj Caifás , naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote . Haˈ bey tuˈ xin cutxanico ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yeb ebnaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Wal naj Pedro xin nahat tzujan isto naj yinta Comam , yapni naj yamakˈil yatut naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote tuˈ , yay tzˈon ̈ no naj xol ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios yu yilni yin ̈ tzet chielico Comam .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Wal ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ lahtiˈ xol ebnaj Israel issay ebnaj mac chioc halno lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ Comam yun ̈ e iscawxico camical yiban ̈ .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Caw xin txˈiˈal mac octoj , ishobnican ̈ ebnaj lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ Comam , yajaˈ maẍticˈa hunu tzet oc ismulo Comam . Lahwi tuˈ yapni cawan ̈ xa ebnaj ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: yalni ebnaj : ― Huneˈ naj tiˈ jabehan ̈ yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hanintiˈan chu wuchcˈanayojan huneˈ yatut Comam Dios tiˈ , cat wanican ̈ an isselel yin ̈ oxeb tzˈayic , ” ẍi naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Yah lin ̈ no naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yalni naj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin mach chaẍtakˈwi ? ¿ Tzet ye huntekˈan chal ebnaj tiˈ tawin ̈ ? ẍi naj .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Yajaˈ maẍticˈa takˈwi Comam tet naj , lahwi tuˈ yalnipaxo naj : ― Yin ̈ isbi Comam Dios itzitz , hal yin ̈ isyelal jetan ̈ . ¿ Ham hach tiˈ Cristo , Iscˈahol Comam Dios ? ẍi naj .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet naj : ― Hoˈ , hanintonan hacaˈ hawalni tiˈ . Chiwalan teyet tato Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios cheyil woc tzˈon ̈ nojan yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam Dios caw aycano yip , cat heyilni wulan xol moyan , ẍi Comam .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Yet yaben naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote tzet yal Comam tuˈ , istzilnilo naj xil iskˈap yu ishowal , yalni naj tet ebnaj yetbi tuˈ : ― Huneˈ mayal naj tiˈ , caw txˈoj yul sat Comam Dios . Yuxin tinan ̈ matxa yilal chicokˈan anma chihalni ismul naj , wal xin han ̈ ‑ caw ‑ on ̈ majabe istxˈojal istzotel naj .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Yuxin , ¿ tzet cheyute heyalni hex tiˈ ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Ay ismul naj , camojab naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Istzublico ebnaj yin ̈ sat Comam , ismakˈnipaxo ebnaj Comam , ay ebnaj xin pakˈnilto sat Comam ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: chalni ebnaj : ― Hach Cristo , txumiloj mac macachmakˈni , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Yet tzˈon ̈ anayo naj Pedro istiˈ yamakˈil teˈ n ̈ a tuˈ , ishitzico huneˈ ix chejab iscˈatan ̈ naj , yalni ix : ― Hach tiˈ hawetbi haba yeb naj Jesús ah Galilea , ẍi ix .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Wal naj Pedro tuˈ yeba naj yin ̈ sat sunil anma , yalni naj : ― Mach wohtajojan tzet chawala , ẍi naj .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Haxa yet yapni naj bey ispultahil yamakˈil teˈ n ̈ a tuˈ , yalni hunxa ix tet anma cutxanico bey tuˈ : ― Naj tiˈ yetbi isba naj yeb naj Jesús ah Nazaret , ẍi ix .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Yajaˈ yeba naj hunelxa , yalni naj : ― Caw chabe Comam Dios , ¡ mach wohtajojan huneˈ naj tuˈ ! ẍi naj .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Hunepixto xin ishitzico huntekˈan ebnaj iscˈatan ̈ naj , yalni ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , hach tiˈ hawetbi haba yeb ebnaj chiecˈ yinta naj Jesús tiˈ yuto ixtan ̈ cotxumnilojan ̈ hatzoteli , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Yajaˈ oc naj Pedro tuˈ istzˈactiˈn ̈ e isba , yalni naj : ― Caw chabe Comam Dios mach wohtajojan huneˈ naj tuˈ , ẍi naj . Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin yokˈcan ̈ huneˈ noˈ icham chiyo .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu isnaniti naj Pedro yin ̈ tzet yal Comam yet yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan yet chiokˈcan ̈ noˈ icham chiyo , ” ẍi Comam . Lahwi tuˈ yelti naj Pedro bey tuˈ , yoc naj okˈo sicˈlebil .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Haxa yet issajbilo xin , islahtiˈn ̈ en isba ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob tuˈ yin ̈ tzet chu yakˈlax camo Comam Jesús .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ iscˈalnayo ebnaj Comam , yinito ebnaj Comam sata naj gobernador ah Roma chiyij Poncio Pilato .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Wal naj Judas , naj anico Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj tuˈ , hayet yilni naj ta cawxico camical yiban ̈ Comam , istac iscˈul naj yu istxˈojal iswatxˈe tuˈ , isto naj yakˈnopaxo chˈen treinta plata tet ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb tet ebnaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: yalni naj tet ebnaj : ― Caw mawaco inmulan , yuto mawacojan huneˈ naj machi ismul yul iskˈab camical , ẍi naj . Istakˈwi ebnaj tet naj : ― ¡ Tzet jocan ̈ tawin ̈ , ila tzet chawute haba ! ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Hayet yaben naj huneˈ tuˈ xin istiẍnicanicto naj chˈen melyu tuˈ yul yatut Comam Dios . Lahwi tuˈ isto naj istˈun ̈ bano isba .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote issicˈcan ̈ ebnaj chˈen melyu tuˈ , yalni ebnaj : ― Huntekˈan chˈen melyu tiˈ mach chu jahnayto chˈen xol chˈen ofrenda , yuto istohol camical ye chˈen , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Islahtiˈn ̈ en isba ebnaj , islokˈni ebnaj huneˈ txˈo txˈotxˈ chihallax : “ Istxˈotxˈ naj watxˈem xi , ” yu yoc camposantohal bay chimujlax anma nan con ̈ obal chicam bey yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén tuˈ .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Yuxin Istxˈotxˈal Chicˈ occano isbiho huneˈ txˈo txˈotxˈ tuˈ , haˈ xin chihallax yin ̈ txˈotxˈ tinan ̈ .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Hac tuˈ yu yijni isba tzet halbilcano yu naj Jeremías , yet yalni naj : “ Yican ̈ ebnaj chˈen treinta plata , chˈen yakˈ ebnaj Israel istoholo huneˈ naj .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Yin ̈ chˈen xin islokˈ ebnaj istxˈotxˈ naj watxˈem xi , hac tuˈ yu yalni Comam Dios Jahawil wetan , ” ẍicano naj Jeremías yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Yet ayco Comam Jesús sata naj Pilato iskˈamben naj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom yahawil anma Israel hawehi ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ , yeli hacaˈ hawalni tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Wal ebnaj iswiˈehal ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob , caw oc ebnaj akˈocˈule yin ̈ Comam . Yajaˈ wal Comam xin maẍticˈa takˈwi ninoj .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Yuxin yal naj Pilato tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom mach chawabe tzet chal ebnaj tiˈ tawin ̈ ? ẍi naj .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Yajaˈ maẍticˈa takˈwi Comam tet naj Pilato tuˈ , yuxin caw cˈayilo iscˈul naj yin ̈ Comam .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Yin ̈ hunun kˈin ̈ Pascua chisbejtzo naj gobernador tuˈ hunun ebnaj presowom , yajaˈ haˈticˈa mac chal iscˈul anma haˈ chibejtzolaxi .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Cˈuxan xin ayco huneˈ naj Barrabás isbi yul preso , caw ohtabil naj yu anma .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Yet cutxanico anma tuˈ iskˈamben naj Pilato tet anma : ― ¿ Mac cheyoche chinbejtzohan , tom naj Barrabás mato naj Jesús , naj cheyal Cristohal ? ẍi naj .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Yal naj huneˈ tuˈ yuto yohta naj ta yu ayco ishowal ebnaj iswiˈehal sacerdote yin ̈ Comam yuxin ilaxto Comam sata naj .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Yet ayicto naj Pilato yul iscapil tuˈ , yapni tzotiˈ tet naj yu yixal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mach chawaco haba xol ebnaj yin ̈ huneˈ naj machi ismul tuˈ , yuto hayet may akˈbal ay huneˈ inwayican caw xiwquilta yin ̈ naj , ” ẍito ix tet naj .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Wal ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj yul con ̈ ob tuˈ , oc ebnaj akˈocˈule tet anma ta chala ta chibejtzolax naj Barrabás cat yakˈlax camo Comam Jesús .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo naj gobernador tuˈ tet anma : ― Yin ̈ ebnaj cawan ̈ tiˈ , ¿ mac cheyoche chinbejtzohan ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi anma tuˈ sunil : ― ¡ Naj Barrabás chabejtzo ! ẍi anma .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Iskˈamben naj : ― ¿ Tzet xin chiwutehan naj Jesús tiˈ heyalni , naj chihallax Cristohal tiˈ ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi anma sunil : ― Ahojab naj yin ̈ culus , ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Iskˈamben naj Pilato tuˈ : ― ¿ Tzet xin istxˈojal iswatxˈe naj ? ẍi naj . Yajaˈ wal anma tuˈ caw ecˈbalto ah yaw , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Camojab naj yin ̈ culus ! ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Hayet yilni naj Pilato ta caw ecˈbalto ah wejna anma , matxa hunuxa tzet tzˈaj yuteˈ naj , iskˈanniti naj ha haˈ . Yoc naj istxˈahno iskˈab yin ̈ sat sunil anma yu isyenilo naj tato machi yoc naj yin ̈ iscamical Comam Jesús . Lahwi tuˈ yalni naj : ― Mach wiban ̈ ojan chitit iscamical huneˈ naj tiˈ , wal xin teyiban ̈ chitocanoj , ẍi naj .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Istakˈwi anma sunil : ― Waxan ̈ ca chioc iscamical naj tuˈ comulojan ̈ yeb yiban ̈ juninalan ̈ , ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu isbejtzon naj Pilato naj Barrabás , ischejni naj hatelaxo Comam Jesús . Lahwi tuˈ yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj yu yalaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Yinito ebnaj soldado Comam Jesús bey ispalacio naj gobernador tuˈ . Yet yapni Comam xin , iscutxbanico isba ebnaj soldado , yoc hoyno ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Yinilo ebnaj xil iskˈap Comam , yanico ebnaj huneˈ xilkˈape caj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Isbakˈonayo ebnaj huntekˈan teˈ txˈix coronahil , yahnato ebnaj yin ̈ iswiˈ Comam . Yanipaxico ebnaj huneˈ te teˈ yul iskˈab Comam , yichico ebnaj istzebi yin ̈ Comam , chila xin ay jahno ebnaj sata Comam , yalni ebnaj : ― ¡ Tzalajon ̈ we yin ̈ naj yahawil anma Israel tiˈ ! ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Istzublipaxico ebnaj yin ̈ Comam , yinilo ebnaj te teˈ ayco yul iskˈab ismakˈnico ebnaj teˈ yin ̈ iswiˈ Comam .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Lahwi yetancano ebnaj Comam , yinilo ebnaj huneˈ xilkˈape caj yaco ebnaj yin ̈ Comam tuˈ , yanipaxico ebnaj xil iskˈap Comam . Lahwi tuˈ yinito ebnaj Comam yu yalaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an yilaxto Comam bay chialaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus , istzabnayo ebnaj soldado huneˈ naj ah Cirene , Simón isbi , ischejnico ebnaj naj yinoto isculus Comam .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Hayet yapni ebnaj bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ chiyij Gólgota , chihallaxpaxo Isbajil Wiˈe ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: issomni ebnaj yal teˈ uva yeb huntekˈan teˈ cˈahla telaj , yakˈni ebnaj yucˈuˈ Comam . Yajaˈ yet yablen Comam matxa isje Comam yucˈuˈ .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Hayet ayxacan ̈ Comam yin ̈ culus yu ebnaj , yoc ebnaj soldado tuˈ yilweno isba yin ̈ xil iskˈap Comam yu ispohnican ̈ ebnaj yin ̈ . Hac tuˈ yu yijni isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chala : “ Ispohcan ̈ ebnaj xil inkˈapan yin ̈ , yocpaxo ebnaj yilweno isba mac cˈul yin ̈ bal yin ̈ xil inkˈaptuˈan , ” ẍiayoj .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yoc tzˈon ̈ no ebnaj istan ̈ en Comam .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Yanico ebnaj hayeb tzˈib yiban ̈ iswiˈ Comam yin ̈ teˈ culus tuˈ bay chala tzet yin ̈ xin akˈlax camo Comam . Haˈ huntekˈan tzˈib tuˈ ẍi hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ naj tiˈ Jesús Yahawil anma Israel , ” ẍicoj .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Aypaxo cawan ̈ ebnaj elkˈom alaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus yinta Comam . Huneˈ naj ah yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam , huneˈxa naj xin ah yin ̈ ismeckˈab Comam .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Haˈ macta chiecˈto bey tuˈ oc buchwal yin ̈ Comam , chisbilen iswiˈ ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Hach tiˈ , hawala tato chawuchacˈayo yatut Comam Dios , cat hawanican ̈ isselel yin ̈ oxeb tzˈayic hawalni ! ¡ Yuxin colayti haba tato yel chawala Iscˈahol Comam Dios hawehi ! ¡ Ayan ̈ ti yin ̈ teˈ culus tuˈ ! ẍi ebnaj .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob tuˈ , oc ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ Comam , chalni ebnaj :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: ― Naj tiˈ iscol naj anma , wal naj xin mach chu iscolni isba . Tato yeli haˈ naj tiˈ Jahawil han ̈ on ̈ Israel hon ̈ tiˈ , jilaˈ yinayti isba naj yin ̈ culus , wal tuˈ chijaco janma yin ̈ naj .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Chicawxi iscˈul naj yin ̈ Comam Dios yalni yuxin jilaˈ yul Comam Dios colwal yin ̈ naj tato caw yeli ochebil naj yu Comam , yuto chal naj tato Iscˈahol Comam Dios ye naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj elkˈom alaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus yinta Comam , ocpaxo ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ Comam .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Yet chumanil iskˈejholilo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ masanto yin ̈ chˈen oxeb yin ̈ kˈejbiyalil sajbipaxiloj .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ orahil tuˈ ah yaw Comam Jesús yin ̈ caw ip , yalni Comam : ― Elí , Elí , ¿ lama sabactani ? ẍi Comam . Chal yelapnoj : Hach inDiosal , hach inDiosal , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin chinhabejcanojan ? ẍi .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj aben huneˈ tuˈ , yalni ebnaj : ― Ham naj Elías , ischejab Comam Dios chawte naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ay xin huneˈ yetbi ebnaj to yin ̈ an ̈ e yinoti huneˈ esponja , islahbanayto naj xol pahla vino , iscˈalnico naj yin ̈ iswiˈ huneˈ teˈ ah , yanahto naj yin ̈ istiˈ Comam .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Yajaˈ cachlax naj yu huntekˈanxa ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Maẍton ̈ e bela , jilaˈ tato chul naj Elías iscoloˈ naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Yahwipaxo Comam yin ̈ caw ip hunelxa , lahwi tuˈ xin iscamiloj .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
