text2: Tato yin ̈ naj David tuˈ titna naj Cristo , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin yal naj David naj Cristo Yahawiloj ? ẍi Comam . Caw hantan ̈ e anma iscutxbaco isba bey tuˈ , caw xin sunil mac yoche yabeˈ yin ̈ tzet chal Comam .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Yet lan ̈ an iscuywa Comam Jesús , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yuto ebnaj tuˈ caw choche ebnaj yakˈaco huntekˈan xilkˈape nimej ishojo istel , yeb yochebal ebnaj caw nanxa islow chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj yet chiecˈ ebnaj yulaj txon ̈ bal .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Chissaynipaxilo ebnaj huntekˈan tzˈon ̈ obal caw ay yelapno ye yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel yeb bay chiawtelax ebnaj waˈoj .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Chanipaxico ebnaj lekˈtiˈal chinilo ebnaj yatut ebix hunix , yajaˈ yun ̈ e mach isyelo isba istxˈojal chiswatxˈe ebnaj tuˈ cˈul yub ebnaj , nimej chute ebnaj yoj istxah . Ebnaj tuˈ caw ecˈbal niman isyaˈtajil chiay yiban ̈ ebnaj yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Hunel , tzˈon ̈ anayo Comam Jesús iscawilal caẍa bay chayto anma yofrenda tet Comam Dios , yilni Comam yanayto anma tuˈ yofrenda . Caw txˈiˈal ebnaj kˈalom yayto yet , caw xin txˈiˈal chˈen yayto ebnaj .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin yapni huneˈ ix hunix caw mebaˈ , yanayto ix cabeb chˈen melyu niẍchˈan sat yul caẍa tuˈ .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Yet yilni Comam huneˈ tuˈ , yawten Comam ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , huneˈ ix hunix tiˈ caw ecˈbal mayakˈ ix sata sunil ebnaj mayakˈ yofrenda tiˈ .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Yuto ebnaj kˈalom tiˈ iskˈalxan ̈ e chayto ebnaj , wal ix tiˈ xin caw mebaˈ ix , yaj cˈuxan mayayto ix ismelyu chilokˈni tzet chiocnico yu , ẍi Comam .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Yet lan ̈ an yelti Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , yalni huneˈ naj iscuywom Comam : ― Mamin , ¡ ilcˈanab huntekˈan chˈen chˈen yeb huntekˈan nimeta n ̈ a tiˈ lah ! ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Huntekˈan nimeta n ̈ a tiˈ chiuchcˈalaxtoj , matxa hunu chˈen chˈen latzˈbil tiˈ chican yiban ̈ yet chˈenal , ẍi Comam .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom yin ̈ istzalanil won ̈ an Olivo ayco yetcˈulal satacˈtiˈ yatut Comam Dios ; yay tzˈon ̈ no Comam bey tuˈ . Iskˈamben naj Pedro , naj Juan yeb naj Andrés tet Comam yet ischuquilxan ̈ e :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: ― Mamin , hal jetan ̈ bakˈin chihul huntekˈan chawal tiˈ , ¿ tzettaxca yechel chiyu yet chijni isba ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Caw cheyil heba , machojab mac chexakˈni subchahoj .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Yuto caw txˈiˈal ebnaj chuli cat isbalnico ebnaj inbihan yin ̈ , cat yalni ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hanintiˈan Cristo hinan , ” ẍi ebnaj . Caw xin txˈiˈal mac chisubcha yu ebnaj .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Hayet cheyabeni ta ay howal hecawilal maca nahata , mach chexxiwi yuto yilal yuni huntekˈan tiˈ , cat iswejchacan ̈ anma , yajaˈ maẍto istan ̈ balo huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Chakˈlecan ̈ howal ej txˈotxˈ nimeta con ̈ ob yeb huntekˈanxa txˈotxˈ nimeta con ̈ ob , cat yanipaxico howal huneˈ con ̈ ob yin ̈ huneˈxa con ̈ ob . Caw xin txˈiˈal bay chiecˈ chixcab yeb wahil , yajaˈ huntekˈan tuˈ yichebaniln ̈ e isyaˈtajil .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Caw cheyil heba yuto chexálaxico sata ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob , cat hemakˈlax yulaj capilla . Chexalaxpaxico sata ebnaj gobernador yeb sata ebnaj rey , yu ayexxaco yul inkˈaban . Hac tuˈ xin chu quinheyalnilojan tet ebnaj .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Yet maẍto chitan ̈ ilo yul yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yilal ispujbalaxicˈo Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile yulajla txˈotxˈ nimeta con ̈ ob .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Hayet chexalaxico sata ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob tuˈ , mach cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul yin ̈ tzet cheyala ; wal xin haˈ tzet chihallax teyet yu Comam Dios haˈ cheyala , yuto maẍtajex chextzoteli , to haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , ay ebnaj chaco yuẍta yul iskˈab camical , ay mame miˈe chaco yuninal yul iskˈab camical , aypaxo ebnaj uninale chiyaco howal yin ̈ ismam yeb ismiˈ cat yakˈni camoj .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Caw sunil anma chioc ishowal teyin ̈ yuto ayexico yul inkˈaban , yajaˈ mac chitecha yu masanto yet islahobal , chicolchahi .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu huneˈ ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Daniel , tato yilal yul naj chietanto yatut Comam Dios yu istxˈojal chiswatxˈe . Haˈ mac chiilni huneˈ tiˈ txumchahojabilo yu . Yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ , mac hex ayex bey Judea tiˈ , chexelcan ̈ cat heto iswiˈla witz .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Mac ayahto yiban ̈ yatut xin matxahojab chiayti yikˈalti hunu tzet ye tuˈ .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Wal mac ayto xol ismunil , matxahojab chimeltzo yikˈalti xil iskˈap yul yatut .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Caw cˈanchˈan ebix ix ayxa tzet yehi , yeb ebix chito txutxwi niẍte yunin yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Kˈanwe tet Comam Dios haxinwal maẍtaj yin ̈ n ̈ abil chihul huneˈ tuˈ .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Yuto caw chiecˈyaˈ yanma anma yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ . Huntekˈan isyaˈtajil tuˈ maẍto hunelo chuhi yichitax iswatxˈen Comam Dios huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , matxa xin bakˈinal chuhi yet chilahwi yunicanoj .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Ta mach chiscˈotzba Comam Dios Jahawil yoj huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , machi hunu mac chicolchahi , wal xin chiscˈotzba Comam yuto xahan ay yuninal Comam yu , huntekˈan sicˈbilxaloj .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet : “ Haˈ bey tiˈ ay naj Cristo lah , ” maca ta “ Haˈ bey tuˈ ay naj lah , ” ta ẍi , mach cheyayto yul heyanma .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Yuto caw txˈiˈal ebnaj lekˈtiˈwom chisbalico isba Cristohal . Aypaxo ebnaj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios cat isyeni ebnaj cˈaybalcˈule yeb yechel yip naj matzwalil yun ̈ e issubcha anma yu ebnaj . Etza xin chisubchapaxo ebnaj sicˈbilxa yu Comam Dios yu ebnaj .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: ¡ Caw cheyil heba xin ! Yalan ̈ to chiwalnicanojan huntekˈan tiˈ teyet , ẍi Comam .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Hayet chilahwi yecˈcano huntekˈan isyaˈtajil tuˈ , chikˈejholilo yoj tzˈayic , matxa chimujlipaxo ixahaw ,

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: cat istitcˈay ej txˈumel ay satcan ̈ , cat xin isbilipaxo sunil tzet ay yip ay yul satcan ̈ .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ cat yillax wulan xol moyan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . Chinhulan yeb sunil iskˈakˈal wipan ,

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: cat inchejni wángelan iscutxbanoco sunil mac sicˈbilxalo wuhan yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , sunil baytajtuˈwal ay anma bay chiecˈ ebnaj .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Txumwecˈanab yin ̈ teˈ higuera : Yet chielilo ischon iskˈab teˈ cat yul xaj teˈ , cheyohtan ̈ eloj ta toxa chioc haˈ n ̈ ab .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Hac tuˈ ye huntekˈan chiwaltiˈan . Hayet cheyilni yijni isba huntekˈan tuˈ , yilal heyohtan ̈ eni tato cawilxa yeti bay chinhulan .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ; sunil huntekˈan tiˈ chiyu yalan ̈ to maẍto chicam huntekˈan anma tiˈ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Haˈ satcan ̈ yeb txˈo txˈotxˈ tiˈ chitan ̈ iloj , wal Intzotiˈan xin mach chiecˈto yet yijni isba tzet chala .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Yajaˈ wal yin ̈ tzet tzˈayical yeb tzet orahil chinhulan machi hunu mac ohtan ̈ e nitam ebnaj ángel ay yul satcan ̈ . Mach wohtapaxojan , Hanin Iscˈahol Comam Dios intiˈan ; wal xin han ̈ cˈan ̈ e Inmaman ohtan ̈ e .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Yuxin caw nann ̈ e heyu , majwan ̈ wej yuto mach heyohtajo tzet orahil chinhulan .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Lahan hacaˈ yet chito hunu naj yahaw n ̈ a yin ̈ hunu isbel caw nahat . Yalan ̈ to maẍto chito naj chalnicano naj tzettaj munilal chu hunun ischejab , cat yalnicano naj tet naj tan ̈ em pulta tato caw chil naj istiˈ pulta tuˈ .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Ebnaj chejab tuˈ , mach yohtajo ebnaj bakˈin chimeltzo naj yahaw n ̈ a , mach yohtajo ebnaj tato hayet yahbal akˈbal chul naj , maca yin ̈ chuman akˈbal , maca yet chiokˈ noˈ chiyo , maca yet sahab sacˈayal . Haquexpax tuˈ mach heyohtajo bakˈin chinhulan , yuxin majwahan ̈ wej ,

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: tajca tona nahul ayex cat wul lemnahan .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Huntekˈan tiˈ , maẍn ̈ etaj teyet chiwalan , to chiwalpaxojan tet sunil anma . ¡ Caw majwahan ̈ wej ! ẍi Comam .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Yet cabexan ̈ e kˈin ̈ Pascua , yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan ̈ al chialaxicoj , yichico ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés issayni yin ̈ tzet chu yaycˈay Comam yin ̈ hunu istxˈojal ; yun ̈ e istzabnayo ebnaj cat ispotxˈni ebnaj Comam yalni .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Xol ebnaj tuˈ ay ebnaj halni : ― Mach chicotzabayo naj yin ̈ kˈin ̈ yuto ahta wejna anma sunil jin ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Yet ay Comam Jesús bey con ̈ ob Betania , isto Comam bey yatut naj Simón , naj ayticˈaco yabil lepra yin ̈ . Yet ayco Comam waˈo sat meẍa yapni huneˈ ix iscˈatan ̈ Comam , ikˈbil huneˈ an ̈ caw xukˈ sam yu ix ayayto yul huneˈ chˈen limeta alabastro isbi . Nardo isbi huneˈ an ̈ tuˈ caw ay istohol . Iscˈutznilto ix isnukˈ chˈen limeta tuˈ , isjobnayo ix huneˈ an ̈ caw xukˈ sam tuˈ yiban ̈ iswiˈ Comam .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Xol mac ayicto bey tuˈ , ay huntekˈan ebnaj tit ishowal , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin ton ̈ e chietalaxto huneˈ an ̈ caw xukˈ sam tiˈ ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Estam matxon ̈ laxtoj , ecˈbalmi oxeb ciento denario chiakˈlax yin ̈ , cat ispohlaxcan ̈ istohol yin ̈ anma mebaˈ , ẍi ebnaj . Caw xin oc ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ ix .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Yajaˈ xin yal Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin cheyakˈ hetiˈ yin ̈ ix ? Mach checach ix yuto huneˈ maswatxˈe ix win ̈ tiˈan caw cˈul .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Haˈ anma mebaˈ ayn ̈ eticˈaco texol yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , tzijxan ̈ e tiempohal chu hecolwa yin ̈ ; wal inpaxojan xin mach sunilbal tiempo ayinicˈojan texol .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Ix tiˈ , haˈ tzet chikˈoji ix iswatxˈeni , haˈ maswatxˈe ix win ̈ an . Mayan ̈ tecano ix innimanilan yalan ̈ to maẍto chinmujlaxan .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ; bay ‑ xan ̈ e ‑ tuˈwal chihallaxicˈo Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile , chihallaxpaxo huneˈ maswatxˈe ix tiˈ win ̈ an , cat yakˈlax binaho ix , ẍi Comam .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Wal naj Judas Iscariote , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom Comam Jesús , to naj yilaˈ ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yun ̈ e yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj huneˈ tuˈ caw tzalacan ̈ ebnaj , yalten ebnaj melyu tet naj . Yichico naj Judas tuˈ issayni yin ̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Haxa yayilo babel tzˈayic kˈin ̈ Pascua , yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan ̈ al chialaxicoj , yeb yet chipotxˈlax noˈ meˈ xahanbalil ; iskˈamben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tet : ― Mamin , ¿ baytuˈwal chawoche chicowatxˈehan ̈ tzet chicolo yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Ischejnito Comam cawan ̈ ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Asiˈwe yul con ̈ ob , hayet chexapno bey tuˈ cheyilno huneˈ naj ikˈbil huneˈ tzˈahab haˈ yu , chexoco tzujno yinta naj .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Haˈ bay chˈapni naj xin chekˈambe tet naj yahaw n ̈ a tuˈ : “ ¿ Baytuˈwal ay huneˈ cuarto bay chiwaˈ yaˈ cuywawom yeb iscuywom yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua ? ” quexchi .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Haˈ naj xin chiyeno huneˈ cuarto caw nimajal teyet , ayco yin ̈ iscab piso , caw cˈulxa yehi . Haˈ bey tuˈ xin chewatxˈe tzet chicolo , ẍi Comam .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , isto ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén , yilcha yu ebnaj hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam . Yoc ebnaj iswatxˈeno tzet chilolax yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tuˈ .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Haxa yet lan ̈ anxa yay numna xin yapni Comam yeb ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom yul huneˈ cuarto tuˈ .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Yet ayxaco Comam waˈo sat meẍa yeb ebnaj iscuywom xin , yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , haˈ huneˈ mac chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical , ayco naj waˈo coxol tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam huneˈ tuˈ , caw oc biscˈulal yin ̈ yanma ebnaj , yoc ebnaj iskˈambeno yin ̈ hununtajil tet Comam : ― Mamin , ¿ tom haninan ? ẍi hunun ebnaj .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Huneˈ mac texol hex cablahon ̈ wan ̈ hex tiˈ , naj chislabayto ispan yul insecˈan , haˈ naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios yilal wecˈan yin ̈ camical hacaˈ yalni yul Yum Comam , yajaˈ cˈanchˈan naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical . Ayxicˈa mach pitzcˈana naj yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an iswaˈ Comam , yinican ̈ ixim pan , yakˈni yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios , lahwi tuˈ iskˈaxponayo ixim , yakˈni Comam ixim tet ebnaj , yalni Comam : ― Chahwej , cat hewahni . Huneˈ tiˈ yechel innimanilan yehi , ẍi Comam .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinipaxocan ̈ Comam chˈen vaso , yakˈnipaxo Comam yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios . Lahwi tuˈ xin yakˈni Comam chˈen tet ebnaj iscuywom , caw xin sunil ebnaj ucˈni .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Huneˈ tiˈ yechel inchiqˈuilan chimalto yu iscˈulal yin ̈ txˈiˈal anma . Hac tuˈ chu yijni isba huneˈ acˈ trato chakˈ Comam Dios teyet .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan ; matxa chiwucˈan yal sat teˈ uva masanto chioc Comam Dios Yahawiloj , catto wucˈnihan yin ̈ yacˈtohal hunelxa , ẍi Comam .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Lahwi isbitnicano Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom , isto Comam yeb ebnaj bey won ̈ an Olivo ,

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ huneˈ akˈbal tiˈ , caw hesunil cheyikˈalo heyanma win ̈ an , yuto hac tuˈ yu istzˈibn ̈ elaxcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : “ Chinpotxˈcamojan naj tan ̈ em meˈ , cat issaj lemito noˈ meˈ tuˈ , ” ẍiayoj .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Yajaˈ yet chinitzitzbican ̈ an chinbabitojan bey Galilea tesataj , ẍi Comam .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : ― Mamin , waxan ̈ ca sunil mac chiinilo yanma tawin ̈ , walinan machoj , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Pedro , yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan tawet ; yin ̈ ticˈa huneˈ akˈbal tiˈ , yalan ̈ to maẍto chiokˈ noˈ icham chiyo yin ̈ iscayel , oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan , ẍi Comam .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Islahnico naj Pedro , yalni : ― Waxan ̈ ca chinakˈlax camojan tawintaj yajaˈ mach chiwalan ta mach cachwohtajojan , ẍi naj tet Comam . Sunil xin ebnaj iscuywom Comam halni hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , isto Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey huneˈ peyab chiyij Getsemaní , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Canan ̈ wecano tzˈon ̈ no bey tiˈ , chintohan txahloj , ẍi Comam .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Han ̈ e xin naj Pedro , naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan yito Comam . Caw yabe Comam isyaˈil biscˈulal yin ̈ yanma .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Caw chiwabehan isyaˈil isbiscˈulal camical yin ̈ wanmahan . Canan ̈ wecano bey tiˈ , mach chexwayi , ẍi Comam .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ishitzilo Comam hanicˈxa sata ebnaj , yay jahno Comam , yay xulno sat txˈotxˈ , yoc Comam iskˈanni tet Comam Dios ta ay tzet chu yecˈto huneˈ isyaˈtajil chul yiban ̈ tuˈ .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Yalni Comam yin ̈ istxah : ― Mam , machi hunu tzet ye tuˈ yaˈta yul hasat . Colinan tet huneˈ isyaˈtajil chul wiban ̈ tiˈan , yajaˈ mach hacaˈ chiwochehan to hacaˈojab tzet chal hacˈul , ẍi Comam .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , ismeltzo Comam bay cancano ebnaj oxwan ̈ , yalni Comam tet naj Pedro : ― ¿ Tom wayo chawu ? ¿ Tom mach chu hawinilo hawayan ̈ hunu orahil ? ẍi Comam .

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : Iwelo hewayan ̈ , txahlan ̈ wej , haxinwal mach chexaycˈay yul iskˈab istxˈojal , wal heyanma caw hinan isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , yajaˈ wal henimanil xin mach chitecha ilwebal yu , ẍi Comam .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Istopaxo Comam txahlo hunelxa , hacaˈticˈa tzet yal Comam yet babelal , hac tuˈ yute yalnipaxo yin ̈ iscayel .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Haxa yet ismeltzopaxo Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj xin , wayan ̈ chupaxo ebnaj , yuto mach chitecha naj wayan ̈ yu ebnaj . Yuxin matxa chitxumcha yu ebnaj yin ̈ tzet chu istakˈwi tet Comam .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Haxa yet ismeltzo Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj yin ̈ xa yoxel isbeycˈo txahloj , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom yexn ̈ eto hewayi yeb hexewi ? ¡ Yetzanxa ! Wal xin Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios tiˈ maapni yorahil walaxicojan yul iskˈab anma mulum .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Ahan ̈ wewanoj , ton ̈ wej ; lan ̈ an yul naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical , ẍi Comam .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an istzotel Comam Jesús tuˈ , yapni naj Judas , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom Comam . Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma tzujan yinta naj . Ay mac ikˈbil yespada , aypaxo mac ikˈbil isteˈ yu . Chejbil ebnaj yu ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb yu ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yeb yu ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Naj Judas chianico Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj tuˈ halbilxa tet ebnaj yu naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ naj chintzˈohoˈan iskˈotx , haˈ naj chetzabayoj , cat heyinito naj ; mach xin chebejtzo naj , ” ẍi naj .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Yuxin apnin ̈ e naj , ishitzico naj iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yalni naj : ― Mam cuywawom , ẍi naj . Istzˈohni naj iskˈotx Comam ,

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: yoc bulna ebnaj yin ̈ Comam , istzabnayo ebnaj .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Yajaˈ ay huneˈ naj iscuywom Comam yihti yespada yul yatut , ispitnilto naj istxiquin ischejab naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj apni tzabnoyo tuˈ : ― ¿ Tom elkˈominan teyet yuxin ikˈbil heyespada yeb heteˈ win ̈ an chexhul quinhetzabnoyojan ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Hunun tzˈayic inbeyan cuywal yul yatut Comam Dios texol , yajaˈ mach quinhetzabayojan . Wal tinan ̈ yilal yuni huneˈ tiˈ yun ̈ e yijni isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano win ̈ an yul Yum Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam , elcan ̈ ebnaj sunil , yanicano ebnaj Comam ischuquil .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj tzeh oc tzujno yinta Comam , han ̈ e huneˈ kˈap sábana ayco xilo iskˈap naj .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Istzablaxayo naj yu ebnaj inito Comam , yajaˈ xin iscolilo isba naj , iscancano kˈap sábana yul iskˈab ebnaj tuˈ ; tˈilanxa naj yet yelcan ̈ naj yin ̈ an ̈ e .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinito ebnaj Comam Jesús sata naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote . Iscutxbanico isba ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Wal naj Pedro nahat tzujan isto naj yinta Comam , yapni naj yamakˈil yatut naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote tuˈ , yoc tzˈon ̈ no naj kˈaẍno xol ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ lahtiˈ xol ebnaj Israel , oc ebnaj issayaˈ hunu tzet chioc ismulo Comam yun ̈ e iscawxenico ebnaj camical yiban ̈ Comam yalni , yajaˈ machi hunu tiˈ cawxico ismulo Comam .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Caw txˈiˈal ebnaj hobnican ̈ lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ Comam , yajaˈ nanantan ̈ e tzet chal ebnaj .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj ah lin ̈ noj , yalni ebnaj lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ Comam hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: ― Jabehan ̈ yalni naj : “ Huneˈ yatut Comam Dios tiˈ chiwuchcˈayojan , oxebn ̈ e xin tzˈayic chiwacan ̈ an selel , yajaˈ mach anmaho chiwatxˈencan ̈ , ” ẍi naj tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Yajaˈ maẍticˈa ocpaxo huneˈ tuˈ ismulo Comam .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yah lin ̈ no naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yalni naj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin mach chachtakˈwi ? ¿ Tzet ye huntekˈan chal ebnaj tawin ̈ tiˈ ? ẍi naj .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Yajaˈ xin maẍticˈa takˈwi Comam tet naj . Iskˈambenpaxo naj tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom hach tiˈ Cristo , Iscˈahol Comam Dios , Comam chihallax cˈulal ? ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ , hanintonan . Hex tiˈ cheyilaˈ woc tzˈon ̈ nojan yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam Dios caw aycano yip , cat heyilni wulpaxojan xol moyan yul satcan ̈ , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Hayet yaben naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote yin ̈ tzet yal Comam tuˈ , istzilnilo naj xil iskˈap yu isyenilo naj ta txˈoj chabe naj yin ̈ tzet yal Comam . Lahwi tuˈ , yalni naj : ― Wal tinan ̈ matxa yilalo chicokˈan mac chihalni ismul naj tiˈ .

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Hex caw hex maxeyabe istxˈojal istzotel naj yin ̈ Comam Dios . ¿ Tzet cheyute heyalni yin ̈ naj ? ẍi naj . Sunil xin ebnaj halni tato yilal iscam Comam .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Ay xin ebnaj tzublico yin ̈ sat Comam , ismajchenpaxo ebnaj sat , ismakˈnipaxo ebnaj , chiskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― Haliloj mac chachmakˈni , ẍi ebnaj . Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios ocpaxo ebnaj ispakˈalto sat Comam .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Wal naj Pedro ayayto naj yamakˈil teˈ n ̈ a tuˈ yet yapni ix ischejab naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Hayet yilni ix iskˈaẍni naj Pedro , yoccano tˈan ̈ no ix yin ̈ naj , yalni ix : ― Hach tiˈ hawetbi haba yeb naj Jesús , naj ah Nazaret , ẍi ix .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Pedro : ― Tzimi chawal hach tiˈ , mach wohtajojan naj chawal tuˈ , ẍi naj . Lahwi tuˈ isto naj istiˈ huneˈ niman pulta , lan ̈ antoticˈa xin yokˈcan ̈ huneˈ noˈ icham chiyo .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Hayet yilnipaxo ix naj Pedro , yalni ix tet ebnaj ayayto bey tuˈ : ― Huneˈ naj tiˈ yetbi isba naj yeb naj Jesús , ẍi ix .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Yajaˈ xin yalpaxo naj ta mach yohtajo naj Comam . Hunepixto xin yalni ebnaj ayayo bey tuˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , hach tiˈ hawetbi haba yeb ebnaj chiecˈ yinta naj Jesús , yuto ah Galilea hach , ẍi ebnaj .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Yajaˈ oc naj Pedro istzˈactiˈn ̈ e isba , yalni naj : ― Caw chabe Comam Dios mach wohtajojan huneˈ naj cheyal tiˈ , ẍi naj .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa yalni naj hacaˈ tuˈ yokˈcan ̈ noˈ icham chiyo yin ̈ iscayel . Hac tuˈ yu isnaniti naj Pedro yin ̈ tzet yal Comam tet naj , yet yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yalan ̈ to maẍto chiokˈ noˈ icham chiyo yin ̈ iscayel , oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan , ” ẍi Comam . Hayet istit yul iscˈul naj yin ̈ tzet yal Comam tuˈ , yoc naj okˈoj .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Haxa yet issajbilo xin iscutxban isba ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yeb ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ lahtiˈ , iscˈalnayo ebnaj Comam , yinito ebnaj Comam yin ̈ sat naj Pilato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Iskˈamben naj Pilato tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom yeli Yahawil anma Israel hawehi ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ , yel hacaˈ hawalni tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Yajaˈ wal ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote caw ayco ebnaj yalni txˈiˈal tzet ye tuˈ ismulo Comam .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Yuxin iskˈambe naj Pilato tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin mach chachtakˈwi ? ¿ Tom mach chawabe hanta tzet chisbalcan ̈ ebnaj hamuluj ? ẍi naj .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Wal Comam xin mach takˈwi Comam , yuxin caw cˈayilo iscˈul naj Pilato tuˈ .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Yin ̈ hunun kˈin ̈ Pascua chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ isbejtzo naj Pilato hunun ebnaj presowom , yajaˈ macticˈa chal iscˈul anma haˈ chibejtzolaxi .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj anico howal yin ̈ naj yahaw con ̈ ob , aypaxo xin anma ispotxˈ ebnaj yuxin ayco ebnaj preso . Xol ebnaj presowom tuˈ ayco huneˈ naj , Barrabás isbi .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Iscutxbanico isba anma , yoc anma iskˈanno tet naj Pilato ta chisbejtzo naj hunu naj presowom hacaˈticˈa chute naj yin ̈ hunun kˈin ̈ Pascua .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Istakˈwi naj tet anma tuˈ : ― ¿ Chimisje hecˈul chinbejtzohan naj Yahawil Israel ? ẍi naj .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Hac tuˈ yute yalni naj , yuto yohta naj ta ton ̈ e chichiwaco iscˈul ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tuˈ yin ̈ Comam , yuxin yaco ebnaj Comam yul iskˈab naj .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Wal ebnaj yahaw ebnaj sacerdote oc ebnaj akˈocˈule tet anma ta haˈ naj Barrabás chisbejtzo naj Pilato .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Iskˈamben naj Pilato tet anma : ― ¿ Tzet wal wutenan naj isreyal Israel tiˈ , chal tuˈ ? ẍi naj .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Istakˈwi anma tuˈ : ― ¡ Camojab naj yin ̈ culus ! ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Iskˈamben naj Pilato : ― ¿ Tzet xin istxˈojal iswatxˈe naj ? ẍi naj . Yajaˈ ah wejna anma tuˈ , yalni hunelxa : ― ¡ Camojab naj yin ̈ culus ! ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Wal naj Pilato , yun ̈ e istzala iscˈul anma yin ̈ naj yuxin isbejtzo naj naj Barrabás . Ischejni naj hatelaxo Comam , yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj soldado yu yalaxcan ̈ Comam yin ̈ culus .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinilto ebnaj soldado Comam yamakˈil palacio , iscutxbanpaxico ebnaj huntekˈanxa ebnaj soldado .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ishucbanico ebnaj huneˈ kˈap kˈap caj jilni yin ̈ Comam . Isbakˈonayo ebnaj huneˈ teˈ txˈix , yanahto ebnaj coronahil yin ̈ iswiˈ Comam .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Yichico ebnaj yahwi yalni yin ̈ caw ip hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Tzalajon ̈ we yin ̈ naj yahawil anma Israel tiˈ ! ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Chismakˈnipaxico ebnaj huneˈ teˈ ah yin ̈ iswiˈ Comam , istzublipaxico ebnaj yin ̈ , yeb xin chiay jahno ebnaj sata Comam , cat yay xulno ebnaj sat txˈotxˈ .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Lahwi istzebicano ebnaj yin ̈ Comam , yinilo ebnaj huneˈ kˈap kˈap ishucbaco yin ̈ Comam , yanico ebnaj xil iskˈap Comam . Lahwi tuˈ yinito ebnaj Comam yin ̈ culus .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj ah Cirene , Simón isbi , ismam naj Alejandro yeb naj Rufo ye naj , ispeto xin naj munil . Hayet yecˈto naj sata ebnaj ikˈn ̈ e Comam tuˈ , istzabnayo ebnaj naj , yinito naj isculus Comam .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Yinito ebnaj Comam bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ chiyij Gólgota , chaliloj Isbajil Wiˈe .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Yakˈni ebnaj vino sombil yeb huntekˈan teˈ telaj chiyij mirra yucˈuˈ Comam , yajaˈ mach isje Comam yucˈuˈ .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yanican ̈ ebnaj Comam yin ̈ culus , yoc ebnaj soldado yilweno isba yin ̈ xil iskˈap Comam yun ̈ e yilni ebnaj mac chiinitoj .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Yin ̈ chˈen balon ̈ eb yet yalan ̈ chuman yanican ̈ ebnaj Comam yin ̈ culus .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ispahnico ebnaj huneˈ nichˈan akˈinteˈ ahto yiban ̈ iswiˈ Comam yin ̈ culus bay tzˈibn ̈ ebilicoj tzet yin ̈ xin akˈlax camoj , ẍi hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ naj tiˈ Yahawil anma Israel , ” ẍicoj .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ay xin cawan ̈ ebnaj elkˈom ah yin ̈ culus yinta Comam , huneˈ naj ah yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam , huneˈxa naj yin ̈ ismeckˈab .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu yijni isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano bay chala : “ Alaxico naj xol ebnaj caw txˈoj chiswatxˈe , ” ẍiayoj .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Haˈ xin anma chiecˈto bay alaxcan ̈ Comam yin ̈ culus , chisbile iswiˈ cat isbuchwa yin ̈ Comam , chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Hach tiˈ chawuchcˈayo yatut Comam Dios cat hawanican ̈ selel yin ̈ oxeb tzˈayic hawalni ,

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: colilo haba yin ̈ culus tiˈ , cat hawaytij , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , oc ebnaj yalaˈ tet hunun : ― Txˈiˈal mac iscol naj , wal naj xin mach chu iscolnilo isba naj .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Ta chiscolilo isba naj yin ̈ culus tiˈ yin ̈ cosat , wal tuˈ chimjayto yul janma ta haˈ naj Cristo Yahawil Israel , ẍi ebnaj . Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj aycan ̈ yin ̈ culus yinta Comam tuˈ , ocpaxo ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ Comam .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Haxa yet yapni yin ̈ chumanil iskˈejholilo sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yin ̈ xa chˈen oxeb yin ̈ kˈejbiyal issajbilo hunelxa .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ orahil tuˈ ah yaw Comam , yalni yin ̈ caw ip : ― Eloi , Eloi , ¿ lama sabactani ? ẍi Comam . Haˈ chal yelapnoj : Mamin , Mamin , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin chinhanahuln ̈ etojan ? ẍi Comam .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj ayayo bey tuˈ aben tzet yal Comam , yalni ebnaj : ― Abewecˈanab tzet chal naj , lan ̈ an yawten naj naj Elías , ischejab Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Isto huneˈ naj yin ̈ an ̈ e islabanayto huneˈ esponja xol teˈ pahla vino , yanico naj huneˈ esponja tuˈ yin ̈ iswiˈ huneˈ teˈ ah , yanahto naj yin ̈ istiˈ Comam yun ̈ e yucˈni Comam . Yalni naj tet ebnaj ayco iscawilal tuˈ : ― Jilaˈwej ta chihul naj Elías yikˈalo naj yin ̈ culus tiˈ , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yah yaw Comam yin ̈ caw ip , iscamiloj .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Wal huneˈ kˈap niman kˈap aycan ̈ yictabanil yatut Comam Dios , cab ayico kˈap . Ichiti istzilbanil kˈap yin ̈ iswiˈ masanta ayilo yin ̈ yojtabanil .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Hayet yilni naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj soldado tzet yuhi yet iscam Comam tuˈ , yalni naj : ― Caw yelticˈabani , Iscˈahol Comam Dios ye huneˈ naj tiˈ , ẍi naj .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebix ix nahat yehilo ilni iscam Comam . Xol ebix tuˈ ayco ix María ah Magdala yeb ix Salomé , yeb xin ix María ismiˈ naj José yeb naj Jacobo , naj tzujan unin .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Huntekˈan ebix tuˈ ecˈ tzujtzun yinta Comam , iscolwapaxo ebix yin ̈ Comam yet yecˈ yul ismajul Galilea . Aypaxo haywan ̈ ebix hun yu yapni yeb Comam bey Jerusalén .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ xin chiswatxˈecano anma Israel yin ̈ tzettaj chiocnico yu yin ̈ hunxa tzˈayic , yuto hunxa tzˈayic tuˈ , tzˈayic xewilal . Haxa yet lan ̈ anxa iskˈejbayoj xin ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: isto naj José iskˈanno isnimanil Comam tet naj Pilato ; caw mach xiw naj iskˈanni isnimanil Comam . Naj José tuˈ ah Arimatea naj , ayco naj xol ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ lahtiˈ xol ebnaj Israel , caw xin ay yelapno naj yul sat ebnaj . Echmabilpaxo yu naj yoc Comam Dios Yahawiloj .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Hayet yaben naj Pilato ta cam Comam , caw cˈayilo iscˈul naj , yawten naj naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj soldado , iskˈamben naj ta yeli camnaxa Comam .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Hayet yalni naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj soldado ta xacam Comam , ischejni naj Pilato ta chiyiyti naj José tuˈ isnimanil Comam yin ̈ culus .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Hayet yaben naj xin , isto naj islokˈno huneˈ kˈap sábana caw ay istohol , yinayti naj isnimanil Comam yin ̈ teˈ culus , ispichnico naj huneˈ sábana tuˈ yin ̈ Comam ; lahwi tuˈ isto naj yanocto isnimanil Comam yul huneˈ chˈen chˈen holbil . Yanicanico naj huneˈ chˈen chˈen ismajilo istiˈ bay alaxicto Comam tuˈ .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Wal ix María Magdalena yeb ix María ismiˈ naj José yil ebix bay alaxcanicto isnimanil Comam .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Haxa yet islahwi istzˈayical xewilal xin , islokˈni ix María ah Magdala yeb ix María ismiˈ naj Jacobo , yeb ix Salomé huntekˈan an ̈ caw xukˈ sam yu yanico ebix yin ̈ isnimanil Comam .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayal yin ̈ babel tzˈayic yin ̈ semana xin , isto ebix bay mujlax Comam ; haˈ caw yahilo tzˈayic yapni ebix bey tuˈ .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Yallen ebix tet hunun : ― ¿ Mactaxca chiinilo chˈen ayco ismajilo istiˈ bay ayicto Comam ? ẍi ebix .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Haxa yet yilniti ebix matxa ayoco huneˈ chˈen niman chˈen tuˈ ismajilo bay alaxicto isnimanil Comam .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Hayet yocto ebix yul chˈen xin , yilni ebix huneˈ naj tzeh tzˈon ̈ anayo yin ̈ cowatxˈkˈab yulicto chˈen , caw sajhopon ̈ e xil iskˈap naj aycoj , caw xin nimajal istel yoj xil iskˈap naj tuˈ . Caw xiwcan ̈ ebix yet yilni ebix naj .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Yalni naj tet ebix : ― Mach chexxiwi , wohtajan tato Comam Jesús ah Nazaret chesayicˈoj , Comam alaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus . Xaitzitzbican ̈ Comam , matxa Comam bey tiˈ . Ilwecˈanab bay alaxicti Comam .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: As halwe tet ebnaj iscuywom Comam yeb tet naj Pedro tato chibabi apno Comam bey Galilea tesataj , haˈ bey tuˈ xin cheyil yin ̈ Comam hacaˈticˈa yu yalnicano teyet , ẍi naj .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yelti lemna ebix bey tuˈ , isto ebix , toxan ̈ e xin chiluylun ebix yu xiwquilal . Machi mac tet xin yal ebix , yuto caw xiw ebix .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Hayet yitzitzbican ̈ Comam yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayalil yin ̈ babel tzˈayic yin ̈ semana , haˈ tet ix María ah Magdala bay isye isba Comam babel , ix bay yilo Comam hujwan ̈ ischejab naj matzwalil .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , isto ix yalno tet ebnaj ecˈ tzujtzun yinta Comam ta isye isba Comam tet ix . Haˈ ebnaj tuˈ caw biscˈulal ye ebnaj yeb xin caw chiokˈ ebnaj .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj ta itzitzbican ̈ Comam yeb ta isye isba tet ix , caw mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Tzujan tuˈ xin , isyenipaxo isba Comam tet cawan ̈ iscuywom yet lan ̈ an isto bey huneˈ aldea ; nan yu isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Isto ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ yalno tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj iscuywom Comam , yajaˈ maẍticˈa yapaxayto ebnaj yul yanma .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ tzujanilxa xin isyeni isba Comam Jesús tet ebnaj hunlahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom yet ayco ebnaj waˈo sat meẍa , iscachlax ebnaj yu Comam yu chicabcon iscˈul ebnaj ; mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ tzet yal ebnaj xailni ta xaitzitzbican ̈ Comam .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj : ― Asiˈwe sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ cat heyalnicˈo Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile tet sunil anma .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Haˈ mac chianayto yul yanma cat yahcano haˈ iswiˈ , chicolchahi , yajaˈ wal mac mach chianayto yul yanma , chiay isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Haˈ huntekˈan cˈaybalcˈule tiˈ chioc yechelo tet mac chianayto yul yanma , chiyilo ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin ̈ anma yin ̈ inbihan , cat istzotel ebnaj yin ̈ nan abxubal .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca chistzab ebnaj noˈ laba , waxan ̈ ca chiakˈlax veneno yucˈuˈ ebnaj , matzet chu ebnaj . Hayet chanayo ebnaj iskˈab yiban ̈ anma yaˈay , cat iscawxicanocan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jesús sunil huntekˈan tuˈ tet ebnaj iscuywom , yilaxto Comam satcan ̈ , yoc tzˈon ̈ no Comam yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam Dios .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ yalnocˈo Istzotiˈ Comam Dios sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal . Caw xin ayco Comam Dios yetbiho ebnaj , yeb caw chioc yip tzotiˈ chalicˈo ebnaj tuˈ yu ej cˈaybalcˈule yeb yu yechel yip Comam chisye ebnaj .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , chintzˈibn ̈ etojan huneˈ carta tiˈ tawet mam Teófilo , yin ̈ huntekˈan tzet ye tuˈ xayu coxol tiˈ . Haˈ ebnaj chihalnicˈo Istzotiˈ Comam Jesucristo tinan ̈ yil ebnaj yin ̈ tzet yu yichicoj , lahwi tuˈ xin con ̈ iscuynicanojan ̈ ebnaj yin ̈ sunil tzet xayu tuˈ . Caw xin txˈiˈal mac xayaco yin ̈ iscˈul istzˈibn ̈ encano tzet xayu tuˈ .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Haquinpaxtuˈan mam Teófilo , lahwi inkˈambenan yin ̈ nancˈulal yin ̈ sunil caw yichebanil , yoc yin ̈ innabalan intzˈibn ̈ entojan sunil tiˈ yin ̈ istxolal tawet .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin caw cˈul chu hawohtan ̈ eniloj ta yel chal huntekˈan xahacuy tuˈ .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Hayet ayco naj Herodes yahawilo txˈotxˈ Judea , ay hun majan ebnaj xol anma Israel chˈakˈni xahanbal tet Comam Dios , chiyij isbi Abías . Xol ebnaj tuˈ ayco huneˈ icham chiyij Zacarías , Elizabet isbi yixal icham . Yichmam ixnam ye icham Aarón .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Caw cˈul isbeybal icham yeb yixal yul sat Comam Dios , yeb xin caw yijem iscawan ̈ il yin ̈ sunil ischejbanil Comam . Yuxin machi mac chu yalni tato mach yijemo icham yeb yixal sata Comam .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Wal ixnam Elizabet tuˈ xin , maẍticˈa yunin , yuxin machi hunu yuninal icham yeb ixnam yet yichambicaniloj .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Haˈ hunel xin , ayilo istiempohal bay oc icham Zacarías yin ̈ ismunil yin ̈ sacerdotehal yeb ebnaj yetbi yul yatut Comam .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Yilwen ebnaj mac yin ̈ chˈoc isbi yocto isn ̈ usno pom yiban ̈ ismeẍahil bay chin ̈ uslax pom yul yatut Comam hacaˈticˈa chute ebnaj . Cˈuxan xin yiban ̈ icham Zacarías apni .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an isn ̈ usni icham Zacarías pom tet Comam Dios yul yatut Comam tuˈ , aycanilto sunil anma txahloj .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Hayet ayicto icham Zacarías isn ̈ usno pom tuˈ , isyenican ̈ isba huneˈ yángel Comam Dios tet icham , yoc lin ̈ no yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab ismeẍahil bay chin ̈ uslax pom tuˈ .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Yet yilni icham naj ángel tuˈ , isxiwcan ̈ icham , iscˈaycanilo iscˈul icham .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Yalni naj ángel : ― Mam Zacarías , mach chaẍxiwcan ̈ , caw mayabe Comam Dios tzet maxawal yin ̈ hatxah . Yu huneˈ tuˈ xin , chiyilaˈ hawixal Elizabet yin ̈ huneˈ nichˈan hacˈahol , Juan chawaco isbihoj .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Caw chitzala hacˈul yin ̈ , caw niman anma chitzalapaxocan ̈ yet chiyaben ispitzcˈa nichˈan heyuninal tuˈ .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Huneˈ heyuninal chipitzcˈa tuˈ , caw aycano yelapno chˈelico yul sat Comam Dios . Maẍticˈa chucˈuˈ vino nitam hunuxa nan uqˈuehal . Ayxaco Espíritu Santo yin ̈ yet chipitzcˈahi .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Caw hanta ebnaj israelita chiswatxˈeˈco isba yul iskˈab Comam Dios yu huneˈ hacˈahol tuˈ .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Haˈ naj Juan tuˈ chibabito sata Comam Jahawil . Hacaˈ ishelanil yeb yip yanma naj Elías ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , hac tuˈ chˈelico naj . Yu cuybanile chal naj chimeltzoco yanma ebnaj mame yeb ebix miˈe yin ̈ akˈancˈulal yeb yuninal . Yebpaxo anma man ̈ cˈom chimeltzoco isnabal cat isyijenpaxo tzet chal Comam Dios . Hac tuˈ chu iswatxˈen isba anma , cat ischahni Comam , ẍi naj ángel tuˈ .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ icham Zacarías tuˈ : ― ¿ Tzet xin chu wanaytojan yul wanmahan huneˈ chawal tiˈ ? Yuto hanintiˈan caw icham inxahan , caw xin ixnamxapaxo wixalan , ẍi icham .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Yalni naj ángel tuˈ : ― Hanintiˈan Gabriel inan . Haˈ Comam Dios maquinchejnitijan walnojan huneˈ chejbanile caw cˈul tiˈ tawet .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , chimajicano hatiˈ . Matxa chiyu hatzotel tinan ̈ masanto yet chijni isba yapni istiempohal ispitzcˈa nichˈan hacˈahol , yuto machi maxawayto yul hawanma yin ̈ tzet mawaltiˈan , ẍi naj ángel tuˈ tet icham Zacarías .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Wal anma chiˈechman yelilo icham Zacarías tuˈ xin , caw chicˈay iscˈul yuto caw ecˈ istiempo icham yul yatut Comam Dios .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Haxa yet yelilo icham xol anma , caw matxa chu istzotel icham . Isnanilo anma tato ay huno tzet isye Comam Dios tet icham . Caw toxan ̈ e chisye icham yechel yu iskˈab yin ̈ tzet yelax tet , wal istzotel icham , matxa chuhi .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Hayet islahwi istiempohal ismunil icham yul yatut Comam Dios , ispaxto icham yatut .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Hayet isbelwi istzˈayical tuˈ xin ispitzcˈati huneˈ nichˈan unin yin ̈ ixnam Elizabet . Howeb ixahaw maẍticˈa bay elto ixnam yul yatut . Chistxumni ixnam hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: ― Yu ishelanil Comam Dios yuxin hac tiˈ wehan , yun ̈ e mach chiel inpixanan yuto maẍticˈa huno wuninan , ẍi ixnam ischuquil .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Wajebxa ixahaw xin ischejniti Comam Dios naj ángel Gabriel bey con ̈ ob Nazaret ayco yul ismajul Galilea .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Yapni naj iscˈatan ̈ huneˈ ix kˈopo , María isbi . Wal xin takˈwebilxa mohyilal yu ix tet huneˈ naj , José isbi , yichmam naj ye naj rey David .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Hayet yoc apno naj ángel yul n ̈ a bay ay ix , yalni naj tet ix : ― Tzalahan ̈ yuto ayco Comam Dios hawetbihoj . Caw niman iscˈulchˈanil Comam tawin ̈ yuto sicˈbilachilo xol hawet ixal , ẍi naj .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Hayet yaben ix tzet yal naj tuˈ xin , iscˈayilo iscˈul ix , yichico ix istxumnilo hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tzet yelapno ye huneˈ tiˈ ? ẍi ix .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Yalnipaxo naj ángel tet ix : ― María , mach chachxiwcan ̈ , yuto xaˈilcha iscˈulal hawu yul sat Comam Dios .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , chipitzcˈahoti huneˈ nichˈan winaj unin tawin ̈ , haxa yet chipitzcˈahi Jesús chawaco isbihoj .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Caw ay yelapno chˈelico naj , cat xin yalni anma ta Iscˈahol Comam Dios ye naj . Haˈ Iscˈahol Comam Dios Jahawil tuˈ chiˈoco reyalil , hacaˈ yu yoc naj rey David , yichmam naj .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Haˈ naj tuˈ chiˈoc yahawilo anma Israel yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . Machi bakˈinal chilahwi huneˈ ismunil naj tuˈ , ẍi naj .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Iskˈamben ix María tet naj : ― ¿ Tzet chu yijno isba huneˈ chawal tiˈ ? Hanintiˈan maẍto wichamilan , ẍi ix tet naj .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Yalni naj ángel tuˈ tet ix : ― Haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo chiˈayolo tawiban ̈ , yebpaxo yip Comam Dios caw ay ismay chiayilo tawiban ̈ hacaˈ hunu moyan . Yuxin haˈ huneˈ unin chipitzcˈa tawin ̈ tuˈ , yet Dios yehi cat yallaxpaxoj ta Iscˈahol Comam .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Hacaˈ ixnam Elizabet hanoh , caw ixnamxa ixnam , yajaˈ chiyilaˈ ixnam yin ̈ huneˈ nichˈan yunin . Wal xin ohtabil tato maẍticˈa hunu unin xapitzcˈati yin ̈ ixnam , yaj wal tinan ̈ wajebxa ixahaw iscˈul ixnam .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Wal xin machi hunu tzet ye tuˈ mach chu iswatxˈen Comam , ẍi naj ángel tet ix .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ ix María xin : ― Hanintiˈan ischejab Comam Dios Jahawil wehan , yubojab hacaˈ maxawal tiˈ , ẍi ix . Lahwi tuˈ xin , ismeltzoto naj ángel .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ xin , yin ̈ hamataj to ix María bey huneˈ con ̈ ob chewal txˈotxˈ yul ismajul Judea .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Yapni ix bey yatut icham Zacarías , iskˈamben ix hanicˈ ye ixnam Elizabet .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Hayet yaben ixnam Elizabet istzotel ix María tuˈ , isbili nichˈan unin ijbilico yu ixnam . Hac tuˈ yu yoccano ixnam yalan ̈ yip Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Yuxinto yal ixnam hacaˈ tiˈ yin ̈ caw ip : ― Hach tiˈ María , caw niman iscˈulal Comam Dios chakˈ tawet sata sunil ebix jet ixal . Nimanpaxo iscˈulal Comam chakˈ tet huneˈ hawunin chipitzcˈaho tiˈ .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: ¿ Tzet caw yelapno wehan yuxin mahul ismiˈ Comam Wahawilan quinistucleˈan ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Yet mawabenan hatzotelcan ̈ mabili nichˈan unin tiˈ win ̈ an yu tzalahilal .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Sakˈal hawet yuto hawayto yul hawanma ta chij isba tzet yal Comam Dios , ẍi ixnam Elizabet .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yalni ix María : Caw chitzala wanmahan chiwalnihan cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios Jahawil , Comam caw aycano yip .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Caw chitzalacano wanmahan yin ̈ Comam Dios Incolomalan .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca mach nimano welapnojan , yajaˈ Comam Dios chˈanayo iscˈulal wiban ̈ an . Yuxin chiyalaˈ anma yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo ta caw sakˈal wetan yu ayayo iscˈulal Comam wiban ̈ an .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Yuto haˈ Comam Dios , caw aycano yip , haˈ chiyenilo cˈaybalcˈule win ̈ an . Caw niman yelapno isbi Comam , caw machi nichˈano istxˈojal ayco yin ̈ .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Sunilbal tiempo chitzˈay iscˈul Comam yin ̈ sunil mac chixiw tet .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Isyelo Comam yip , yuchcˈanto Comam sunil tzet iswatxˈe ebnaj chal isba can ̈ yehal .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Xaˈel ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob yul iscapil yu Comam , haxa ebnaj chewchotan ̈ e chute isba , yican ̈ Comam .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Xayakˈnoho Comam iscˈul ebnaj chin ̈ ohchahi , haxa ebnaj kˈalom xin , occano ebnaj yin ̈ man ̈ tzetal .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Xaˈoc Comam jetbiho han ̈ on ̈ Israel hon ̈ tiˈ , han ̈ on ̈ ischejab Comam jehi , maẍticˈa to nahul yu Comam , istzˈay iscˈul jin ̈ .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj jichmam ; tet icham Abraham , yeb xin tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj ichmame titna yin ̈ naj , ẍi ix María .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Etza oxeb ixahaw beyicˈo ix María iscˈatan ̈ ixnam Elizabet , ismeltzoto ix bey yatut hunelxa .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Hayet yapni istiempohal , ispitzcˈa nichˈan iswinaj unin ixnam Elizabet tuˈ ,

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: yapni ebix ay iscawilal yatut ixnam yeb yicˈal ixnam tzalaho yin ̈ iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios yakˈ tet ixnam .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Yin ̈ xa iswaxajeb tzˈayic xin , yet yakˈlax circuncidar nichˈan tzˈul tuˈ , yalni anma ta Zacarías chij isbi hacaˈ isbi ismam .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Yalni ixnam miˈe tuˈ tet anma : ― Machoj , Juan chiyij isbi naj , ẍi ixnam .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Yalni anma tet ixnam : ― ¿ Tzet yuxin hac tuˈ cheyakˈ yijaˈ isbi ? Wal xol heyicˈal machi hunu mac hac tuˈ isbi , ẍi anma .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Yuxin eqˈuiˈco iskˈab anma iskˈamben tet icham Zacarías yin ̈ tzet biˈehal chiyakˈ yijaˈ iscˈahol .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Iskˈanni icham huneˈ nichˈan akˈinteˈ , istzˈibn ̈ enayo icham hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Juan chiyij isbi huneˈ nichˈan unin tiˈ , ẍiayoj . Toxan ̈ e cˈaycanocan ̈ iscˈul sunil anma yet yabeni .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin istzotelcan ̈ icham Zacarías , yichi yalni icham cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Iscˈayilo iscˈul sunil anma ayayo iscawilal yatut icham , ispujbalaxicˈo huneˈ tiˈ bey sunil chewal txˈotxˈ yul ismajul Judea .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Sunil anma aben huntekˈan tiˈ chi ‑ la ‑ iskˈamben tet hunun : ― ¿ Tzettaxca caw chˈeloco huneˈ nichˈan unin tiˈ ? ẍi anma . Hac tuˈ yute yalni anma yuto ayco Comam Dios yetbiho nichˈan unin tuˈ .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Wal icham Zacarías , ismam huneˈ nichˈan unin tuˈ , oc icham yalan ̈ yip Comam Espíritu Santo , yalni icham tzotiˈ hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Hallaxojab tzotiˈ cˈul yin ̈ Comam , Comam coDiosal han ̈ on ̈ Israel hon ̈ tiˈ , yuto xahul Comam con ̈ iscoloˈ han ̈ on ̈ iscon ̈ obon ̈ tiˈ .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Yati Comam Dios huneˈ Cocolomal caw aycano yip , huneˈ Cocolomal tiˈ titna yin ̈ yuninal jichmam rey David , naj ischejab Comam .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Huneˈ tiˈ halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet ebnaj ischejab sicˈbililo yu yet payat :

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Chon ̈ iscolilo Comam tet macta ayco ishowal jin ̈ yeb xin macta chichiwa iscˈul jin ̈ .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Yalnipaxoj ta chitzˈay iscˈul Comam yin ̈ ebnaj jichmam , yeb maẍticˈa chito nahul yu isyijen tzetticˈa halbilcano tet ebnaj jichmam tuˈ .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Haˈ huneˈ tiˈ halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet jichmam Abraham yetax payat .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Yal Comam ta chon ̈ iscolilo yul iskˈab ebnaj chichiwaco iscˈul jin ̈ , haxinwal mach chon ̈ xiw jakˈni chejaˈ coba tet Comam Dios .

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Cˈulojab chijute cobeybal sata Comam , han ̈ eˈojab yin ̈ Comam ayco conabal sunilbal tiempo , ẍi icham .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Yalnipaxo icham Zacarías tuˈ yin ̈ iscˈahol : Walach hach tiˈ cˈahol , chachoc ischejabo Comam Dios caw ay yip , yuto hach babel chaẍto sata Comam Jahawil . Yu hawatxˈen isbeh Comam , haˈ ton hacuyni yanico anma isnabal yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Hach chawakˈa yabe anma yin ̈ tzet chu ischahni iscolbanil yet chˈakˈlaxcano tan ̈ o ismul yu Comam .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Yu caw chitzˈay iscˈul Comam Dios jin ̈ , yuxin hacaˈ yahilo tzˈayic , cat comujli yu , hac tuˈ chu yul huneˈ Cocolomal chejbilti yu Comam .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Yu yiniti issajilkˈinal jet han ̈ on ̈ ayico kˈejholo yin ̈ janma , yeb han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab naj camical . Haˈ xin chon ̈ ijban con ̈ yanico yin ̈ akˈancˈulal yeb Comam Dios , ẍi icham Zacarías .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Wal huneˈ nichˈan unin tuˈ xin , hacaˈticˈa ischˈib isnimanil , hacpax tuˈ ischˈib yitzˈatil iswiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios . Haxa yet istzehbican ̈ naj , isto naj bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ desierto , haˈ tuˈ ehayo naj masanto apni istiempohal yakˈni yohtan ̈ elo isba naj tet con ̈ ob Israel .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , yalni naj Augusto César , yahawil yeco yin ̈ txˈotxˈ Roma , ta chˈilaxcan ̈ isbisil sunil anma ayco yalan ̈ yip txˈotxˈ Roma .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Hayet yah huneˈ babel isbisil anma tiˈ haˈ naj Cirenio ayco gobernadoral yul ismajul Siria .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Sunil anma to istzˈunuˈ isbi baytajtuˈwal con ̈ ob titna yicˈal .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Yuxinto el naj José bey yul con ̈ ob Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea , isto naj bey Belén yul ismajul Judea , yuto haˈ tuˈ pitzcˈana naj rey David , yichmam naj José tuˈ .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Yuxin to naj José yeb ix María , ix takˈwebilxa ismohyi yeb naj , istzˈunuˈ isbi bey con ̈ ob Belén . Wal ix María tuˈ , ayxa tzet ye ix .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Hayet ay naj yeb ix María bey Belén , yayilo istzˈayical iswatxˈi iscˈul ix .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Yuxin haˈ ta bey tuˈ pitzcˈa nichˈan isbabel unin ix . Ispichnico ix istxow nichˈan yunin tuˈ , ishilbanayto ix yul ishucub no nokˈ , yuto matxa hamanil yul waybal .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Bey iscawilal con ̈ ob Belén , ay huntekˈan ebnaj tan ̈ en meˈ ; chiwayn ̈ en ismeˈ sat chekˈan .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Cˈuxan xin isyecan ̈ isba huneˈ ángel tet ebnaj . Yaypaxo jopla iskˈakˈal yip Comam Dios yiban ̈ ebnaj , isxiwcanocan ̈ ebnaj xin .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Yalni naj ángel tet ebnaj : ― Mach chexxiwi yuto ay huneˈ tzotiˈ caw cˈul chinhulan walaˈan teyet . Haˈ huneˈ chiwaltiˈan istzalabal hecˈul yeb istzalabal sunil anma .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Bey yul con ̈ ob Belén , iscon ̈ ob naj rey David , haˈ tuˈ mapitzcˈa huneˈ Hecolomal , haˈ ton Comam Cristo , Comam Jahawil .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Haˈ tiˈ chˈakˈno hetxumuloj , pichbilico istxow yin ̈ , hilanayto yul teˈ hucub bay chalaxayto istelaj no nokˈ , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa xin , isyenican ̈ isba hun bulanxa ebnaj ángel iscˈatan ̈ naj babel tuˈ . Istzabnico ebnaj isbitn ̈ en isbi Comam , chi ‑ la ‑ yalni ebnaj :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: Jalawe cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios ay yul satcan ̈ , ayojab akˈancˈulal sat txˈo txˈotxˈ xol anma ochebil yu Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Hayet ispaxto ebnaj satcan ̈ , yichico ebnaj tan ̈ em meˈ yalni tet hunun : ― Ton ̈ we bey Belén jilaˈ huneˈ mayu tuˈ , huneˈ mayakˈ Comam Dios Jahawil johtan ̈ elo tiˈ , ẍile ebnaj tet hunun .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Yin ̈ an ̈ e xin , to ebnaj yilaˈ . Hayet yapni ebnaj xin , yilchayo ix María yeb naj José , yeb nichˈan neneˈ ayayto yul ishucub no nokˈ .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Yet yilnico ebnaj yin ̈ nichˈan neneˈ tuˈ xin , istzabloco yalni ebnaj tet sunil anma tzet hallax tet ebnaj yu naj ángel yin ̈ huneˈ nichˈan neneˈ tuˈ .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Sunil anma aben huntekˈan yal ebnaj tan ̈ em meˈ tuˈ , caw cˈaycanocan ̈ iscˈul anma yabeni .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Wal ix María xin , ton ̈ e iscˈubacano ix yul yanma yin ̈ huntekˈan tzet yal ebnaj , chi ‑ la ‑ ecˈ yin ̈ isnabal ix yin ̈ tzet caw yehi .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Wal ebnaj tan ̈ em meˈ , hayet ispaxto ebnaj yichico ebnaj yanico ismay Comam Dios , yakˈnipaxo ebnaj yuchˈandiosal tet Comam yin ̈ tzet yabeˈ ebnaj , yeb xin yu tzet bey ebnaj yilaˈ , yuto hacaˈticˈa yu yallax tet ebnaj hac tuˈ elicoj .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
