text2: Hayet yilni anma huneˈ tuˈ , yichico anma buchwal yin ̈ Comam yuto cancano Comam bey yatut huneˈ naj mulum .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Haˈ naj Zaqueo tuˈ , ah lin ̈ no naj , yalni naj tet Comam : ― Mamin , wal tinan ̈ chiwakˈan yicta tzet ayinan tet anma mebaˈ , yeb xin ta ay mac ecˈbal wutelojan ismelyu , can ̈ elto ecˈbal selel chiwakˈan tet , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Mahul huneˈ colbanile bey huneˈ n ̈ a tiˈ tinan ̈ ; naj Zaqueo tiˈ caw yuninalpaxo icham Abraham ye naj .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Wal xin Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , hulnajinan insayaˈan yeb incolnihan anma cˈaynato yu ismul , ẍi Comam .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an yaben anma yin ̈ tzet chal Comam Jesús tuˈ , lan ̈ anxa xin yapni Comam bey Jerusalén yoc yin ̈ isnabal anma ta lan ̈ anxa yapni istiempohal bay chˈoc Comam Dios Yahawilo anma , yuxin yicheco Comam yalni huneˈ yechel tiˈ .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Yet hunel ay huneˈ naj caw cˈulticˈa yin ̈ bal . Awtelax naj yul huneˈ niman con ̈ ob yu ischahni naj yoc yahawilo yul iscon ̈ ob yet chimeltzohi .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Yet maẍto chito naj , yawte naj lahon ̈ wan ̈ ebnaj chimunla yintaj , yakˈnicano naj niman melyu tet hunun ebnaj yu ismunla ebnaj yeb chˈen . Lahan yutecano naj isbisil chˈen yin ̈ ebnaj . Yalnicano naj tet ebnaj : “ Munlahan ̈ we yeb chˈen inmelyutiˈan masanto yet chinhulan , cat heyakˈni chˈen yeb yal wetan , ” ẍi naj , isto naj xin .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Yajaˈ wal ebnaj yet con ̈ ob naj xin , caw chichiwa iscˈul ebnaj yin ̈ naj , yuxin yet isto naj , tzujanticˈa yu isto huntekˈan ebnaj akˈocˈule yin ̈ naj tet naj awten naj tuˈ , yalni ebnaj tet naj caw yahaw tuˈ hacaˈ ti : “ Haˈ huneˈ naj tiˈ caw mach chijochehan ̈ chˈoc naj yahawilo yul cocon ̈ oban ̈ , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Yaj caw akˈlaxticˈa huneˈ ismunil naj yoc yahawo iscon ̈ ob tuˈ . Haxa yet ayxa naj yul iscon ̈ ob hunelxa , yawten naj ebnaj lahon ̈ wan ̈ bay yakˈ naj ismelyu tuˈ yu iskˈamben naj hantaxa yal chˈen yikˈ hunun ebnaj .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Yapni huneˈ naj babel , yalni naj : “ Mamin , haˈ chˈen hamelyu hawacano yul inkˈaban , lahon ̈ ebto chˈen wikˈan yu chˈen , ” ẍi naj .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Istakˈwi naj yahaw tuˈ tet naj : “ Hach tiˈ , caw cˈul yu hamunla yin ̈ hanicˈchˈan wacanojan tawet , yuxinto chaẍwacanicojan yahawo lahon ̈ eb con ̈ ob , ” ẍi naj .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yapni hunxa naj munlawom , yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mamin , haˈ chˈen hamelyu hawakˈcano yul inkˈaban , howeb to chˈen wikˈan yin ̈ chˈen , ” ẍi naj .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Yalni naj yahaw tuˈ tet naj : “ Hach tiˈ , chaẍwacanicojan yahawilo howeb con ̈ ob , ” ẍi naj .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yapni hunxa naj , yalni naj tet naj yahaw tuˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mamin , ay hamelyu lah . Cˈubabil chˈen yul huneˈ payuˈe tiˈ wuhan .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: Caw quinxiwan intzabnihan hamelyu tiˈ , yuto wohtajan ta caw how ach , yebpaxo toxan ̈ e chachah tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajach watxˈen ̈ e , yeb ton ̈ e chahatxˈ tzet ye tuˈ maẍtajach tzˈunn ̈ e , ” ẍi naj tet naj yahaw .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Yalni naj yahaw tuˈ tet naj : “ Walach hach tiˈ , caw machiswalil yu hamunlahi , yu tzet maxawal wettiˈan yuxin chaẍwacanicojan yin ̈ isyaˈtajil .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin mach hawakˈ inmelyutiˈan cˈamil tet anma , haxinwal yet manhultiˈan ayxa yal chˈen chikˈa ? ” ẍi naj .

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Yalni xin naj yahaw tuˈ tet ebnaj ayco iscˈatan ̈ hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Iwelo chˈen melyu tet naj tiˈ , cat heyakˈni chˈen tet naj ikˈni chˈen lahon ̈ eb to , ” ẍi naj yahaw tuˈ .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Yalni ebnaj : “ Mamin , yaj huneˈ naj chawal tuˈ , caw lahon ̈ ebxa chˈen ecˈbal ikˈbil yu naj , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Istakˈwi naj yahaw tuˈ xin : “ Haˈ mac ay yet , chˈakˈlax yakˈbil tet , haˈ mac machi yet , haˈ nichˈan ay yul iskˈab tuˈ , chiˈilaxolo tet .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Yebpaxo xin , ebnaj ayco ishowal win ̈ an mach choche chinocan yahawilo yul con ̈ ob tiˈ , iweti ebnaj bey tiˈ , cat hepotxˈni camo ebnaj yin ̈ insatan , ” ẍi naj yahaw tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Lahwi yalni Comam Jesús huntekˈan tuˈ xin , isto Comam bey Jerusalén yeb ebnaj iscuywom .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Hayet ayco Comam yin ̈ istzalanil won ̈ an Olivo , xolbal con ̈ ob Betfagé yeb con ̈ ob Betania , ischejnito Comam cawan ̈ ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam tet ebnaj :

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: ― Asiwe bey huneˈ aldea cosatacˈto tiˈ . Yet chexapno bey tuˈ , cheyilaˈ huneˈ noˈ burro xecan , maẍto hunu mac chiˈahto yiban ̈ noˈ . Chepuholo noˈ , cat heyinoti noˈ wetan , ẍi Comam .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Ta ay mac chikˈamben teyet , “ ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin chepuhilo noˈ ? ” ta ẍi , cheyalaˈwe hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ay chˈocnico noˈ yu Comam Jesús , ” quexchi , ẍi Comam .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Isto ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ , yilcha noˈ yu ebnaj hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Yet lan ̈ an ispuhnilo ebnaj noˈ yapni ebnaj ay yet noˈ tuˈ , yalni ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yuxin chepuhilo noˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― To ay chˈocnico noˈ yu Comam Jesús , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yinito ebnaj noˈ tet Comam , yanahto ebnaj huntekˈan xil iskˈap yiban ̈ noˈ , tzujan tuˈ xin iscolwa ebnaj yanahto Comam yiban ̈ noˈ .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an yecˈto Comam xin , islitxˈbanayo anma xil iskˈap yul beh sata Comam yu chitzala iscˈul anma yin ̈ Comam .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Hayet lan ̈ anxa yapni Comam yin ̈ isxulanil won ̈ an Olivo tuˈ , yah yaw sunil anma tzujan yinta Comam yu tzalahilal . Yalni anma cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios yu sunil cˈaybalcˈule xayil anma .

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Chalni anma hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Jalaˈwe cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Jahawil chul coxol yu Comam Dios . Ayojab akˈancˈulal yul satcan ̈ , caw jakˈaweco ismay Comam Dios .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj fariseo ayco xol anma tuˈ , halni tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , cach huntekˈan anma chˈel yaw tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Chiwalan teyet , ta chisbejaˈ anma yelo yaw , haxam chˈen chˈen chiˈaho yaw selelo anma tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Haxa yet lan ̈ anxa yapni Comam iscawilal con ̈ ob Jerusalén , yokˈcan ̈ Comam yilni con ̈ ob tuˈ .

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Tinan ̈ xin , hex ah Jerusalén , majaltam yet huneˈ tzˈayic tiˈ chinachalo heyu yin ̈ huneˈ mac chu yakˈni akˈancˈulal yul heyanma , yaj wal xin mach chinachalo huneˈ tiˈ heyu yuto caw ewan ye yul hesat .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Cˈanchˈanex , ay huneˈ tiempo bay chihulo isyaˈtajil teyiban ̈ yu anma ayco ishowal teyin ̈ . Chihoylaxayo hecon ̈ ob tiˈ , hacaˈ xan ̈ e peyab chuco ebnaj soldado , cat yanico ebnaj howal teyin ̈ .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Chitan ̈ tzelaxilo huneˈ con ̈ ob tiˈ . Matxa hunu chˈen chˈen chicancano yiban ̈ yet chˈenal , cat ispotxˈlax camo sunil anma yuto mach hechah huneˈ Mac Akˈbilti texol Hecolomalo yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yocto Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , istzumbenilti Comam anma chitxon ̈ wi bey tuˈ .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Yalni Comam tet anma : ― Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ watutan yet txah yehi , ” ẍicanoj . Yaj hex tiˈ hacaˈ hunu isn ̈ achˈen elkˈom ye heyu , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Hunun tzˈayic isbey Comam Jesús cuywal yul yatut Comam Dios . Yajaˈ ebnaj yahawil yeco yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yebpaxo ebnaj yahaw yeco yin ̈ con ̈ ob , caw issay ebnaj tzet chute yakˈni camo Comam .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Yajaˈ mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj tzet chu ispotxˈlax Comam , yuto caw ayco yanma sunil anma yaben tzet chal Comam .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Ay huneˈ tzˈayical tiˈ yet lan ̈ an iscuywa Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , yet chalni Comam cuybanile yet colbanile , yapni ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yebpaxo ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yeb ebnaj ichamta iswiˈehal yin ̈ con ̈ ob tuˈ .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Mac cachchejni hawatxˈen huntekˈan tiˈ ? yebpaxo ¿ mac akˈni hawip ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Istakˈwi Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Haquinpaxtuˈan , ay huneˈ inkˈambebalan chiwakˈan teyet . Pajtzewe wetan ,

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: ¿ mac chejniti naj Juan anican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma , Comam Dios mato haˈ anma ? ẍi Comam .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Yichico ebnaj iskˈamben tet hunun : ― ¿ Tzet xin chijute jalni tet naj tiˈ ? Ta chijalaˈ ta Comam Dios chejn ̈ eti naj Juan tuˈ , chalaˈ naj jet : “ ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin machi heyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet yal naj ? ” ẍim naj jet .

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Macato ta chijalaˈpaxo ta maẍtaj Comam Dios an ̈ eti naj , chitij ishowal anma jin ̈ , cat con ̈ iskˈojno camoj , yuto haˈ naj Juan tuˈ caw ischejab Comam Dios ye naj yul sat anma , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Yuxin yal ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mach johtajojan ̈ mac akˈni ismunil naj Juan tuˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yuxinto yal Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Hac intuˈan , mach chiwalpaxilojan teyet mac akˈn ̈ e huneˈ wiptiˈan inwatxˈenan huntekˈan tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yichico Comam Jesús yalni huneˈxa yechel tiˈ tet anma : ― Ay huneˈ naj winaj tzˈunni teˈ uva sat istxˈotxˈ . Lahwi tuˈ xin yanito naj istzˈunub comonal tet huntekˈan ebnaj munlawom . Isto naj niman tiempo bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ caw nahat .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax teˈ uva , ischejnito naj yahaw txˈotxˈ huneˈ ischejab ischabaˈ ismajul tet ebnaj munlawom tuˈ . Hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj , yoc ebnaj ismakˈno naj . Maẍticˈa xin tzet akˈlax tet naj , ischejlaxtopaxo naj .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , ischejnipaxto naj yahaw tuˈ huneˈxa ischejab . Hayet yapni naj , yoc ebnaj munlawom tuˈ iscajno naj , ismakˈnipaxo ebnaj naj . Maẍticˈa tzet akˈlaxpaxo tet naj , istzumbelaxto naj .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yanipaxto naj yahaw txˈotxˈ tuˈ huneˈxa ischejab yet yoxel . Hayet yapni naj tuˈ , yocpaxo ebnaj munlawom tuˈ ismakˈno taho naj , istzumbelaxpaxti naj .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Yuxinto yal naj yahaw txˈotxˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¿ Tzet wal wutenan tinan ̈ ? Wal xin chinchejtojan huneˈ incˈaholtiˈan caw ochebil wuhan , etzan ̈ em chixiw ebnaj tet naj , ” ẍi naj .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj cˈahole tuˈ , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : “ ¡ Ilwecˈanabtoj ! Lan ̈ an yul naj cˈahole lah . Haˈ tet naj chicancano istxˈotxˈ ismam tiˈ . Wal tinan ̈ xin comakˈaˈwe camo naj haxinwal jetxa chuboco huneˈ txˈotxˈ tiˈ , ” ẍi ebnaj munlawom tuˈ .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yilaxilto naj yintalto peyab tuˈ , haˈ bey tuˈ akˈlax camo naj , ẍi Comam . Iskˈamben Comam tet anma : ― ¿ Tzet xin chiutelax ebnaj munlawom yu naj yahaw tzˈunub tuˈ , heyalni ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Wal xin haˈ naj caw yahaw tuˈ , chitij cat istan ̈ tzencanilo naj ebnaj munlawom tuˈ , cat yanito naj istzˈunub comonal tet hunuxa majan ebnaj munlawom , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben anma huneˈ tuˈ yalni : ― Machojab bakˈinal chu hacaˈ chawal tiˈ , ẍi anma .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Yuxinto oc tˈan ̈ no Comam Jesús yin ̈ anma , yalni Comam : ― ¿ Yaj tzettaxca chalilo huneˈ tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios heyalni bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ ? : Haˈ huneˈ chˈen chˈen istirilo ebnaj watxˈem n ̈ a , haˈ chˈen caw ecˈbal cˈul yoc xeˈo n ̈ a , ẍicanoj .

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Yaj macn ̈ eticˈa chiˈaycˈay yiban ̈ huneˈ chˈen tuˈ chikˈahtoj , yaj ta haˈ chˈen chˈaycˈay yiban ̈ huneˈ mac tuˈ , chiquechmoto yalan ̈ chˈen , ẍi Comam .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Yuxin ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yet hunep tuˈ yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam Jesús , yuto nachalo yu ebnaj ta haˈ ebnaj chal huneˈ cuybanile yal Comam , yaj chixiw ebnaj istzabnayo Comam yu anma ayicto bey tuˈ .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Yuxin haˈ ebnaj yahaw yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés istohla ebnaj huntekˈan ebnaj to ilno ta chˈaycˈay Comam yin ̈ hunu lekˈtiˈal . Cˈul yub ebnaj cˈulchˈan istzotel ebnaj tet Comam yun ̈ e yaycˈay Comam yin ̈ hunu tzotiˈ , cat yanico ebnaj Comam yul iskˈab naj gobernador .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , caw johtajan ̈ ta tzet chawala yeb tzet chacuyu caw toholcanoj , yebpaxo lahan yelapno ye anma yul hasat . Chacuypaxo yin ̈ caw isyelal tzet chu cowatxˈen yin ̈ tzet choche Comam Dios .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Yuxin chicokˈambehan ̈ tawet : ¿ Cˈulmi jakˈni cotohlabal tet naj jahaw ay bey Roma , naj César , mato machoj ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Yajaˈ yohtaxa Comam ta txˈoj nabil yu ebnaj , yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: ― Yewe hunu chˈen melyu wilaˈan nan ̈ . ¿ Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin ̈ chˈen ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Yechel sat naj jahaw ay bey Roma yeb isbi naj ayco yin ̈ chˈen , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : ― Akˈwe tet naj César tuˈ baytet yet naj yehi , cat heyakˈni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi , ẍi Comam .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Yajaˈ maẍticˈa hunu tzotiˈ txˈoj ilchalo yin ̈ Comam yu ebnaj yin ̈ tzet yal Comam sata anma . Ton ̈ e cˈaycanocan ̈ iscˈul ebnaj yu ispaj istzotiˈ ebnaj yakˈ Comam . Yuxin matxa tzet yal ebnaj .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yapni huntekˈan ebnaj saduceo ilwal yin ̈ Comam Jesús . Ebnaj saduceo tuˈ , chal ebnaj tato matxa chiitzitzbi anma chicami . Iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: ― Mam cuywawom , tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu naj Moisés tato chicam yichamil hunu ix ix , mach xin yuninal naj yeb ix , yilal yikˈni ix yuẍta naj camna tuˈ , haxinwal ay yuninal naj yeb ix , cat yoc yuninalo naj camna tuˈ .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Yaj ay hunel ay hujwan ̈ ebnaj yuẍtan ̈ e isba . Naj babel mohyi naj yeb huneˈ ix , yaj cam naj , machi xin hunu yuninal naj yeb ix .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ naj iscab , mohyi naj yeb ix , iscampaxo naj , machipaxo yuninal naj yeb ix .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Ismohyipaxo naj yox yeb ix . Hac tuˈ xin yu ismohyilo ebnaj hujwan ̈ tuˈ yeb ix , yaj ton ̈ e la ‑ cam ebnaj sunil . Maẍticˈa xin hunu yuninal ebnaj yeb ix .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Islahobal xin , iscampaxo ix .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Yuxin hayet chiapni istzˈayical yet chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa , ¿ mac xin ebnaj hujwan ̈ tuˈ chˈoc yichamilo ix yuto mohyina ebnaj hujwan ̈ tuˈ yeb ix ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ Comam Jesús : ― Bey yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ebnaj winaj chiyikˈ ebnaj yixal , yeb ebix ix chikˈ ebix yichamil .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Yajaˈ anma yetticˈa satcan ̈ yehi , yet chiitzitzbocan ̈ xol camom , matxa yixal naj winaj , matxapaxo yichamil ix ix .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Matxa chicam anma tuˈ yuto lahanxa chˈelico yeb ebnaj yángel Comam Dios . Chiˈoc yuninalo Comam Dios bey satcan ̈ yet chiitzitzbican ̈ .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Naj Moisés , yakˈcano naj johtan ̈ eloj tato chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa , bay tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yin ̈ yet yilni naj yoc kˈaˈ yin ̈ hun hoban teˈ txˈix yet istzotelilti Comam Dios xol kˈa kˈaˈ tet naj . Yalni Comam : ― Haninan isDiosal icham Abraham , isDiosal naj Isaac yebpaxo isDiosal naj Jacob , ẍi Comam .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca camnaxa ebnaj , yaj itzitz ebnaj yul sat Comam Dios , yuto mach isDiosalo camom ye Comam . Yuxin yul sat Comam Dios sunil anma itzitz , ẍi Comam .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Yalni huntekˈan ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom caw cˈul maxawute hapajtzen huneˈ tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin matxa hunu ebnaj yakˈ iskˈambebal tet Comam .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet anma ayco iscˈatan ̈ tuˈ : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin chihallaxi tato yin ̈ naj David titna Comam Cristo ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Yajaˈ yalcano naj David yin ̈ Salmos hacaˈ tiˈ : Yal Comam Dios tet Wahawilan : “ Ayan ̈ tzˈon ̈ no yin ̈ inwatxˈkˈabtiˈan ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: masanto chiwacojan anma ayco ishowal tawin ̈ yalan ̈ hawoj , ” ẍi naj David .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin yal naj David Wahawan yin ̈ Comam Cristo , tato yin ̈ naj titna Comam ? ẍi Comam Jesús tet anma .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yet ayco anma yaben tzet chal Comam Jesús tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: ― Caw cheyil heba haxinwal mach chexcˈayto yu iscuybanil ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , yuto ton ̈ eticˈa choche ebnaj yecˈ hucxi yeb huntekˈan nime xilkˈape chaco yin ̈ . Chochepaxo ebnaj ta nanxa islow chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj yet chiecˈ ebnaj yulaj txon ̈ bal . Chisaypaxo ebnaj huntekˈan tzˈon ̈ obal caw ay yelapno yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel , yebpaxo yet chˈawtelax ebnaj waˈo yin ̈ kˈin ̈ .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Chelkˈanpaxilo ebnaj sunil tzet ay ebix hunix . Yun ̈ e yallax ebnaj cˈulal yuxin caw nime chute ebnaj yoj istxah . Yaj hanan chiwalan ta caw niman isyaˈtajil chul yiban ̈ ebnaj , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Yet hunel ayicto Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , yilni yanayto ebnaj kˈalom yofrenda yul caẍa bay chayto anma yofrenda .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Yilnipaxo Comam yanayto huneˈ ix hunix caw mebaˈ cabeb chˈen melyu .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , haˈ huneˈ ix hunix tiˈ , caw mebaˈ ix , yajaˈ caw ecˈbal mayakˈ ix sata sunil mac mayayto yofrenda tiˈ .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Yuto haˈ ebnaj tiˈ , iskˈal xan ̈ e chakˈ ebnaj tet Comam . Wal huneˈ ix tiˈ , caw mebaˈ ix , yajaˈ caw cˈuxan mayayto ix ismelyu chilokˈni tzet chiocnico yu , ẍi Comam .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Ay huntekˈan ebnaj cuywom tiˈ lan ̈ an yalni ta caw cˈulchˈan jilni yatut Comam Dios yu huntekˈan chˈen chˈen caw cˈulchˈan ayco yin ̈ , yebpaxo yu issabehal anma ayco yelawiloj . Yuxinto yal Comam Jesús :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: ― Sunil huntekˈan cheyil tiˈ , chul istiempohal bay chiuchcˈalaxayoj . Matxa huno chˈen chˈen latzˈbil tiˈ chican yiban ̈ yet chˈenal , ẍi Comam .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj iscuywom Comam : ― Mamin , ¿ bakˈin chu huneˈ chawal tiˈ ? ¿ Tzet chiyenilo yet chul huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Caw cheyil heba haxinwal machi mac chexakˈni subchahoj yuto caw ay mac chuli , cat yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hanintiˈan Cristo hinan , maˈayilo huneˈ istiempohal tiˈ , ” ẍi ebnaj . Yaj mach chexoc tzujno yinta tzet chal ebnaj tuˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Hayet cheyabeni ta ay howal , yebpaxo yet chˈah wejna anma howal yin ̈ ebnaj yahaw txˈotxˈ nime con ̈ ob , mach chexxiwcan ̈ yuto yilal yul huntekˈan tuˈ babel , yaj maẍto istan ̈ balo yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Chakˈle howal huneˈ txˈotxˈ nime con ̈ ob yeb hunxa txˈotxˈ nime con ̈ ob , yebpaxo huntekˈanxa con ̈ ob chakˈlecan ̈ howal yeb huntekˈanxa .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Chulpaxo nimeta chixcab , cat yul wahil , yebpaxo yabil caw how yulajla con ̈ ob yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Ay huntekˈan xiwbalcˈule yeb nimeta cˈaybalcˈule chu satcan ̈ , caw chixiw anma yilni .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Yajaˈ yet maẍto chul huntekˈan tuˈ , chextzablaxayoj , cat hetzumbelaxicˈoj . Chexilaxto yulajla iscapilla ebnaj Israel cat heyilwelaxi , cat heyalaxico preso , cat heyilaxto sata ebnaj rey yeb sata huntekˈanxa ebnaj yahawil , sunil huntekˈan isyaˈtajil tiˈ chechah yu ayexxaco yul inkˈaban .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu quinheyalnilojan tet ebnaj .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Yaj mach cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul yin ̈ tzet cheyal sata ebnaj yu hecolni heba yin ̈ tzet chal ebnaj .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Hanintiˈan chiwakˈan hehelanil hetzoteli , haxinwal haˈ ebnaj ayco ishowal teyin ̈ , mach chikˈoji ebnaj yin ̈ ispaj hetzotiˈ , yeb matxa tzet tzˈaj yalaˈ ebnaj .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Ayex chexalaxico yul iskˈab ebnaj yahaw yu hemam , hemiˈ , yu heyuẍtaj , yu heyicˈal yebpaxo yu heyamigo . Ayex chexakˈlax camoj .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Sunil anma chˈoc ishowal teyin ̈ yuto ayco heyanma win ̈ an .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Wal xin mach chexxiwi yuto Comam Dios chexcolni . Machi hunu xil hewiˈ chicˈaytoj .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Tohol cheyute heba haxinwal chexcolchahi .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Hayet hoyanxaco ebnaj soldado yin ̈ la Jerusalén tiˈ , cheyohtan ̈ eweloj ta toxa chiuchcˈalaxayoj .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Haˈ mac ay yul sunil ismajul Judea tiˈ tojab yebaˈ isba iswiˈla witz . Haxa mac ay yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén tiˈ , elojabcan ̈ . Yebpaxo haˈ mac ayto xol ismunil , matxaojab chimeltzo yul con ̈ ob tiˈ .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Yuto hayet huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , chul isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ anma ay yul huneˈ con ̈ ob tiˈ , haˈ ton ispaj sunil istxˈojal tzet xaˈiswatxˈe , cat yijnicano isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Yaj cˈanchˈan ebix ix ayxa tzet ye yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , yeb ebix chito txutxwi yunin yin ̈ . Yuto chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban ̈ anma tiˈ , cat yul isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ huneˈ txˈotxˈ con ̈ ob tiˈ .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Caw txˈiˈal anma chicam xol howal , cat yilaxto anma yulajla nan con ̈ obal , cat yoccano con ̈ ob Jerusalén yalan ̈ yoj anma mach Israeloj masanto chˈapni istzˈayical bay halbil yu Comam Dios .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Ay huntekˈan yechel chisyecan ̈ isba yin ̈ tzˈayic yeb yin ̈ ixahaw , yeb yin ̈ txˈumel . Wal anma ay sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chisomchaocan ̈ iscˈul yu xiwquilal yaben ishuccha haˈ mar yet chismakˈnican ̈ isba haˈ , yuto caw ayxa ismay chute haˈ .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Chipaxilo yip anma yu xiwquilal yu isnani tzet chu yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Yebpaxo sunil tzet caw ay yip satcan ̈ chitzicobtan ̈ elaxi .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Chilahwi tuˈ xin , cat yilni anma wayilojan xol moyan Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . Chinhulan yeb sunil iskˈakˈal wipan .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an istzabnico yuni huntekˈan chiwaltiˈan , cheyaweco yip heyanma , cat hetˈan ̈ xiwecan ̈ satcan ̈ yuto toxa chexcolchahi , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Yanipaxico Comam hunxa yechel tiˈ : ― Chisje hetxumnilo yin ̈ teˈ higuera yeb hunuxa teˈ comon kˈeptaj .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Hayet cheyilni yelilo xaj teˈ , chinachalo heyu ta toxa chˈoc n ̈ ab .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ , yet chiyuni huntekˈan tiˈ cheyohtan ̈ eweloj tato toxa chˈoc Comam Dios Yahawiloj .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , chul huntekˈan chiwaltiˈan yet maẍto chilahwilo iscam huntekˈan anma Israel tiˈ .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Haˈ satcan ̈ yeb txˈo txˈotxˈ tiˈ chitan ̈ iloj , yaj wal Intzotiˈan xin mach chˈecˈto yet yijni isba tzet chala .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Caw nann ̈ e heyu , machojab cheyakˈ cawxolo henabal yu pekˈal , yu ucˈu teˈ , yeb yin ̈ tzettaj ye tuˈ bay cheyaco heyanma yul yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , haxinwal yet chul huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ , mach tona nahul ayex .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Yuto hacaˈ hunu latzˈab , hac tuˈ chu yul huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ yiban ̈ anma ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Yuxin caw majwan ̈ wej , txahlan ̈ we yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , haxinwal chu hecolni heba yalan ̈ huntekˈan tzet chihul tuˈ , haxinwal mach chexxiw yet chexoc lin ̈ no insatajan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Yet tzˈayical chicuywa Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , haxa yet akˈbalil xin , chibey Comam bey huneˈ won ̈ an Olivo isbi .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Wal xin , hunun sacˈayal yapni anma yul yatut Comam Dios yaben tzet chal Comam .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Yet lan ̈ anxa yayilo kˈin ̈ Pascua , yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan ̈ al chialaxicoj .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Yoc ebnaj yahawil sacerdote yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés issayaˈ yin ̈ tzet chu ispotxˈni ebnaj Comam Jesús ; yaj yin ̈ ewantajil , yuto chixiw ebnaj tet anma .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Yayto naj matzwalil yul yanma naj Judas , chihallaxpaxo Iscariote , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom Comam .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Yuxin , to naj iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios , yu istzotel yin ̈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Caw tzalacan ̈ ebnaj yaben huneˈ tuˈ , yuxinto yalte ebnaj melyu tet naj Judas .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu iswatxˈencanayo ebnaj istzotiˈ ; yuxinto oc naj Judas issayaˈ tzet chu yanico naj Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj yin ̈ ewantajil .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Hayet yayilo istzˈayical bay chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan ̈ al chialaxicoj , yeb yet chipotxˈlax noˈ meˈ xahanbalil yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua ,

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: yalni Comam Jesús tet naj Pedro yeb naj Juan : ― Asiwe hewatxˈeˈ tzet chicolo yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Baytuˈwal chawoche chon ̈ tohan ̈ cowatxˈeˈan ̈ hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : ― Hayet chexapno bey yul con ̈ ob tuˈ , cheyilaˈ huneˈ naj ikˈbil huneˈ tzˈajab haˈ yu . Chexocowe tzujno yinta naj masanto yul n ̈ a bay chiocto naj ,

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: cat heyalno tet naj yahaw n ̈ a tuˈ : “ Haˈ yaˈ cuywawom macon ̈ chejnitijan ̈ , ẍi yaˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : ‘ ¿ Baytuˈwal ay huneˈ cuarto bay chinwaˈojan yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua yeb ebnaj incuywoman ? ’ ” ẍi yaˈ , quexchi .

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Haˈ naj chiyeno huneˈ niman cuarto yin ̈ iscab piso cˈulxa yehi . Haˈ bey tuˈ xin chewatxˈeˈ tzet chicolo , ẍi Comam .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu isto ebnaj . Yilcha yu ebnaj hacaˈticˈa yu yalni Comam . Yoc ebnaj iswatxˈeno tzet chilolax yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Hayet yapni yorahil , yoc Comam yeb ebnaj ischejab sat meẍa .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Hayeltaxam chiwochehan chiwecˈtzehan huneˈ wah yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua tiˈ yeb hex yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chincaman .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Chiwalan teyet , matxa chiwecˈtzehan huneˈ kˈin ̈ tiˈ masanto chij isba tzet yelapno ye huneˈ tiˈ yet chˈoc sunil yalan ̈ yip Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yinican ̈ Comam chˈen copa , bay ayayto yal teˈ uva , yakˈni yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios , yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Chahwej lah , ucˈwej , awecˈo teyin ̈ hununex .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Caw chiwalcanojan teyet , matxa chiwucˈan yal sat teˈ uva masanto yet chˈoc sunil yalan ̈ yip Comam Dios .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yinican ̈ Comam ixim pan , yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios , iskˈaxpon Comam ixim , yakˈni Comam ixim tet ebnaj , yalni Comam : ― Haˈ huneˈ tiˈ yechel innimanilan chiwakˈan yin ̈ camical yu hecolchahi . Wawej , yu quinhenanitijan , ẍi Comam .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Lahwi iswaˈilo Comam yeb ebnaj yinipaxocan ̈ Comam chˈen copa , yalni Comam : ― Haˈ huneˈ ayayto yul copa tiˈ haˈ chakˈni henab yin ̈ huneˈ acˈ trato akˈbil yu Comam Dios , chij isba yet chimalto inchiqˈuilan yu hecolchahi , ẍi Comam .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Yajaˈ naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab ebnaj chichiwa iscˈul win ̈ an , ayco naj sat meẍa coxol tiˈ .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , yilal wecˈan yin ̈ camical hacaˈ halbil yu Comam Dios , yajaˈ cˈanchˈan naj chinanicojan yul iskˈab camical , ẍi Comam .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj huneˈ tuˈ , yichico ebnaj iskˈamben tet hunun yin ̈ mac chˈanico Comam yul iskˈab camical .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yichico ebnaj iscuywom iscajlen isba yin ̈ mac ecˈbal yelapno ye xol ebnaj .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Haˈ ebnaj ayco yahawo txˈotxˈ nime con ̈ ob ay yip ebnaj yiban ̈ anma . Ebnaj ayco yahawilal tuˈ xin chihallax cˈulal yin ̈ ebnaj yu anma .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Wal xin mach haco tuˈ cheyute heba . Ta ay hunujex caw ay heyelapno cheyabe , iweyo heba hacaˈ huno mac mach yelapno yehi . Yebpaxo haˈ mac caw iswiˈehal yeco texol chabe yakˈabico isba hacaˈ hunu chejab .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay huneˈ niman wah chioqui , ¿ mactaxca caw niman yelapno ye heyalni ? ¿ Tom haˈ naj ayco sat meẍa , mato haˈ naj chibatxnicˈo itah ? Wal xin , haˈ ton naj ayco sat meẍa caw niman yelapnoj . Yajaˈ walinan , ayinicojan texol hacaˈ naj chibatxnicˈo itah .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Hex tiˈ , caw ayexn ̈ eticˈaco yet yul isyaˈtajil wiban ̈ an .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Chexwacojan yahawiloj , hacaˈ wocan yahawilo yu Inmaman .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Hex tiˈ , chexwaˈ sat inmeẍahan bay chinocan Yahawiloj , cat heyay tzˈon ̈ no yul hecapil hununex , cat heyoc yahawil yiban ̈ cablahon ̈ eb majan ebnaj Israel , ẍi Comam .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj Pedro : ― Simón , Simón xaiskˈan naj matzwalil tet Comam Dios ta chexyilwe naj hacaˈ chu istxayelax ixim trigo .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Yaj xaˈinkˈanan tet Comam Dios haxinwal mach chabej iscawxi hawanma yin ̈ Comam . Yajaˈ yet chawanico hawanma win ̈ an hunelxa , chawiptze sunil ebnaj hawuẍta xayaco yanma win ̈ an , ẍi Comam .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Yalni naj Pedro tuˈ tet Comam : ― Mamin , caw hinaninan intohan tawintaj , waxan ̈ ca yul preso maca yin ̈ camical , ẍi naj .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj xin : ― Pedro , chiwalan tawet , yalan ̈ to maẍto chiˈokˈ noˈ icham chiyo , oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Iskˈamben Comam Jesús tet ebnaj iscuywom : ― Yet quexinchejnitojan yet walnihan teyet ta mach cheyito hetzˈispa yeb hemelyu , yeb hexan ̈ ab , ¿ aymi tzet mach yabe yul hekˈab ? ẍi Comam . Istakˈwi ebnaj : ― Matzet , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : ― Wal tinan ̈ xin , maquex ay hetzˈispa yeb hemelyu , iwetoj . Haˈ mac mach yespada , istxon ̈ abto ischumpa cat islokˈni yet .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Yuxinto chiwalan teyet , yilal yijnicano isba sunil tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano win ̈ an yu ebnaj ischejab Comam bay chala : “ Hacaˈ chˈutelax ebnaj caw xiwquilta ismul , hac tuˈ chˈutelaxo naj , ” ẍiayoj . Yuxinto yilal yijni isba sunil , ẍi Comam .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mamin , ay cabeb chˈen espada ikˈbil juan ̈ lah , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam : ― Cˈuxanxa xin , ẍi Comam .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , yelti Comam Jesús yul n ̈ a , isto bey huneˈ won ̈ an Olivo isbi , bayticˈa chibeycˈo Comam . Istopaxo ebnaj iscuywom Comam yintaj .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Hayet yapni Comam bey tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Txahlan ̈ wej , haxinwal mach chexaycˈay yul iskˈab istxˈojal , ẍi Comam .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yel Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj hacaˈmi xol bay chˈapni hunu chˈen chˈen chikˈojlaxtoj . Haˈ tuˈ xin , ay jahno Comam txahloj .

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Yalni Comam yin ̈ istxah : Mamin , ta choche hacˈul , colinnilojan yin ̈ huneˈ isyaˈtajil chul wiban ̈ tiˈan , yaj machojab hacaˈ chiwochehan , to hacaˈojab tzet chal hacˈul , ẍi Comam .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yayilo huneˈ naj yángel Comam Dios yul satcan ̈ , yakˈno yip yanma Comam .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Caw occano niman isyaˈil yin ̈ yanma Comam , yuxin caw islahico Comam istxahli yin ̈ sunil yanma . Caw xin chˈel haˈ yin ̈ Comam hacaˈ nimeta tuˈan chicˈ yaycˈay sat txˈotxˈ .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Yet islahwi istxahli Comam , isto bay cancano ebnaj iscuywom . Hayet yapni Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj , caw wayan ̈ chu ebnaj yu biscˈulal .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin chexwayi ? Ahan ̈ wewanoj , txahlan ̈ wej haxinwal mach chexaycˈay yul iskˈab istxˈojal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Lan ̈ anto yalni Comam Jesús huneˈ tuˈ yapni hun bulan ebnaj ; babelico naj Judas sata ebnaj , naj ayco istzˈajo ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ ischejab Comam . Ishitzico naj Judas tuˈ iscˈatan ̈ Comam yun ̈ e istzˈohni naj iskˈotx Comam .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Judas , yet chatzˈohnilo inkˈotxtiˈan , ¿ tom hac tuˈ chu quinhawanicojan yul iskˈab camical ? Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús tzet lan ̈ an yul yiban ̈ Comam , iskˈamben ebnaj : ― Mamin , ¿ chimisje jakˈnihan ̈ chˈen espada yin ̈ ebnaj tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj xol ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ , pitnilto istxiquin huneˈ naj ischejab naj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , huneˈ istxiquin naj yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús : ― ¡ Bejwej ! Mach cheyute hacaˈ tuˈ . Istzabnico Comam istxiquin naj , iswatxˈiloj .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Haˈ ebnaj beycˈo tzabnoti Comam , haˈ ton ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj yahawil yilomal yatut Comam Dios , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob ; yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom elkˈominan teyet yuxin ikˈbil heyespada yeb heteˈ , cat heyul quinhetzabnotojan ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Hunun tzˈayic ayinicˈtojan yul yatut Comam Dios , yajaˈ mach quinhetzabayojan . Yaj wal tinan ̈ maˈapni yorahil quinisbejtzonicojan Comam Dios yul hekˈab yeb tet naj yahawil kˈejholo , ẍi Comam .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , istzabnayo ebnaj Comam , yilaxto Comam bey yatut naj yahaw yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote . Wal naj Pedro xin , nahat tzujan naj yinta Comam .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Yanico xin ebnaj tuˈ iskˈaˈ yictabal yamakˈil teˈ n ̈ a , yoc tzˈon ̈ no ebnaj kˈaẍnoj . Ocpaxo tzˈon ̈ no naj Pedro kˈaẍno xol ebnaj .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Ay xin huneˈ ix munlawom bey tuˈ , ilni naj Pedro yet tzˈon ̈ anico naj yin ̈ kˈaˈ . Yoc tˈan ̈ no ix yin ̈ naj , yalni ix : ― Huneˈ naj tiˈ , yetbi isba naj yeb naj Jesús , ẍi ix .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Hayet yaben naj Pedro huneˈ tuˈ , yalni naj : ― Mach wohtajojan naj chawal tuˈ , ẍi naj tet ix .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Hunepixto xin , yillax naj Pedro yu huneˈ naj , yalni naj tet naj : ― Hach tiˈ hawetbi haba yeb ebnaj tuˈ , ẍi naj . Istakˈwi naj Pedro : ― Machoj , mach wetbiho inbahan yeb ebnaj , ẍi naj .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Ayxam hunu orahil xin , ischilban yalni huneˈxa naj yin ̈ naj Pedro tuˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , haˈ naj tiˈ yetbi isba naj yeb naj Jesús tiˈ , yebpaxo ah Galilea naj , ẍi naj .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Yalni naj Pedro : ― Mach wohtajan huneˈ tzet chawal tiˈ , ẍi naj . Yet lan ̈ an yalni naj Pedro huneˈ tuˈ xin , yokˈcan ̈ huneˈ noˈ icham chiyo .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Istˈan ̈ xito Comam yin ̈ naj Pedro tuˈ . Hac tuˈ xin yu isnaniti naj Pedro tzet yal Comam tet naj : “ Oxelxa chawala ta mach quinhawohtajojan yet chiˈokˈcan ̈ noˈ icham chiyo , ” ẍi Comam Jesús tet naj .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu yelto naj , yoc naj okˈoj .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Wal ebnaj ayco tan ̈ eno Comam Jesús tuˈ , oc ebnaj tzebo yin ̈ Comam , ismakˈnipaxo ebnaj Comam .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Yoc ebnaj ismajcheno sat Comam , chi ‑ la ‑ iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― Halilo mac macachmakˈni , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Hantato buchwal tzotiˈ yal ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Hayet issajbilo xin , iscutxbanico isba ebnaj ichamta winaj yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel , yeb ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj chicuywa yin ̈ isley naj Moisés ; ischejni ebnaj ilaxoti Comam Jesús sataj . Iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam :

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: ― Hal jetan ̈ , ¿ tom yeli hach tiˈ Cristo hach ? ẍi ebnaj . Istakˈwican ̈ Comam : ― Ta chiwalan teyet ta Haninan Cristo hinan , mach cheyakˈayto yul heyanma .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Taca ay tzet chinkˈambepaxojan teyet , mach chepajtzepaxo wetan .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Yaj wal tinan ̈ Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinoctzˈon ̈ nojan yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam Dios ; Comam caw aycano yip , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Yuxinto sunil ebnaj oc kˈambeno tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom Iscˈahol Comam Dios hawe chal tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj . Istakˈwi Comam Jesús : ― Hoˈ , Iscˈahol Comam Dios wehan hacaˈ cheyute heyalni tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Yalni ebnaj : ― Tinan ̈ matxa yilalo chicokˈan anma chihalni ismul naj tiˈ , to han ̈ ‑ caw ‑ on ̈ majabe tzet chal naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Sunil ebnaj ah wejnahi , yinito ebnaj Comam Jesús sata naj Pilato .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Yoc ebnaj akˈocˈule yin ̈ Comam tet naj Pilato hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Machalo huneˈ naj tiˈ juan ̈ , sunil anma chisomchato isnabal yu naj , cat iscachni naj anma ta mach chakˈ istohlabal tet naj César , naj jahaw ay bey Roma , cat yalnipaxo isba naj Cristohal , haˈ chalilo jahawil , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Iskˈamben naj Pilato tet Comam : ― ¿ Tom yahawil anma Israel hawehi ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Hoˈ , yeli hacaˈ hawalni tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Yuxinto yal naj Pilato tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb tet sunil anma cutxanico tuˈ : ― Haˈ huneˈ winaj tiˈ , machi hunu mule chiˈilchalo yin ̈ wuhan , ẍi naj .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Ischilban ebnaj , yalni yin ̈ caw ip : ― Lan ̈ an issomchato isnabal sunil anma yu cuybanile chakˈ naj . Ichiti naj iscuyni anma bey Galilea , tinan ̈ xin hac tuˈ chutepaxo naj bey Judea tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Hayet yaben naj Pilato huneˈ tuˈ , iskˈamben naj ta ah Galilea Comam .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Hayet yaben naj ta ah Galilea Comam , yanito naj Comam yul iskˈab naj Herodes , yuto naj Herodes tuˈ ayco yahawilo bey Galilea . Cˈuxan xin aycˈo naj Herodes bey Jerusalén yet yuni huneˈ tuˈ .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Hayet yilni naj Herodes Comam , caw tzalacan ̈ naj yuto payxa ichi yochen naj yilaˈ Comam . Caw xin txˈiˈalxa bay chabe naj yin ̈ Comam . Caw xin choche naj yilaˈ iswatxˈen Comam hunu cˈaybalcˈule .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Caw txˈiˈal tzet iskˈambe naj tet Comam , yajaˈ maẍticˈa takˈwi Comam tet naj .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Wal ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , caw ischilba ebnaj yoc akˈocˈule yin ̈ Comam .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Naj Herodes yeb ebnaj issoldado tuˈ oc ebnaj isbuchuˈ Comam . Yanico ebnaj huneˈ xilkˈape yin ̈ Comam hacaˈ chaco ebnaj rey yun ̈ e yoc ebnaj tzebo yin ̈ Comam . Lahwi tuˈ xin , yanipaxto naj Herodes tuˈ Comam yul iskˈab naj Pilato hunelxa .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Yin ̈ ticˈa huneˈ tzˈayical tuˈ , naj Pilato yeb naj Herodes oc ebnaj amigohal , yaj wal yet yalan ̈ to caw ayleco ishowal ebnaj yin ̈ hunun .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Iscutxbanico naj Pilato ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob , yebpaxo sunil anma yul con ̈ ob tuˈ .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Yalni naj tet ebnaj : ― Haˈ huneˈ naj maxeyiti wettiˈan cheyala ta lan ̈ an issomchancan ̈ naj isnabal sunil anma . Wal xin tesata mankˈambehan tet naj , yajaˈ caw machi hunu ismul naj chiˈilchalo wuhan hacaˈ cheyute heyalni tiˈ .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Mawatojan naj yul iskˈab naj Herodes , yajaˈ mach ismul naj mailcha yu naj , yuxin mayapaxti naj Herodes tuˈ naj hunelxa wetan . Wal xin , mach ismul naj chˈakˈni camoj .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Ton ̈ e xin chiwakˈ hatelaxojan naj , cat inbejtzonan naj , ẍi naj Pilato tuˈ ,

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: yuto yin ̈ hunun kˈin ̈ Pascua chibejtzolax hunun ebnaj presowom .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Yaj sunil anma cutxanico bey tuˈ , ah yaw yin ̈ caw ip : ― ¡ Ilo huneˈ naj tiˈ yin ̈ cosatan ̈ , cat hebejtzon naj Barrabás ! ẍixan ̈ e anma .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Yaj naj Barrabás tuˈ , ayco naj preso yu huneˈ howal yicheco naj yul con ̈ ob tuˈ , yebpaxo potxˈom anma naj .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Wal naj Pilato , caw yoche naj isbejtzoˈ Comam Jesús , yuxinto tzotelilti naj xol anma hunelxa .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Yajaˈ anma tuˈ , caw ecˈbalto ah yaw , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¡ Camojab naj yin ̈ culus ! ¡ Camojab naj yin ̈ culus ! ẍixan ̈ e anma tuˈ .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Yalni naj Pilato yin ̈ yoxel tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yu ? ¿ Tzet istxˈojal iswatxˈe naj heyalni ? Mach hunu ismul naj chiˈilchalo yin ̈ wuhan chˈakˈni camoj . Wal xin ton ̈ e chinchejan hatelaxo naj , cat inbejtzonan naj , ẍi naj .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Ischilban ebnaj yel yaw yin ̈ caw ip , iskˈanni camo ebnaj Comam yin ̈ teˈ culus . Yu caw chˈel yaw ebnaj yuxinto akˈlax tzet choche ebnaj .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Yuxinto isyije naj Pilato tzet iskˈan ebnaj .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Wal xin , haˈ naj ayco preso yu howal yeb yu potxˈwal , haˈ naj isbejtzoto naj Pilato hacaˈ yu iskˈanni ebnaj . Yanico naj Pilato Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an yilaxto Comam Jesús bay chˈalaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus , istzabnayo ebnaj huneˈ naj , Simón isbi . Lan ̈ an yocto naj yul con ̈ ob tuˈ , haˈ bey txˈotxˈ Cirene ay naj . Yalaxico isculus Comam yiban ̈ naj , yoc tzujno naj yinta Comam .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Caw hantan ̈ e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam ; xol anma tuˈ ay huntekˈan ebix caw chˈokˈ yu biscˈulal yin ̈ Comam .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Istˈan ̈ xiti Comam yin ̈ ebix , yalni Comam tet ebix : ― Hex ix ah Jerusalén tiˈ , mach chexokˈ win ̈ an . Okˈan ̈ we teyin ̈ yeb yin ̈ niẍtej heyunin .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Yuto chihul istzˈayical bay chihallax hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Sakˈal yet ebix ix maẍticˈa yunin , yeb ebix maẍticˈa unin chitxutxwi yin ̈ , ” ẍi anma tuˈ .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Yet huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ , chal anma hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Majaltam chititcˈay witz tiˈ jiban ̈ , cat comujicano yalan ̈ , ” ẍi anma tuˈ .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Ta hanintiˈan , lahaninan hacaˈ hunu teˈ kˈepta caw yax , yaj chˈecˈyaˈ wanmahan yu anma , hajxamex hex tiˈ , lahanex yeb teˈ tajin teˈ caw niman isyaˈtajil cheyila , ẍi Comam .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Aypaxo cawan ̈ xa ebnaj caw xiwquilta ismul , ilaxto camo yin ̈ culus yinta Comam .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Hayet yapni ebnaj bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ chij Calavera , chalilo Isbajil Wiˈe , yalaxcan ̈ Comam yin ̈ culus . Hac tuˈ utelax cawan ̈ ebnaj xiwquilta ismul tuˈ , huneˈ naj ah yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam , hunxa naj yin ̈ ismeckˈab Comam .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Hayet aycan ̈ Comam yin ̈ culus tuˈ , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , akˈ nimancˈulal yin ̈ anma tiˈ , yuto mach chinachalo yu ta txˈoj tzet chiswatxˈe , ẍi Comam . Yoc ebnaj soldado yilweno isba yin ̈ mac chiinito xil iskˈap Comam .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Sunil anma tuˈ tˈan ̈ anico yilni tzet chuhi ; yoc ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob buchwal yin ̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj : ― Ta haˈ naj tiˈ Cristo sicˈbililo yu Comam Dios , iscolabayti isba naj , hacaˈ yu iscolwa naj yin ̈ anma , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Hacpax tuˈ ebnaj soldado , oc ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ Comam , yakˈni ebnaj pahla vinagre yucˈuˈ Comam .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Yalni ebnaj : ― Ta yeli yahaw anma Israel hawehi , colayti haba , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Yin ̈ iswiˈ isculus Comam tzˈibn ̈ ebilico hayeb tzˈib , chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ naj tiˈ , yahawil anma Israel , ” ẍicoj .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Xol ebnaj cawan ̈ alaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus yinta Comam , ay huneˈ naj txˈoj istzotel tet Comam , yalni naj tet Comam : ― Ta hach tiˈ Cristo hach , colayto haba , cat con ̈ hacolnipaxaytojan ̈ , ẍi naj .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Haxa huneˈxa yetbi naj cachwa yin ̈ hacaˈ tiˈ : ¿ Tom mach chaxiw tet Comam Dios ? ¿ Tom mach chawila tato lahan jeco yin ̈ isyaˈtajil yeb yaˈ ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ , lan ̈ an yecˈyaˈ janma yu cotohlan istxˈojal cowatxˈe , wal yaˈ tiˈ , machi nino istxˈojal iswatxˈe yaˈ , ẍi naj tet yetbi tuˈ .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Yalni naj tet Comam : ― Mam Jesús , chinhanabaˈtijan yet chaẍhul cat hawoc yahawil , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan tawet , haˈticˈa tinan ̈ chaẍapno incˈatan ̈ an bey huneˈ ehobal chij Paraíso , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Yet chuman xin iskˈejholilo yul yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ masanto yin ̈ chˈen oxeb yin ̈ kˈejbiyal issajbipaxiloj .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Istzilmopaxayo huneˈ kˈap kˈap aycan ̈ yul yatut Comam Dios , cab ayico kˈap .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Yah yaw Comam yin ̈ caw ip , yalni : ― Mam , yul hakˈab chiwacanicojan wanmatiˈan , ẍi Comam .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Hayet yilni naj yahawil ebnaj soldado ah Roma huneˈ tuˈ , yoc naj yalno cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios , yalni naj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , huneˈ winaj tiˈ mach ismul , ẍi naj .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Sunil anma cutxanico bey tuˈ , hayet yilni tzet yuhi , cawtoxan ̈ e chistin ̈ anma istxam iscˈul yu biscˈulal yet ispaxto yatut .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Wal sunil anma yohta isba yeb Comam Jesús , yeb huntekˈan ebix tit yinta Comam bey Galilea , nahat lin ̈ anti yilni tzet chuhi .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Ay huneˈ naj José isbi , ay bey con ̈ ob Arimatea , yul ismajul Judea ; naj tuˈ , caw cˈul iscˈul naj , caw cˈulpaxo isbeybal naj . Ayco naj xol ebnaj iswiˈehal yin ̈ lahtiˈ yul con ̈ ob Israel .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Yajaˈ mach yaco isba naj yin ̈ istxˈojal iswatxˈe ebnaj yetbi tuˈ yin ̈ Comam Jesús , yuto chechma naj yoc Comam Dios Yahawiloj .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Isto naj José tuˈ iskˈanno isnimanil Comam tet naj Pilato .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto naj yinoyti isnimanil Comam yin ̈ teˈ culus , ispichnico naj huneˈ sábana caw cˈul yin ̈ . Isto naj yanocto isnimanil Comam yul huneˈ chˈen chˈen holbil yul , caw xin maẍto hunu camom chiˈalaxicto yul chˈen .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayical tuˈ chiskˈuy isba anma Israel yin ̈ tzet chislo yin ̈ tzˈayic xewilal . Lan ̈ anxa xin isto tzˈayic cat yichico tzˈayic xewilal .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Haˈ ebix ix tit yinta Comam bey Galilea , topaxo ebix mujwal yin ̈ Comam , yilni ebix chˈen chˈen bay alaxicto Comam , yilnipaxo ebix tzet yucanicto isnimanil Comam .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Lahwi ispaxto ebix , iswatxˈen ebix cab majan an ̈ caw xukˈ sam chˈoc yin ̈ isnimanil Comam . Lahwi tuˈ xin yichico tzˈayic xewilal , yuxin xew ebix hacaˈticˈa yalni isley naj Moisés .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Yet babel tzˈayic yin ̈ semana caw sahab to ebix bay alaxicto isnimanil Comam , ikˈbil huntekˈan an ̈ caw xukˈ sam watxˈebil yu ebix .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Hayet yapni ebix bey tuˈ , yilni ebix ta elnaxa chˈen chˈen ayco ismajilo bay alaxicto isnimanil Comam .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Yocto ebix yul chˈen , yilni ebix ta matxa isnimanil Comam ayictoj .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Caw cˈayilo iscˈul ebix yu huneˈ tuˈ . Haxa yet yilniti ebix xin lin ̈ anxacan ̈ cawan ̈ ebnaj yángel Comam Dios , toxan ̈ e chitzejtzon xil iskˈap ebnaj ayco yin ̈ .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Caw xiwcan ̈ ebix , yay xulno ebix sat txˈotxˈ , yalni ebnaj tet ebix : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin haˈ bay chimujlax camom chesayicˈo huneˈ mac itzitzxa ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Matxa Comam ayicti bey tiˈ , to xaitzitzbican ̈ . Naweti tzet yal teyet yet aycˈo bey Galilea ,

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: yet yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , caw yilal walaxicojan yul iskˈab ebnaj txˈoj , cat walaxcan ̈ an yin ̈ culus , yajaˈ yin ̈ yox tzˈayic cat witzitzbican ̈ an , ” ẍi Comam , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu isnaniti ebix tzet yal Comam .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Isto ebix yalno tzet yabe tuˈ tet ebnaj hunlahon ̈ wan ̈ ischejab Comam , yeb tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Haˈ huntekˈan ebix bey halno tuˈ , haˈ ton ix María ah Magdala , ix Juana , yeb ix María , ismiˈ naj Jacobo , yeb huntekˈanxa ebix .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Wal ebnaj ischejab Comam tuˈ , ton ̈ em chal ebix , yalni ebnaj ; yuxin maẍticˈa yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ tzet chal ebix .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Wal naj Pedro xin , to naj yin ̈ an ̈ e yilaˈ bay alaxicto isnimanil Comam tuˈ . Hayet yaycˈon ̈ no naj yilnicto naj , haˈxan ̈ e kˈap sábana aycanayoj . Caw cˈaycan ̈ iscˈul naj , ispaxto naj bay aya .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Haˈticˈa yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayical tuˈ , ay cawan ̈ ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús , to bey huneˈ aldea Emaús . Aymi oxebo legua yelo yin ̈ con ̈ ob Jerusalén .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Yet ayco ebnaj yin ̈ isbel tuˈ , chitzotel ebnaj yin ̈ tzet yakˈle Comam Jesús .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an istzotel ebnaj yin ̈ huneˈ tuˈ , yapni Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj , hunxa xin yu isto Comam yeb ebnaj .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca yil ebnaj yin ̈ Comam , yaj ay huneˈ tzet machi chahni yohtan ̈ elo ebnaj Comam .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet tzotiˈal ayco heyu yul beh tiˈ ? ẍi Comam . Caw xin biscˈulal jilni sat ebnaj ,

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: istakˈwi huneˈ naj chiyij Cleofas : ― Sunil anma ohtan ̈ e tzet yu yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén yin ̈ huntekˈan tzˈayic tiˈ . ¿ Tom hach xan ̈ e yul con ̈ ob tiˈ mach hawohtajoj ? ẍi naj .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet huneˈ yu tuˈ ? ẍi Comam . Yalni ebnaj : ― Ay huneˈ yaˈ Jesús , ah Nazaret , ischejab Comam Dios , haˈ tzet iswatxˈe yeb tzet yala caw niman yelapno yul sat Comam Dios yeb yul sat anma .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Yaj haˈ ebnaj yahaw yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj iswiˈehal con ̈ ob , haˈ ebnaj anico yaˈ yul iskˈab camical , yalaxcan ̈ yin ̈ culus .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Haˈ yaˈ ayco yipo janmahan ̈ yoc colnolo con ̈ ob Israel tiˈ yul iskˈab ebnaj romano . Yaj tinan ̈ oxebxa tzˈayic yuni huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebix jetbi cobahan ̈ yebi caw sahab mabeycˈo bay alaxicto isnimanil yaˈ . Caw macˈayilo cocˈulan ̈ yu tzet mayal ebix .

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Yuto hayet maapni ebix , matxa isnimanil yaˈ ayictoj . Yuxin hayet mameltzo ebix , mayalni ebix jetan ̈ ta mayil ebix huntekˈan ebnaj ángel , mayalni ebnaj ta itzitz yaˈ .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj jetbihan ̈ mabey ilno bay alaxicto isnimanil yaˈ . Caw xin matxa isnimanil yaˈ ayicto hacaˈticˈa mayu yalni ebix jetan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Caw yaˈta istxumchalo heyu yeb caw lan ̈ o cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet halbilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: ¿ Tom mach heyohtajo ta naj Cristo yilal yecˈyaˈ yanma hacaˈ mayu tuˈ , lahwi tuˈ cat yoc naj Yahawil ? ẍi Comam .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Yoc Comam yalno yin ̈ caw haban yin ̈ sunil tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yin ̈ Comam Cristo yul Yum Comam Dios . Ichico bay tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu naj Moisés , masanta apni yin ̈ sunil tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an yapni ebnaj yul aldea tuˈ , isyenilo Comam ta palan ̈ istohi .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Yajaˈ mach ischato ebnaj Comam . Yalni ebnaj : ― Canan ̈ cano cocˈatan ̈ an ̈ , yuto caw kˈejbixa lah , ẍi ebnaj . Hac tuˈ xin yu iscan Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Hayet ayxaco Comam sat meẍa yeb ebnaj , yinican ̈ Comam ixim pan . Lahwi yakˈni Comam yuchˈandios tet Comam Dios , iskˈaxponayo ixim , yakˈni Comam ixim tet ebnaj .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Yin ̈ haˈmataj tuˈ xin , hacaˈtan ̈ e hajcha sat ebnaj , isnachalo Comam Jesús yu ebnaj . Wal Comam xin , cˈaycan ̈ Comam yin ̈ sat ebnaj .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet hunun : ― ¡ Toˈan yuxin caw matzalacan ̈ janma yet macon ̈ iscuyni Comam yin ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios yul beh ! ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
