text2: Lahwin ̈ ena tuˈ xin , ismeltzoto ebnaj bey Jerusalén , isto ebnaj bay cutxanico ebnaj hunlahon ̈ wan ̈ yeb huntekˈanxa iscuywom Comam .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , maitzitzbican ̈ Comam , masye isba tet naj Simón Pedro , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Yalnipaxo ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ yin ̈ tzet yu isyenican ̈ isba Comam yul beh tet ebnaj , yeb tzet yu yohtan ̈ enilo ebnaj Comam yet iskˈaxpon ixim pan .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an istzotel ebnaj yin ̈ huneˈ tuˈ , yilniti ebnaj xin lin ̈ anxayo Comam Jesús yictabal ebnaj , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Ayojab akˈancˈulal texol , ẍi Comam .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Caw xiw ebnaj , iscˈaycan ̈ iscˈul ebnaj yuto ispixan camommi chil ebnaj yalni .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Yajaˈ yal Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin chexxiwi yeb chicabcon heyanma ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Ilwecˈanab inkˈaban yeb wojan bay to chˈen lawuẍ . ¡ Caw hanintonan ! Tzabinwecˈanaban cat heyohtan ̈ eniloj ta haninan . Wal hacaˈ hunu ispixan camom , machi ischibehal , machipaxo isbajil hacaˈ chu quinheyilnitiˈan .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Hayet yalni Comam huneˈ tuˈ isyeni Comam iskˈab yeb yoj tet ebnaj .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Yajaˈ yu xatzalahilal yeb yu chicˈay iscˈul ebnaj yilni , yuxin machi caw yayto ebnaj yul yanma ta haˈ Comam . Yuxin iskˈambe Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Aymi nichˈano tzet chicolo aycˈo heyu ? ẍi Comam .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Yakˈni ebnaj kˈaxep noˈ txobil cay tet Comam , yeb nichˈan noˈ cab .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Ischahnilo Comam noˈ , iswaˈ Comam yin ̈ sat ebnaj .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Haˈ huntekˈan isyaˈtajil mawakˈletiˈan , haˈ ton walan teyet yet ayintocˈojan texol , ta yilal yijni isba hacaˈ tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano win ̈ an yu naj Moisés , yebpaxo yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yebpaxo xin yin ̈ Salmos , ẍi Comam .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Hac tuˈ yu yakˈni Comam Jesús yohtan ̈ elo ebnaj yin ̈ tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayoj ta yilal yecˈyaˈ wanmahan , cat incaman , Hanin Cristo intiˈan . Lahwi tuˈ xin , cat witzitzbican ̈ an yin ̈ yox tzˈayic .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Caw xin , yilal yallaxicˈo Intzotiˈan babel yul Jerusalén tiˈ , yebpaxo sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ta yilal yanico isba anma yul iskˈab Comam Dios cat isbejnicano istxˈojal , haxinwal chˈakˈlax nimancˈulal yin ̈ ismul .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Hex tiˈ , cheyakˈaco heba heyalnolo huntekˈan tiˈ , yuto hex cawex heyilaˈ .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , wal heye bey Jerusalén tiˈ masanto chechah yip Espíritu Santo chinchejtijan bey satcan ̈ ; huneˈ halbilcano yu Inmaman , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj ischejab tuˈ .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinito Comam Jesús ebnaj ischejab yul ismajul Betania . Yinican ̈ Comam iskˈab , iskˈanni Comam iscˈulal Comam Dios yiban ̈ ebnaj ischejab tuˈ .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Lan ̈ antoticˈa tuˈ xin , yilaxto Comam satcan ̈ .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Yoc ebnaj yalno cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam , ispaxto ebnaj bey Jerusalén yin ̈ caw tzalahilal .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Hunun tzˈayic xin iscutxban isba ebnaj yul yatut Comam Dios , chalni ebnaj cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam Dios . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , yet maẍto hunu tzet watxˈinaxa , ayxaticˈa Comam Tzotiˈ isbi . Haˈ Comam Tzotiˈ tuˈ huneˈn ̈ e ye yeb Comam Dios , caw Diospaxo yehi .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Yet caw yichebanil ayxaticˈa Comam tuˈ yeb Comam Dios .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Yu Comam Tzotiˈ tuˈ , yuxin iswatxˈe Comam Dios Mame sunil tzettaj ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yeb satcan ̈ . Machi hunu tzet ye tuˈ watxˈinaj ta mach yuho Comam Tzotiˈ .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Yin ̈ Comam Tzotiˈ tuˈ , chipitzcˈati kˈinale , haˈ ton xin chiakˈni issajilkˈinal tet yanma anma .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Huneˈ issajilkˈinal tiˈ chimujli xol kˈejholo . Haˈ kˈejholo tuˈ xin , mach chikˈoji isbutnitan ̈ oj .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj ischejab Comam Dios , Juan isbi .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Hulicˈo naj tzotelo yin ̈ huneˈ issajilkˈinal tuˈ yun ̈ e yanayto sunil anma huneˈ issajilkˈinal yul yanma .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Haˈ naj Juan tuˈ xin , maẍtaj naj huneˈ issajilkˈinal tuˈ , caw ton ̈ e hul naj tzotelo yin ̈ issajilkˈinal .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Wal Comam yin ̈ caw yeli issajilkˈinal tuˈ , hulicˈo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yu yakˈni Comam issajilkˈinal yul yanma sunil anma .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca iswatxˈe Comam Dios sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yu Comam Tzotiˈ tuˈ , yajaˈ yet yulicˈoj maẍticˈa ohtan ̈ elax Comam yu anma .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Hulicˈo Comam yul iscon ̈ ob , yaj machi ischah anma Comam .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Yaj wal sunil mac chahni Comam , yanayto yul yanma yin ̈ tzet chala , haˈ ton huntekˈan tuˈ yakˈ Comam yip yoccano yuninalo Comam Dios .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Yet chˈoc yuninalo Comam Dios , mach lahano hacaˈ chu ispitzcˈa yuninal anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yeb mach hacaˈo chal iscˈul naj winaj , to hacaˈ chiel yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Dios , hac tuˈ chu yoc anma yuninalo Comam .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Comam Tzotiˈ tuˈ , yaco isba anmahil . Hulicˈo coxol isyeni isyelal jet , yebpaxo iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Dios . Jilnipaxo iskˈakˈal yip Comam ischah tet Ismam . Wal xin han ̈ cˈan ̈ e hunpilan Iscˈahol Comam Dios tuˈ .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ naj Juan yal naj yin ̈ Comam tuˈ yin ̈ caw ip hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Haˈ ton huneˈ naj tiˈ walan teyet ta tzujan yul wintajan yeb ta caw ecˈbal yelapno ye insatajan , yuto ayxaticˈa naj yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chinpitzcˈahan , ẍi naj Juan tuˈ .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Haˈ Comam chiwaltiˈan , caw cosunil chicochah iscˈulal iscˈul , yaj xin mach huneln ̈ eho chicochah , chilann ̈ eticˈa cochahni .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Yul iskˈab naj Moisés yakˈ Comam Dios huneˈ chejbanile caw how yakˈni naj jet , haxa Comam Jesucristo xin , hul akˈno sunil iscˈulal iscˈul yeb xin isyelal Comam Dios jet .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Caw maẍto hunu mac xailni yin ̈ Comam Dios , hachcachann ̈ e hunpilan Iscˈahol Comam Dios , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo ayn ̈ eticˈa iscˈatan ̈ , haˈ Comam hul yeno jet tzet ye Comam Dios .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Yet hunel xin ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel ay bey Jerusalén , ischejto ebnaj huntekˈan ebnaj sacerdote yeb huntekˈan ebnaj levita iskˈambeno tet naj Juan hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Mac hach anmahil hach tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yalnilo naj yin ̈ caw isyelal tet ebnaj , matzet yebacano naj , yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Maẍtajinan chiwijan Cristohal , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo ebnaj hunelxa : ― ¿ Mac hach anmahilach , chal tuˈ ? ¿ Tom hach tiˈ Elías ? ẍi ebnaj . ― Machoj , maẍtajinan , ẍi naj . ― ¿ Mato hach tiˈ ischejab Comam Dios echmabil yul juhan ̈ ? ẍi ebnaj tet naj . ― Machoj , ẍipaxo naj .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo ebnaj hunelxa : ― ¿ Mac ach anmahil , chal tuˈ ? Halilo jetan ̈ yun ̈ e jinitojan ̈ ispaj istzotiˈ ebnaj chejn ̈ eon ̈ tijan ̈ . ¿ Tzet caw chawute hawalni jetan ̈ tawin ̈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Juan tuˈ xin , yalni naj : ― Hanintiˈan yal naj Isaías , huneˈ naj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yet istzˈibn ̈ encano naj : Ay huneˈ mac chiawi bey txˈotxˈ desierto , chalni : “ Hacaˈ chu ishamlax hunu beh , cat istoholban ̈ elaxi yet chul naj jahaw , hac tuˈ chu hewatxˈenico heyanma , yuto chihul Comam Dios Jahawil , ” ẍicano naj Isaías tuˈ , ẍi naj Juan .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Ebnaj chejlaxto tzotelo tet naj Juan yu ebnaj fariseo ,

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: iskˈambe ebnaj tet naj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chawacan ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma tiˈ tato maẍtajach tiˈ Cristo hach ? ¿ Mach Elíaspaxo hach ? ¿ Maẍtajachpaxo ischejab Comam Dios echmabil yul juhan ̈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Yalni naj Juan tuˈ tet ebnaj : ― Wal hanintiˈan han ̈ e ha haˈ chiwakˈan yahbalo haˈ iswiˈ anma , yaj coxol tiˈ ayco huneˈ mac caw maẍto heyohtajoj .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Tzujan yul naj wintajan , yaj caw ecˈbal naj insatajan , yuxin mach chu inpuhnilojan istxˈan ̈ al isxan ̈ ab naj chiwabehan , ẍi naj Juan .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Haˈ bey huneˈ txˈotxˈ chiyij Betania , iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ niman Jordán , bay yacan ̈ naj Juan haˈ iswiˈ anma , haˈ tuˈ beycˈo ebnaj iskˈambeˈ huntekˈan tiˈ tet naj .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Haxa yet hunxa tzˈayical xin , yilnito naj Juan tato lan ̈ an yapni Comam Jesús iscˈatan ̈ , yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Ilwecˈanabi lah , haˈ huneˈ mac lan ̈ an yul tiˈ , haˈ akˈbilti jet yu Comam Dios coxahanbaloj , hacaˈ chiyu yoc noˈ meˈ xahanbalil . Haˈ naj chiinilo comul jiban ̈ cosunil han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Haˈ ton yin ̈ naj tiˈ quintzotelan yet walnihan teyet : “ Ay huneˈ naj tzujan yul wintajan , caw ecˈbal yelapno insatajan , yuto ayxaticˈa naj yet maẍto chinpitzcˈahan yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ” quinchiyan teyet .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , caw maẍticˈa wohtajojan mac Cocolomal , yaj wahcan ̈ an haˈ iswiˈ anma yun ̈ e yohtan ̈ elaxilo Comam yu anma Israel tiˈ , ẍi naj Juan tuˈ .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Yalnipaxo naj Juan : ― Caw wilan yayilo Comam Espíritu Santo yul satcan ̈ yiban ̈ naj . Hacaˈ chiyu yay lalon hunu noˈ palamuch , hac tuˈ yu yay yiban ̈ .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ tocano tuˈ , caw maẍto wohtajojan naj , yaj Comam Dios chejn ̈ eintijan wanocan ̈ an haˈ iswiˈ anma tiˈ , haˈ Comam chalni wetan : “ Haˈ huneˈ mac chawil yay Comam Espíritu Santo yiban ̈ , haˈ ton huneˈ tuˈ chiakˈni Comam Espíritu Santo tet anma , ” ẍi Comam Dios wetan .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Caw ilbilxa wuhan , yuxin chiwalicˈojan tato caw Iscˈahol Comam Dios ye naj tiˈ , ẍi naj Juan .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Yet huneˈxa tzˈayical xin , aypaxicˈo naj Juan bey tuˈ yeb cawan ̈ xa ebnaj iscuywom iscˈatan ̈ .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Hayet yilni naj Juan yecˈto Comam Jesús , yalni naj tet ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ : ― Ilwecˈanabi lah , haˈ naj tuˈ akˈbil jet coxahanbalo yu Comam Dios hacaˈ chiyu yoc noˈ meˈ xahanbalil ju , ẍi naj Juan tuˈ .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Hayet yaben ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ tzet yal naj Juan , isto ebnaj yinta Comam Jesús .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Istˈan ̈ xito Comam Jesús yintaj , yilni Comam tato tzujan ebnaj cawan ̈ tuˈ yinta Comam . Iskˈamben Comam tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet chesaya ? ẍi Comam . ― Rabí , ¿ baytuˈwal ayach ? ẍi ebnaj . ( Huneˈ tzotiˈ rabí , cuywawom chaliloj . )

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam xin : ― Catawej cat heyilni , ẍi Comam . Hac tuˈ yu isto ebnaj yilno baytuˈwal ay Comam . Iscancano ebnaj huneˈ akˈbal tuˈ yuto kˈejbixa .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Ebnaj cawan ̈ aben tzet yal naj Juan occano tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam . Huneˈ naj Andrés isbi , yuẍta isba naj yeb naj Simón Pedro .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Yet lahwi istzotel naj Andrés tuˈ yeb Comam Jesús , yin ̈ hamataj to naj saywal yin ̈ yuẍtaj , yalni naj tet naj : ― Caw machahloyo Comam Mesías juhan ̈ , ẍi naj .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu yijbanto naj Andrés tuˈ naj Simón iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesús . Yoc tˈan ̈ no Comam yin ̈ naj Simón tuˈ , yalni Comam tet naj : ― Simón , iscˈahol naj Jonás , wal tinan ̈ Cefas chioccano habihoj , ẍi Comam tet naj . ( Yin ̈ huneˈ yabxubal ebnaj tuˈ , huneˈ bihe Cefas chal yelapnoj Pedro . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Yet huneˈxa tzˈayic xin yoc yin ̈ isnabal Comam Jesús isto bey yulaj ismajul txˈotxˈ Galilea . Ischahni isba Comam yeb naj Felipe , yalni Comam tet naj : ― Ocan ̈ tzujno wintajan , ẍi Comam .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Caw xin yet con ̈ ob isba naj Felipe tuˈ yeb naj Andrés yebpaxo naj Simón Pedro ; ah con ̈ ob Betsaida ebnaj .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto naj Felipe saywal yin ̈ naj Natanael . Yet ischahlo naj Natanael tuˈ yu naj , yalni naj tet naj : ― Machahlo Comam tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yul Hum yet ley akˈbilcano yu naj Moisés , yeb tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu huntekˈanxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat ; haˈ naj Jesús ah Nazaret , iscˈahol naj José , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Yalni naj Natanael tuˈ : ― ¿ Tom xin ay hunu mac cˈul chielti xol ebnaj ay bey con ̈ ob Nazaret tuˈ ? ẍi naj . Istakˈwi naj Felipe xin : ― Ton ̈ cˈanab jilaˈ cat hawilni , ẍi naj .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Yet yilnito Comam Jesús yapni naj Natanael iscˈatan ̈ tuˈ xin , yalni Comam : ― Haˈ huneˈ naj lan ̈ an yul tiˈ , caw Israel naj yul sat Comam Dios , caw machi nino lekˈtiˈal ayco yin ̈ naj , ẍi Comam .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Iskˈamben naj Natanael tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet xin chu quinhawohtan ̈ enilojan ? ẍi naj . Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Macachwilan yet maẍto chachyawte naj Felipe tiˈ , yet ayach yich teˈ higuera , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Natanael tuˈ : ― Mam cuywawom , yin ̈ caw yeli hach tiˈ Iscˈahol Comam Dios , Yahawil con ̈ ob Israel hawehi , ẍican ̈ naj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet naj : ― Chawayto yul hawanma win ̈ an yuto mawalan ta macachwilan yich teˈ higuera , wal xin caw ecˈnato cˈaybalcˈule chito hawilaˈ sata tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , cheyilaˈ ishajni isba satcan ̈ , cat heyilni yahtoj yeb yayilo ebnaj yángel Comam Dios wiban ̈ an Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jesús .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Haxa yet yoxihalxa xin , yoc huneˈ mohyilal bey yul con ̈ ob Caná ay yul ismajul Galilea . Ayco ismiˈ Comam Jesús xol huneˈ mohyilal tuˈ .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Awtebilpaxo Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom yin ̈ huneˈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Yajaˈ xin lahwilo isvino ebnaj ay ismohyilal tuˈ , yuxin yal ismiˈ Comam tet : ― Caw malahwi isvino ebnaj , ẍi ismiˈ Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam xin : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ wetan chawal huneˈ tiˈ , miˈ ? Wal xin maẍto chiapni istiempohal inyenilo wipan tet anma , ẍi Comam .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yalni ismiˈ Comam tet ebnaj chejab yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ : ― Yijewe hewatxˈen sunil tzet chal naj teyet , ẍi ismiˈ Comam .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Haˈ bey tuˈ xin ayayo wajeb nimeta chˈen moc tzˈahab . Aymi oxebo maca can ̈ ebo nimeta tzˈahab haˈ chiayto yul hunun . Yul huntekˈan moc tuˈ chiayto ha haˈ chiocnico yu ebnaj Israel istxˈahni iskˈab hacaˈ yalni ischejbanil ebnaj .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj chejab yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ : ― Nohtzewe huntekˈan moc tiˈ yu ha haˈ , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj . Hac tuˈ xin yu yoc ebnaj isnohtzenoj .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Yet nohnaxa huntekˈan chˈen moc tuˈ xin , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Iwelti haˈ yul moc tuˈ tinan ̈ , cat xin heyinito tet naj chiˈilni yoc anma sat meẍa , ẍi Comam . Hac tuˈ yute ebnaj .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Yablen naj chiˈilni yoc anma sat meẍa tuˈ ha haˈ oc vinohal , caw xin mach yohtajo naj baytuˈwal caw istitico huntekˈanxa vino tuˈ . Wal ebnaj chejab tuˈ xin , yohta ebnaj tzet yehi , yuto haˈ ebnaj inilti ha haˈ yul chˈen moc tuˈ . Hayet yablen naj chiˈilni yoc anma sat meẍa , huneˈ vino tuˈ , yawten naj naj mohyom tuˈ ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: yalni naj tet naj : ― Haˈ chute anma , to babel chiˈalaxicˈo vino caw cˈul tet anma awtebil , yet chilahwi yucˈni anma teˈ vino caw cˈul tuˈ , cat xin yalaxicˈo huntekˈan mach lahano iscˈulal . Wal hach tiˈ yin ̈ xa islahobal chawakˈ vino caw cˈul , ẍi naj .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Haˈ xin bey yul con ̈ ob Caná ayco yul ismajul Galilea , haˈ bey tuˈ isye Comam Jesús babel cˈaybalcˈule . Hac tuˈ yu isyeni Comam ishelanil yip , wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam xin , caw yacanayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto Comam bey yul con ̈ ob Capernaum ; istopaxo ismiˈ Comam yeb yuẍta Comam , yebpaxo xin ebnaj chicuywi yintaj . Haˈ tuˈ xin ehayo hayeb tzˈayical .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Yet toxa chiˈayilo kˈin ̈ Pascua , iskˈin ̈ anma Israel , isto Comam Jesús bey yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Yet yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios , yilni Comam tato ayicto ebnaj txon ̈ om wacax , yeb ebnaj txon ̈ om meˈ , yeb ebnaj txon ̈ om palamuch . Aypaxo xin ebnaj helom melyu tzˈon ̈ anicto bey tuˈ .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Hayet yilni Comam huneˈ tuˈ , iswatxˈenayo Comam huneˈ tzˈum yin ̈ huntekˈan lasu , yoc Comam istzumbenilti ebnaj txon ̈ om wacax yeb ebnaj txon ̈ om meˈ . Istiẍnipaxcanto Comam ismelyu ebnaj helom melyu . Ispacˈchancanocan ̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Yalni xin Comam tet ebnaj txon ̈ om palamuch hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Iwelto huntekˈan noˈ chˈic tiˈ bey tiˈ , mach chu heyakˈaco yatut Inmaman txon ̈ balil , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , yu isnaniti ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam Jesús tzotiˈ tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yul Hum yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yu caw xahan ay hawatut wuhan , yuxin caw yaˈ chuco yin ̈ wanmahan , ” ẍiayoj .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Iskˈamben xin ebnaj yahawil Israel tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet hunu chawakˈ yechelo jetan ̈ yun ̈ e johtan ̈ enilojan ̈ tato ay hawip hawatxˈen huntekˈan tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Uchcˈaweyo huneˈ yatut Comam Dios tiˈ , cat xin wahnican ̈ an selel yin ̈ oxeb tzˈayic , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Yalni xin ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ anma Israel tuˈ tet Comam : ― Huneˈ yatut Comam Dios tiˈ , caw cuarenta y seis habil yitoj yet yahi . ¿ Caw xin oxebn ̈ echˈan tzˈayic chawutecan ̈ selel hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Yaj caw maẍticˈa txumchalo yu ebnaj baytet huneˈ n ̈ a bay chitzotel Comam tuˈ , ton ̈ ca xin haˈ Comam bay chitzoteli .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Yuxin hayet yitzitzbican ̈ Comam xol anma camom , isnaniti ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tato halbilcano huneˈ tuˈ yu Comam . Yanayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Hum yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yeb yin ̈ tzet yal Comam Jesús .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Yet aycˈo Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén yin ̈ kˈin ̈ Pascua , caw hantan ̈ e anma chahnayto Comam yul yanma yu cˈaybalcˈule iswatxˈe Comam bey tuˈ .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Yajaˈ machi cawxi iscˈul Comam yin ̈ anma , yuto caw yohta Comam anma sunil .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Mach yechelto ay mac chihalni tet Comam tzet ye anma , yuto caw yohta Comam tzet ye yanma hunun anma .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Xol ebnaj fariseo ay huneˈ naj , Nicodemo isbi , caw niman yelapno naj xol ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Yet akˈbalil xin , apni naj yilaˈ Comam Jesús , yalni naj tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , caw johtajan ̈ tato haˈ Comam Dios an ̈ e hachti con ̈ hacuyuˈan ̈ , yuto machi mac chiyu iswatxˈen cˈaybalcˈule hacaˈ chawatxˈe tiˈ ta mach ayoco Comam Dios yetbihoj , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet naj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan tawet , macn ̈ eticˈa mach chipitzcˈa yin ̈ iscayelal mach chu yoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Iskˈamben naj Nicodemo tuˈ xin : ― ¿ Tzettaxca chu ispitzcˈa hunu anma yin ̈ iscayelal tato ichamxa ? ¿ Tom chito yu ismeltzoco yin ̈ ismiˈ hunelxa cat xin ispitzcˈa , hawalni ? ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet naj : ― Caw yel chiwalcanojan tawet , macn ̈ eticˈa mach chipitzcˈa yu ha haˈ yeb xin yu Yespíritu Comam Dios , caw mach chiyu yoc yul iskˈab Comam .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Hayet chon ̈ pitzcˈa yin ̈ comiˈ , yeli ay huneˈ iskˈinal conimanil chabil ju tet comiˈ , yaj caw yilal copitzcˈa yu Yespíritu Comam Dios yun ̈ e cochahni iskˈinal Espíritu Santo jin ̈ .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Mach chicˈay hacˈul yuto chiwalan tawet ta yilal chipitzcˈa sunil anma yin ̈ iscayelal .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Hacaˈticˈa jakˈekˈ tinan ̈ , caw ton ̈ e chijabe yeqˈui , yaj caw mach johtajoj baytuˈwal chi ‑ caw ‑ istita , caw mach johtajopaxoj baytuˈwal chi ‑ caw ‑ istopaxicoj . Hac ton tuˈ xin yet anma chipitzcˈa yu Yespíritu Comam Dios , yin ̈ yesalil chipitzcˈahi , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Iskˈamben naj hunelxa tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet xin chu yijni isba huneˈ tuˈ ? ẍi naj .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Hach tiˈ , caw cuywawom hawehico xol ebnaj Israel , yaj ¿ tzet yin ̈ caw mach hawohtajo huneˈ tiˈ ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli haˈ tzet ohtabil juhan ̈ haˈ chijalan ̈ , cat jalnipaxojan ̈ tzet ilbil juhan ̈ . Walex caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet chijalan ̈ .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Yet chiwalnihan teyet tzet yelapno ye tzettaj ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma , hajxam ta chiwalan teyet yin ̈ tzettaj ay yul satcan ̈ chal tuˈ , caw maẍticˈam cheyapaxayto yul heyanma .

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Wal xin , caw maẍto hunu mac xabeyahto yul satcan ̈ tuˈ , hachcachann ̈ e Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , titnajinan yul satcan ̈ .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Hacaˈ yu yanican ̈ naj Moisés huneˈ yechel noˈ laba yin ̈ te teˈ bey txˈotxˈ desierto , caw yilal hac tuˈ chiyu wahlaxcan ̈ an yin ̈ teˈ culus , yuxinto macn ̈ eticˈa chinchahnihan yul yanma , mach chicˈaytoj , wal xin chischah huneˈ iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Wal xin , caw xahancano ay anma ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yu Comam Dios , yuto yati Comam hunpilan Iscˈahol coxol , yuxinto macn ̈ eticˈa chichahni yul yanma , mach chicˈaytoj , to caw chischah huneˈ iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Hanintiˈan caw Iscˈahol Comam Dios wehan . Akˈbilintijan yu Comam yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , maẍtaj yu wulan wanocojan isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ anma , machoj , to yu incolnihan yalan ̈ ismul .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Macn ̈ eticˈa chinchahnihan yul yanma , mach chiay isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ , wal mac mach chinchahnihan yul yanma xin caw chitocano ismul yiban ̈ yuto mach chayto yul yanma win ̈ an , haninn ̈ echˈan Iscˈahol Comam Dios intiˈan .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Hulnajinan bey yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yun ̈ e wanicojan anma xol issajilkˈinal , yaj xin caw ay anma mach chiocheni . Hacn ̈ e tuˈ xin caw chicawxico ismul yiban ̈ yu istxˈojal chiswatxˈe anma tuˈ , yuto yet kˈejholo yehi .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan anma chiwatxˈen ismachiswalilal , mach chiyoche huneˈ issajilkˈinal tiˈ . Mach chisjepaxti xol , yuto mach chiyoche iscˈul tato chˈel yen ̈ el sunil istxˈojal chi ‑ la ‑ iswatxˈe .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Yajaˈ wal mac chiyijen cuybanile akˈbilcano yu Comam Dios xin , chaco isba xol issajilkˈinal yun ̈ e yiẍtan ̈ wiloj ta haˈ tzet chiswatxˈe , lahan hacaˈ tzet choche Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet naj Nicodemo tuˈ .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ , isto Comam Jesús yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey yul ismajul Judea . Haˈ tuˈ xin ehayo Comam hanicˈ tiempohal yeb ebnaj ; chiyanican ̈ ebnaj haˈ iswiˈ anma .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Wal naj Juan xin , ayco naj yanican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma bey Enón iscawilal Salim , yuto caw txˈiˈal ha haˈ bey tuˈ . Haˈ tuˈ xin chiapni anma iscˈatan ̈ naj yu yahcano haˈ iswiˈ .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Yu huntekˈan tiˈ yet maẍto chialaxico naj preso .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Yet hunel tuˈ xin , oc ebnaj chicuywi yinta naj Juan isteyele isba yeb huneˈ naj israelita yin ̈ tzet chiyu cosajn ̈ en coba yin ̈ isbeybal Comam Dios .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Isto ebnaj yalno tet naj Juan : ― Mam cuywawom , naj ayco tacˈatan ̈ yet ayach bey haˈ niman Jordán , naj hawal jetan ̈ , lan ̈ an yahnican ̈ naj haˈ iswiˈ anma . Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma chioccano tzujno yinta naj , ẍi ebnaj tet naj Juan .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Juan tet ebnaj : ― Caw machi hunu mac chiwatxˈen huneˈ munil tiˈ tato maẍtaj Comam Dios chiakˈni tet .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , xaheyabe tzet walan teyet tato maẍtajinan Cristo hinan . Wal xin caw babel quinchejlaxtijan yalan ̈ to yet maẍto chihul Comam Cristo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay hunu mohyilal tinan ̈ , haˈ naj chimohyi tuˈ , haˈ naj chiˈikˈni ix ix , wal naj yamigo naj ayco iscˈatan ̈ , chitzala naj yaben istzotel naj chimohyi tuˈ . Hac tuˈ xin istzala wanmahan wabenan yapni anma iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesús .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Yuxin caw yilal niẍtejal yoccano yip ismunil Comam , walinan xin , niẍtejal islahwipaxcano wettiˈan , ẍi naj Juan tet ebnaj chicuywi yintaj .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Haˈ Comam tit yul satcan ̈ , haˈ caw ecˈbal jiban ̈ cosunil . Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ yet sat txˈotxˈal jehi , yuxin han ̈ e tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ haˈ chijala . Wal huneˈ Mac ecˈbal cosataj , haˈ ton Comam ispeto yul satcan ̈ .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Yuxin haˈ tzet ilbil yu , yeb xin tzet abebil yu , haˈ chiyala , yaj xin machi mac chiyayto yul yanma yin ̈ tzet chiyala .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Yaj tato ay mac chichahni tzet chal Comam tuˈ yul yanma , huneˈ mac tuˈ chaco isba yalniloj ta haˈ tzet chal Comam Dios caw yeli .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Huneˈ Comam akˈbilti yu Comam Dios , haˈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios chalicˈoj , yuto caw nohnan ̈ eticˈaco Comam Espíritu Santo yin ̈ yu Comam Dios .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Caw xahan ay Iscˈahol Comam Dios tuˈ yu , yuxinto caw yaco Comam Dios Mame sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ yul iskˈab Iscˈahol tuˈ .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , macxan ̈ eticˈa chichahni Iscˈahol Comam yul yanma , chischah huneˈ iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , yaj wal mac mach chichahni Comam yul yanma xin , caw mach chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , to haˈ isyaˈtajil chischah yu Comam .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Yaben ebnaj fariseo ta chiyapaxocan ̈ Comam Jesús haˈ iswiˈ anma yeb xin ta caw ecˈnaxa anma tzujan yinta Comam satapaxo naj Juan ;

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Waxan ̈ ca maẍtaj caw Comam chianican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma tuˈ , wal xin haˈ ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam , haˈ ebnaj chianican ̈ haˈ iswiˈ anma . )

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Hayet yabenilo Comam Jesús ta yabe ebnaj fariseo huneˈ tuˈ , yel Comam yul ismajul Judea , ismeltzoto bey yul ismajul Galilea ,

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: yajaˈ xin , caw yilal yecˈ Comam yul ismajul Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Yapni Comam bey huneˈ con ̈ ob chiyij Sicar ayco yul ismajul Samaria tuˈ , iscawilal huneˈ txˈo txˈotxˈ akˈbilcano yet payat yu naj Jacob tet iscˈahol , haˈ ton naj José .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Haˈ bey tuˈ xin , ay huneˈ cˈuh watxˈebil yu naj Jacob . Caw xin xasiqui Comam isbelwi , yuxin oc tzˈon ̈ no Comam istiˈ huneˈ cˈuh tuˈ yet lan ̈ anxa yoc chuman .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tuˈ xin , to ebnaj yul con ̈ ob islokˈo tzet chilolaxi . Hayet ayto ebnaj lokˈwo tuˈ xin , yapni huneˈ ix ah Samaria ikˈoti haˈ yul huneˈ cˈuh tuˈ , yalni Comam tet ix : ― Akˈ nino hawaˈ tuˈ wucˈuˈan , ẍi Comam .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Istakˈwi ix tet Comam : ― Walach hach tiˈ , caw ah con ̈ ob Israel hach , ¿ tom caw mach hawohtajoj tato ah con ̈ ob Samaria inan ? ¿ Tzet yin ̈ chakˈanpaxo ha haˈ hawucˈu wetan ? ẍi ix tet Comam . ( Yal ix hacaˈ tuˈ , yuto haˈ anma Israel mach chischahle tzotelo isba yeb anma ah Samaria . )

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ix xin : ― Kˈinalo ta hawohta huneˈ mac chikˈanni haˈ tawet tiˈ , yeb xin ta hawohta iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Dios chiyakˈ jet , chimhakˈanpaxo hawaˈ wetan , catmi wakˈnihan haˈ chiakˈni kˈinale machi istan ̈ bal tawet , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Yalnipaxo ix tet Comam : ― Mamin , caw nahat yehayto haˈ yul cˈuh lah , caw xin machi hanet chiinahti haˈ . ¿ Bay xin chaẍto hawikˈati haˈ chiakˈni kˈinale chawakˈ wettuˈan hawalni ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Naj Jacob , jichmam yettax payat tiempo , haˈ naj an ̈ ecano huneˈ cˈuh tiˈ jetan ̈ . Ha haˈ yul huneˈ cˈuh tiˈ xin yucˈ naj yeb sunil yuninal , yebpaxo sunil isnokˈ . ¿ Tom xin caw ecˈbal hachto satapaxo naj Jacob tuˈ ? ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ Comam tet ix : ― Sunil mac chiucˈni huneˈ ha haˈ tiˈ chititpaxo istajintiˈal hunelxa .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Wal mac chiucˈni ha haˈ chiwakˈtiˈan xin , matxa bakˈin chitaj istiˈ , yuto huneˈ ha haˈ chiwakˈtiˈan lahan hacaˈ hunu isnukˈ ha haˈ chiahilo toptoni cat isbelwi , haˈ chakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal tet , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Yalni ix tet Comam xin : ― Mamin , akˈ huneˈ haˈ chawal tiˈ wucˈuˈan haxinwal matxa chitaj intiˈan , matxa chinhulan ikˈo haˈ bey tiˈ , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ix : ― As awteti hawichamil cat heyul bey tiˈ , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: ― Machi wichamilan , ẍi ix tet Comam . Yalni Comam tet ix : ― Caw yel chawala , machi hawichamil .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Yaj howan ̈ xa ebnaj chawikˈle , walpaxo naj ikˈbil hawu tinan ̈ xin , mach hawichamilo naj . Yuxin caw yel chawala , machi hawichamil , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Hayet yaben ix huneˈ tuˈ xin , yalni ix tet Comam . ― Mamin , wal tinan ̈ , caw chitxumchalo wuhan tato caw ischejab Comam Dios hawehi .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ebnaj jichmaman ̈ , haˈ tiˈ hulicˈo ebnaj iswiˈ huneˈ witz tiˈ yikˈayo isba tet Comam Dios , walexpaxo israelita hex tiˈ , caw cheyala ta cachann ̈ echˈan yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén chiyu coto jinoyo coba tet Comam Dios , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ix : ― Hach ix ach tiˈ , ayto sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan yul hawanma . Chiapni huneˈ istiempohal yet matxa chexhul heyikˈayo heba tet Comam Dios bey huneˈ witz tiˈ , yeb matxa yilalo chextopaxo bey Jerusalén .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Hex ah con ̈ ob Samaria hex tiˈ , cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios heyalni , yaj xin mach heyohtajo Comam , walon ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ xin , johtajan ̈ Comam Dios bay chijiyo cobahan ̈ , yuto coxolan ̈ chiel Iscolomal anma .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Wal xin lan ̈ an yapni istiempohal , haˈ ton tinan ̈ , yet chiyinayo isba anma yin ̈ istoholal . Caw xin chíyo isba tet Comam Dios yin ̈ sunil yanma yeb xin yin ̈ caw isyelal , yuto hac tuˈ choche iscˈul Comam ta chiyiyo isba anma tet .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Wal Comam Dios , caw Espíritu ye Comam , yuxin macn ̈ eticˈa chiyiyo isba tet Comam , caw yilal chiyiyo isba yin ̈ sunil yanma yeb xin yin ̈ caw isyelal , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Yalni ix tet Comam : ― Caw wohtajan tato chul huneˈ naj Mesías , haˈ ton Comam Cristo Cocolomal , yu Comam Dios . Hayet chihul naj tuˈ xin , haˈ naj chi ‑ cam ‑ halni yin ̈ tzet caw yelapno ye sunil , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Yalni Comam xin : ― Hanintonan huneˈ chawal tiˈ , huneˈ lan ̈ an istzotel tawet tiˈ , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Hayet lan ̈ an istzotel Comam tuˈ xin , yapni ebnaj iscuywom . Caw cˈayilo iscˈul ebnaj yilni istzotel Comam yeb huneˈ ix ix tuˈ . Wal xin caw machi hunu ebnaj kˈambeni tzet yin ̈ xin tzotel Comam yeb ix , yeb xin tzet chal Comam yeb ix .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isbejnicano ix istzˈahab istiˈ cˈuh tuˈ , isto ix yalno tet anma yul iscon ̈ ob hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: ― Catawej , ton ̈ we jilaˈ huneˈ mac mahalni wetan yin ̈ sunil tzet wehicojan . ¿ Cˈuxan tato haˈ naj tuˈ Cristo ? ẍi ix .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Hayet yaben anma huneˈ tuˈ , istit anma yilno Comam .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Yet maẍto chiapni anma iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , waˈan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Ay huneˈ tzet chinlohan caw mach heyohtajoj , ẍi Comam .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Yoc ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ yalno tet hunun hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tocˈanab xin ay mac mahulicˈo akˈno tzet chislo Comam tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Yalni Comam xin : ― Wal xin , haˈ tzet choche Comam chejn ̈ eintijan , haˈ chiwochehan chinwatxˈehan , cat xin inlahnihan ismunil akˈbilcano yul inkˈaban . Yuxin hayet chinwatxˈenan ismunil tiˈ , caw lahan yeb hacaˈ yet lan ̈ an inwaˈan .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Hex tiˈ cheyala ta can ̈ ebto ixahaw bay chicˈuplaxcan ̈ ixim trigo . Caw hacticˈam tuˈ , yaj chiwalan teyet : ¡ Tˈan ̈ xan ̈ wetoj lah , naweloj ! Caw maayilo istiempohal iscutxbalaxico anma wetan , hacaˈ chiyu iscutxbalax ixim trigo yet chikˈanbilo ixim .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Haˈ naj chicˈupnican ̈ ixim trigo chischah naj istohol , yechel naj ye naj chiinito anma iscˈatan ̈ Comam yu ischahni iskˈinal chiyakˈ Comam . Yuxin naj chitzˈunni ixim yeb naj chicˈupnican ̈ ixim , lahan istzala iscˈul ebnaj iscawan ̈ il .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Hacaˈ yalni anma chijabe : “ Nan naj chitxihni ixim trigo , nanxapaxo naj chicˈupnican ̈ ixim , ” ẍi .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Yuxin chexinchejtojan xol anma , hacaˈ ebnaj chicˈupnican ̈ ixim trigo tuˈ , nan ebnaj babel munlanahi hacaˈ yin ̈ istxihnayo ixim , hex tiˈ xin caw toxan ̈ e chexecˈ hecˈupuˈcan ̈ ixim , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Caw txˈiˈal anma yul huneˈ con ̈ ob ay yul ismajul Samaria tuˈ chahnicano Comam yul yanma yuto caw wiyom yalni ix hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mayalilo naj wetan yin ̈ sunil tzet xale inwatxˈehan , ” ẍi ix .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Yuxin hayet yapni anma tuˈ iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yalni anma tet Comam tato chicancano Comam yul con ̈ ob tuˈ . Hac tuˈ xin yu iscancano Comam cab tzˈayical bey tuˈ .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ eto anma chahnicano Comam yul yanma yet yaben iscuywacanto Comam .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Yalni anma tet ix tzotel tet Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Wal tinan ̈ , caw chijaytojan ̈ yul janmahan ̈ , yaj maẍn ̈ etaj yu tzet maxawal jetan ̈ , to yu han ̈ ‑ caw ‑ on ̈ an ̈ majabehan ̈ tzet chal Comam , yuxinto caw johtajan ̈ ta haˈ Comam tiˈ Cristo , haˈ Cocolomal cosunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi anma tet ix .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Yet islahwi cab tzˈayic yecˈ Comam Jesús bey ismajul Samaria tuˈ xin , isto Comam bey yul ismajul Galilea .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Caw xin halbilxaticˈa yu Comam tuˈ tato caw machi hunu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios xahan chiillax yul iscon ̈ ob .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Hayet yapni Comam bey Galilea tuˈ xin , caw cˈul yu ischahlax Comam yu anma , yuto yil anma tzettaj iswatxˈe Comam yet yecˈ kˈin ̈ Pascua bey Jerusalén , yet isbeycˈo anma yin ̈ kˈin ̈ .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Yapni Comam Jesús bey yul con ̈ ob Caná bay elico ha haˈ vinohal yu Comam . Haˈ bey yul con ̈ ob Capernaum xin , ay huneˈ naj niman yelapno ismunil chimunla yinta naj rey , ay xin huneˈ iscˈahol naj caw txˈoj ye iscˈul yu yabil .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Yet yaben naj tato tit Comam Jesús bey Judea yapni bey ismajul Galilea tuˈ , isto naj yilno Comam . Iskˈanni naj tet Comam tato chito Comam yilaˈ huneˈ iscˈahol naj caw how yehico yabil yin ̈ , lan ̈ anxa iscami .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Yalni xin Comam tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Wal hex tiˈ , tato mach cheyil sunil wipan yeb ej cˈaybalcˈule chinwatxˈehan , caw maẍticˈam chinhechahan yul heyanma , ẍi Comam .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Yalni naj tet Comam : ― Mamin , ton ̈ yin ̈ an ̈ e yakˈ isba maẍto chicam incˈaholan , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Paxan ̈ to hawatut , cawxa naj hacˈahol , ẍi Comam tet naj . Hac tuˈ yu yanayto naj yul yanma yin ̈ tzet yal Comam , ispaxto naj yatut .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Yet ayco naj yin ̈ isbel bey con ̈ ob Capernaum tuˈ , yapni huntekˈan ebnaj ismunlawom naj chahwal yin ̈ yul beh , yalni ebnaj tet naj : ― Cawxa naj hacˈahol , ẍi ebnaj tet naj .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Iskˈambenilo naj mame tuˈ tet ebnaj ismunlawom : ― ¿ Hanicˈ mawatxˈilo iscˈul incˈaholtuˈan ? ẍi naj . Yalni ebnaj : ― Ewitax yin ̈ chˈen hujeb yel kˈaˈ yin ̈ naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Istxumni naj mame tuˈ ta hacaˈticˈa orahil chal ebnaj ismunlawom naj tuˈ , hac tuˈ orahil yet yalni Comam Jesús tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Cawxa naj hacˈahol tuˈ tinan ̈ , ” ẍi Comam . Hac tuˈ xin yu ischahnicano naj Comam Jesús yul yanma yeb sunil mac ay bey yul yatut naj tuˈ .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ cˈaybalcˈule tiˈ iswatxˈe Comam yul ismajul Galilea lahwi isbey Comam yin ̈ kˈin ̈ bey Judea . Haˈ xin iscab cˈaybalcˈule tiˈ iswatxˈe Comam .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , istopaxo Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén yin ̈ huneˈ iskˈin ̈ anma Israel chiecˈ yul con ̈ ob tuˈ .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Bey yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén tuˈ xin , iscawilal ispultahil bay chˈocto noˈ meˈ , haˈ tuˈ ay huneˈ ha haˈ ton ̈ e etxan . Yul abxubal hebreo Betesda isbi huneˈ haˈ tuˈ . Istiˈla haˈ tuˈ xin , aycan ̈ howeb n ̈ a machi yich .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Caw xin txˈiˈal anma yaˈay hilanejayo yul huntekˈan n ̈ a tuˈ . Ay mac mach chu yilni , ay xin mac mach chu yeqˈui , aypaxo mac mach chibili isnimanil . Huntekˈan anma yaˈay tuˈ ayco yechman isbilican ̈ haˈ ,

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: yuto caw yin ̈ n ̈ e istiempohal chihulayti huneˈ naj ángel isbile haˈ , macn ̈ eticˈa babel chiayto yet chibilican ̈ haˈ xin , haˈ chian ̈ chahi , cat yel tzettaj yabilal ayco yin ̈ .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Xol anma yaˈay tuˈ ayayo huneˈ naj treinta y ocho habilxa yoc yabil yin ̈ .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Hayet yilni Comam Jesús ta hilanayo naj bey tuˈ , istxumnilo Comam tato caw payxa ichico naj , yalni Comam tet naj : ― ¿ Chimhawoche chaẍan ̈ chahi ? ẍi Comam .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Yalni naj tet Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , caw machi hunu mac chinanaytojan xol haˈ tiˈ yet chibilican ̈ haˈ . Hayet chinaytojan xol haˈ walnihan , nan mac chibabayto insatajan , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj xin : ― Ahan ̈ wanoj , ican ̈ hawaybal tiˈ , cat hatohi , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Yin ̈ n ̈ ena tuˈ iscawxican ̈ naj , yoc naj yinocan ̈ iswaybal , isto naj xin . Hayet yan ̈ chacano naj tuˈ , cˈuxan istzˈayical xewilal ,

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: yuxinto yal ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Wal tinan ̈ , caw istzˈayical xewilal , caw mach chu hawijnicˈo hawaybal tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj tet naj .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ naj cawxican ̈ tuˈ : ― Haˈ mac maquinakˈni cawxojan , haˈ mahalni wetan hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ican ̈ hawaybal , cat xin hatohi , ” ẍi wetan , ẍi naj tet naj yahawil tuˈ .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj tet naj : ― ¿ Mac xin najil mahalni tawet , ta chawican ̈ hawaybal cat xin hatohi ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Wal xin caw mach yohtajo naj mac akˈni cawxo tuˈ , yuto caw hantan ̈ e anma bey tuˈ , caw xin pet cˈaycan ̈ Comam Jesús xol anma .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , ischahnayo Comam Jesús naj yul yatut Comam Dios , yalni Comam tet naj : ― Wal tinan ̈ , caw macachcawxiloj . Matxa chawaco yakˈbil hamul haxinwal matxa hunuxa isyaˈtajil caw txˈoj chul tawiban ̈ , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto naj yalno tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel tato haˈ Comam Jesús akˈni cawxo naj .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , yu yoccano ebnaj yanoco ishowal yin ̈ Comam isyayil yakˈ cawxo Comam huneˈ naj yin ̈ istzˈayical xewilal .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús xin : ― Inmaman , maẍticˈa chisbej ismunlahi , yuxin haquintuˈan , maẍticˈa chinbejcanojan inmunlahan , ẍi Comam .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , caw yacanico ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel tuˈ yin ̈ iscˈul yakˈni camo Comam Jesús , yuto mach isyije Comam huneˈ tzˈayic xewilal .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalcanojan teyet , caw Iscˈahol Dios wehan , yuxin haˈ huntekˈan chinwatxˈetiˈan caw mach wetojan inchuquilan . Haˈ tzet chakˈ Inmaman inwatxˈehan , haˈ chiwuhan , yuxinto sunil tzet chiswatxˈe Inmamtuˈan , caw chiyupaxo wuhan .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , Iscˈahol Dios wehan , caw xin xahan ayinan yu Inmamtuˈan . Sunil tzet chinwatxˈehan Inmamtuˈan chiyeni wetan . Ayto xin huntekˈan tzet caw ay yelapno chisye Inmamtuˈan wetan cat inwatxˈenan , hac tuˈ xin chicˈay hecˈul heyilni .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Wal Inmamtuˈan chiyu yakˈni itzitzbocan ̈ camom , cat xin yakˈnipaxo iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Haquinpaxtuˈan chiwakˈan kˈinale tet mac bay choche incˈulan chiwakˈan .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Machi hunu anma chiyil Inmaman yin ̈ tzet chielicoj , walxinto haninan akˈbil wipan yu Inmaman yu wilnihan yin ̈ tzet chielico anma .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Caw yul inkˈaban ayco huntekˈan tiˈ yu Inmaman yun ̈ e lahann ̈ e chˈoc inmayan yeb Inmaman . Yaj tato ay anma machi welapnojan yul sat , caw machipaxo yelapno Inmaman yul sat chal tuˈ , yuto Inmamtuˈan chejn ̈ eintijan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , macn ̈ eticˈa chˈaben tzet chiwaltiˈan , cat yanayto yul yanma yin ̈ Inmaman chejn ̈ eintijan , chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Hac tuˈ xin mach chicawxico ismul yiban ̈ , caw wiyom yel yul iskˈab naj camical , cat ischahnicano iskˈinal yin ̈ huneln ̈ e .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Wal hanin Iscˈahol Comam Dios wetiˈan , caw chiwalcanojan teyet tato chihul istiempohal , haˈ ton tinan ̈ yet chaben anma camom wawihan ; haˈ mac chiaben tzet chiwaltiˈan xin chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Wal Inmaman , haˈticˈa ikˈn ̈ e iskˈinal , haquinpaxtuˈan win ̈ an ayco inkˈinalan yu Inmaman . Hacaˈ chu yakˈni Inmaman iskˈinal anma , hac tuˈ chu wakˈnipaxojan .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Chakˈnipaxo Inmaman wipan yul inkˈaban wilnihan yin ̈ tzet chielico anma , ta cˈul maca txˈoj tzet chiswatxˈe . Ay huneˈ wiptiˈan yuto Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Inmaman .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Caw mach cheyakˈ cˈayo hecˈul yin ̈ huntekˈan tzet chiwalcanojan teyet tiˈ . Wal xin caw chiapni istiempohal yet chaben sunil anma camomxa yul innukˈan , cat xin yitzitzbican ̈ .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Macn ̈ eticˈa cˈul tzet iswatxˈe yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chiitzitzbican ̈ cat ischahni huneˈ iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , walpaxo anma caw istxˈojaln ̈ eticˈa hulicˈo iswatxˈe yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , chiitzitzbican ̈ cat xin ischahni isyaˈtajil , ẍicano Comam Jesús .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel : ― Wal hanintiˈan , caw machi hunu tiˈ chinwatxˈehan yul wetan inchuquilan . Hacaˈ halbil wetan yu Inmaman hac tuˈ chu wilnihan yin ̈ tzet chielico anma , yajaˈ chiwilan yin ̈ tzet chielico yin ̈ caw istoholal . Yuxin haˈ tzet chal iscˈul Inmaman an ̈ eintijan , haˈ chinwatxˈehan , maẍtaj tzet chiwochehan .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Tato han ‑ caw ‑ inan chinocan tzotelo yin ̈ sunil tzet chinwatxˈehan , caw matzet chalilo chal tuˈ .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Yajaˈ ay huneˈ mac caw chakˈ isba istzotel win ̈ an , caw xin wohtajan ta sunil tzet chala caw yeli .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Yet hechejnito hechejab tet naj Juan hekˈambeno tzet caw yelapno ye naj , caw isyelal yal naj teyet .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Yaj maẍtaj yu wikˈni wipan yin ̈ tzet chal anma yuxin chiwalan huneˈ tiˈ teyet , machoj , walxinto yu hecolchahi .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Naj Juan tuˈ , caw lahan naj hacaˈ hunu cantil ayco kˈaˈ yin ̈ , nahat chimujli iskˈakˈal . Caw hac tuˈ yu yulicˈo naj , yuxinticˈa quextzalacan ̈ yu naj hanicˈ tiempohal .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Yajaˈ ay huneˈ tzet caw ecˈbal yelapno ye sata tzet yal naj Juan tuˈ win ̈ an , sunilej cˈaybalcˈule yakˈ Inmaman inwatxˈehan , haˈ chitzotel win ̈ an . Haˈ xin chiyeniloj tato haˈ Inmaman quinanitijan .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Haˈ Inmaman an ̈ eintijan haˈ chitzotel win ̈ an , walex hex tiˈ caw maẍto bay cheyabe istzoteli , caw maẍto chetxumilo mac caw Inmaman .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Caw maẍto Istzotiˈ Inmamtuˈan yul heyanma , yuto mach cheyayto yul heyanma win ̈ an , wal xin haˈ Comam Dios an ̈ eintijan .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Hex tiˈ caw cheyil hecuyni Istzotiˈ Comam Dios , yuto chˈecˈ yin ̈ henabal ta yin ̈ tuˈ chiilchalo hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Yajaˈ waxan ̈ ca Istzotiˈ Comam Dios tuˈ chitzotel win ̈ an , yajaˈ mach chisje hecˈul chexoc tzujno wintajan yun ̈ e hechahni hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal chiwakˈtiˈan .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Maẍtaj yu yalaxico inmayan yu anma yuxin chiwalan huntekˈan tzotiˈ tiˈ .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Wal hacaˈ quexwilnitiˈan , caw mach cheyoche Comam Dios .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Hanintiˈan caw chejbilintijan yu Inmaman , yaj caw mach cheyabe tzet chiwalan . Wal tato hunuxa naj comon anma chihul yeb yet , wal tuˈ caw sakˈal heyijen sunil tzet chal naj .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: ¿ Tzetticˈa chu heyanayto yul heyanma tato hemay cheyaco hununex , wal helanil chitit tet Comam Dios , caw mach chicam hecˈul hesayniloj ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Tajca cheyala tato hanintiˈan chinocan akˈocˈule yin ̈ hemul tet Inmaman , walxinto haˈ caw naj Moisés chioc akˈocˈule teyin ̈ , naj bay chicawxi hecˈul .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Wal xin tato cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu naj Moisés , chimheyapaxayto yul heyanma win ̈ an , yuto win ̈ an chitzotel huntekˈan tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu naj .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Yajaˈ tato mach cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano win ̈ an yu naj tuˈ , tzicˈanab chiyu heyanayto yul heyanma yin ̈ sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isto Comam Jesús iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ lago Galilea , chiyijpaxo Tiberias .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam , yuto yil anma tuˈ iswatxˈen Comam cˈaybalcˈule yet iscawxi anma yaˈay yu Comam .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Isto Comam Jesús iswiˈ huneˈ won ̈ an yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj , yay tzˈon ̈ no Comam yeb ebnaj bey tuˈ .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Toxa xin chiichico kˈin ̈ Pascua , iskˈin ̈ ebnaj Israel .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Yet yilni Comam xin ta caw hantan ̈ e anma apni iscˈatan ̈ , yalni Comam tet naj Felipe : ― ¿ Baytuˈwal chicolokˈ tzet chislo sunil anma tiˈ ? ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Yal Comam huneˈ tiˈ yun ̈ e yaben Comam tzet chiyute yalni naj Felipe . Wal Comam xin , caw yohtaxa tzet chiyu yakˈni waˈo sunil anma tuˈ .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Istakˈwi naj : ― Waxan ̈ ca ay cabo ciento denario comelyu chilokˈni tzet chilolaxi , caw maẍticˈam chabe yikˈni anma hunta txˈinano yet , ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj chicuywi yinta Comam tuˈ , yuẍta isba yeb naj Simón Pedro , Andrés isbi . Haˈ naj halni :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: ― Ay huneˈ naj nichˈan coxol tiˈ , ay cacˈon ̈ noˈ cay ikˈbil yu naj yeb xin howeb ixim pan cebada , yajaˈ ¿ tzet chakˈ hanicˈ tiˈ yin ̈ sunil anma ? ẍi naj tet Comam .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tuˈ : ― Halwe tet sunil anma ayojab tzˈon ̈ noj , ẍi Comam . Caw xin chekˈanla sat txˈotxˈ bey tuˈ , yuxin hacn ̈ e tuˈ yu yay tzˈon ̈ no anma sunil . Aymi howebo mil isbisil ebnaj winaj .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Yinican ̈ Comam ixim pan tuˈ . Yet lahwi yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal yin ̈ ixim tet Comam Dios , yitxkˈanto Comam ixim yin ̈ anma tzˈon ̈ an tuˈ . Hacticˈapax tuˈ yute Comam yin ̈ noˈ cay , yakˈ Comam hantaticˈa caw choche anma .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Hayet lahwi isnohcano iscˈul anma tuˈ xin , yalni Comam tet ebnaj chicuywi yintaj : ― Cutxbaweyo sunil ixim matxa malahwi yu anma tiˈ , haxinwal machi ixim chietaxtoj , ẍi Comam .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu iscutxbanico ebnaj ixim , caw xin cablahon ̈ ebto motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma tuˈ yin ̈ ixim howeb pan cebada .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Yet yilni anma huneˈ cˈaybalcˈule iswatxˈe Comam Jesús tuˈ , yalni anma hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , haˈ huneˈ naj tiˈ ischejab Comam Dios halbilcanoj tato chihul coxol bey yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi anma .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Isnanilo Comam Jesús tato chˈecˈ yin ̈ isnabal anma yinito Comam cat yanico anma Comam yahawiloj , yuxinto el Comam xol anma , isto Comam iswiˈ won ̈ an ischuquil .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Yet yay numnahi yapni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús istiˈ haˈ lago .

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yocto ebnaj yul huneˈ teˈ barco yun ̈ e yecˈ apno ebnaj iskˈaxepxacˈto haˈ lago cat yapni ebnaj yul con ̈ ob Capernaum . Caw xaay numnahi , maẍtoticˈa xin chiapni Comam iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Yet bel chu isbarco ebnaj yiban ̈ haˈ tuˈ , istzabnico yecˈ huneˈ niman jakˈekˈ . Caw nahat chiˈah haˈ isbilen jakˈekˈ .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Ayxam xin yictajo iscab legua chito isbarco ebnaj yiban ̈ haˈ lago tuˈ , yilni ebnaj Comam Jesús belwo chu yiban ̈ haˈ . Lan ̈ an xin ishitzico Comam iscˈatan ̈ teˈ barco bay ayicto ebnaj tuˈ , isxiwcan ̈ ebnaj .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Haninan , mach chexxiwcan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Yuxinto caw tzalacan ̈ ebnaj ischahnicto ebnaj Comam yul barco tuˈ iscˈatan ̈ . Hunepixto xin , yapni ebnaj iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ bay nabilto yu yapni .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Haxa yin ̈ hunxa tzˈayic xin , yet aytocˈo anma sunil istiˈ haˈ lago tuˈ , isnaniti anma tato xato ebnaj iscuywom Comam yul huneˈ teˈ barco ayayo bey tuˈ , han ̈ e xin teˈ ayayoj . Isnanipaxti anma ta machi to Comam yinta ebnaj .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan teˈ barco ispeto yul con ̈ ob Tiberias apni iscawilal bay iswah anma ixim pan yet yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal yin ̈ ixim tet Comam Dios .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Yet yilni anma tato matxa Comam Jesús bey tuˈ yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj , yocto anma yul huntekˈan teˈ barco apni bey tuˈ , isto anma saywal yin ̈ Comam kˈaxepxacˈto haˈ bey yul con ̈ ob Capernaum .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Yet yecˈ apno anma iskˈaxepicˈto haˈ lago tuˈ yilcha Comam yu anma . Iskˈamben anma tuˈ tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , ¿ hanicˈ hawul bey tiˈ ? ẍi anma tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet anma : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , walex hex tiˈ , chinhesayilojan yuto caw noh hecˈul yu ixim pan wakˈan hewab . Maẍtaj yu matxumchalo heyu yin ̈ tzet chal yelapno ye huneˈ cˈaybalcˈule inwatxˈetuˈan , ẍi Comam .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Maẍn ̈ etaj tzet chelo cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul hesayniloj yuto huneˈ tuˈ chilahwi . Wal xin ay huneˈxa hacaˈ tzet chicolo mach chitan ̈ iloj , haˈ huneˈ tuˈ chiakˈni hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Haˈ huneˈ tuˈ wal heyanico yin ̈ heyanma hesayniloj . Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Inmaman , haninan chiwakˈan huneˈ itah , haˈ ton kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal , yuto xaisyelo Comam Dios tato haninan sicˈbilintijan yu , ẍi Comam Jesús tet anma .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Iskˈamben anma tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet xin wal juten cobahan ̈ yun ̈ e cowatxˈenan ̈ sunil tzet choche iscˈul Comam Dios ? ẍi anma .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Haˈ huneˈ chiyoche Comam Dios to cheyayto yul heyanma win ̈ an , yuto haˈ Comam chejn ̈ eintijan , ẍi Comam .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Yalnipaxo anma tet Comam : ― ¿ Tzet xin hunu cˈaybalcˈulehal chaye jilaˈan ̈ , yun ̈ e cachcochahnihan ̈ yul janmahan ̈ ? ¿ Tzet hunu chawatxˈe ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Ebnaj jichmaman ̈ yet payat , ay huneˈ cˈaybalcˈule ilbil yu ebnaj yet isloni ebnaj maná bey txˈotxˈ desierto . Hacaˈ yalni Istzotiˈ Comam Dios bay chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yati Comam Dios huneˈ itah satcan ̈ islob sunil anma , ” ẍiayoj , ẍi anma tet Comam .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Yalni Comam tet anma : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , maẍtaj naj Moisés akˈn ̈ e huneˈ itah satcan ̈ il tuˈ tet ebnaj jichmam yet payat tiempo tuˈ . Wal xin itah tit yul satcan ̈ tuˈ yechel yin ̈ huneˈ wah caw yeli chakˈ Inmaman teyet .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Huneˈ wah chakˈ Comam tiˈ , yul satcan ̈ titnaj , haˈ xin chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal tet anma , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Yalni anma tet Comam : ― Mamin , akˈ huneˈ wah tuˈ jetan ̈ yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi anma .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Yalni Comam tet anma : ― Hanintonan huneˈ wah tuˈ , yuto chiwakˈan kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal . Macn ̈ eticˈa chaco isba yul inkˈaban , matxa bakˈinal chin ̈ ohchahi , yeb xin macn ̈ eticˈa chianayto yul yanma win ̈ an , matxa bakˈinal chitajpaxo istiˈ .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Caw xaticˈa walan teyet , waxan ̈ ca caw cheyilico win ̈ an , yajaˈ caw mach cheyaco heba yul inkˈaban .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Wal xin , sunil mac chahti Inmaman wetan , chul yul inkˈaban , yuxin mac chihul yul inkˈabtuˈan caw chinchahan , mach chinman ̈ cˈotojan .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , quintitan yul satcan ̈ , yaj maẍtaj yu inwatxˈenan tzet chal incˈulan , wal xin titnajinan yun ̈ e inwatxˈenan tzet chal iscˈul Inmaman chejn ̈ eintijan .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Haˈ tzet choche iscˈul Comam chejn ̈ eintijan yin ̈ sunil macta chiyaco yul inkˈaban , ta machi hunu mac chicˈayto wuhan , to chiwakˈ itzitzbocan ̈ an yet chiapni islahobal tzˈayic .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Haˈ choche iscˈul Inmaman , to haˈ mac chinilnihan ta haninan Iscˈahol Dios wehan , cat yanayto yul yanma win ̈ an , chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Haxa yet chiapni islahobal tzˈayic , cat wakˈni itzitzbocan ̈ an xol camom , ẍi Comam .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj Israel yin ̈ tzet chal Comam tuˈ , yoc ebnaj buchwal yin ̈ Comam yuto yal Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hanintiˈan huneˈ wah titna yul satcan ̈ , ” ẍi Comam .
