text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Yalni ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tom maẍtaj naj tiˈ naj Jesús , iscˈahol naj José ? Caw johta mac ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj . ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chal naj tato yul satcan ̈ titna naj ? ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Bejwe hetzotel win ̈ an .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Caw machi hunu mac chihul yul inkˈaban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan , Comam an ̈ eintijan . Haninan xin chiwakˈ itzitzbocan ̈ an yet islahobal tzˈayic .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Sunil mac chicuylax yu Comam Dios , ” ẍiayoj . Yuxin sunil mac chiaben tzet chal Comam Dios tuˈ , chitxumchalo yu yin ̈ tzet chala , haˈ xin chihul yul inkˈaban .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Caw maẍto hunu mac iln ̈ e yin ̈ Comam Dios Mame hachcachann ̈ e inan , yuto yul satcan ̈ titnajinan , yuxinto caw wohtajan Comam .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , macn ̈ eticˈa chinchahnihan yul yanma , caw chischah huneˈ iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Hanintiˈan haˈ ton huneˈ wah chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Haˈ ebnaj heyichmam yet payat tuˈ , iswah ebnaj huntekˈan maná bey txˈotxˈ desierto , yaj xin sunil ebnaj xa ‑ le ‑ camtoj .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Yajaˈ mac chiwahni huneˈ wah titna yul satcan ̈ , chiwaltiˈan xin , machi bakˈinal chicami .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Hanintonan huneˈ wah itzitz titna yul satcan ̈ , yuxin macn ̈ eticˈa chiwahni huneˈ wah tiˈ , caw itzitzn ̈ eticˈa yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . Haˈ huneˈ wah chiwakˈtiˈan , haˈ ton innimanilan chiwakˈan yun ̈ e ischahni anma iskˈinal , ẍi Comam Jesús tet anma .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Hayet yaben anma Israel huntekˈan tiˈ , istzabnico anma isteyelen isba yin ̈ tzet yal Comam . Le ‑ yalni anma hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tzet chu yakˈni naj tiˈ isnimanil cocˈuxuˈ ? ẍi anma tet hunun .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Yalni Comam xin : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , hacaˈ tato mach checˈux innimaniltiˈan , Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , yeb xin hacaˈ ta mach cheyucˈ inchiqˈuilan , mach chechah hekˈinal mach istan ̈ bal .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Yuxin macn ̈ eticˈa chicˈuxni innimaniltiˈan , cat yucˈni inchiqˈuiltiˈan , caw chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Hayet islahobal tzˈayic xin chiwakˈ itzitzbocan ̈ an xol anma camom .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Yuto innimaniltiˈan lahan hacaˈ wah , haˈ chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal , hacpax tuˈ xin inchiqˈuilan hacaˈ tzet chiucˈlaxi .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Macn ̈ eticˈa chicˈuxni innimanilan cat xin yucˈni inchiqˈuilan , caw hunxan ̈ e chiwucanojan yebi .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Comam Dios caw itzitz yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , haˈ Comam tuˈ quinchejnitijan , yuxin itzitz inn ̈ eticˈapaxojan . Hac ton tuˈ xin , mac chicˈuxni innimaniltiˈan , caw itzitzn ̈ eticˈapaxo wuhan .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Hanintonan , huneˈ wah titna yul satcan ̈ , yaj mach hacaˈo maná islo ebnaj jichmam , yuto waxan ̈ ca islo ebnaj huntekˈan maná tuˈ , yaj cam ebnaj . Wal mac chiwahni huneˈ wah chiwaltiˈan xin , caw ay iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , ẍi Comam .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan tiˈ yakˈ Comam Jesús iscuyuˈ anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel bey yul con ̈ ob Capernaum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Yet yaben anma chicuywi yinta Comam Jesús huntekˈan cuybanile yakˈ Comam tuˈ , txˈiˈal ebnaj halni tet hunun : ― Caw yaˈta cochahni huntekˈan chal naj tiˈ . ¿ Mactaxca chikˈoji isyijeni ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Wal Comam xin , caw yohtaxa tzettaj chal ebnaj tuˈ , yuxin yal Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tom caw chicabconcan ̈ hecˈul yin ̈ tzet chiwaltiˈan ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Wal Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios tiˈ , tato cheyil inmeltzohan yul satcan ̈ bay titnajinan , ¿ tzixam chi ‑ la ‑ heyalaˈ ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Haˈ Yespíritu Comam Dios haˈ chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal , wal conimanil matzet chakˈa . Huntekˈan cuybanile xawalan teyet tuˈ , yin ̈ caw yeli yet Espíritu yehi , haˈ chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Yajaˈ ayexto hex tiˈ , maẍto cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet chiwaltiˈan , ẍi Comam . Yal Comam hacaˈ tuˈ yuto caw yohtaxa Comam yet caw yalan ̈ tocanoj macta mach chianayto yul yanma yin ̈ tzet chal Comam . Caw xin yohtaxapaxo Comam mac chianico yul iskˈab ebnaj ayco ishowal yin ̈ .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Caw chiwalan teyet tato caw machi hunu mac chaco isba yul inkˈaban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan , ẍi Comam .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Yet yaben anma tzet yal Comam tuˈ xin , txˈiˈal anma bejnicano yecˈ yinta Comam .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Yuxinto iskˈambe Comam tet ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ iscuywom : ― Haxa hex tiˈ , ¿ chimheyoche chextopaxoj ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Istakˈwi naj Simón Pedro , tet Comam : ― Mamin , maccˈanab yinta chon ̈ oc tzujnojan ̈ , yuto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e hatzotiˈ chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ , caw xajaytojan ̈ yul janmahan ̈ tawin ̈ . Caw xin johtajan ̈ tato ach tiˈ Cristo hach , Iscˈahol Comam Dios caw itzitz , ẍi naj Pedro tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Wal xin quexinsayilojan hecablahon ̈ wan ̈ il , yaj ay huneˈ hex tiˈ ayayto naj matzwalil yul yanma , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Yet yalni Comam hacaˈ tuˈ , yin ̈ naj Judas , iscˈahol naj Simón Iscariote yal Comam . Yuto waxan ̈ ca ayco naj yetbiho ebnaj cablahon ̈ wan ̈ , yaj xin haˈ naj anico Comam yul iskˈab camical .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , istzabnico Comam Jesús yecˈ yul ismajul Galilea . Matxa isje iscˈul Comam ehoyo yul ismajul Judea yuto caw chiyoche ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj Israel yakˈaˈ camo Comam .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Toxa xin chiichico huneˈ kˈin ̈ Poy telaj isbi , huneˈ iskˈin ̈ anma Israel ,

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: yalni ebnaj yuẍta Comam tuˈ tet : ― Mach chaẍcan bey tiˈ , wal xin asiˈ bey Judea bay caw ay anma chicuywi tawintaj , haxinwal chil anma cˈaybalcˈule chi ‑ la ‑ hawatxˈe tiˈ .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Yuto ta ay hunu mac choche chiohtan ̈ elaxi mach chiswatxˈe hunu tzet ye tuˈ bay ewan , yuxin yilal hayeni sunil cˈaybalcˈule chi ‑ la ‑ hawatxˈe tiˈ yin ̈ sat anma , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Hac tuˈ yute yalni ebnaj yuto mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Maẍto chiapni istzˈayical inyenilo inbahan tet anma , wal hex tiˈ , tzijxan ̈ e tzˈayical cˈul heyenilo heba .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ mach chexisyaha , walinan xin caw caj chinillaxan , yuto chiwalan tato caw machiswalil sunil tzet chiswatxˈe anma .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Asiˈwe hex tiˈ yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ , walinan mach chintohan , yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal inyenilo inbahan tet anma , ẍi Comam .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Yet lahwi yalni Comam huntekˈan tiˈ tet ebnaj xin , iscancano Comam bey Galilea .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Yet xato ebnaj yuẍta Comam Jesús tuˈ yin ̈ kˈin ̈ istopaxo Comam , yaj yin ̈ ewantajil .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Caw xin chissayicˈo ebnaj iswiˈehal ebnaj Israel tuˈ Comam Jesús yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ , chalni ebnaj : ― ¿ Baytaxca tuˈ ay huneˈ naj winaj tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Caw xin nanantaxan ̈ e chal anma yin ̈ Comam , ay anma chalni : “ Caw cˈulcano huneˈ naj tuˈ , ” ẍi . Aypaxo anma chihalni : “ Caw machiswalil huneˈ naj tuˈ , caw ton ̈ e chiyakˈ subchaho naj anma , ” ẍipaxoj .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Yajaˈ xin caw ewanta chitzotel anma tuˈ yuto caw chixiw anma tet ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ anma Israel .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Hayet caw niman kˈin ̈ tuˈ , yocto Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios , istzabnico Comam iscuyni anma .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Caw xin chicˈay iscˈul ebnaj Israel tuˈ yaben tzet chal Comam . Chi ‑ la ‑ yalni ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Tzet chute huneˈ naj tiˈ yohtan ̈ enilo sunil huntekˈan tiˈ ? Yaj mach cuywina naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ Comam tet ebnaj : ― Haˈ cuybanile chiwalan teyet tiˈ mach wetojan inchuquilan , yet Comam chejn ̈ eintijan .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Tato ay mac chiyoche chisyije tzet chal Comam Dios , caw yilal istxumniloj tato yet Comam ye cuybanile tiˈ . Yohtapaxoj ta maẍtaj yul inwiˈan inchuquilan chiwitijan cat xin walnihan teyet .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Macn ̈ eticˈa yul iswiˈ chiyiti tzet chiyakˈ iscuyuˈ anma , chiyute huneˈ tuˈ yun ̈ e yoc iswinajil sata anma . Wal hanin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , haˈ yalaxico ismay Comam yu anma haˈ chinsayan , yuxin caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan , caw machi lekˈtiˈal yin ̈ .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Caw akˈbil isley Comam Dios teyet yu naj Moisés , yajaˈ machi hunujex cheyije tzet chal huneˈ ley tuˈ . ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chinhepotxˈan heyalni ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj xin , yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Etzan ̈ em ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ayco tawin ̈ . ¿ Mac chachakˈni camo hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yu huneˈ cˈaybalcˈule inwatxˈehan yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayical xewilal caw hesunil chicˈayilo hecˈul yin ̈ .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Hatax ebnaj heyichmam ichencanocan ̈ huneˈ circuncisión , haˈ xin naj Moisés chihalni tato caw yilal isyijelaxi . Yuxinto waxan ̈ ca yin ̈ istzˈayical xewilal , cheyakˈ circuncidar niẍte unin winaj semanahil ixto ispitzcˈahi .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , istzˈayicalojab xewilal masan cheyakˈ circuncidar niẍte unin yun ̈ e mach cheman ̈ cˈo isley naj Moisés heyalni . Tato caw hac tuˈ cheyute , ¿ tzet yin ̈ yuxinto caw chichiwa hecˈul win ̈ an yuto yet istzˈayical xewilal wakˈni cawxojan huneˈ naj ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Mach ton ̈ eho chexoc heyilaˈ yin ̈ tzet chiswatxˈe anma . Tato cheyoche chexoc heyilaˈ tzet yehi , ilwe yin ̈ caw istoholal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj ah Jerusalén halni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Machmi taj naj tiˈ chal ebnaj ispotxˈoˈ ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Caw yin ̈ sat anma lan ̈ an istzotel naj lah , yaj machi hunu mac chicachni naj istzoteli . ¿ Mato xayayto ebnaj jahawil tiˈ yul yanma tato haˈ naj tiˈ Cristo ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Yet chul Comam Cristo tuˈ , machi hunu mac ohtan ̈ e baytuˈwal chi ‑ caw ‑ istiticoj . Wal naj tiˈ xin caw johtaj baytuˈwal titnaco naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Yet yaben Comam yalni ebnaj hacaˈ tuˈ , haˈ ton yet lan ̈ an iscuywa Comam yul yatut Comam Dios , yalni Comam yin ̈ caw ip : ― Caw quinheyohtajan heyalni , yeb xin heyohtaj baytuˈwal titnaj inpaxojan . Yajaˈ caw maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan , wal xin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , Comam caw isyelaln ̈ eticˈa chala , yaj mach heyohtajo Comam .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Wal intiˈan caw wohtajan Comam tuˈ , yuto yin ̈ Comam titnajinan , haˈ quinanitijan , ẍi Comam .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an yalni Comam huneˈ tuˈ xin , ay huntekˈan ebnaj yoche inoto Comam yul teˈ , yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam , yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal bay chicami .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ e mac chanayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam , chi ‑ la ‑ yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yet chihul Comam Cristo tuˈ , ¿ tom caw ecˈbalto cˈaybalcˈule chisye sata sunil tzet chisye naj tiˈ jet ? ẍi anma yin ̈ Comam .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tzet yal anma yin ̈ Comam Jesús tuˈ , iscutxbanayo isba ebnaj yeb xin ebnaj yahawil sacerdote , ischejnito ebnaj ebnaj mayor chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios yu istzabnayo ebnaj Comam , cat yanicto Comam yul preso .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Yalni Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Hanicˈxan ̈ echˈan tiempohal ayinicˈojan texol , cat xin inpaxtojan iscˈatan ̈ Comam chejn ̈ eintijan .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Hex tiˈ chexoc saywal win ̈ an , yaj matxa chinilchahan heyu , yuto mach chu heyapni bay chinapnituˈan , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Yichico ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel tuˈ iskˈamben tet hunun hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Baytaxca tuˈ chito naj tiˈ , yuxin chal naj tato matxa chiilcha naj ju ? Ay ebnaj jet con ̈ ob pujanto xol ebnaj griego , ¿ ham tuˈ chito naj cuywal xol ebnaj , cat yoc naj iscuyno ebnaj griego tuˈ yalni ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: ¿ Tzet caw chalilo huneˈ chal naj tiˈ : “ Chinhesayaˈan , yaj matxa chinilchahojan heyu , yuxinto mach chiyu heyapni bay chinapnituˈan ? ” ẍi naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Haˈ islahobal tzˈayic kˈin ̈ tuˈ , haˈ caw ay yelapno ye yul sat anma Israel . Yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ xin , ah lin ̈ no Comam Jesús , yalni Comam yin ̈ caw ip hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Maquex chitaj hetiˈ titan ̈ we incˈatan ̈ an , cat heyucˈni huneˈ ha haˈ chiwakˈan .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Hacaˈ yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : “ Haˈ mac chianayto yul yanma win ̈ an , hacaˈ chiyu ispitzcˈa isnukˈ ha haˈ chiel yojomal , hac tuˈ chiyu ispitzcˈa isnukˈ haˈ yet kˈinale yul yanma , ” ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Yal Comam Jesús huneˈ tiˈ yin ̈ Comam Espíritu Santo chischah macta chianayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam . Yet huneˈ tiempohal tuˈ xin , maẍto chiayilo Comam Espíritu Santo isyayil maẍto chiilaxto Comam yul satcan ̈ .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Yet yaben anma cutxanico tuˈ yin ̈ tzet yal Comam Jesús , ay anma halni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli , haˈ naj tiˈ ischejab Comam Dios halbilcanoj ta chuli , ẍi .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Aypaxo mac halni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Haˈ ton naj tiˈ Cristo , echmabil yul ju , ẍi . Aypaxo huneˈxa majan anma halni : ― Naj Cristo tuˈ , ¿ tom Galilea chitit naj heyalni ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato haˈ bey yul con ̈ ob Belén , yul iscon ̈ ob naj rey David chipitzcˈa naj Cristo tuˈ , yuto yuninal yuninal naj rey David ye naj , ẍi hunmajanxa anma .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu ispohnito isba anma yu Comam .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Aypaxo ebnaj xin etza inito Comam yul preso , yaj machi hunu mac yaco iskˈab yin ̈ Comam .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Haxa yet ismeltzo ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios iscˈatan ̈ ebnaj fariseo , iskˈamben ebnaj tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto machi maxeyiti naj Jesús tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Yalni ebnaj chitan ̈ en yatut Comam Dios tuˈ hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Caw machi hunu mac caw helan istzotel hacaˈ istzotel naj , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Yalni xin ebnaj fariseo tuˈ tet ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom haˈ hunex cheyakˈ subchaho heba tet huneˈ naj tuˈ ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: ¿ Tom ay hunu ebnaj yahawil chianayto yul yanma yin ̈ tzet chal naj , maca hunujon ̈ an ̈ han ̈ on ̈ fariseo on ̈ tiˈan ̈ ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Han ̈ cˈan ̈ e huntekˈan anma caw mach yohtajo isley naj Moisés , haˈ chisubcha yu naj , yajaˈ xin chiay isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ huntekˈan anma tuˈ yu Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj fariseo Nicodemo isbi , naj beycˈo tzotelo tet Comam yin ̈ huneˈ akˈbalil , haˈ naj xin halni tet ebnaj yetbi tuˈ :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: ― Haˈ chiyute yalni coley tato mach chu iscawxico ismul hunu naj yiban ̈ yalan ̈ to maẍto chijabe tzet chal naj , yun ̈ e johtan ̈ eniloj tzet iswatxˈe naj , ẍi naj Nicodemo tuˈ .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Yuxinto yal ebnaj yetbi naj tuˈ tet : ― ¿ Tom ah Galilea hachpaxoj ? Wal xin say yul Istzotiˈ Comam Dios cat hawilni tato ay hunu ischejab Comam Dios chitit bey Galilea tuˈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , ispaxto ebnaj yatut .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Wal Comam Jesús xin to Comam bey huneˈ won ̈ an , Olivo isbi .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈxa tzˈayical xin , yapni Comam hunelxa yul yatut Comam Dios yin ̈ caw sahab sacˈayal . Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma apni iscˈatan ̈ Comam . Lahwi tuˈ xin , yay tzˈon ̈ no Comam istzabnico iscuyni anma tuˈ .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Hunepixto xin yiniti ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés huneˈ ix ix tet Comam . Caw cˈuxan ischahlo ix yin ̈ ismul yu ebnaj . Yalaxico ix xol anma cutxanico iscˈatan ̈ Comam tuˈ .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Mam cuywawom , machahlo huneˈ ix tiˈ juhan ̈ iscˈatan ̈ iswinaj .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Wal xin , chal isley naj Moisés tato ebix ix txˈoj ye iswiˈ hacaˈ huneˈ ix tiˈ , yilal iskˈojlax camo ebix , yajaˈ ¿ tzimi chawute hawalnipaxo hach tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Yal ebnaj hacaˈ tuˈ yun ̈ e yilwen ebnaj Comam , yeb yun ̈ e yaycˈay Comam yin ̈ hunu istxˈojal , cat xin yoc ebnaj akˈocˈule yin ̈ Comam , chute yalni .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Yaj xin ton ̈ e ay cˈon ̈ no Comam , istzabnico istzˈibli sat txˈotxˈ yu yiximal iskˈab . Ayn ̈ eticˈaco xin ebnaj iskˈamben tet Comam tzet caw chielcanico ix , yuxinto ah tˈan ̈ no Comam , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Macn ̈ eticˈa caw machi nichˈano ismul texol , haˈojab babel chˈakˈni chˈen kˈojbal yin ̈ ix , ẍi Comam .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yaypaxo cˈon ̈ no Comam , istzabnico istzˈibli sat txˈotxˈ hunelxa .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Yet yaben ebnaj tzet yal Comam tuˈ , istxumni isba yanma ebnaj ta machi hunu ebnaj cˈul , yuxin hununtajil yu yel ebnaj iscˈatan ̈ Comam . Babel el ebnaj ecˈna ichamtaxa , lahwi tuˈ istopaxo ebnaj tzehtaj . Hac tuˈ yu iscancano Comam ischuquil yeb ix tuˈ .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yah lin ̈ no Comam , iskˈamben Comam tet ix : ― Ix , ¿ baytuˈwal ay ebnaj chiakˈwi cˈule tawin ̈ ? ¿ Tom caw machi hunu ebnaj macachkˈojnican ̈ yu chˈen chˈen ? ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: ― Macho Mamin , machi hunu maca , ẍi ix tet Comam . ― Haquinpaxtuˈan , mach chiwalan ta chaẍkˈojlax camo yu hamul . Asiˈ xin , matxa chawaco hamul hunelxa , ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet anma hunelxa : ― Wal hanintiˈan , caw hacaˈ issajilkˈinal wehayojan xol anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Macn ̈ eticˈa chˈoc tzujno wintajan chiwakˈan issajilkˈinal yul yanma . Yu huneˈ issajilkˈinal tiˈ xin , chischah iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Matxa xin chiecˈ xol kˈejholo , ẍi Comam .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Yalni ebnaj fariseo xin : ― Caw matzet chalilo tzet chawal tiˈ , yuto hach tiˈ , hach caw chachtzotel tawin ̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam : ― Waxan ̈ ca caw han ‑ caw ‑ inan chiwalan yin ̈ tzet wehan , yaj caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalan . Yuto hanintiˈan wohtajan baytuˈwal titnajinan , caw wohtapaxojan baytuˈwal chi ‑ caw ‑ intocojan . Walex hex tiˈ , caw mach heyohtajo baytuˈwal titnajinan , yeb baytuˈwal chintopaxojan .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , caw comonn ̈ eticˈa chexoc heyilaˈ tzet ye anma , yaj walinan mach ton ̈ eticˈaho chinocan wilaˈan tzet chielico anma .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Yajaˈ yet chiwilnihan yin ̈ tzet chielico anma , chiwilan yin ̈ caw istoholal , yuto mach inchuquilojan chiwilan tzet chielico anma , to haˈ hun Inmaman an ̈ eintijan , haˈ chiilni tzet chielico anma wintajan .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Chal hecuybanil tato ay cawan ̈ o testigo lahan yalni yin ̈ hunu tzet ye tuˈ , caw yel huneˈ tuˈ chal tuˈ .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ilwecˈanab xin , ay cawan ̈ mac chakˈ testigohal . Caw testigo wehicojan win ̈ an , yeb xin Inmaman an ̈ eintijan haˈ chitzotel win ̈ an , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin iskˈamben ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Baytuˈwal ay hamam tuˈ xin ? ẍi ebnaj . Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Hex tiˈ , mach quinheyohtajojan , caw xin mach heyohtajo Inmamtuˈan . Kˈinalo tato quinheyohtajan , heyohtapaxo Inmaman , ẍi Comam .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Hayet iscuywa Comam Jesús yul yatut Comam Dios yalnicano Comam huntekˈan tiˈ , iscawilal bay chibey anma yakˈaˈcano yofrenda . Yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam , yuto maẍto chiapni istzˈayical bay chicami .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús hunelxa : ― Hanintiˈan chintohan , wal xin chinhesayaˈcojan yajaˈ mach chinilchahan heyu , yuto mach chu heto bay chintotuˈan . Walex hex tiˈ yin ̈ hemul chexcamcantoj , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yuxin yal ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel : ― ¿ Tom xin chispotxˈ isba naj , yuxinto chal naj tato caw mach chu japni bay chiapni naj tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : ― Walex hex tiˈ , caw yet sat txˈotxˈal heyehi , wal intiˈan yet satcan ̈ wehan , caw yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ heyehi , wal inpaxojan mach yeto sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ wehan .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Yuxinto caw chiwalan teyet tato yin ̈ hemul chexcami , yuto mach chechayto yul heyanma tato haninan huneˈ hacaˈ chiwute walnihan teyet , yuxinto caw yin ̈ hemul chexcamtoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Iskˈambenpaxo ebnaj tet Comam : ― ¿ Mac hach anmahil chal tuˈ ? ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Halbilxaticˈa teyet wuhan yet yalan ̈ tocanoj mac anmahilinan .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Caw hantan ̈ e tzet chiwalan teyin ̈ yet chiwilnihan yin ̈ tzet chexelicoj . Yaj Comam an ̈ eintijan texol tiˈ , caw yin ̈ isyelal chitzoteli . Yuxinto haˈ tzet halbil wetan yu , haˈ chiwalpaxojan tet anma ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi Comam .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Yaj xin caw maẍticˈa txumchalo yu ebnaj tato haˈ Comam Dios chal Comam .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj : ― Hayet chinheyanican ̈ an yin ̈ teˈ culus , haˈ to tuˈ chitxumchalo heyu tato Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , cat xin heyohtan ̈ eniloj tato mach wetojan inchuquilan sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan . Wal xin haˈ tzet chal Inmaman wetan , haˈ chiwalan .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Haˈ Comam an ̈ eintijan , haˈ ayco wetbihojan . Caw mach chinisbejcanojan inchuquilan , yuto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e tzet choche iscˈul chinwatxˈehan yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Yet yalni Comam huntekˈan tuˈ , caw hantan ̈ e anma chahni Comam yul yanma .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet anma Israel chahni Comam yul yanma : ― Tato caw huneln ̈ e cheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ tzet chiwalan , yin ̈ caw yeli incuywoman heyehi .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu heyohtan ̈ enilo isyelal ; haˈ isyelal tuˈ xin , haˈ chexcolnicanoj , ẍi Comam .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : ― Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ jichmaman ̈ ye icham Abraham , caw machi hunelo con ̈ txon ̈ laxan ̈ tet anma . ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chawala “ chexcolchacanoj ? ” cachi , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , mac caw mach chisbejcano yanico ismul , caw txon ̈ bil isba tet mule .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Kˈinalo hunu naj txon ̈ bil chejabo tet huno yahaw tinan ̈ , mach chiyu yoc naj yetbiho yuninal naj yahawil tuˈ yin ̈ huneln ̈ e . Wal hacaˈ naj cˈahole xin , caw yetbiticˈa isba naj yeb ismam yeb ismiˈ yeb ej yuẍtaj .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Yuxin tato haninan chexincolilojan yin ̈ hemul , yin ̈ caw yeli chexcolchacanoj yuto caw Iscˈahol Dios wehan .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Caw wohtajan tato heyichmam icham Abraham , yaj caw cheyoche quinhepotxˈoˈan , yuto mach cheyoche heyabeˈ cuybanile chiwakˈtiˈan .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Haˈ tzet wilan bey Inmamtuˈan , haˈ chiwalan teyet , walex hex tiˈ caw nan hemam , yuxinto haˈ tzet chal hemam tuˈ haˈ chewatxˈe , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Istakˈwipaxo ebnaj : ― Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ , comaman ̈ jichmam Abraham , ẍi ebnaj . Istakˈwi Comam : ― Tato caw yel cheyala hemam ye icham Abraham tuˈ , ham tzet iswatxˈe icham , haˈ chewatxˈe .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Wal xin waxan ̈ ca haˈ caw isyelal halbil wetan yu Comam Dios haˈ chiwalan teyet , yaj caw cheyoche quinheyakˈaˈ camojan . Wal icham Abraham cheyal tiˈ , machi hunelo yute isba icham hacaˈ hex tiˈ .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Haˈticˈa tzet chiswatxˈe hemam , haˈ cheyupaxoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj . Yuxinto yal ebnaj : ― Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ , mach matn ̈ ebilon ̈ an ̈ , wal xin huneˈchˈan comaman ̈ , haˈ ton Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam : ― Tato yeli hemam Comam Dios tuˈ , xahanmi chinheyilan , yuto haˈ bay ay Comam Dios titnajinan yet wulan bey tiˈ , Maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan , haˈ Comam Dios chejn ̈ eintijan .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin mach chitxumchalo tzet chiwaltiˈan heyu ?

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , haˈ naj matzwalil , haˈ naj caw hemam , yuto hatzet choche iscˈul naj , haˈ caw choche hecˈul hewatxˈeˈ . Naj matzwalil tuˈ , caw potxˈom anma naj yichtaxticˈa yul naj sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Caw maẍticˈa isyelal yin ̈ naj , yuxin sunil tzet chiahti yul istiˈ naj mach yeloj . Hayet chanico naj lekˈtiˈal , haˈ tzet ye naj haˈ chal naj , yuto caw lekˈtiˈ naj ; caw ismam lekˈtiˈwom naj .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , haˈ caw isyelal chiwalan , yuxinto caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma tzet chiwaltiˈan .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: ¿ Mac hunujex tiˈ tinan ̈ chiyu heyalnico yin ̈ insatan tato ay inmulan ? Wal xin , caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwaltiˈan , yaj ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin mach cheyayto yul heyanma ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Haˈ mac yet Comam Dios yehi , caw choche yabeˈ Istzotiˈ Comam . Walex hex tiˈ xin , mach yeto Comam Dios heyehi , yuxinto mach chiyoche hecˈul heyabeˈ Istzotiˈ Comam , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Yalni ebnaj yahawil yehico yin ̈ anma Israel tuˈ tet Comam Jesús : ― Haˈ ye juhan ̈ chijalnihan ̈ ta ah Samaria hach , yeb ta ayco huneˈ ischejab naj matzwalil tawin ̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam Jesús xin : ― Machoj , machi huno ischejab naj matzwalil ayco win ̈ an , walxinto haˈ wanicojan ismay Inmaman haˈ chiwuhan , walex hex tiˈ chinhehincaniltojan .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , maẍtaj yalaxico inmayan chinsayan ; waxan ̈ ca ay huneˈ Mac chianico inmayan , haˈ huneˈ tuˈ xin chihalnoj Mac caw yel chala .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Yin ̈ caw isyela chiwalan teyet , macn ̈ eticˈa chiyijen tzet chiwaltiˈan , machi bakˈinal chicami , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Yalni ebnaj : ― Wal xin caw yel chijalan ̈ tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil tawin ̈ . Icham Abraham yebpaxo xin ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payxa , sunil ebnaj camnatoj . Wal chawute hawalnipaxo xin : “ Macn ̈ eticˈa chiyijen tzet chiwalan maẍticˈa chicamtoj , ” cachi . ¿ Tom caw ecˈbal hach to sata jichmam Abraham tuˈan ̈ yeb sunil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ecˈlena yet payat tiempo tuˈ ? ¿ Tzet yelapno hawe hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam tet ebnaj : ― Tato han ‑ caw ‑ inan chiwican ̈ inbahan , caw matzet chalilo huneˈ tuˈ , yaj wal xin haˈ caw Inmaman chianico inmayan . Haˈ Inmamtuˈan xin , haˈ cheyal heDiosaloj .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Yaj hex tiˈ , mach heyohtajo Inmamtuˈan , walinan , caw wohtajan . Yaj tato chiwalan ta mach wohtajojan Inmamtuˈan , lahanmi inlekˈtiˈalan yeb hex chal tuˈ . Wal xin caw chiwalan caw wohtajan Inmaman , yuxinto sunil tzet chal Inmaman wetan chinyijehan .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Icham heyichmam Abraham tuˈ , caw tzala iscˈul icham yet yabeni ta chinhulan . Hayet isyelax tet icham xin , caw tzalacanocan ̈ iscˈul icham sicˈlebil , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj tuˈ .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Yalnipaxo ebnaj tet Comam : ― Hach tiˈ , maẍto hach yin ̈ cincuenta habil , cat xin hawalni ta hawil icham Abraham tuˈ :

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Yalni Comam : ― Yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , yettax yalan ̈ to maẍto chipitzcˈa icham Abraham tuˈ , ay inxaticˈahan , ẍi Comam .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , yu yinican ̈ ebnaj chˈen chˈen yun ̈ e iskˈojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni . Yaj yebato isba Comam tet ebnaj , yelti Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tuˈ .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Yet yecˈ Comam Jesús yin ̈ isbel hunel , yilni Comam huneˈ naj caw maẍticˈa chu yilni yettaxticˈa ispitzcˈahi .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tuˈ : ― Mam cuywawom , ¿ tzet yin ̈ yuxin mutzˈan sat huneˈ naj tiˈ yet ispitzcˈa naj ? ¿ Tom yu ismul ismam naj mato yu ismul naj ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Yalni Comam xin : ― Maẍtaj yu ismul ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj , maẍtajpaxo yu ismul naj yuxinto hac tuˈ ye naj . Wal xin Comam Dios caw choche iscˈul chisyelo yip yin ̈ naj , yuxinto hac tuˈ ye naj .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Caw yilal inwatxˈenan ismunil Comam an ̈ eintijan yakˈ isba tzˈayical to yucˈaˈ chiah akˈbal yet matxa chu comunlahi .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Yakˈ isba ay intocˈojan yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ caw hacaˈ issajilkˈinal wehayojan xol sunil anma , ẍi Comam .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Yet lahwi istzotel Comam xin , istzublayo Comam sat txˈotxˈ , issomni Comam nichˈan tzˈotzˈew yu iskˈab , lahwi tuˈ xin ismasnico Comam yin ̈ isbakˈsat naj mutzˈan sat tuˈ .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Asiˈ bey haˈ Siloé , huneˈ haˈ etxan , cat xin hatxˈahnilo hasat , ẍi Comam tet naj . ( Siloé chiyal yelapnoj Akˈbiltij . ) Hac tuˈ xin yu isto naj bey haˈ Siloé tuˈ , istxˈahni naj sat xol haˈ . Haxa yet ispaxti naj xin , xayu yilni naj .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Yuxin haˈ anma ayayo yatut iscawilal naj yeb huntekˈanxa anma ohtan ̈ e naj , yal hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Cochan haˈ naj tiˈ chiecˈ tzˈon ̈ la kˈano melyu ? ẍi anma tuˈ yin ̈ naj .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Ay mac xin halni : ― Hoˈ , haˈ naj tiˈ , ẍi anma . Aypaxo mac halni : ― Machoj , maẍtaj naj , yaj etza hac tiˈ jilni naj , ẍipaxoj . Wal naj xin yal naj : ― Hoˈ , hanin ‑ ton ‑ an , ẍi naj .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Yoc anma iskˈambeno tet naj : ― ¿ Tzet xin mayu ishajlo hasat ? ẍi anma .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Yalni naj xin : ― Huneˈ yaˈ , Jesús isbi , haˈ yaˈ somni nichˈan tzˈotzˈew , ismasnico yaˈ yin ̈ insatan . Lahwi tuˈ xin , yalni yaˈ wetan : “ Asiˈ bey haˈ Siloé , cat hatxˈahnilo hasat xol haˈ , ” ẍi yaˈ wetan . Hac tuˈ yu intohan intxˈahnolojan insattiˈan ; lahwi tuˈ xin ishajlo insatan , ẍi naj .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj tet naj : ― ¿ Baytuˈwal xin ay naj tinan ̈ ? ẍi ebnaj . ― Caw mach wohtajojan , ẍi naj .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yilaxto naj mutzˈanticˈa sat tuˈ tet ebnaj fariseo .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Yet iswatxˈen Comam nichˈan tzˈotzˈew yun ̈ e ishajlo sat naj tuˈ , caw cˈuxan istzˈayical xewilal .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Yuxinto ocpaxo ebnaj fariseo tuˈ iskˈambeˈ tet naj hunelxa : ― ¿ Tzet yu ishajlo hasat tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj tet naj . Istakˈwi naj : ― Yaˈ Jesús masnico nichˈan tzˈotzˈew yin ̈ insatan , lahwi tuˈ xin intohan intxˈahnolojan ; hac tuˈ xin yu ishajlo insatan , ẍi naj .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Ay xin ebnaj fariseo halni : ― Huneˈ naj tuˈ , caw mach yeto Comam Dios ye naj yuto mach chisyije naj istzˈayical xewilal , ẍi ebnaj yin ̈ Comam . Yaj ay ebnaj halnipaxoj : ― Yaˈ Jesús tuˈ , mach mulumo yaˈ . Wal xin tato mulum yaˈ , ¿ tom chiyu isyeni yaˈ hunu cˈaybalcˈule hacaˈ chisye tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Yocpaxo ebnaj fariseo iskˈambeno tet naj maẍticˈa chiyu yilni tuˈ : ― Haxa hach tiˈ , ¿ tzet chawute hawalni yin ̈ naj akˈni hajlo hasat tiˈ ? ẍi ebnaj . Yalni naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Haˈ huneˈ chiwute walnihan , to caw ischejab Comam Dios ye yaˈ , ẍipaxo naj tet ebnaj .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Yaj caw maẍticˈa yaco ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel tuˈ yin ̈ iscˈul tato hajlo sat huneˈ naj tuˈ yu Comam . Haˈ yute isnani ebnaj to caw cˈulticˈa ye sat naj , yuxinto awtelax ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj yu ebnaj .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj tet ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Ham naj tiˈ , heyuninal cheyala tato caw maẍticˈa chu yilni yet ispitzcˈahi ? ¿ Tzet yu ishajlo sat naj ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Istakˈwi ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj : ― Caw yeli juninalan ̈ naj , caw yelpaxoj maẍticˈa chiyu yilni naj yet ispitzcˈa naj .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Yaj caw mach johtajojan ̈ tzet yu ishajlo sat naj , yeb xin mach johtapaxojan ̈ mac akˈni hajloho sat naj . ¡ Kˈambewe tet naj yuto ichamxa naj , chiyu yalni naj teyet ! ẍi ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj tet ebnaj tuˈ .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Wal xin , hac tuˈ yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj yuto caw chixiw tet ebnaj yahawil yehico yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel , yuto halbil yu ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Macn ̈ eticˈa chihalni tato haˈ naj Jesús tiˈ Cristo , matxa chicochacti yul capilla tiˈ , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Yuxinto hac tuˈ yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismiˈ naj : “ Kˈambewe tet naj , ichamxa naj , xayu yalni naj teyet , ” ẍi .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yawtenpaxti ebnaj naj hajlo sat tuˈ hunelxa , iskˈamben ebnaj tet naj : ― Caw chabe Comam Dios caw halilo isyelal jetan ̈ , wal xin caw johtajan ̈ ta caw mulum huneˈ naj chawal tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj tet naj .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Yalni naj xin : ― Hanintiˈan , caw mach wohtajojan tato mulum yaˈ maca machoj , yuxin mach chiyu walnihan teyet ; hachcachann ̈ e wohtajan to maẍticˈa chiyu wilnihan yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , wal tinan ̈ xin xayu wilnihan , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Iskˈamben ebnaj hunelxa : ― ¿ Tzet caw caẍyute naj ? ¿ Tzet caw yu ishajlo hasat tiˈ yu naj ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Yalni naj xin : ― Caw mawalan teyet , yaj to caw mach cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul . ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin cheyoche chiwalan teyet hunelxa ? ¿ Mato cheyoche chexocpaxo cuywo yinta yaˈ ? ẍi naj tet ebnaj .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Yet yalni naj hacaˈ tuˈ , istzabnico ebnaj isbahni naj , yalni ebnaj tet naj : ― Hach tiˈ , ayachxaco yinta naj , wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ yinta iscuybanil naj Moisés tzujanon ̈ an ̈ .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Walon ̈ tiˈan ̈ caw johtajan ̈ tato haˈ caw Comam Dios anicano cuybanile tet naj Moisés tuˈ . Wal naj chawal tiˈ , caw mach johtajojan ̈ baytuˈwal titnaco naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ naj tet ebnaj xin : ― Caw chicˈay incˈulan yuto cheyala tato mach heyohtajo bay titnaco yaˈ , yajaˈ caw cheyila hajlo insatan yu yaˈ .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Caw johtaj tato mach chabe Comam Dios tzet chiskˈan anma mulum , hachcachann ̈ e anma caw ayco yanma yin ̈ Comam , cat yinayo isba tet , hachcachann ̈ e huntekˈan anma tuˈ chakˈ Comam ispaj tzet chiskˈanaˈ .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Wal xin , caw maẍto bay chijabe iskˈumal tato ay huno mac chiyu yakˈni hajloho sat hunu anma maẍticˈa chiyu yilni yettaxticˈa ispitzcˈahi .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Tato maẍtaj Comam Dios an ̈ eti yaˈ tiˈ , caw machim nino tzet chiyu iswatxˈen yaˈ , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj tet naj : ― Walach hach tiˈ , caw mulumach yettaxticˈa hapitzcˈahi . ¿ Tom chaẍoc con ̈ hacuyuˈan ̈ hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet naj , hac tuˈ yu istennilti ebnaj naj tuˈ yul capilla .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Yabe Comam Jesús tato tenlaxilti naj hajlo sat tuˈ yul capilla , haxa yet ischahloyo naj yu Comam , yalni Comam tet naj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin ̈ Hanin Akˈbilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ? ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Iskˈamben naj tet Comam : ― Mamin , ¿ mac huneˈ chawal tuˈ ? Hal wetan cat xin wanico wanmahan yin ̈ , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Caw xahawil yin ̈ ; Hanintonan huneˈ mac bay lan ̈ an hatzotel tiˈ , ẍi Comam tet naj .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Yet yaben naj hacaˈ tuˈ , yay jahno naj yin ̈ sat Comam , yalni naj : ― Caw chiwaco wanmahan tawin ̈ Mam , ẍi naj .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Yalni Comam tet naj : ― Wal hanintiˈan , hulnajinan bey yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yun ̈ e wilnihan tzettaj chiˈelico anma , yuto ay anma tiˈ caw mach chiyu yilni , yaj xin haninan chiwakˈ hajlohojan sat . Aypaxo anma caw cˈul yilni , yaj chimutzˈicano sat wuhan yun ̈ e matxa chiyu yilni , ẍi Comam .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Ay xin huntekˈan ebnaj fariseo ayco iscˈatan ̈ Comam , yet yaben ebnaj yin ̈ tzet yal Comam tuˈ , yalni ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom xin haˈ hunon ̈ an ̈ mach chiyu jilnihan ̈ hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ebnaj : ― Kˈinalo tato mach chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tuˈ yet Comam Dios yehi , caw machim hemul . Yaj cheyala tato caw chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tuˈ yet Comam Dios , yaj mach cheyijepaxoj , yuxinto caw ay hemul , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Kˈinaloj ta ay hunu ispeyabil noˈ meˈ , cat yocto hunu naj yul , nan bay xin chisholicto isba naj ; yin ̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , caw elkˈom huneˈ naj tuˈ .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Wal naj chiˈocto yul ispultahil ispeyab noˈ tuˈ , haˈ ton naj tuˈ chitan ̈ en noˈ .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Haˈ naj chiwayn ̈ en noˈ xin chishaj naj ispultahil ispeyabil noˈ tet naj , cat yocto naj iscˈatan ̈ noˈ . Caw sunil noˈ kˈayna yaben yul isnukˈ naj . Caw hununtajil yawtenilti naj noˈ , yuto ay isbi hunun noˈ yu naj , hac tuˈ xin chiyu ishajnilti naj noˈ .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Yet chilahwi yinilti naj ismeˈ tuˈ , cat xin isbabi naj sata noˈ , cat yoc tzujno noˈ yinta naj , yuto caw yohta noˈ yul isnukˈ naj .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Yajaˈ wal ta hunu naj comon , mach chˈoc tzujno noˈ yinta naj ; chixiwilo noˈ tet naj yuto mach kˈaynajo noˈ yaben yul isnukˈ naj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yal Comam huneˈ yechel tiˈ tet ebnaj , yaj maẍticˈa txumchalo yu ebnaj tzet caw yelapno yehi .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Yalnipaxo Comam Jesús : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , hanintiˈan hacaˈ ispultahil ispeyab noˈ meˈ , caw hac tuˈ wehan .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ to yet maẍto chinhulan , ay ebnaj hulicˈo yanico isba ebnaj hecolomaloj . Haˈ huntekˈan ebnaj tuˈ xin , caw lahan ebnaj hacaˈ hunu naj elkˈom chiocto yul ispeyabil noˈ meˈ tuˈ , yaj wal anma caw yetticˈa Comam Dios ye xin , caw maẍticˈa ishajba istxiquin yin ̈ tzet yal ebnaj .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Hanintiˈan , lahaninan hacaˈ ispultahil ispeyabil noˈ meˈ , macn ̈ eticˈa chiocto yul huneˈ peyab tiˈ chicolchahi . Hacaˈticˈa hunu noˈ meˈ chielti lowoj cat yapnipaxo yul ispeyab , hac tuˈ xin ye huntekˈan mac tuˈ .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Ay ebnaj hacaˈ elkˈom chiyu yuli , ton ̈ e chihul elekˈ yeb xin yakˈni camo anma . Yaj walinan , hulnajinan wakˈaˈan kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal tet anma chiyaco isba yul inkˈaban . Huntekˈan anma tuˈ , caw niman chiyu ischahni iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Dios .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , caw lahaninan hacaˈ hunu naj tan ̈ em meˈ caw cˈul . Huneˈ naj tan ̈ em meˈ caw cˈul tuˈ , caw hinan yanma naj yakˈni camo isba yin ̈ ismeˈ .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Wal tato ton ̈ e chitohlalax hunu naj chitan ̈ en noˈ meˈ tuˈ , maẍtaj xin naj yahaw noˈ tuˈ chitan ̈ eni . Hayet chiyilni naj yapni noˈ oj , chisbejcano naj noˈ cat yelcan ̈ naj , yuto mach yeto naj noˈ , cat yoc noˈ oj tuˈ istzabnayo noˈ , cat xin ispujnacan ̈ noˈ sunil .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Chielcan ̈ naj chitan ̈ en noˈ , yuto yin ̈ n ̈ e istohol naj ayco yanma . Caw mach chicam iscˈul naj yin ̈ noˈ yuto mach yeto naj noˈ .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan , caw lahaninan yeb naj tan ̈ em meˈ caw cˈul , haxa mac chaco isba yul inkˈaban lahan hacaˈ noˈ meˈ . Caw ohtabilinan yu Inmaman , wohtapaxojan Inmamtuˈan , hac tuˈ xin wepaxojan yeb macta chaco isba yul inkˈaban , caw johta cobahan ̈ yebi . Yin ̈ ton huntekˈan mac tuˈ chiwakˈ camo inbahan .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Aypaxo huntekˈan anma chinchahnihan yul yanma , ton ̈ e xin caw mach jet con ̈ oboj . Caw yilal winitijan cat xin yoc isyijeno cuybanile chiwaltiˈan , caw xin hunxan ̈ e chucanoj yeb hunxan ̈ e mac chitan ̈ eni .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Caw xahan ayinan yu Inmaman yu caw chiwakˈ camo inbahan yin ̈ anma , yaj chinchahpaxojan inkˈinalan hunelxa .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Chiwakˈ camo inbahan yuto hac tuˈ chiel yin ̈ incˈulal . Wal xin , caw machi hunu mac chiyu quinispotxˈni camojan tato mach chisje incˈulan . Caw machi hunu mac chincachnihan wakˈni inbahan yin ̈ camical , aypaxo wipan inchahnihan inkˈinalan hunelxa , yuto hac tuˈ inchejbanilan yu Inmaman , ẍi Comam .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Yet yaben anma Israel yin ̈ tzet yal Comam tuˈ , ispohnipaxto isba hunelxa .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Ay hun majan anma halni : ― ¿ Tzet yuxin cheyabeto tzet chal naj tiˈ ? Wal huneˈ naj tiˈ , caw chabil locohal yu naj , ayco huneˈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin ̈ naj , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Ay hunxa majan anma halnipaxoj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil yin ̈ naj , ¿ tom hac tuˈ istzotelo naj ? Yalnipaxo ebnaj : ― ¿ Tom chu yu hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ishajni sat hunu naj caw maẍticˈa chiyu yilni ? ẍi ebnaj .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Yin ̈ istiempohal n ̈ abil chiecˈtzelax iskˈin ̈ Yatut Comam Dios bey yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Yet lan ̈ an yecˈ Comam Jesús istiˈ yatut Comam Dios tuˈ , huneˈ chiyij Yamakˈil naj rey Salomón ,

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: yoc hoyno ebnaj Israel yin ̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : ― ¿ Caw bakˈin chon ̈ hawilojan ̈ yin ̈ huneˈ cabcˈulal tiˈ ? ¿ Mac caw anmahilach ? Yin ̈ caw yeli , tato hach tiˈ Cristo hach , caw makˈbil hawalnilo jetan ̈ , ẍi ebnaj .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Istakˈwican ̈ Comam tet ebnaj : ― Caw xawalan teyet , yaj caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma . Sunil cˈaybalcˈule chinwatxˈehan yu yip Inmaman , haˈ caw chiyeniloj mac anmahilinan .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma , yuto caw maẍticˈa wetojan heyehi hacaˈ walnihan yalan ̈ tocanoj .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Macta caw wetan yehi , caw chishajba istxiquin yin ̈ tzet chiwalan ; caw xin wohtapaxojan huneˈ mac tuˈ . Hacaˈticˈa chiyu yoc tzujno noˈ meˈ yinta istan ̈ emal , hacpax tuˈ chiyu yoc tzujno wintajan .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Wal xin , hanan chiwakˈan iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , machi bakˈinal chicami , machi hunu mac xin chiyu yinilo yul inkˈaban .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Wal xin haˈ Inmaman , caw ecˈbalcano sata sunil maca , haˈ akˈn ̈ e anma tiˈ wetan . Caw machi hunu mac chiyu yinilo huntekˈan tiˈ yul iskˈab Inmamtuˈan .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Hanintiˈan yeb Inmaman , caw huneˈn ̈ e jehan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu istzabnipaxico ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel tuˈ issicˈnican ̈ ischˈen yun ̈ e iskˈojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús tet ebnaj : ― Yu ishelanil Inmaman , yuxin caw hantan ̈ e tzet caw cˈul chinwatxˈehan texol . ¿ Baytet yin ̈ yuxin chinhekˈoj camojan heyalni ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Istakˈwi ebnaj yahawil yin ̈ ebnaj Israel tuˈ : ― Mach chaẍcokˈojcan ̈ an ̈ yu hunu iscˈulal chawatxˈe , wal xin yu chachbuchwa yin ̈ Comam Dios , yuto hach tiˈ caw comon anma hach , yaj chawalico haba Diosal , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús : ― Istzotiˈ Comam Dios tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yet payat akˈbilcano teyet , chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haninan chiwalan tato dios hex , ” ẍicanoj .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Caw xin mach chiyu coman ̈ cˈon tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanoj , yuto caw Comam Dios tuˈ haln ̈ ecanoj diosal yin ̈ mac bay akˈbilcano Istzotiˈ .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Haˈ Comam Dios an ̈ eintijan yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yajaˈ ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin cheyalpaxoj tato buchwal chiwuhan yin ̈ Comam Dios yet chiwalnihan tato caw Iscˈahol Dios wehan ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Tato mach chinyijehan chejbanile akˈbil wetan yu Inmaman , mach cheyayto yul heyanma win ̈ an .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Wal xin hatzet chal Inmaman , haˈ chinwatxˈehan . Waxan ̈ ca caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma , chahwe yul heyanma tzet chinwatxˈetiˈan . Hac tuˈ xin chiyu heyohtan ̈ eniloj tato caw ayco Comam Dios wetbihojan , ayinpaxicojan yin ̈ Comam , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Caw xin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam , yaj iscolilo isba Comam yul iskˈab ebnaj .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , istopaxo Comam kˈaxepxacˈto haˈ niman Jordán , bay ah haˈ iswiˈ anma yu naj Juan yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , haˈ bey tuˈ xin cancano Comam .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Caw hantan ̈ e anma apni ilno Comam bey tuˈ , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Yin ̈ caw yeli waxan ̈ ca machi hunu cˈaybalcˈule isye yaˈ Juan jet , yaj sunil tzet yalcano yaˈ yin ̈ yaˈ Jesús tiˈ caw yeli , ẍi anma tuˈ .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Caw xin hantan ̈ e anma anayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam Jesús bey tuˈ .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Bey con ̈ ob Betania ay huneˈ naj chiyij Lázaro yaˈbi ay , haˈ bey tuˈ xin aypaxo cawan ̈ yanab naj , María isbi huneˈ ix , huneˈxa ix xin Marta isbi . Ix María tuˈ , haˈ ix anico aceite caw xukˈ sam yin ̈ yoj Comam Jesús , lahwi tuˈ , issuni tajo ix yoj Comam yu xil iswiˈ .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Ebix cawan ̈ yanab naj Lázaro tuˈ xin , yato ebix tzotiˈ tet Comam Jesús hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , caw txˈoj ye iscˈul conohan ̈ , naj caw xahan ay hawu , ẍito ebix tet Comam .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Yet yaben Comam huneˈ chejbanil tuˈ , yalni Comam : ― Huneˈ yabil tuˈ , mach chitan ̈ cano yin ̈ camical . Wal xin haˈ chiyenilo yip Comam Dios , haˈ xin bay chiixtan ̈ wipaxilo wipan , hanin Iscˈahol Comam Dios intiˈan , ẍi Comam .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca caw xahan ay ix Marta yeb ix María yeb naj Lázaro yu Comam Jesús , yaj yet yallaxi tato caw yaˈay naj Lázaro tuˈ , caw cabto tzˈayic ecˈ Comam bey tuˈ .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : ― Ton ̈ wepaxo ismajul Judea hunelxa , ẍi Comam .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Yalni xin ebnaj iscuywom Comam tuˈ tet : ― Mamin , caw tolto yoche ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel cachiskˈojoˈ camoj . ¿ Tom xin chaẍtopaxo hunelxa hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : ― Caw johtaj tato caw cablahon ̈ eb hora ikˈbil yu huneˈ tzˈayic , yuxin tato tzˈayical chon ̈ belwi , mach comono chon ̈ txakˈmohi , yuto sajkˈinal .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Yaj tato xol kˈejholo chon ̈ ecˈ xin , wal tuˈ chon ̈ txakˈmohi yuto mach sajkˈinal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yalni Comam : ― Caw mawaycan ̈ jamigo Lázaro , wal tinan ̈ xin chintohan wikˈalojan iswayan ̈ naj , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jesús tuˈ : ― Mamin , yaj tato wayan ̈ chu naj , chicawxocan ̈ naj chal tuˈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Yajaˈ xin yin ̈ iscamical naj Lázaro yal Comam , wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tuˈ xin , ton ̈ e chiway naj , yalni Comam , chute yalni ebnaj .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Yuxinto caw yal Comam yin ̈ caw haban tet ebnaj : ― Naj Lázaro macam naj ,

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: yaj caw chintzalahan yuto machijinan yet iscam naj , yu iscˈulalo teyin ̈ yun ̈ e caw heyanico heyanma win ̈ an . Ton ̈ we jilaˈ naj , ẍi Comam .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Yalni naj Tomás , naj chihallax tioẍ uninal , tet huntekˈanxa ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam : ― Ton ̈ we yinta Comam haxinwal hun cocam yebi , ẍi naj .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Yet yapni Comam Jesús bey tuˈ xin , yaben Comam tato can ̈ ebxa tzˈayic ismuji naj Lázaro tuˈ .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Haˈ con ̈ ob Betania tuˈ , ayn ̈ em yictajo legua yehilo yin ̈ con ̈ ob Jerusalén .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Yuxinto caw txˈiˈal anma ah Jerusalén beycˈo yakˈa isnimanbal iscˈul ix Marta yeb ix María yu iscamical isnoh tuˈ .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Hayet yaben ix Marta tato lan ̈ an yapni Comam Jesús bey tuˈ , istit ix ischahno Comam , wal ix María xin cancano ix yul n ̈ a .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Yalni ix Marta tuˈ tet Comam yet ischahni isba ix yebi : ― Mamin , tato ayachicˈo bey tiˈ , caw machim cam innohan .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Yaj xin caw wohtajan tato sunil tzet chakˈan tet Comam Dios chiyakˈ Comam tawet , ẍi ix .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Istakˈwi Comam tet ix : ― Wal hanoh tuˈ , chiitzitzbocan ̈ , ẍi Comam .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Yalni ix : ― Hoˈ Mamin , caw wohtajan tato chiitzitzbican ̈ innohtuˈan yet chiitzitzbican ̈ sunil anma yet islahobal tzˈayic , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Yalni Comam xin : ― Hanintiˈan chiwakˈ itzitzbocan ̈ an anma camnaxa , yeb xin haninan chiwakˈan iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . Yuxinto macn ̈ eticˈa chinchahnihan yul yanma , waxan ̈ ca chicami chiitzitzbican ̈ .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Yebpaxo xin sunil anma itzitzto chinchahnihan yul yanma , mach chicam yin ̈ huneln ̈ e . ¿ Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin ̈ tzet chiwalan ? ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Hoˈ Mamin , caw chiwaytojan yul wanmahan tato hach tiˈ Cristo hach . Caw Iscˈahol Comam Dios hawehi , halbilcanoj ta chachhul yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ẍi ix Marta tuˈ tet Comam .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Lahwi yalni ix Marta hacaˈ tuˈ , isto ix yawtenoti isnoh , yalni ix tet ix yin ̈ ewantajil : ― Aycˈo Comam cuywawom bey tiˈ , chachyawte Comam , ẍi ix tet ix María .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Yaben ̈ e ix María tzet yal isnoh tuˈ xin , yah lemna ix , isto ix yilno Comam .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Maẍto xin chiapni Comam Jesús yul con ̈ ob , haˈ bay ischah isba ix Marta yeb Comam , haˈ to tuˈ xin ay Comam yet yapni ix María .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Wal anma ah Judea ayco yakˈni isnimanbal iscˈul ebix yet yilni anma yah lemna ix María tuˈ isto ix , yoc tzujno anma yinta ix yuto istxum anma tato chito ix okˈo bay mujan isnoh tuˈ .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Yet yapni ix María iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesús xin , yay jahno ix yich yoj Comam , yalni ix hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , tato ayachicˈo bey tiˈ , machim cam conohtiˈan ̈ , ẍi ix tet Comam .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Yet yilni Comam Jesús yokˈcan ̈ ix María yeb anma ah Judea tzujan yinta ix tuˈ , yoc biscˈulal yin ̈ iscˈul Comam , istzˈaycan ̈ iscˈul Comam .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Iskˈamben Comam xin : ― ¿ Baytuˈwal mujan naj heyu ? ẍi Comam . ― Mamin , ton ̈ jilaˈ , ẍi ix María yeb anma tuˈ .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Yokˈcan ̈ Comam xin .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Yet yilni anma ah Judea yokˈcan ̈ Comam , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Caw yeli xahan ay naj yu yaˈ , ẍi anma .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Aypaxo hunmajanxa anma halni : ― Haˈ yaˈ tiˈ akˈni hajloho sat naj mutzˈan sat , ¿ tom xin mach an ̈ cha naj Lázaro tiˈ yu yaˈ ? Hac tuˈ xin machim cam naj , ẍi anma .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Caw ecˈna oc biscˈulal yin ̈ iscˈul Comam yet yapni bay ayicto naj Lázaro tuˈ . Haˈ huneˈ bay mujan naj tuˈ , n ̈ achˈen yehi , ayco huneˈ chˈen niman chˈen ismajiloj .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Yalni Comam Jesús xin : ― Iwelo ismajil chˈen , ẍi Comam . Yalni ix Marta , yanab naj Lázaro tuˈ : ― Mamin , con ̈ itax cam naj tinan ̈ , caw ayxam sam naj , ẍi ix .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Istakˈwi Comam Jesús : ― ¿ Tom machi mawalan tawet xin tato chawayto yul hawanma yin ̈ tzet chiwalan , caw chawilaˈ ishelanil yip Comam Dios ? ẍi Comam tet ix .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , yilaxilo ismajil chˈen bay mujan naj tuˈ , istˈan ̈ xican ̈ Comam Jesús satcan ̈ , yalni hacaˈ tiˈ : ― Mamin , caw chiwakˈan yuchˈandios tawet yu maxawabe tzet mawalan .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Wohtajan Mam ta sunilbal tiempo chawabe tzet chiwalan , yaj xin chiwalan hunel tiˈ tawet yu sunil anma cutxanico tiˈ , yun ̈ e yanayto yul yanma ta hach tiˈ an ̈ eintijan , ẍi Comam tuˈ .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Yet lahwi yalni Comam huneˈ tiˈ xin , yah yaw Comam yin ̈ caw ip : ― Lázaro , elan ̈ tij , ẍi Comam .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu yelti naj Lázaro tuˈ , becˈbilico kˈap yin ̈ isnimanil naj , pichbilpaxto sat naj yu huneˈ kˈap . Yalni Comam xin : ― Holwelo kˈap yin ̈ naj , cat isto naj , ẍi Comam .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Anma ah Judea apni ilwal yin ̈ ix María , caw yilpaxo tzet iswatxˈe Comam Jesús bey tuˈ , yuxinto caw hantan ̈ e anma anayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Aypaxo huntekˈan ebnaj to halno tet ebnaj fariseo yin ̈ tzet iswatxˈe Comam .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yu yoc ebnaj fariseo islahtiˈn ̈ en isba yeb ebnaj yahawil yehico yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb xin ebnaj yahaw con ̈ ob . Yalni ebnaj : ― ¿ Tzet wal juten tinan ̈ , huneˈ naj tuˈ caw txˈiˈal cˈaybalcˈule chisyecano naj ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Tato ton ̈ e chijila chislahnico naj , caw sunil jet con ̈ ob tiˈ chakˈayto yul yanma yin ̈ naj . Hac tuˈ xin chiyu yulo ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Roma , cat xin yuchcˈanayo ebnaj yatut Comam Dios , cat xin yetanto ebnaj cocon ̈ ob tiˈ , ẍi ebnaj tet hunun .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Ay xin huneˈ naj , Caifás isbi , iswiˈehal yehico naj yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote yin ̈ huneˈ habil tuˈ . Haˈ naj halni : ― Hex tiˈ caw matzet heyohtaj .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Caw mach chitxumchalo heyu tato ecˈbal cˈul iscam naj tiˈ selelo sunil anma , hac tuˈ xin matxa chitan ̈ ilo cocon ̈ ob tiˈ chal tuˈ , ẍi naj .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Wal xin mach yal naj Caifás huneˈ tuˈ yul yet ischuquil , yuto haˈ naj yahawil yehico yin ̈ ebnaj sacerdote huneˈ habil tuˈ , yuxinto haˈ Comam Dios akˈni yalaˈ naj tato chicam Comam Jesús selelo sunil anma ah Israel .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Yaj maẍn ̈ etaj yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel chicam Comam Jesús , wal xin chicampaxo Comam yun ̈ e iscutxbanico sunil yuninal Comam Dios pujanto yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yun ̈ e hunxan ̈ e chiyute isba .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic tuˈ , islahtiˈn ̈ e isba ebnaj yahawil con ̈ ob Israel tato chakˈ camo ebnaj Comam Jesús .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Yuxin matxa ecˈ Comam Jesús xol anma bey ismajul Judea , wal xin to Comam bey yul huneˈxa con ̈ ob chiyij Efraín , huneˈ con ̈ ob ayco iscawilal txˈotxˈ desierto . Haˈ tuˈ xin ehayo Comam yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Wal yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén xin , toxa chiichico kˈin ̈ Pascua , huneˈ kˈin ̈ tuˈ iskˈin ̈ anma Israel . Caw xin txˈiˈal anma yul hunun con ̈ ob apni bey Jerusalén tuˈ , yu isyijen yakˈni sajbo isba yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chiichico kˈin ̈ tuˈ .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Chi ‑ xin ‑ ecˈ anma tuˈ saywal yin ̈ Comam Jesús . Yet cutxanico anma yul yatut Comam Dios , chiskˈamben anma tet hunun hacaˈ tiˈ : ¿ Tzet quexchi ? ¿ Chimhulu yaˈ Jesús yin ̈ kˈin ̈ tiˈ mato machoj ? ẍi anma .
