text2: Tato ayex chexmohyi , mach muleho huneˈ tuˈ ; taca hunu ix kˈopo chimohyi xin , mach txˈojopaxo huneˈ tuˈ . Yajaˈ wal mac chimohyi caw ay isyaˈtajil chila . Ay walaˈan mach chakˈle huntekˈan isyaˈtajil tuˈ .

text: But this I say , brethren , the time is short : it remaineth , that both they that have wives be as though they had none ;
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , haˈ chalilo huntekˈan chiwaltotiˈan to hanicˈxan ̈ e tiempo ayon ̈ icˈoj , yuxin hex ay heyixal , machojabn ̈ etaj yin ̈ heyixal cheyaco henabal , wal xin yilal heyakˈni hamanil yin ̈ yet Comam .

text: And they that weep , as though they wept not ; and they that rejoice , as though they rejoiced not ; and they that buy , as though they possessed not ;
text2: Haxa mac biscˈulal ye xin , hacaˈojtam ayco yin ̈ tzalahilal , haxa mac ayco yin ̈ tzalahilal xin , hacaˈojtam ayco yin ̈ biscˈulal . Haˈ mac chilokˈni hunu tzet ye tuˈ hacaˈojtam mach yeto tzet chislokˈ tuˈ .

text: And they that use this world , as not abusing it : for the fashion of this world passeth away .
text2: Haxa mac chiocnico tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yu , hacaˈojtam mach lan ̈ an yocheni yuto huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ chitan ̈ iloj .

text: But I would have you without carefulness . He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord , how he may please the Lord :
text2: Ay walaˈan matzet cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul . Yet maẍto chikˈ yixal hunu naj tzeh , yin ̈ n ̈ e yet Comam ayco yanma naj , han ̈ e tzet chal Comam haˈ chisyije naj .

text: But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world , how he may please his wife .
text2: Wal hunu naj ayxa yixal xin , haxa yin ̈ tzet ye tuˈ ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ haˈ chaco yin ̈ iscˈul , yeb yu iswatxˈen naj yin ̈ tzet choche iscˈul yixal , hac tuˈ xin cabxa chielico isnabal naj .

text: There is difference also between a wife and a virgin . The unmarried woman careth for the things of the Lord , that she may be holy both in body and in spirit : but she that is married careth for the things of the world , how she may please her husband .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ ebix kˈopo maẍto chimohyi yeb ebix maẍticˈa yichamil , haˈ yin ̈ yet Comam bay ayco yanma ebix yeb sunil isnabal . Wal ebix ay yichamil xin , haˈ tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yeb tzet choche yichamil , haˈ ayco yin ̈ iscˈul ebix iswatxˈeni .

text: And this I speak for your own profit ; not that I may cast a snare upon you , but for that which is comely , and that ye may attend upon the Lord without distraction .
text2: Chiwalan huntekˈan tiˈ , yajaˈ maẍtaj yu quexincachnihan , to yu iscˈulalo teyin ̈ , yeb yu hebeybaln ̈ en hacaˈ choche Comam Dios , cat hemunla yin ̈ ismunil Comam yin ̈ sunil heyanma .

text: But if any man think that he behaveth himself uncomely toward his virgin , if she pass the flower of her age , and need so require , let him do what he will , he sinneth not : let them marry .
text2: Ta ay hunu naj juẍta choche chimohyi yeb hunu ix janab yuto istiempohalxa yikˈni yixal , chisje ismohyi , mach txˈojo huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Nevertheless he that standeth stedfast in his heart , having no necessity , but hath power over his own will , and hath so decreed in his heart that he will keep his virgin , doeth well .
text2: Yajaˈ xin ta ay hunu mac mach chisje iscˈul chikˈ yixal , chi ‑ xin ‑ istˈin ̈ baco yin ̈ yanma yecˈ yu ischuquil , kˈacˈul ta mach chimohyi .

text: So then he that giveth her in marriage doeth well ; but he that giveth her not in marriage doeth better .
text2: Yuxin ta chimohyi huneˈ mac tuˈ , cˈul , yajaˈ ta mach chimohyi xin , ecˈbal cˈultopaxoj .

text: The wife is bound by the law as long as her husband liveth ; but if her husband be dead , she is at liberty to be married to whom she will ; only in the Lord .
text2: Yet itzitzto yichamil hunu ix ix , aytocto ix yalan ̈ ischejbanil yichamil . Yajaˈ ta chicam naj xin caw yetxa isba ix ischuquil , xaisje ismohyi ix yeb mac bay chal iscˈul , yajaˈ tan ̈ e yeb hunu mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam .

text: But she is happier if she so abide , after my judgment : and I think also that I have the Spirit of God .
text2: Yajaˈ wal intxumnihan , ecˈbalto sakˈal yet ix ta mach chikˈ yichamil ix . Hac tuˈ chiwute walnihan yuto haˈ hun Comam Espíritu Santo ayco wetbiojan , haˈ chakˈni walaˈan .

text: Now as touching things offered unto idols , we know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge puffeth up , but charity edifieth .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , chiwaltojan teyet yin ̈ huntekˈan itah chihaltelax tet ej tioẍ . Caw yel hacaˈ yallaxi . “ Caw ay cohelanil cosunil , ” ẍi . Yajaˈ cohelanil tuˈ ay ismay jinican ̈ coba yu . Wal ta xahan chijil coba hununon ̈ , chon ̈ chˈib yin ̈ yet Comam hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: And if any man think that he knoweth anything , he knoweth nothing yet as he ought to know .
text2: Tato ay hunu mac caw ay isnabal chute istxumni , maẍto isnabal huneˈ mac tuˈ yin ̈ hacaˈ caw yelapno yehi .

text: But if any man love God , the same is known of him .
text2: Wal mac ayco yanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , caw ohtabil yu Comam .

text: As concerning therefore the eating of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols , we know that an idol is nothing in the world , and that there is none other God but one .
text2: Wal yin ̈ islolax huntekˈan itah chiakˈlax yin ̈ xahanbalil tet ej tioẍ , caw matzet chaliloj yuto huntekˈan tioẍ tuˈ caw johtaj tato caw matzet chal yelapno yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yuto huneˈn ̈ echˈan Comam Dios .

text: For though there be that are called gods , whether in heaven or in earth , ( as there be gods many , and lords many , )
text2: Yajaˈ waxan ̈ ca xin ay mac chihalni ta ay txˈiˈal dios satcan ̈ , yeb yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ta hac tuˈ txˈiˈal dios , yeb txˈiˈal yahaw yul sat ebnaj .

text: But to us there is but one God , the Father , of whom are all things , and we in him ; and one Lord Jesus Christ , by whom are all things , and we by him .
text2: Yajaˈ wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ , huneˈn ̈ echˈan coDiosal , haˈ ton Comam Dios mame . Haˈ Comam tuˈ yichebanil sunil tzet ye tuˈ , yetpaxo Comam je han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ . Huneˈn ̈ echˈanpaxo Jahawil , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo . Yu Comam tuˈ , yuxin ay sunil tzet ye tuˈ , yeb yu Comam yuxin ayon ̈ .

text: Howbeit there is not in every man that knowledge : for some with conscience of the idol unto this hour eat it as a thing offered unto an idol ; and their conscience being weak is defiled .
text2: Yajaˈ mach sunilo ebnaj juẍta chinachalo huneˈ tiˈ yu . Yuto ay ebnaj chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ yiyo isba tet tioẍ yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , yuxin yet chiscˈuxni ebnaj noˈ chibe haltebilxa yin ̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ tuˈ , chito cabcon iscˈul , chistxumni ebnaj ta chˈetaxto ebnaj yu .

text: But meat commendeth us not to God : for neither , if we eat , are we the better ; neither , if we eat not , are we the worse .
text2: Yajaˈ maẍtaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin chon ̈ can cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios , maẍtaj yu chicolo huntekˈan itah tuˈ yuxin chon ̈ cˈulbiloj , maca yu mach chicolo yuxin chon ̈ can txˈojal .

text: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak .
text2: Caw cheyil heba , tajca yu chisje heloni yuxin cheyakˈ aycˈayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin ̈ yet Comam .

text: For if any man see thee which hast knowledge sit at meat in the idol ' s temple , shall not the conscience of him which is weak be emboldened to eat those things which are offered to idols ;
text2: Tajca yu heyohtaxa ta mach txahulo heloni huntekˈan itah tuˈ , yuxin chexay tzˈon ̈ no waˈo yul yatut tioẍ , yajaˈ ta ay ebnaj juẍta chexilni yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ , mach ismunil hex cawex cheyijba ebnaj isloni huntekˈan itah haltebil tet tioẍ tuˈ .

text: And through thy knowledge shall the weak brother perish , for whom Christ died ?
text2: Ta hac tuˈ cheyute , cheyakˈ aycˈayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin ̈ yet Comam , wal xin haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ mac tuˈ campaxo Comam Jesús .

text: But when ye sin so against the brethren , and wound their weak conscience , ye sin against Christ .
text2: Yuxin tato heyu yuxin chietaxto isnabal hunu heyuẍta maẍto yip yin ̈ Comam , cheyaco hemul yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ yul sat Comam Jesucristo .

text: Wherefore , if meat make my brother to offend , I will eat no flesh while the world standeth , lest I make my brother to offend .
text2: Yuxin ta yun ̈ e incˈuxnihan noˈ chibe yuxin chiwakˈ aycˈayojan hunu wuẍtajan , kˈacˈul tom mach chincˈuxan noˈ chibe tuˈ , haxinwal machi hunu mac chaco ismul wuhan .

text: Am I not an apostle ? am I not free ? have I not seen Jesus Christ our Lord ? are not ye my work in the Lord ?
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli hanintiˈan ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan yuto wilpaxojan Comam , yuxin lahan welapnojan hacaˈ ebnaj ischejab Comam . Hex tiˈ xin ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , yajaˈ yu inmunilan texol .

text: If I be not an apostle unto others , yet doubtless I am to you : for the seal of mine apostleship are ye in the Lord .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca ay mac chalni tato mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan , yajaˈ wal hex tiˈ xin caw heyohtaj tato ischejab Comam wehan , yuto yu inmunilan texol yuxin ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam . Haˈ chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam wehan .

text: Mine answer to them that do examine me is this ,
text2: Hac tiˈ chu inpajtzenan tet ebnaj chitzotel win ̈ an .

text: Have we not power to eat and to drink ?
text2: Hanintiˈan ay wocan yin ̈ inchahnihan tzet chinlohan yin ̈ inmunilan texol .

text: Have we not power to lead about a sister , a wife , as well as other apostles , and as the brethren of the Lord , and Cephas ?
text2: Kˈinalo ta ay hunu ix janab chioc wixalojan tinan ̈ , ¿ tom mach chu winicˈojan ix wintajan hacaˈ chu naj Pedro yeb huntekˈanxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesucristo , yeb ebnaj yuẍta Comam ?

text: Or I only and Barnabas , have not we power to forbear working ?
text2: ¿ Tom haninxan ̈ ehan yeb naj Bernabé mach chiakˈlax tzet chiocnico juhan ̈ yet chon ̈ munlahan ̈ yin ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios ?

text: Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges ? who planteth a vineyard , and eateth not of the fruit thereof ? or who feedeth a flock , and eateth not of the milk of the flock ?
text2: Hacaˈ ebnaj soldado tinan ̈ , ¿ tom yin ̈ ebnaj ayco tzet chiocnico yu ? Hacaˈpaxo hunu naj chitzˈunni teˈ uva , ¿ tom mach chislo naj hunu sat teˈ xin ? Hacaˈpaxo hunu naj tan ̈ em wacax , ¿ tom mach chucˈ naj yal yim noˈ ?

text: Say I these things as a man ? or saith not the law the same also ?
text2: Tajca chetxumu tato haninn ̈ ehan chiwalan huneˈ tiˈ , wal xin hac tuˈ yalnipaxo yin ̈ isley naj Moisés .

text: For it is written in the law of Moses , Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn . Doth God take care for oxen ?
text2: Yin ̈ ley tuˈ tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mach cheyaco tzˈispa yin ̈ istiˈ noˈ wacax yet chixan ̈ wi trigo noˈ , ” ẍiayoj . Yajaˈ maẍtaj noˈ wacax ayco yin ̈ iscˈul Comam yet yalni huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes ? For our sakes , no doubt , this is written : that he that ploweth should plow in hope ; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope .
text2: Wal xin han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ ico yin ̈ iscˈul Comam yet yalni huneˈ tuˈ . Yuxin hacaˈ naj tˈocom txˈotxˈ yeb naj chixan ̈ nilti ixim trigo , haˈ ismunil ebnaj tuˈ ayco yipo yanma , yuto yin ̈ ismunil ebnaj tuˈ chiel tzet chislo .

text: If we have sown unto you spiritual things , is it a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things ?
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ cotzˈunan ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios texol , yuxin mach txˈojoj ta cheyakˈ hanicˈ tzet chiocnico juhan ̈ .

text: If others be partakers of this power over you , are not we rather ? Nevertheless we have not used this power ; but suffer all things , lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ta haˈ hunmajanxa ebnaj chiecˈ texol cheyakˈ tzet chiocnico yu , hajon ̈ xaman ̈ ay yilal cochahni jetan ̈ . Yajaˈ xin machi hunelo cokˈanan ̈ teyet , caw ton ̈ e jijlenan ̈ yun ̈ e mach chioc lin ̈ no jalnicˈojan ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live of the things of the temple ? and they which wait at the alter are partakers with the alter ?
text2: Hex tiˈ heyohtaj tato ebnaj chimunla yul yatut Comam Dios , haˈ tzet chihaltelax tet Comam yul yatut tuˈ , haˈ chiakˈni ecˈo yu ebnaj . Haˈ chal yelapno tuˈ , to naj sacerdote chianico xahanbal tet Comam Dios , ay yoc naj yin ̈ tzet lan ̈ an yalten tuˈ .

text: Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel .
text2: Hac ton tuˈ ye ebnaj chimunla yin ̈ yalnicˈo Tzotiˈ yet colbanile , halbilcano yu Comam Dios tato yilal yakˈlax tzet chiocnico yu ebnaj yin ̈ huneˈ munil bay chimunlaco tuˈ .

text: But I have used none of these things : neither have I written these things , that it should be so done unto me : for it were better for me to die , than that any man should make my glorying void .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan xin , machi hunelo inkˈanan teyet yin ̈ tzet ocnico wuhan waxan ̈ ca xin caw yilal inchahnihan . Yajaˈ maẍtaj yu heyakˈni yuxin chintzˈibn ̈ etojan huneˈ carta tiˈ teyet , wal xin ay huneˈ intzalahilalan yuto machi hunu tzet ye tuˈ inkˈanan teyet . Kˈacˈulmi chincaman satapax inkˈannihan hunu tzet ye tuˈ teyet .

text: For though I preach the gospel , I have nothing to glory of : for necessity is laid upon me ; yea , woe is unto me , if I preach not the gospel !
text2: Hanintiˈan mach chinloloˈn ̈ e inbahan yu chiwalicˈojan Tzotiˈ yet colbanile tet anma , yuto chejbilinan walnicˈojan . Caw cˈanchˈaninan ta mach chiwalan Tzotiˈ yet colbanile .

text: For if I do this thing willingly , I have a reward : but if against my will , a dispensation of the gospel is committed unto me .
text2: Kˈinalo ta yul wetan chiwitijan wecˈan walnocˈojan , caw yilalmi inchahnipaxojan intoholan . Wal xin chiwalicˈojan yuto haˈ Comam Dios akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan .

text: What is my reward then ? Verily that , when I preach the gospel , I may make the gospel of Christ without charge , that I abuse not my power in the gospel .
text2: Wal xin , haˈ huneˈ ispaj yet chinecˈan walnocˈojan Tzotiˈ yet colbanile haˈ ton tzalahilal . Machi intoholan chinkˈanan , waxan ̈ ca yet ay inkˈannihan intoholan yin ̈ inmuniltuˈan yu yecˈ wuhan .

text: For though I be free from all men , yet have I made myself servant unto all , that I might gain the more .
text2: Mach ayinicojan yalan ̈ yip hunu maca , yajaˈ xawaco inbahan hacaˈ chejab tet sunil anma , yun ̈ e caw txˈiˈal anma chioccano yul iskˈab Comam wuhan .

text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew , that I might gain the Jews ; to them that are under the law , as under the law , that I might gain them that are under the law ;
text2: Yet chinecˈan xol ebnaj wet con ̈ ob Israelan , hacaˈ isbeybal ebnaj tuˈ hac tuˈ chiwute inbeybalan , yun ̈ e yoc haywan ̈ o ebnaj yul iskˈab Comam , cat yelcanti ebnaj yalan ̈ ley , yuxin hacaˈtan ̈ e chiwacto inbahan yalan ̈ isley naj Moisés . Yajaˈ yin ̈ caw isyelal mach ayinoctojan yalan ̈ ley tuˈ .

text: To them that are without law , as without law , ( being not without law to God , but under the law to Christ , ) that I might gain them that are without law .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ yet chinecˈan xol anma mach Israeloj , anma mach ayocto yalan ̈ isley naj Moisés , hacaˈ isbeybal ebnaj tuˈ hac tuˈ chiwutepaxo inbahan , yun ̈ e yoc haywan ̈ o ebnaj yul iskˈab Comam . Yajaˈ yin ̈ caw isyelal yalan ̈ ischejbanil Comam Dios ayinictojan , yuto yijeminan yin ̈ ischejbanil Comam Jesucristo .

text: To the weak became I as weak , that I might gain the weak : I am made all things to all men , that I might by all means save some .
text2: Haxa yet ayinicojan xol ebnaj maẍto bin yip yin ̈ yet Comam xin , hacaˈtan ̈ e hunu mac machi yip , hac tuˈ chiwute inbahan , yun ̈ e caw yikˈni yip yanma ebnaj yin ̈ Comam . Wal xin wute inbahan hacaˈ anma tuˈ , yun ̈ e ischahnicano iscolbanil haywan ̈ o anma tuˈ .

text: And this I do for the gospel ' s sake , that I might be partaker thereof with you .
text2: Yu cuybanile yet colbanile , yuxin hac tuˈ wute inbahan , yun ̈ e haˈ huninan chinchahan iscˈulal yu .

text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all , but one receiveth the prize ? So run , that ye may obtain .
text2: Hacaˈ yin ̈ hunu an ̈ e tinan ̈ , txˈiˈal mac chakˈ an ̈ e , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e mac chiikˈwahi . Tinan ̈ xin , hacaˈ chu ebnaj chˈakˈni an ̈ e tuˈ , hacojab tuˈ cheyute heba yin ̈ yet Comam , haxinwal chechah ispaj selel .

text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things . Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown ; but we an incorruptible .
text2: Sunil ebnaj chakˈ an ̈ e , yet chiscuyni isba ebnaj caw cam chil ebnaj ta machi hunu tzet ye tuˈ chietanto isnimanil ebnaj yun ̈ e yikˈni ebnaj ismatan yet chiyakˈni ebnaj an ̈ e . Yajaˈ huneˈ matan chikˈ ebnaj tuˈ pet chietaxtoj , wal huneˈ matan chijikˈ han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ yin ̈ ismunil Comam , machi bakˈin chietaxtoj .

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :
text2: Hacaˈ naj chakˈ an ̈ e tuˈ chakˈ yanma naj yapni bay chiakˈlax ismatan , hac tuˈ wehan hanintiˈan . Hacaˈpaxo ebnaj chialaxico yakˈleno howal haquintuˈan , mach nabn ̈ eho chielto inkˈaban . Wal xin yin ̈ caw sunil wanmahan chinmunlahan yin ̈ ismunil Comam Dios .

text: But I keep under my body , and bring it into subjection : lest that by any means , when I have preached to others , I myself should be a castaway .
text2: Caw chincachan innimanilan , chiwanicojan isyijeno yin ̈ tzet chiwochehan , yuto cˈuxantaxca lahwi wawtenan anma yul iskˈab Comam Dios , haxa taxca chielicoj matxa chinchahan ispaj selel tzet tzumbebil wutiˈan .

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan mach chenahuln ̈ eto yin ̈ tzet yakˈle ebnaj jichmam yet yijbalaxicˈo ebnaj yu naj Moisés yet payat . Sunil ebnaj belwi yalan ̈ huneˈ moyan , yeb xin sunil ebnaj ecˈpaxto yictabal haˈ Mar Rojo .

text: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea ;
text2: Hacaˈtan ̈ e ahcano haˈ iswiˈ anma ishunicanico ebnaj yinta naj Moisés yu huneˈ moyan tuˈ , yeb yet yecˈto ebnaj yictabal haˈ mar tuˈ , hacaˈtan ̈ e ahcano haˈ iswiˈ ebnaj .

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;
text2: Islonipaxo ebnaj huntekˈan tzet chilolax yati Comam Dios yul satcan ̈ .

text: And did all drink the same spiritual drink : for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them : and that Rock was Christ .
text2: Yebpaxo xin sunil ebnaj ucˈni ha haˈ yakˈ Comam Dios elti yin ̈ iscˈul huneˈ chˈen chˈen . Haˈ huneˈ chˈen chˈen tuˈ yechel Comam Jesucristo ye chˈen , haˈ hun Comam tzujan yinta ebnaj jichmam yin ̈ isbel .

text: But with many of them God was not well pleased : for they were overthrown in the wilderness .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca yakˈ Comam Dios huntekˈan tuˈ tet ebnaj , yajaˈ ay ebnaj mach isyije yin ̈ tzet yal Comam Dios , yuxin caw txˈiˈal ebnaj cami , iscancano pacˈno isnimanil ebnaj sat txˈotxˈ desierto yin ̈ isbel tuˈ .

text: Now these things were our examples , to the intent we should not lust after evil things , as they also lusted .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan yu ebnaj tuˈ cocuybanil yucanoj yun ̈ e matxa chijocheco istxˈojal hacaˈ yu ebnaj .

text: Neither be ye idolaters , as were some of them ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play .
text2: Mach cheyiyo heba tetej tioẍ hacaˈ yu txˈiˈal ebnaj tuˈ , hacaˈ yecano istzotiˈal ebnaj yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ay tzˈon ̈ no ebnaj , yoc ebnaj waˈoj yeb ucˈuj . Lahwi tuˈ xin yah bulna ebnaj , yoc ebnaj can ̈ alwoj , yakˈni ebnaj tzet chal iscˈul , ” ẍiayoj .

text: Neither let us commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell in one day three and twenty thousand .
text2: Machojab chexixli hacaˈ yu txˈiˈal ebnaj tuˈ . Yu huneˈ tuˈ yuxin tan ̈ ilo veintitrés mil ebnaj yin ̈ huneˈ tzˈayic .

text: Neither let us tempt Christ , as some of them also tempted , and were destroyed of serpents .
text2: Machojabpaxo xin cheyaco Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ ilwebal , hacaˈ yu anma tuˈ . Yu huneˈ tuˈ yuxin caw txˈiˈal mac chilax yu noˈ laba , iscamiloj .

text: Neither murmur ye , as some of them also murmured , and were destroyed of the destroyer .
text2: Machojab chexbuchwa yin ̈ Comam Dios hacaˈ yu anma tuˈ . Yu huneˈ tuˈ yuxin txˈiˈal mac cam yu naj ángel akˈom camo anma .

text: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples : and they are written for our admonition , upon whom the ends of the world are come .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan tzet yu ebnaj jichmam tuˈ , cuybanile yecano jin ̈ tinan ̈ , tzˈibn ̈ ebilpaxcanayoj yun ̈ e johtan ̈ eni ta mach chu cowatxˈen istxˈojal , han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yin ̈ islahobal tzˈayic tiˈ .

text: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall .
text2: Yuxin haˈ mac caw cˈul yeco chabe , yilal caw cam chil isba haxinwal mach chiaycˈayi .

text: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man : but God is faithful , who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able ; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape , that ye may be able to bear it .
text2: Tzijxan ̈ e ilwebal chi ‑ la ‑ ay jiban ̈ , lahan hacaˈ ilwebal chiay yiban ̈ sunil anma . Yajaˈ chicawxi cocˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios tato mach chischayo Comam hunu ilwebal jiban ̈ mach chitecha ju . Wal xin , hayet chiapni ilwebal jin ̈ , haˈ Comam chiyeni jet tzet chu cocolcha tet ilwebal tuˈ , hac tuˈ xin chu istecha ju .

text: Wherefore , my dearly beloved , flee from idolatry .
text2: Tinan ̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , mach cheyiyo heba tet ej tioẍ .

text: I speak as to wise men ; judge ye what I say .
text2: Chiwaltojan huntekˈan tiˈ teyet yuto caw helanexxa , chisje heyoc heyilnoj ta cˈul huntekˈan chiwaltotiˈan .

text: The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not the communion of the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not the communion of the body of Christ ?
text2: Yet chijecˈtzen santa cena chijakˈni yuchˈandiosal yin ̈ tzet ayayto yul chˈen vaso cat jucˈni , haˈ chiyeniloj tato hunxan ̈ e je yeb Comam Jesucristo yu ischiqˈuil . Haxa yet chicokˈaxponayo ixim pan cat cowahni ixim , haˈ chˈakˈni conabaˈ tato hunxan ̈ e chon ̈ elcanico yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: For we being many are one bread , and one body : for we are all partakers of that one bread .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca caw txˈiˈalon ̈ , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e haˈ ixim pan chicowah cosunil , haˈ chiyeniloj tato hunxan ̈ e nimanile je cosunil .

text: Behold Israel after the flesh : are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the alter ?
text2: Naweti yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel , hayet chiscˈuxni ebnaj noˈ chibe chiakˈlax yin ̈ xahanbalil tet Comam Dios , hunxan ̈ e chucano ebnaj yin ̈ Comam .

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?
text2: Yaj mach lan ̈ ano walnihan tato ay yip tioẍ , yeb ta ay tzet chal yelapno noˈ chibe chihaltelax tet .

text: But I say , that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice , they sacrifice to devils , and not to God : and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils .
text2: Haˈ chalilo huneˈ chiwaltiˈan , to hayet chakˈni ebnaj mach Israelo isxahanbal , maẍtaj tet Comam Dios chalte ebnaj isxahanbal tuˈ , walxinto haˈ tet ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil chalte ebnaj isxahanbal . Haˈ huneˈ tiˈ machojab cheyaco heba yetbiho ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .

text: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord , and the cup of devils : ye cannot be partakers of the Lord ' s table , and of the table of devils .
text2: Mach chu jucˈni tzet ay yul isvaso Comam Dios cat jucˈnipaxo tzet ay yul isvaso ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil . Mach chu jocpaxo tzˈon ̈ no waˈo sat ismeẍa Comam Dios , chilahwi tuˈ cat jocpaxo tzˈon ̈ no waˈo sat ismeẍa ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: Wal xin machojab chicowatxˈe huntekˈan tuˈ , haxinwal mach chijakˈtij ishowal Comam jin ̈ yuto mach ecˈbalo jip yiban ̈ Comam .

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Ay mac chihalni : “ Chisje cowatxˈen sunil tzet chal janma , ” ẍi . Caw yeli , yajaˈ han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ matxa jeto ay cowatxˈen huntekˈan tuˈ . Chu cowatxˈen sunil tzet chal cocˈul , yajaˈ mach sunilo chicolwa jin ̈ con ̈ yakˈni chˈibo yin ̈ yet Comam Dios .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Machojabn ̈ etaj iscˈulal jet chicosayicˈoj , wal xin caw yilal janico conabal yin ̈ iscˈulalo yin ̈ jet anmahil .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Sunil noˈ chibe chitxon ̈ lax yul txon ̈ bal chibe chu hecˈuxni noˈ , mach yilalo chekˈambe tzet ye noˈ haxinwal mach chicabcon heyanma hecˈuxni noˈ .

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Yuto huneˈ yul yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yeb sunil tzet ayayo sat , yet Comam Dios yehi .

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Tato chexawtelax waˈo yu hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul iskˈab Comam , chu hetohi . Ta chisje hecˈul , chu hecˈuxni noˈ chibe chialaxayo yin ̈ hesat . Mach chekˈambe tzet ye noˈ haxinwal mach chicabconcan ̈ heyanma yet checˈuxni noˈ .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: Yajaˈ ta ay mac chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Noˈ chibe tiˈ xaakˈlax noˈ yin ̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ , ” ta ẍi , mach checˈux noˈ , yu iscˈulalo yin ̈ huneˈ mac chalni tuˈ .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: Chiwaltojan huntekˈan tiˈ yun ̈ e mach chietaxto isnabal huneˈ mac maẍto yip isnabal tuˈ , maẍtaj yu henabal hex tiˈ . Yajaˈ ayexmi chetxum hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin chincach inbahan incˈuxnihan noˈ chibe chiakˈlax yin ̈ xahanbalil tuˈ yu anma chinanon iscˈul iscˈuxni noˈ ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Ta chiwakˈan yuchˈandiosal yin ̈ noˈ chibe chincˈuxtuˈan , matxa mac chu yoc buchwal yin ̈ huneˈ tuˈ , ” quexchimi .

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Wal xin chiwalan teyet , ta ay hunu tzet ye tuˈ chelo yeb cheyucˈu , maca hunuxa tzet ye tuˈ cheyu , haˈojab ismay Comam Dios cheyaco yin ̈ tzet chewatxˈe tuˈ .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Wal xin machojab cheyetato isnabal ebnaj Israel maca ebnaj mach Israeloj , maca macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo yu tzet chewatxˈe .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Hacaˈ hanintiˈan , caw chiwakˈ wanmahan inwatxˈenan iscˈulal sata anma , maẍtaj iscˈulal wetan chinsayicˈojan , to iscˈulal yet anma , yun ̈ e istzujcha apno iscolbanil anma yu .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Ocan ̈ we tzujno yin ̈ inbeybaltiˈan , hacaˈ chiwute inbeybaln ̈ ehan isbeybal Comam Jesucristo .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw chintzalahan teyin ̈ , yuto yin ̈ sunil tzet chewatxˈe chinhenatijan , yebpaxo caw ayexico heyijen huntekˈan cuybanile wakˈan teyet .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Chiwochehan cheyohtan ̈ eloj ta Comam Jesucristo , haˈ caw ayco iswiˈehalo ebnaj winaj . Haxa naj ichamile xin , iswiˈehal yeco naj yin ̈ yixal , hacaˈpaxo Comam Dios iswiˈehal yeco Comam yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Tato chaco ebnaj winaj yen ̈ el iswiˈ yet chitxahli ebnaj , maca yet chalni ebnaj tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ chiyilo ebnaj ispixan Comam Jesucristo , Comam ayco iswiˈehalo yin ̈ ebnaj .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Hacaˈpaxo ebix ix , ta ay hunu ix mach chahto yen ̈ el iswiˈ yet chitxahli , maca yet chalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ , haˈticˈa ix chiinilo ispixan yichamil , naj ayco iswiˈehalo yin ̈ ix . Lahan chalilo hacaˈtan ̈ e xayakˈ elo ix xil iswiˈ .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Yuxin ta ay hunu ebix ix , mach chahto yen ̈ el iswiˈ , cˈulmi yakˈni ebix elo xil iswiˈ , yajaˈ ta txˈixobal huneˈ tuˈ chabe ebix xin , yakˈabahto ebix yen ̈ el iswiˈ .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ winajon ̈ tiˈ xin , mach cˈuloj ta chijahto yen ̈ el cowiˈ , yuto yechel Comam Dios jehi yeb han ̈ on ̈ chicoyelo yip Comam Dios . Haxa ebix ix xin , haˈ ebix chiyenilo yip ebnaj winaj .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Yuto yet iswatxˈen Comam Dios naj winaj , mach yin ̈ o ix ix el naj yu Comam . Walxinto haˈ ix ix tuˈ yin ̈ naj winaj elna ix yu Comam .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Maẍtaj yu ix ix yuxin iswatxˈe Comam Dios naj winaj , walxinto yu naj winaj yuxin iswatxˈe Comam ix ix .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Yu huneˈ tuˈ , yuxin yilal yanahto ebix ix yen ̈ el iswiˈ yu isyenilo ebix tato ayicto ebix yalan ̈ ischejbanil yichamil , yuto tˈan ̈ anico ebnaj ángel jin ̈ .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Yajaˈ walxa yin ̈ Comam Dios , machim naj winaj ta machi ix ix , machimpaxo ix ix ta machi naj winaj .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Caw yeli , yin ̈ naj babel winaj elna ix babel ix . Walxa tinan ̈ xin , yin ̈ xa ix ix chipitzcˈa naj winaj . Yajaˈ sunil tuˈ yu Comam Dios yuxin hac tuˈ yehi .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Yuxin txumwej ta cˈul istxahli hunu ix ix yet machi yen ̈ el iswiˈ ix chahtoj .

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Caw johtaj tato caw txˈixobal yakˈni chˈibo ebnaj winaj xil iswiˈ .

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Yajaˈ wal ebix ix xin , caw istzan ebix yakˈni chˈibo xil iswiˈ , yuto xil iswiˈ ebix tuˈ hacaˈ yen ̈ el iswiˈ ebix yecoj .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Tato ay mac chioc tzotelo yiban ̈ ilo huneˈ tiˈ , yohtan ̈ eojabiloj tato han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios yul hunun con ̈ ob , mach chichahlax txahlo hunu ix ix ta machi yen ̈ el iswiˈ ix chahtoj .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Yin ̈ huntekˈan chiwaltojan teyet tiˈ , mach chintzalahan teyin ̈ , yuto hayet checutxbanico heba , caw machi nino iscˈulal chechah , wal xin caw ton ̈ e cheyetato heba .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Yin ̈ babelal chiwaltojan teyet ta xawabehan ta hayet checutxban heba yin ̈ culto tolab chepohle heba , yajaˈ yet chintxumnihan etzan ̈ em caw yel huneˈ tuˈ .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Yajaˈ etza caw yilal chepohle heba , yun ̈ e yixtan ̈ wiloj mac caw yel chala ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Wal xin yet checutxban heba , matxa taj santa cena cheyecˈtze ,

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: yuto yet chiapni yorahil hewaˈi nanantaxan ̈ e hebabico heloni tzet chelo , yuxin ayex mach chinoh hecˈul , ayexpaxo xin chexuqˈuicanocan ̈ .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: ¿ Tom machi heyatut bay chexwaˈ xin ? ¿ Tzet yin ̈ xin cheyilo ispixan mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , cat heyanicanico yin ̈ txˈixwilal mac matzet aya ? ¿ Chimquintzalahan yin ̈ huneˈ hebeybal tuˈ heyalni ? Wal xin caw mach chu intzalahan yin ̈ .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Huneˈ cuybanil chiwapaxtojan teyet tiˈ , haˈ tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chabilcano wuhan . Haˈ yin ̈ huneˈ akˈbal yet yalaxico Comam yul iskˈab camical , yican ̈ Comam ixim pan ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: lahwi yakˈni Comam yuchˈandiosal yin ̈ ixim , iskˈaxponayo ixim , yalni Comam : “ Chahwej cat hewahni , huneˈ tiˈ yechel innimanilan chiwakˈan yin ̈ camical yu hecolchahi . Hunta el yet cheyecˈtzen huneˈ tiˈ chinhenanitijan , ” ẍicano Comam .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ yinipaxocan ̈ Comam chˈen vaso , yalni Comam : “ Huneˈ ayayto yul vaso tiˈ yechel inchiqˈuilan chimaltoj , haˈ xin chitˈin ̈ bancano huneˈ acˈ trato chakˈ Comam Dios . Hunta el yet cheyucˈni huneˈ tiˈ chinhenatijan , ” ẍi Comam .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Yuxin yet chicowahni ixim pan tuˈ , yeb yet chijucˈni tzet ayayto yul huneˈ vaso tuˈ , haˈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo chicoyeloj masanto yet chul Comam hunelxa .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Yuxin ta ay hunu mac matzet chal yelapno ixim pan tuˈ yul sat yet chiswahni , yeb yet chucˈni tzet ayayto yul vaso tuˈ , chaco ismul yin ̈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo , yeb yin ̈ ischiqˈuil Comam .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Yuxin hayet yalan ̈ to maẍto chewah huneˈ pan tuˈ yeb heyucˈni tzet ayayto yul huneˈ vaso tuˈ , caw yilal hetxumni yin ̈ tzet heyeco hununex .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Yuto ta chewah huneˈ pan tuˈ yeb ta cheyucˈ huneˈ ayayto yul vaso tuˈ , machi xin cˈulo heyecoj , yeb xin mach chena ta hacaˈ isnimanil Comam yehi , yin ̈ hac tuˈ chiay isyaˈtajil teyiban ̈ yu Comam Dios .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Yu huneˈ tuˈ , yuxin ay mac yaˈay texol , aypaxo mac tzˈontan ̈ e , yebpaxo xin ay mac xacami .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Wal xin ta chicotxum coba yin ̈ tzet jeco hununon ̈ , machim chiay isyaˈtajil jiban ̈ yu Comam Dios .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Yajaˈ ta mach chicotxum yin ̈ tzet jeco yul sat Comam , chayo Comam isyaˈtajil jiban ̈ , yajaˈ yun ̈ e mach chon ̈ to yin ̈ isyaˈtajil xol huntekˈan anma cˈaynatoj .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yet checutxban heba hechahni santa cena tuˈ , yilal cheyechmale heba hewahni .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Yajaˈ ta ay hunu mac caw xan ̈ ohchahi chisje iswaˈcano bey yatut , haxinwal mach chayo Comam isyaˈtajil teyiban ̈ yin ̈ huntekˈan tzet mach toholo chewatxˈe tuˈ . Wal yin ̈ huntekˈanxa xin , yetto chinapnihan texol cat quexinwatxˈenicojan yin ̈ .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan ̈ elo yin ̈ huntekˈan comunil chiakˈlax jet hununon ̈ yu Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Caw heyohtaj ta yet maẍto chexoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios , caw tzujanexto yinta huntekˈan tioẍ mach chitzoteli .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , chiwakˈan heyohtan ̈ eloj tato haˈ mac chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yakˈabti ishowal Comam Dios yiban ̈ naj Jesús , ” ta ẍi . Haˈ mac chalni hacaˈ tuˈ , maẍtaj Comam Espíritu Santo chiakˈni yalaˈ . Yajaˈ wal mac chalni hacaˈ tiˈ xin : “ Comam Jesús haˈ wahawilan , ” ta ẍi . Huneˈ mac tuˈ haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo chiakˈni yalaˈ .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ nananta comunil hununon ̈ yin ̈ Comam , yajaˈ huneˈ mac chiakˈni jet , haˈ ton Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Caw nananta comunil hununon ̈ , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e mac bay chon ̈ munla cosunil , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Nananta tzet chicowatxˈe hununon ̈ , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e Comam Dios chiakˈni huntekˈan tuˈ jub .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Chisyelo Comam Espíritu Santo tato ayco yul janma hununon ̈ chakˈni Comam iscˈulal jet , yu iscˈulalo yin ̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Yu yip Comam Espíritu Santo yuxin ay ebnaj juẍta caw ay ishelanil istzoteli , aypaxo mac caw ay isnabal iscuywahi , yajaˈ yuticˈapaxo Comam Espíritu .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Yu Comam Espíritu Santo tuˈ , yuxinto ay ebnaj caw chicawxi iscˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios , aypaxo ebnaj chiakˈlax yip yu Comam Espíritu Santo yakˈni cawxo macta yaˈay .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Ay ebnaj chiakˈlax yip isyeni cˈaybalcˈule , aypaxo ebnaj chiakˈlax ishelanil yalnicˈo tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios . Aypaxo ebnaj xin chiakˈlax ishelanil yohtan ̈ eniloj tato haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo ayco yetbiho hunu maca , maca tato yespíritu naj matzwalil ayco yetbihoj . Ay ebnaj chakˈpaxo Comam Espíritu Santo ishelanil yalni nan abxubal , aypaxo xin ebnaj chakˈ Comam Espíritu Santo ishelanil istxumnilo huntekˈan nan abxubale tuˈ .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan tiˈ haˈticˈa Comam Espíritu Santo chiakˈni cowatxˈeˈ hununon ̈ , hataticˈa tzet choche Comam yakˈa jet . Caw xin hunchˈann ̈ e Comam Espíritu .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Hacaˈ conimanil tiˈ , waxan ̈ ca caw txˈiˈal yikˈni isba , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e nimanilehal yehi . Hac tuˈ ye Comam Jesucristo .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Hacticˈapax tuˈ je han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ , waxan ̈ ca Israel hon ̈ , maca mach Israelo hon ̈ , waxan ̈ ca chejabon ̈ , maca jet coba cochuquil , huneˈn ̈ e Comam Espíritu Santo con ̈ hunbani , yuxin huneˈxan ̈ e nimanilehal je yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Haˈticˈa xin Comam Espíritu akˈlax yul janma hununon ̈ .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Hacaˈ ye conimanil tinan ̈ , caw txˈiˈal yikˈni isba , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e nimanilehal .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Kˈinalo ta chu istzotel joj cat yalni : “ Hanintiˈan mankˈabehojan , yuxin machi wocan yin ̈ huneˈ nimanile tiˈ , ” ta ẍi . Waxan ̈ ca chal hacaˈ tuˈ , yajaˈ yetbin ̈ eticˈa isba yeb conimanil tiˈ .

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Maca ta chal cotxiquin hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Wal hanintiˈan manbakˈsatehojan , yuxin mach chiwocan yin ̈ huneˈ nimanile tiˈ , ” ta ẍi . Waxan ̈ ca chal hacaˈ tuˈ , yaj caw yetbin ̈ eticˈa isba yeb huneˈ conimanil tiˈ .

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Ta bakˈsate sunil conimanil tiˈ , machim chu jabeni , yeb tato sunil conimanil tiˈ txiquinn ̈ e , machim chu coxukˈxen sam hunu tzet ye tuˈ .

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Wal xin haˈ Comam Dios watxˈen ̈ e hunun yetbi conimanil tiˈ , yanico Comam bay chal iscˈul .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Kˈinaloj tato lahanxan ̈ eticˈa hunun yetbi conimanil matxam chu jalni baytet conimanil , chal tuˈ .

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Yin ̈ caw isyelal , waxan ̈ ca txˈiˈal yikˈni isba , yajaˈ huneˈn ̈ e nimanilehal yehi .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Isbakˈ cosat mach chu yalni tet cokˈab hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Matzet chachocnico wuhan , ” mach ẍioj . Hacpax tuˈ cowiˈ , mach chu yalni tet joj : “ Matzet chachocnico wuhan , ” mach ẍioj .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Ay huntekˈan yetbi conimanil tiˈ cochn ̈ e caw machi ismunil chijabe , yajaˈ haˈ caw ecˈna chˈocnico ju .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Aypaxo yetbi conimanil tiˈ , cochan matzet chal yelapnoj , yajaˈ haˈ ecˈbal chicoyaˈiln ̈ e . Haxa huntekˈan yetbi conimanil mach cˈulchˈano jalni , haˈ chijebatoj , hac tuˈ xin chu coyeniloj tato caw ay yelapno yehi .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Wal huntekˈan yetbi conimanil cˈulchˈan yillaxi mach yilalo chijaco yen ̈ el . Hac tuˈ yu iswatxˈencano Comam Dios conimanil tiˈ , yun ̈ e haˈ huntekˈan yetbi conimanil machi yelapno tuˈ , haˈ caw ay yelapnoj .

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Yuxinto mach chu iscajlencan ̈ isba ej yetbi conimanil , hayet to lahann ̈ e chisyaˈiln ̈ en isba hunun .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Ta ay hunu yetbi conimanil tiˈ chilahwi , sunil conimanil chiaben isyaˈil . Taca ay hunu yetbi conimanil chitzantelaxi , sunil conimanil chitzalahi .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Yuxin hacaˈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo je cosunil , hununon ̈ tiˈ xin yetbixa isnimanil Comam tuˈ jehi .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Yuxin coxol han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab Comam , ay comunil chakˈ Comam : babel ay mac ischejab Comam Dios yehi , iscab ay mac chalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , yin ̈ yox ay mac cuywawom , aypaxo mac chakˈ Comam Dios ishelanil isyeni ej cˈaybalcˈule , aypaxo mac chiakˈlax ishelanil yakˈni cawxo macta yaˈay , aypaxo mac chiakˈlax ishelanil iscolwahi , aypaxo mac chiˈijbali , yeb xin ay mac chu yalni nan abxubal .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: Yuxin mach sunilo mac ischejab Comam , mach sunilopaxo mac chihalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , mach sunilopaxo mac chicuywahi , yeb mach sunilo mac chu isyeni ej cˈaybalcˈule .

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: Mach sunilopaxo mac chiakˈlax ishelanil yakˈni cawxo anma yaˈay , mach sunilo mac chihalni nan abxubal , yeb xin mach sunilo mac chitxumnilo yin ̈ tzet chal yelapno nan abxubal tuˈ .

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Yuxin hex tiˈ , aweco yin ̈ hecˈul hesayni huntekˈan munil ecˈbalcano iscˈulal chakˈ Comam texol . Yajaˈ ayto huneˈxa tzet caw ecˈbal cˈul cowatxˈeni , haˈ bay chintzotelan yiban ̈ ilo teyet .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca caw helanon ̈ jalni yabxubal anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , maca yabxubal ebnaj ángel , yajaˈ ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , lahanon ̈ n ̈ e hacaˈ hunu chˈen campana ton ̈ e chikˈan ̈ i , yeb chˈen chˈen pakˈan yehi ton ̈ e chitzˈin ̈ xi .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca chijal tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , waxan ̈ ca xin chicotxum huntekˈan tzet ye tuˈ ewan ye yu Comam , waxan ̈ ca johta sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yeb waxan ̈ ca chu cohecˈnilo hunu witz yul yehobal yu ayco janma yin ̈ Comam , yajaˈ ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ machi yelapno jehi .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca xin chijitxkˈato tzet ayon ̈ yin ̈ anma mebaˈ , waxan ̈ ca xin chijakˈ tzˈajoto conimanil xol kˈa kˈaˈ , yajaˈ ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , nabn ̈ e huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Wal xin ta yeli xahan chijil jet anmahil , ay conimancˈulal yin ̈ , chicoyelo iscˈulchˈanil cocˈul tet , yeb mach chichiwa cocˈul yin ̈ , yeb mach chicololoˈn ̈ e coba , yeb mach chijican ̈ coba .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Machi xin chijilo istxˈixobal hunu jet anmahil , machn ̈ etaj jet chijaco yin ̈ cocˈul , mach chitit cohowal , wal xin chiconahuln ̈ eto istxˈojal chiswatxˈe jin ̈ .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Mach chon ̈ tzala yin ̈ istxˈojal chiswatxˈe hunu jet anmahil , walxinto haˈ yin ̈ iscˈulal chiswatxˈe yin ̈ chon ̈ tzalahi .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Yet xahan chijil jet anmahil tuˈ chijakˈ janma istecha sunil tzet chiswatxˈe jin ̈ , chicawxi cocˈul yin ̈ tzet chala , ay conimancˈulal jechmani , niman chijute cocˈul yin ̈ .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ coxahann ̈ en coba tuˈ mach bakˈinal chitan ̈ i , wal jalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios chiapni istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxi . Chiapnipaxo istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxpaxo nan abxubal , yeb matxa yilalo ay cohelanil .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Yuto cohelanil yeb jalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios maẍto tzˈajanoj ,

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: yuxin huntekˈan tuˈ chilahwi ismunil yet chihul huntekˈan tzˈajan yehi .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Yet nichˈan intohan hacaˈ istzotel niẍte unin , hac tuˈ intzotelan . Hacaˈ istxumnipaxo niẍte unin , hac tuˈ intxumnipaxojan , hacaˈpaxo isnabal niẍte unin , hac tuˈ innabalan . Wal tinan ̈ xin icham anma inxahan , xawacanojan tzet ye tuˈ yet niẍte unin .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Tinan ̈ maẍto chon ̈ kˈoji cotxumnilo tzet ye tuˈ hacaˈ caw yehi . Wal xin hacaˈtan ̈ e jilni cosat yul hunu chˈen espejo kˈejmutzˈmun ̈ e , hac tuˈ je tinan ̈ . Yajaˈ chiapni istzˈayical bay chijil yin ̈ caw haban , hacaˈ con ̈ yohtan ̈ en Comam Dios .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Ay oxeb tzet ye tuˈ tiˈ mach chitan ̈ iloj , haˈ ton janayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam Dios , yeb iscawxi cocˈul yin ̈ Comam , yebpaxo coxahann ̈ en jet anmahil . Yajaˈ huneˈ caw ecˈbal yelapnoj xol oxeb tiˈ , haˈ ton coxahann ̈ en jet anmahil .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Machojab chebej hexahann ̈ en heyet anmahil , cat xin heyakˈni heyanma hesayni huntekˈan munil chakˈ Comam Espíritu Santo teyet . Yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ caw cˈul , haˈ heyalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Haˈ mac chitzotel yin ̈ nan abxubal , haˈ tet Comam Dios chitzoteli , maẍtaj tet anma , yu machi mac chitxumni yin ̈ tzet chala . Yu Comam Espíritu Santo yuxin chal tzotiˈ machi mac ohtan ̈ e .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Wal mac chalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios xin , chichˈib ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin ̈ yet Comam yu , cat yiptzelax yu , cat yakˈnipaxo yakˈlobal yanma .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Haˈ mac chitzotel yin ̈ nan abxubal , han ̈ cˈan ̈ e huneˈ mac tuˈ chichˈib yin ̈ yet Comam , yajaˈ wal mac chihalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , chakˈ chˈibo mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam chiaben tzet chala .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Wochebalan tato hesunil cheyal nan abxubal , yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ ecˈbal chiwochehan to cheyalicˈo tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios . Yuto ecˈbal cˈul jalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios sata jalni hunuxa nan abxubal , cachann ̈ e ta ay mac chalnilo tzet chal yelapno huneˈ nan abxubale tuˈ , ta hac tuˈ xin chichˈib macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios yu .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , kˈinalo tato chinapnihan quexwilaˈan cat intzotelan yin ̈ nan abxubal teyet , machmi tzet cheyikˈ yin ̈ . Yajaˈ ta hunu tzet chakˈ Comam Dios johtan ̈ e , haˈ chiwalan , maca helanile , maca ta chiwalan tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , maca hunuxa cuybanile ; wal tuˈ chitxumchalo heyu .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Kˈinalo hunu teˈ suˈ maca hunu teˈ arpa , machim chicotxum tzet sonal chiˈalaxico yin ̈ teˈ ta mach watxˈebilo yul isnukˈ teˈ .

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Yeb xin ta ay hunu howal cat yokˈtzelax chˈen trompeta yu iscutxico ebnaj soldado , yajaˈ ta mach habano yokˈ chˈen , machim chiscutxbaco isba ebnaj isto yin ̈ howal .

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Caw xin hacon ̈ mi tuˈ , ta mach habano tzet chijala yet chon ̈ tzoteli , ¿ tzettaxca chu istxumlaxilo tzet chijal tuˈ ? Caw nabn ̈ em chon ̈ tzotel yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , caw txˈiˈal abxubal , yajaˈ hunun abxubal tuˈ ay tzet chaliloj .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Yajaˈ ta mach wohtajojan yabxubal hunu mac chitzotel wetan , nan con ̈ obalinan yul sat huneˈ mac chitzotel tuˈ , nanpaxo con ̈ obal naj yul insatan .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Caw wohtajan tato hex tiˈ caw cheyoche huntekˈan munil chakˈ Comam Espíritu Santo teyet , yajaˈ haˈ huntekˈan chˈakˈni chˈibo mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , haˈ bay wal helahnicoj .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Yuxin tato ay mac chitzotel yin ̈ nan abxubal , caw yilal iskˈanni ishelanil tet Comam Dios yun ̈ e chu yalnilo yin ̈ tzet chal yelapnoj .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Ta chintxahlihan yin ̈ nan abxubal , yin ̈ caw yeli han ̈ e wanmahan chitxahli , wal innabalan xin , mach chitxumcha yu yin ̈ tzet chiwaltuˈan .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Yuxin ¿ tzet wal juten coba ? Wal xin machn ̈ eojabtaj janma chitxahli , caw yilal cotxahlipaxo yeb conabal . Yebpaxo yet chon ̈ bitni , machn ̈ eojabtaj janma chibitni , wal xin caw yilal cobitni yeb conabal .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Ta ay hunujex cheyakˈ tzalaho hecˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios yin ̈ hunu nan abxubal , han ̈ e heyanma chitzalahi , wal mac chiaben tzet cheyal tuˈ xin , mach chu yalni : “ Hacojab tuˈ ” yuto mach chitxumcha yu tzet cheyala .

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Yin ̈ caw yeli lan ̈ an heyakˈni tzalaho heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , yajaˈ mac chiaben tuˈ , mach chikˈ yip yanma heyu .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Hanintiˈan chiwakˈan yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios yuto ecˈbalto chiwalan nan abxubal tesataj .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Yajaˈ yet chicocutxban coba yin ̈ culto , wochebalan waxan ̈ ca howebn ̈ e tzotiˈ chiwalan , yajaˈ tan ̈ e chikˈ anma cuybanile yin ̈ , sata walnihan lahon ̈ eb mil tzotiˈ yin ̈ abxubal mach chitxumcha heyu .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , machojab hacaˈ istxumni niẍte unin , machojab haco tuˈ hetxumni . Wal xin hacaˈojab istxumni icham anma hacojab tuˈ hetxumni , yajaˈ wal yin ̈ istxˈojal , hacaˈojab istxumni niẍte unin maẍto isnabal yin ̈ istxˈojal , hacojab tuˈ cheyute heba .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Chintzotelan tet huneˈ con ̈ ob tuˈ yin ̈ nan abxubal , yeb anma nan con ̈ obal chihalni intzotiˈan , yajaˈ maẍticˈa chabeto anma tzet chiwalan , ẍi Comam , ẍiayoj .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Yuxin huntekˈan nan abxubale tuˈ yechel ye tet anma maẍto chaco isba yul iskˈab Comam Dios , maẍtaj tet anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam . Wal tzotiˈ chihallax chitit tet Comam Dios xin , yechel ye tet anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Kˈinalo checutxba heba cat heyichico hesunil tzotelo yin ̈ nan abxubal , cat yoc apno hunu comon anma maca hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul iskˈab Comam , maca hunu mac mach ohtan ̈ e huneˈ tuˈ , chimistxum huneˈ mac tuˈ ta matxa tzˈajano ye yul hewiˈ .

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Wal ta hesunil lan ̈ an heyalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios xin , yet chioc apno hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul iskˈab Comam , maca hunu mac mach yohtajo tzet cheyu tuˈ , wal tuˈ chimistxum isba huneˈ mac mulum tuˈ , cat isnani isba yu huntekˈan tzet cheyal tuˈ .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu yelcano yen ̈ el tzet cˈuwan yul yanma huneˈ mac tuˈ , cat yay jahnoj , cat yinayo isba tet Comam Dios , hac tuˈ xin chu yohtan ̈ en huneˈ mac tuˈ ta caw yeli ayco Comam Dios heyetbioj .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hayet checutxban heba yin ̈ culto ayex chisje hebitni , ayexpaxo xin chisje hecuywa yin ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios , maca heyalni tzet chakˈ Comam Dios heyohtan ̈ eloj . Ayexpaxo xin chu hetzotel yin ̈ nan abxubal , ayex xin chu heyalni yin ̈ tzet chal yelapno huntekˈan abxubal tuˈ . Aweco huntekˈan tuˈ yin ̈ ismunil , yajaˈ yun ̈ e yikˈni yip heyanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Yet chextzotel yul nan abxubal , cawan ̈ , maca oxwan ̈ n ̈ e mac chitzoteli , yajaˈ yin ̈ hununtajil , ayojab mac xin chalnilo yin ̈ tzet chal yelapno huntekˈan abxubal cheyal tuˈ .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Taca machi mac chitxumnilo yin ̈ tzet chal yelapno xin , cˈulmi ta mach cheyala , wal xin ischuquilojab heyanma chitzotel tet Comam Dios .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ xin yet chihallax tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , cawan ̈ maca oxwan ̈ n ̈ e mac chitzoteli , wal ebnaj juẍta xin ton ̈ ehojab chˈoc tucno yaben yin ̈ tzet caw yehi .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Yajaˈ ta ay hunu tzet chakˈ Comam Dios yohtan ̈ elo hunu mac tzˈon ̈ anayo texol tuˈ , huneˈ mac lan ̈ an istzotel tuˈ xin yilal istucban istzoteli , cat istzotel huneˈxa mac tuˈ .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Hesunil chu heyalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , yajaˈ yin ̈ hununtajil yun ̈ e ay cuybanil cheyikˈ yin ̈ , cat yanico yip heyanma .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Haˈ mac chalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , chisje iscachni isba yet ay mac lan ̈ an istzoteli ,

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: yuto mach choche Comam Dios tato toxan ̈ e chon ̈ wejchahi yet chicocutxban coba , wal xin hununtajil cotzotel yin ̈ akˈancˈulal . Hacaˈticˈa ye ischejbanil anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios ay yul hunun con ̈ ob ,

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: ebix janab , mach chu yoc ebix tzotelo texol yet checutxban heba yin ̈ culto , yuto mach akˈbil ischejbanil ebix istzoteli . Wal xin caw yijemojab chute isba ebix hacaˈ yalni isley naj Moisés yu Comam Dios .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Tato ay hunu tzet ye tuˈ choche ebix yohtan ̈ eloj , iskˈambehab ebix tet yichamil bey yatut , yuto mach cˈuloj tato chitzotel ebix yet cutxanexicoj .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Tajca chetxumu tato teyet babel akˈlax Istzotiˈ Comam Dios , yeb tato hexn ̈ e chabilxa heyu .

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Tato ay hunu mac ischejab Comam Dios ye chabe , maca ta iptzebil yu Comam Espíritu Santo , yilal istxumni tato huntekˈan cuybanile chintzˈibn ̈ etotiˈan , ischejbanil Comam Dios yehi .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Yajaˈ tato machi yelapno huntekˈan cuybanile tiˈ yul sat , machojabpaxo xin yelapno huneˈ mac tuˈ yul hesat .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Yuxin tinan ̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ochewe heyalaˈ tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , yajaˈ mach checach yallaxpaxo nan abxubal .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Yajaˈ caw hacaˈojab yehi , hac tuˈ chewatxˈe yeb xin yin ̈ istxolal .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan chenati Tzotiˈ yet colbanile halbilcano teyet wuhan , huneˈ chabilxa heyu bay lin ̈ anex tinan ̈ .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Yuto yu huneˈ Tzotiˈ yet colbanile tuˈ , yuxin colbilexxa , yaj tato mach lin ̈ anojex yin ̈ , chal yelapnoj tato mach heyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ caw isyelal .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Haˈ huntekˈan cuybanile caw yilal yehi , haˈ wakˈan teyet , huntekˈan chabilcano wuhan . Quexincuynihan tato cam Comam Jesús yu comul , hacaˈ yalni yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Lahwi tuˈ ismujlax Comam , yajaˈ yin ̈ yox tzˈayic yitzitzbican ̈ xol camom , hacaˈticˈa yalni yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Isyeni isba Comam tet naj Pedro , isyenipaxo isba tet ebnaj ischejab .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ecˈbal howeb ciento ebnaj juẍtaj . Txˈiˈal xin ebnaj aytocˈo tinan ̈ , ay xin ebnaj xacami .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Isyenipaxo isba Comam tet naj Jacobo , lahwi tuˈ xin isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ebnaj ischejab .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Haxa yin ̈ istzujanilxa xin isyeni isba Comam wetan , yajaˈ hacaˈ hunu nichˈan unin pitzcˈana yalan ̈ to maẍto istiempohalo ispitzcˈahi , hac tuˈ wehan .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Yuxin caw matzet welapnojan xol ebnaj ischejab Comam chiwabehan , yuxin mach intzanojan yallax ischejab Comam Jesucristo win ̈ an , yuto wakˈ ecˈojan yaˈ yanma macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios yet yalan ̈ tocanoj .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Yu iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios , yuxin ayinicojan yin ̈ huneˈ munil tiˈ , yajaˈ mach nabn ̈ eho huneˈ iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam yakˈ wettuˈan yuto ecˈbalto chinmunlahan sata ebnaj ischejab Comam . Yajaˈ maẍtaj yu wipan , walxinto haˈ iscˈulchˈanil Comam chicolwa win ̈ an .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Yajaˈ mach chiyoc yin ̈ mac chihalnicˈo cuybanile tiˈ , ta haninan maca ebnaj ischejab Comam , haˈ huneˈ caw yilal to haˈ jalnicˈojan ̈ cuybanile tuˈ , huneˈ chabilxa yul heyanma .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ quexcocuyan ̈ yin ̈ yet yitzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yajaˈ ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin ayex cheyala tato mach chiitzitzbican ̈ camom ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Ta mach chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa , machim itzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Ta mach itzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo machim tzet chal yelapno cuybanile jakˈan ̈ teyet , naban ̈ em chijaco janma yin ̈ Comam .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Ta hac tuˈ lekˈtiˈon ̈ mi yin ̈ Comam Dios , yuto chijala tato haˈ Comam Dios akˈni itzitzbocan ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Machim yakˈ itzitzbocan ̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican ̈ camom .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa , machmi itzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Ta mach itzitzbican ̈ Comam tuˈ xol camom , nabn ̈ em chijaco janma yin ̈ Comam Dios , ayon ̈ tomico yin ̈ comul .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Hacmipax tuˈ ebnaj chabilxa Comam Jesucristo yu yet iscami , cˈaynamicanto ebnaj yin ̈ huneln ̈ e .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Ta iscawxobal cocˈul yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo yuln ̈ e sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yehi , maẍticˈam nichˈano iscˈulal jet yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Wal xin , yin ̈ caw yeli itzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom , hacaˈ babel sat tzˈunub chakˈa , hac tuˈ yu isbabi yitzitzbican ̈ cosataj .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Yu huneˈ naj , yuxin hul camical yiban ̈ anma yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yajaˈ yu huneˈxa naj xin , yuxin chiitzitzbican ̈ anma yin ̈ camical .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Hacaˈticˈa chu iscamto anma yu ismul naj Adán , hacticˈapax tuˈ chu yulcan ̈ iscˈul anma yu Comam Jesucristo .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Yuxin yin ̈ istxolal aycoj , haˈ Comam Jesucristo haˈ babel itzitzbican ̈ , haxa yet chul Comam yet iscayel cat yitzitzbican ̈ macta yetxa Comam .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , cat yul islahobal tzˈayic bay chikˈoji Comam yin ̈ ebnaj can ̈ yehi yeb ebnaj ayco yahawilo con ̈ ob , yeb ischejab naj matzwalil chiecˈ xol jakˈekˈ yeb yul yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , catto yanico Comam sunil tzet ay yul iskˈab tet Comam Dios Mame .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Yajaˈ yet maẍto chaco Comam Jesucristo sunil tiˈ yul iskˈab Comam Dios chˈoc Comam Yahawiloj masanto yet chioc sunil mac ayco ishowal yin ̈ Comam yalan ̈ yoj .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Haxa huneˈ islahobal bay chikˈoji Comam xin , haˈ ton yin ̈ naj camical ayco ishowal yin ̈ Comam .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanoj tato sunil tzet ye tuˈ chacto Comam Dios yalan ̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo , yajaˈ wal Comam Dios mach chiocto yalan ̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo , yuto haˈ Comam Dios chianico sunil yalan ̈ yoj Comam Cristo .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Yet chioccanto sunil yalan ̈ yip Comam Jesucristo tuˈ xin , haˈ caw Comam tuˈ chacto isba yalan ̈ ischejbanil Ismam an ̈ eco sunil tzet ye tuˈ yul iskˈab , hac tuˈ xin haxan ̈ e Comam Dios Yahaw chucanico yin ̈ sunil tzet ye tuˈ .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Yebpaxo hunxa , hacaˈ anma chiah haˈ iswiˈ selelo anma camnaxa , yajaˈ ta mach chulcan ̈ iscˈul camom , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin chiah haˈ iswiˈ anma selelo anma camnaxa tuˈ ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Ta machi itzitzbican ̈ camom , ¿ tzet yin ̈ xin chijakˈ janmahan ̈ han ̈ on ̈ ischejab Comam Dios on ̈ tiˈan ̈ jijlenan ̈ isyaˈtajil chul jiban ̈ an ̈ hunun tzˈayic ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hanintiˈan caw hunun tzˈayic inhinni inbahan incaman . Huneˈ tiˈ caw yeli hacaˈ huneˈ tzalahilal chiwabehan teyin ̈ , yuto ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Hanintiˈan caw ecˈyaˈ wanmahan bey Efeso hacaˈtan ̈ e wakˈlenan howal yeb ej noˈ howla nokˈ . ¿ Tzet xin chiwikˈan yin ̈ huneˈ tuˈ tato mach chiitzitzbican ̈ camom ? Ta hac tuˈ , haˈmi ye yu anma chihalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¡ Waˈojon ̈ we yin ̈ caw cˈul , jakˈawe tzet choche janma , yuto camomon ̈ xataxca yet hecal ! ” ẍi .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , mach cheyakˈ subchaho heba , cajxam yallaxi : “ Ta chijetbin ̈ e coba yeb anma txˈoj isbeybal , niẍtejaln ̈ e cocuynito cowatxˈen istxˈojal tuˈ , ” ẍi .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Nachaojabilo heyu yin ̈ istxˈojal bay ayexicoj yeb matxa cheyaco hemul , yuto ayex maẍto heyohtajo Comam Dios . Chiwalan huneˈ tiˈ yun ̈ e hetxˈixwican ̈ .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Aymi mac chikˈamben hacaˈ tiˈ : “ ¿ Tzettaxca chu yitzitzbican ̈ anma camnaxa ? yeb ¿ tzettaxca jilni isnimanil yet chiitzitzbican ̈ ? ” ẍi .

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Haˈ mac chalni hacaˈ tuˈ caw suc . Kˈinalo ta chicotzˈun hunu ixim hin ̈ at , caw yilal iskˈato huneˈ hin ̈ at tuˈ , hacaˈtan ̈ e chicam chijila , haxa yanma ixim xin chiahiloj .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Maẍtaj awalxa yehi chicotzˈunni , walxinto haˈ ixim hin ̈ at tuˈ chicotzˈunu , maca ixim hin ̈ at trigo maca hunuxa nan hin ̈ atil .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Haxa Comam Dios xin chiakˈni aholo ixim hin ̈ at tuˈ hacaˈ choche iscˈul , hataticˈa tzet hin ̈ atil chicotzˈunu haˈ xin chiahiloj .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Yuxin mach sunilo nimanile lahan , wal xin nanticˈa isnimanil anma , nanpaxo isnimanil no nokˈ can ̈ eb yoj , nanpaxo isnimanil noˈ chˈic , nanpaxo isnimanil noˈ cay .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ xin , ay nimanile yet satcan ̈ yehi , aypaxo nimanilehal yet sat txˈotxˈal tiˈ . Yajaˈ xin nananta jilni iscˈulchˈanil isnimanil tzettaj ye tuˈ ay satcan ̈ , yeb xin nan jilni iscˈulchˈanil isnimanil tzettaj ye tuˈ ay sat txˈo txˈotxˈ tiˈ .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Hacpax tuˈ tzˈayic , mach lahano iskˈakˈal yeb ixahaw , mach lahanpaxo yeb txˈumel , hacpax tuˈ ej txˈumel mach lahano iskˈakˈal hunun .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Hac tuˈ chu yitzitzbican ̈ anma camom . Huneˈ nimanile chimujlaxi chietaxtoj , yajaˈ nanxa nimanile chu ispitzcˈacan ̈ , matxa xin chietaxtoj .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Chimujlax huneˈ nimanile ayco istxˈojal yin ̈ , wal yet chiitzitzbican ̈ xin , cˈulchˈanxa jilni . Chimujlax huneˈ nimanile machi yip , haxa yet chiitzitzbican ̈ caw ayxa yip .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Chimujlax huneˈ nimanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , haxa yet chiitzitzbican ̈ xin , yetxa espíritu yehi . Ay nimanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , aypaxo nimanile yet espíritu .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Chal yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ naj Adán , naj babel winaj , anma yu iswatxˈelax naj , akˈbil iskˈinal naj , ” ẍiayoj . Haxa naj iscab Adán , yet satcan ̈ ye naj , haˈ naj chiakˈni kˈinale mach istan ̈ bal .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Wal xin babel hul tzet ye tuˈ yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , tzujan tuˈ xin , yul tzet ye tuˈ yet espíritu .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Naj babel winaj , yin ̈ txˈo txˈotxˈ watxˈelax naj , yuxin yet txˈo txˈotxˈ ye naj . Wal naj iscab Adán yet satcan ̈ ye naj .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Haˈ nimanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , lahan hacaˈ isnimanil naj watxˈebil yin ̈ txˈo txˈotxˈ , wal nimanile yet satcan ̈ xin , lahan hacaˈ isnimanil naj tit yul satcan ̈ .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Yulbal yet ayon ̈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , lahan conimanil yeb naj babel winaj watxˈebil yin ̈ txˈo txˈotxˈ , wal yet bakˈin xin , lahan chielico conimanil hacaˈ naj yet satcan ̈ il yehi .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwalan teyet tato huneˈ conimanil tiˈ , mach chu yapni iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios , yuto chibe yeb baj ; huntekˈan chietaxto tiˈ , mach chu yapni bay mach chietaxto tzet ye tuˈ .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Chiwochehan cheyohtan ̈ elo huneˈ tzet ye tuˈ ewan yehi : Mach cosunilo chon ̈ cami , yajaˈ xin cosunil chihellax conimanil ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: yuto yin ̈ caw lembil , hacaˈn ̈ e ismutzˈla cosat , yet chiokˈ chˈen islahobal trompeta cat yitzitzbican ̈ macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam xacami , matxa xin bakˈinal chicami . Walon ̈ itzitzon ̈ tiˈ yet chiyuni huneˈ tuˈ chihellax conimanil .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Yuto huneˈ conimanil chietaxto tiˈ , chihellax yin ̈ huneˈ nimanile mach chietaxtoj . Huneˈ conimanil chicamto tiˈ chihellaxi , haˈ huneˈ satcan ̈ il chiˈakˈlax seleloj huneˈ matxa bakˈin chitan ̈ iloj .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Huneˈ conimanil chietaxto tiˈ chiheli cat yoc yin ̈ huneˈ nimanile machi etaxtoj . Chihellax conimanil chicamto tiˈ yin ̈ huneˈ nimanile mach chicami . Hac tuˈ chu yijni isba tzet tzˈibn ̈ ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Chicˈaytzelaxilo naj camical , ay huneˈ mac chikˈoji yin ̈ naj yin ̈ huneln ̈ e .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Yuxin hach camical ¿ baytuˈwal ay hahelanil ? ¿ Baytuˈwal ay hawip hapotxˈwahi ? ẍiayoj .

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Haˈ mule chon ̈ yakˈ camoj , wal isley Comam Dios xin ip yanico isyaˈtajil jiban ̈ .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ¡ Yajaˈ yuchˈandios tet Comam Dios , yuto xacon ̈ kˈoji yin ̈ naj camical , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo !

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , lin ̈ bawe heba , mach chexpax teyintaj . Hunun tzˈayicojab hex yin ̈ yet Comam , munlahan ̈ we yin ̈ ismunil Comam Dios sunilbal tiempo , yuto johtaj tato mach nabn ̈ eho chon ̈ munla yin ̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
