text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Ay bay caw quinsiquihan inmunlahan , wakˈlenan isyaˈtajil . Txˈiˈal el mach quinwayan , ay bay wijlehan n ̈ ohchahilal , yeb tajintiˈal . Txˈiˈal el mach quinwaˈhan . Ay bay xin wetapaxo incˈulan yu chew , yeb txˈiˈal el quincancanojan man ̈ xilkˈapehal .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Mach han ̈ cˈan ̈ eho huntekˈan isyaˈtajil tuˈ wakˈlenan , wal xin ayn ̈ eticˈaco yin ̈ incˈulan yin ̈ ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con ̈ ob .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Yuto ta ay hunu mac maẍto chiyikˈ yip yin ̈ yet Comam caw chiwikˈ biscˈulalan yin ̈ , hacaˈtan ̈ e maẍto chiwikˈpaxo wipan chute innanihan . Ta ay ebnaj chietaxto isnabal yu hunuxa maca , caw chitac incˈulan .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Ta caw yilal chiwican ̈ inbahan , chimwican ̈ inbahan yin ̈ huntekˈan lan ̈ an walnitiˈan , yuto haˈ huntekˈan tiˈ chiyeniloj tato machi bin wipan .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Haˈ Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo , haˈ ay yet yalaxico ismay yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , caw yohta Comam tato caw yel chiwalan .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Yet hunel , yet ayinicˈojan yul con ̈ ob Damasco , ischejni naj gobernador chimunla yinta naj rey Aretas tato chioc ismajomal istiˈ hunun ispultahil chˈen cˈub hoyanico yin ̈ con ̈ ob tuˈ yun ̈ e intzablaxayojan .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Yajaˈ quinalaxaytojan yul huneˈ motx yu huntekˈan ebnaj juẍtaj , walaxiltijan yul isventanahil chˈen cˈub tuˈ . Hac tuˈ yu incolchahan yul iskˈab naj gobernador tuˈ .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Matzet chiwikˈan yin ̈ winican ̈ inbahan , yajaˈ yilalticˈa walnihan huntekˈan yakˈ Comam Dios wilaˈan , yeb tzet yelax wetan yu Comam .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Ay huneˈ naj ohtabil wuhan , caw ayco yanma naj yin ̈ Comam Cristo . Can ̈ lan ̈ ebxa habil tinan ̈ yilaxto naj satcan ̈ bay ay Comam Dios . Yajaˈ mach wohtajojan ta beycˈo naj yeb isnimanil maca han ̈ cˈan ̈ e yanma naj , han ̈ echˈan Comam yohtaj .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Caw wohtajan tato ilaxto huneˈ naj tuˈ , yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ mach wohtajojan ta ilaxto naj yeb isnimanil maca machoj , han ̈ echˈan Comam Dios yohtaj .

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ wohtajan to ilaxto naj bey paraíso . Bey tuˈ yabe naj huntekˈan tzotiˈ machi mac ohtan ̈ e , yeb xin machi mac chisje yalnicˈoj .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ naj tuˈ chisje winican ̈ an , wal intiˈan xin haˈ yin ̈ huntekˈan isyaˈtajil chiwilan , haˈ bay chiwican ̈ inbahan .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Kˈinalo tato chiwochehan chiwican ̈ inbahan chiticˈam isje yuto haˈ isyelal chiwalan , mach sucojinan yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ . Yajaˈ mach chiwican ̈ inbahan yuto chiwochehan tato machi hunu mac chinani ta caw ecˈbal welapnojan yiban ̈ tzet chil anma win ̈ an , yeb xin tzet chiyabe anma walnihan .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Yajaˈ yun ̈ e machi oc loloˈal win ̈ an yu huntekˈan tzet cˈulchˈan yelax wilaˈtuˈan , yuxin akˈlax huneˈ isyaˈtajil wetan yu naj matzwalil , hacaˈ hunu teˈ txˈix alaxico yin ̈ innimanilan , hac tuˈ yu yakˈlax huneˈ isyaˈtajil tiˈ win ̈ an .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Oxelxa chinkˈanan tet Comam Dios ta chilo Comam huneˈ isyaˈtajil tiˈ win ̈ an .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Yajaˈ takˈwi Comam wetan hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Akˈ tzalaho hacˈul yin ̈ iscˈulchˈanil incˈulan xawakˈan tawet , yaj yu inhelanilan chitecha hawu . Han ̈ cˈan ̈ e huneˈ tuˈ xin chiocnico hawu yuto caw ecˈna caw cˈul isyenilo isba wipan yin ̈ isyaˈtajil , ” ẍi Comam . Hac tuˈ xin caw chintzalahan yin ̈ isyaˈtajil chihul wiban ̈ an , yuto chisyelo isba yip Comam Cristo win ̈ an .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Yuxin caw chintzalahan yin ̈ ej isyaˈtajil chihul wiban ̈ an , yuxin waxan ̈ ca chibuchwa anma win ̈ an , yeb waxan ̈ ca matzet ayinan , yeb waxan ̈ ca chincajlaxan , yeb waxan ̈ ca chihul isyaˈtajil wiban ̈ an , yaj yu chinmunlahan yin ̈ yet Comam Jesucristo . Yaj caw chitzala wanmahan yuto hayet machi caw wipan chiwabehan , caw chiwikˈcanocan ̈ wipan , yajaˈ yu Comam .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Hacaˈ hunu mac mach cˈulo ye yul iswiˈ , hac tuˈ wute inbahan wanicojan inwinajilan , yajaˈ hex ay hemul win ̈ an yuto hex wal heyanico inwinajilan , yuto mach ecˈbalo ebnaj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Jesucristo tuˈ insatajan , haˈ ebnaj cheyabeto tzet chala . Waxan ̈ ca mach chiyelapno wehan , yajaˈ mach chu ispalcˈon ebnaj wiban ̈ an .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Hayet wecˈan texol caw niman wute incˈulan teyin ̈ . Inyehan cˈaybalcˈule yeb yechel yip Comam Dios texol ; haˈ xin chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Huneˈxan ̈ e tzet mach lahano quexwutehan hacaˈ huntekˈanxa ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con ̈ ob , yuto mach inkˈanan yin ̈ tzet ocnico wuhan , yuxin akˈwe nimancˈulal yin ̈ huneˈ inmultuˈan .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Tinan ̈ xin toxa chintohan quexwilaˈan yin ̈ yet yoxel , yajaˈ matzet chinkˈanpaxojan teyet yin ̈ tzet chu yecˈ wuhan bey tuˈ . Yuto maẍtaj yin ̈ tzet ayex bay ayco wanmahan , walxinto hex ayexico yin ̈ incˈulan . Yuto hacaˈ hunu naj mame tinan ̈ yilal yakˈni naj tzet chiocnico yu yuninal , maẍtaj yuninal naj tuˈ chiakˈni tzet chiocnico yu .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Hanintiˈan , hinaninan incˈaytzenilojan sunil tzet ayinan yeb innimaniltiˈan yu iscˈulalo teyin ̈ . Yajaˈ chiwilan , hayet ecˈbalto chiwaco wanmahan teyin ̈ , walex xin ip heyinilo heyanma win ̈ an .

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Yajaˈ waxan ̈ ca ay ebnaj yohtaj ta machi hunelo tiˈ waco inbahan heyijatzo yin ̈ tzet chiocnico wuhan , yajaˈ chal ebnaj tato yu inhelanilan yin ̈ istxˈojal yuxin quexwakˈ subchahojan inkˈannihan tzet ye tuˈ teyet .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: ¿ Tom quexwakˈ subchahojan yu ebnaj juẍtaj watojan yu isto quexyilnoj ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Inkˈanan tet naj Tito tato chito naj quexyilaˈ yeb hunxa naj juẍta to yinta naj . ¿ Tom quexyakˈ subchaho naj Tito tuˈ ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin hacaˈ innabalan yeb iscˈulchˈanil incˈulan , hac tuˈ yute isba naj texol .

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay juhan ̈ , ham hetxumni tato lan ̈ an cocolni cobahan ̈ yin ̈ hesat yet chijalnihan ̈ huntekˈan tiˈ , ¡ machoj ! Wal xin yet Comam Cristo jehan ̈ yuxin chon ̈ tzotelan ̈ yin ̈ istˈin ̈ anil sata Comam yun ̈ e hechˈib yin ̈ yet Comam Dios .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Chinxiwan cˈuxantaxca mach lan ̈ ano hewatxˈen hacaˈ chiwochehan yet chinapnihan ilwal teyin ̈ , yebpaxo ta mach chischah hewiˈ yin ̈ tzet chinwatxˈehan . Chinxiwpaxojan wapnihan cˈuxantaxca aytoco howal texol , maca ta chi ‑ to ‑ chiwa hecˈul teyin ̈ hununex , maca ta ayco chichoncˈulal texol , maca ta ayex lan ̈ an heyinican ̈ heba , maca ayex cheyal txˈoj tzotiˈ yin ̈ hunu ebnaj juẍtaj , maca tato ayex halo kˈumal cheyu , maca ta ayex cheloloˈn ̈ e heba , maca ta ayex lan ̈ an hewatxˈen tzet ye tuˈ mach toholoj .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Yet chinapnihan quexwilaˈan hunelxa , cˈuxantaxca chintxˈixwican ̈ an sata Comam Dios , cat wocan okˈo teyin ̈ , hex maẍticˈa chebejcano heyanico hemul , heyixli maca hewinajli , yeb huntekˈan istxˈojal kˈaynajexticˈa hewatxˈeni .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Wal xin yin ̈ xa yoxel chintohan quexwilaˈan . Hayet chinapnituˈan tzijxan ̈ e tzet mulehal chioc lahtiˈ yin ̈ , yajaˈ yilal yin ̈ sat cawan ̈ maca oxwan ̈ o testigo chicowatxˈe .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Hayet inbeycanicˈojan quexwilnojan yin ̈ iscayel ay huntekˈan tzet intakˈecanojan teyet , yajaˈ chiwalpaxtojan hunelxa , waxan ̈ ca machijinan texol bey tuˈ yet chiwalnihan huneˈ tiˈ tet mac xayaco ismul yet yalan ̈ to tuˈ , yeb xin teyet hesunil . Hayet chinapnihan quexwilnotuˈan xin mach chiwakˈ nimancˈulalan teyin ̈ .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Hac tuˈ chu heyohtan ̈ eliloj tato haˈ Comam Cristo chiakˈni wipan intzotelan . Comam Cristo mach tzˈono yakˈni Comam texol , walxinto caw chisyelo yip Comam texol .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Hacaˈ hunu mac machi yip , hac tuˈ yu yalaxcan ̈ Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus , yajaˈ itzitz Comam tinan ̈ yu yip Comam Dios . Hac tuˈ xin jehan ̈ han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ , tzˈon chijute cobahan ̈ , yu hunxa jehan ̈ yeb Comam , yajaˈ yu yip Comam yuxin itzitzon ̈ an ̈ yeb yu comunlahan ̈ texol .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Txumwelo hununex tato caw yeli ayco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Txumwepaxiloj tato lan ̈ an hechˈib yin ̈ yet Comam , mato ton ̈ e chebalico heba yuninalo Comam Dios .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Yajaˈ chijochehan ̈ ta cheyohtan ̈ eloj tato cˈul con ̈ elicojan ̈ yet con ̈ heyilwenan ̈ , hac tuˈ chu isyenilo isba tato yetxa Comam Jesucristo jehan ̈ .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Caw chintxahlihan teyin ̈ tet Comam Dios yun ̈ e hewatxˈen iscˈulal , maẍtaj yu cocanan ̈ cˈulal yul hesat , machoj , waxan ̈ ca xin mach cˈulo con ̈ elicojan ̈ yet con ̈ heyilwenan ̈ hacaˈ yallaxi .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Yuto mach chisje cowatxˈenan ̈ istxˈojal yin ̈ huneˈ cuybanile caw yel chal tiˈ , wal xin haˈ jetan ̈ caw ayon ̈ icojan ̈ colwal yin ̈ .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Yuxin chon ̈ tzalahan ̈ yet machi jipan ̈ , walex xin caw ay heyip , yuxin caw chicolahicojan ̈ cotxahlihan ̈ teyin ̈ , yun ̈ e caw tzˈajan chexelcanico yin ̈ yet Comam .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Chiwatojan huneˈ incartatiˈan teyet yalan ̈ to maẍto chintohan quexwilaˈan , haxinwal hayet chinapnituˈan mach yilalo chincachwahan teyin ̈ yu wipan akˈbil yu Comam . Mach yuho quexwetanan yuxin akˈbil wiptuˈan , walxinto yun ̈ e hechˈib yin ̈ yet Comam .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ayojabico tzalahilal yul heyanma . Caw watxˈeweco henabal yin ̈ istˈin ̈ anil yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . Iptzewe heba hununex yin ̈ yet Comam . Hunxan ̈ ehojab henabal . Ayojab akˈancˈulal texol . Haˈojab Comam caw xahan ayon ̈ yu yeb chiakˈni akˈancˈulal yul janma chioc heyetbihoj .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Kˈambewej hanicˈ heye hununex , haˈ xin chiyeniloj tato xahan cheyil heba .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Chi ‑ xin ‑ iskˈambeto ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey tiˈ hanicˈ heye bey tuˈ .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Haˈojab Comam Jesucristo chiakˈni iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul teyet , yeb xin chexxahann ̈ e Comam Dios , yeb haˈojab Comam Espíritu Santo chioc heyetbihoj .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Hanin Pablo intiˈan , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Mach anmaho chejn ̈ einan yeb akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan , to haˈ Comam Jesucristo yeb xin Comam Dios Mame , Comam akˈni itzitzbocan ̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom .

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Haˈ hun ebnaj juẍta aycˈo incˈatan ̈ an chitzˈibn ̈ ento huneˈ carta tiˈ wintajan teyet hex ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Galacia .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Yakˈab Comam Dios Mame yeb Comam Jesucristo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul yeb akˈancˈulal teyet .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Yaco isba Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ camical yu comul , yun ̈ e con ̈ iscolni tet istxˈojal huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yuto hac tuˈ yoche iscˈul Comam Dios Mame .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Jalaˈwe tzotiˈ cˈul yin ̈ Comam yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Caw chicˈay incˈulan yuto pet heyilo heba yin ̈ Comam Dios , Comam quexawten yu iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Jesucristo , heyoc tzujno yinta huneˈxa cuybanile nan chu yalni yin ̈ tzet chu cocolchahi .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Wal xin , matolo ay hunoxa cuybanile bay chon ̈ colchahi , machoj , walxinto ay mac chiakˈni etanoto henabal , chishelni cuybanile yet colbanile chiyakˈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Yajaˈ xin tato ay hunuxa mac chiˈakˈni hunoxa nan cuybanilehal teyet yin ̈ tzet chu cocolchahi , mach lahano yeb huneˈ akˈbilcano teyet juan ̈ , caw yakˈabayo Comam Dios ishowal yiban ̈ , waxan ̈ ca han ̈ on ̈ an ̈ , maca hunu naj ángel ay yul satcan ̈ .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Wal xin xaticˈa walan huneˈ tiˈ teyet , yaj chiwalpaxojan hunelxa , tato ay hunu mac chiecˈ halno hunuxa nan cuybanile texol yin ̈ tzet chu cocolchahi , mach lahano xin yeb huneˈ chabilxa heyu , ayojab istzˈactiˈ Comam Dios yiban ̈ huneˈ mac lekˈtiˈ tuˈ .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Yet chiwalnitojan huneˈ tiˈ , mach chiwocan yin ̈ tato chitzala anma win ̈ an maca mach xin , walxinto haˈ istzala Comam Dios win ̈ an haˈ chinsayan , yuto ta haˈ istzala anma win ̈ an haˈ chinsayan , mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwakˈcanojan heyohtan ̈ eloj tato huneˈ cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalicˈojan , mach anmaho ay yet .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Mach anmaho akˈn ̈ e wetan , yeb xin mach yin ̈ o hunu anma cuybililo wuhan , wal xin haˈ Comam Jesucristo akˈn ̈ e wohtan ̈ elojan .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Hex tiˈ , heyabemi yallaxi tato yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , yet ayintocojan yin ̈ isreligión ebnaj wet con ̈ ob Israelan , caw ecˈyaˈ macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios wuhan . Caw xin wakˈlenan intan ̈ tzenilojan .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Yin ̈ isreligión ebnaj wet con ̈ obtuˈan , haninan caw ecˈna ayincan ̈ an yiban ̈ sunil ebnaj wet chˈiboman , yuto caw ecˈna chinyijehan sunil tzet iswatxˈe ebnaj jichmam .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Yaj xin , haˈ sakˈalil iscˈul Comam Dios quinsicˈnilojan yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chinpitzcˈahan , quinyawtenicojan Comam munlaho yin ̈ ismunil . Haxa yet yapni istiempohal hacaˈticˈa chal iscˈul Comam , yakˈni Comam iscˈahol wohtan ̈ elojan yun ̈ e walnicˈojan Tzotiˈ yet colbanile xol anma mach Israeloj . Yet hunel tuˈ xin , machi hunu mac tet quinbeyan inkˈambeˈan .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Mach quinbeypaxicˈojan bey yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén inkˈambeˈan tet ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesús babel ocna insatajan . Wal xin caw yin ̈ an ̈ e quintohan yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Arabia , lahwi tuˈ xin inpaxtijan yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Damasco .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Yet lahwi oxeb habil xin , intohan wilnojan naj Pedro yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén ; holan ̈ eb tzˈayic ayinan iscˈatan ̈ naj bey tuˈ .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Yet hunel tuˈ , machi hunuxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesús wilan yin ̈ , cachann ̈ echˈan naj Jacobo , naj yuẍta Comam Jesús .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Yin ̈ sat Comam Dios chiwalan teyet tato caw yel tzet chintzˈibn ̈ etojan teyet tiˈ .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Lahwi tuˈ xin , intohan yulaj ismajul txˈotxˈ Siria yeb yul ismajul txˈotxˈ Cilicia .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Wal ebnaj juẍta ay yul hunun con ̈ ob yul ismajul Judea tuˈ , maẍto ohtabilojinan yu ebnaj .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Iskˈumalixto chiyabe ebnaj hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Huneˈ naj caw chicajwa jin ̈ yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , tinan ̈ chiecˈ naj yalaˈcˈo cuybanile yin ̈ tzet chu janayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam Dios , huneˈ yoche iscˈul naj istan ̈ tzeloj , ” ẍi ebnaj .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Yu huneˈ tuˈ yuxinto caw chitzala iscˈul ebnaj yin ̈ Comam Dios wuhan .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Yin ̈ xa iscan ̈ lahon ̈ eb habil intohan bey Jerusalén yeb juẍta Bernabé , yebpaxo juẍta Tito .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Quinbeycˈojan , yuto Comam Dios halni wetan tato chintohan . Hayet ayinan bey Jerusalén tuˈ , cocutxbanayo cobahan ̈ yeb ebnaj chiijbali xol ebnaj juẍtaj , walnihan tet ebnaj yin ̈ cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalicˈojan xol anma mach Israeloj . Walan huneˈ tiˈ tet ebnaj yun ̈ e isnanilo ebnaj tato tˈin ̈ an wehicojan , yeb xin ta mach nabn ̈ eho chinmunlahan .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Haˈ hun juẍta Tito tzujan jintajan ̈ waxan ̈ ca griego yicˈal naj , yajaˈ machi hunu mac ischilba yalni tato masan chiyakˈ circuncidar isba naj .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Waxan ̈ ca xin ay huntekˈan ebnaj ton ̈ e chal isba yuninalo Comam Dios , oc ebnaj coxolan ̈ yun ̈ e yoc ebnaj yilno huneˈ cocolbanil yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo ; yuto yoche ebnaj chon ̈ meltzohan ̈ hunelxa yalan ̈ isyaˈtajil isley naj Moisés .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Yaj xin , caw maẍticˈa nino jabetojan ̈ tzet yal ebnaj yuto caw chijochehan ̈ ta ayn ̈ eticˈaco isyelal huneˈ Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile tiˈ teyin ̈ .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Yet walnihan sunil cuybanile tuˈ , caw machi hunuxa acˈ akˈlaxcano incuyuˈan yu ebnaj ijbalom tuˈ . Haˈ tzet ye ebnaj yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , caw machi wocan yin ̈ , yuto yul sat Comam Dios caw lahanon ̈ n ̈ e cosunil .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Machi hunuxa nan cuybanile ahti yul istiˈ ebnaj , wal xin caw istxum ebnaj tato haˈ Comam Dios akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan yin ̈ walnicˈojan Istzotiˈ Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj , hacaˈ yu yalaxico naj Pedro munlaho xol wet con ̈ ob Israelan .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Haˈticˈa Comam Dios akˈn ̈ e ishelanil naj Pedro yoc cuywal xol anma Israel , haˈticˈapaxo Comam akˈn ̈ e inhelanilan wocan cuywal xol anma mach Israeloj .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Yuxin juẍta Jacobo , yeb juẍta Pedro , yeb xin juẍta Juan , ayco ijbalo yin ̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam , caw txumchalo yu ebnaj tato Comam Dios akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan yin ̈ weltojan walnocˈojan Istzotiˈ Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj . Haˈ huneˈ tiˈ yeniloj tato con ̈ ischahan ̈ ebnaj yetbihoj . Yakˈni ebnaj iskˈab wetan yeb xin tet juẍta Bernabé , caw xin chitzala iscˈul ebnaj ta chon ̈ munlahan ̈ xol anma mach Israeloj , walpaxo ebnaj xin xol anma Israel cancano ebnaj munil .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Cachan huneˈ tiˈ yal ebnaj jetan ̈ , tato yilal conanitijan ̈ ebnaj mebaˈ , huneˈ tuˈ nabilticˈa wuhan inwatxˈenan .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Yet yapni juẍta Pedro yul con ̈ ob Antioquía , incachan juẍta yin ̈ sat sunil ebnaj juẍtaj , yuto maẍtaj istoholal chiswatxˈe juẍta tuˈ .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Yuto yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chiapni huntekˈan ebnaj chejbil yu juẍta Jacobo , juẍta Pedro tuˈ chiwaˈ xol ebnaj ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios mach Israeloj . Haxa yet yapni ebnaj tuˈ xin , niẍtejal ishitzilo naj , ispohnilo isba naj xol ebnaj mach Israelo tuˈ yu xiwcan ̈ naj tet ebnaj chalni ta yilal yakˈlax circuncidar ebnaj mach Israeloj .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta Israel oc tzujno yinta tzet isbeybaln ̈ e juẍta Pedro tuˈ , hacpax tuˈ juẍta Bernabé isbeybaln ̈ epaxo naj huneˈ sucal tuˈ .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Yuxin hayet wilnihan tato mach chisyije ebnaj hacaˈ yalni Tzotiˈ yet colbanile , walnihan tet juẍta Pedro yin ̈ sat sunil ebnaj cutxanico tuˈ : “ Wal hach tiˈ Israel hach , yajaˈ chachecˈ hacaˈ anma mach Israeloj , yajaˈ tinan ̈ xin ¿ tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chawal tet ebnaj mach Israeloj tato yilal chicˈo ebnaj isbeybal anma Israel ? ” quinchiyan tet juẍta tuˈ .

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ Israel jicˈal tiˈ , mach yicˈalo huntekˈanxa nan con ̈ obal chihallax mulumal jehi .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Yaj xin johtaj tato machi hunu mac chican cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isley naj Moisés , wal xin chican anma cˈulal , yajaˈ cachann ̈ e yu yanico yanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hacon ̈ tuˈ han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ xajayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo yuxin xacon ̈ can cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios , maẍtaj yu coyijen tzet chal ley . Wal xin caw machi hunu mac chican cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal isley naj Moisés .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Tato chicosay joc cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yip Comam Jesucristo , chal yelapnoj ta mulumon ̈ hacaˈ anma mach Israeloj . Yajaˈ ¿ tom haˈ Comam Jesucristo chon ̈ anico mulumal ? ¡ Machoj !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Kˈinalo tato chinmeltzohan wintajan , lahwi tuˈ cat wocan inwatxˈenpaxojan sunil tzet bejbilcano wuhan yet payxa , han ‑ caw ‑ inan chiwaco inmulan yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Wal hanintiˈan camnajinxalojan yin ̈ ley . Haˈ huneˈ ley tuˈ quinakˈni camojan yun ̈ e caw witzitzbilojan yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ , haˈ yul sat Comam Dios , tˈun ̈ aninxacan ̈ an yin ̈ teˈ culus , yuxin matxatajinan itzitzinan tinan ̈ , haxa Comam Jesucristo itzitz win ̈ an . Haˈ tzet chinwatxˈehan tinan ̈ xin cachann ̈ e wanico wanmahan yin ̈ Iscˈahol Comam Dios , haˈ chiwuhan . Caw isyelo Comam ta xahan ayinan yu , yuto yakˈ camo isba win ̈ an .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Mach chicoyah iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios . Wal xin ta yu coyijen ley yuxin chon ̈ can cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios , caw nabn ̈ em cam Comam Jesucristo chal tuˈ .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Hex ah Galacia hex tiˈ , caw suquex . ¿ Mac akˈni etanoto henabal yuxin mach cheyije cuybanile caw yeli ? Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈan ̈ xajalan ̈ teyet yin ̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus hacaˈojtam caw heyil iscam Comam .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , han ̈ cˈan ̈ e huneˈ tiˈ chinkˈambehan teyet : ¿ Tom hechah Yespíritu Comam Dios yu heyijen isley naj Moisés , mato yu heyayto huneˈ cuybanile yet colbanile yul heyanma ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: ¿ Tom caw huneln ̈ e machi hewiˈ ? Hayet heyoc yul iskˈab Comam Dios , haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo haˈ oc heyetbihoj . Haxa tinan ̈ xin ¿ tom cheyoche chetzˈajba hecolbanil yu tzet chewatxˈe cheyute heyalni ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Caw tzetcˈa isyaˈtajil heyil yu ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , yajaˈ etza caw nabn ̈ e . Hantam sakˈal ta mach nabn ̈ eho heyil isyaˈtajil tuˈ .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Yakˈ Comam Dios Comam Espíritu Santo jet , isyenipaxo cˈaybalcˈule coxol . Yajaˈ ¿ tzet yu cheyabeco tiˈ ? Mach yuho coyijen isley naj Moisés ; walxinto yu janico janma yin ̈ Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile akˈbil jet .

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Hacaˈ icham Abraham , yayto icham yul yanma yin ̈ Comam Dios , yuxinto oc icham cˈulal yul sat Comam .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Yuxin tinan ̈ yilal heyohtan ̈ encanilo mac yeli titna yin ̈ yuninal icham Abraham , to han ̈ cˈan ̈ e mac chayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Yet payat tiempo tuˈ , tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios tato ebnaj mach Israeloj chican ebnaj cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yuto chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin ̈ Comam . Yuxinto halbilcano huneˈ tzotiˈ tiˈ tet icham Abraham , bay chala : “ Hawu yuxinto caw sunil anma yulajla con ̈ ob bay chiwakˈan iscˈulal incˈulan , ” ẍiayoj .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Yuxin macn ̈ eticˈa chichahnayto Istzotiˈ Comam yul yanma , haˈ hun chichahni iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam yinta icham Abraham , yuto haˈ icham babel chahnayto yul yanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan anma ayco yanma yin ̈ isley naj Moisés , chitit ishowal Comam Dios yin ̈ , hacaˈ yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala : “ Chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban ̈ huntekˈan anma mach chikˈoji isyijen sunil ley tzˈibn ̈ ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam , ” ẍiayoj .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Yuxinto haban cotxumni tato machi huno anma chicancano cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal ley , yuto chal yul Yum Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Haˈ mac xacan cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios , yin ̈ n ̈ e Comam ayco yanma , yuxin ay iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal , ” ẍiayoj .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Wal isley naj Moisés tuˈ , matzet chala tato yilal cochahnayto yul janma yin ̈ cat cochahni cokˈinal mach istan ̈ bal . To haˈ coyijeni haˈ chischilba yalni jet , yuto chal yul Yum Comam hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Macn ̈ eticˈa chiyijen sunil tzet chal ley , ay iskˈinal , ” ẍiayoj .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Yajaˈ xin Comam Jesucristo coln ̈ ehon ̈ ilo yalan ̈ isyaˈtajil huneˈ ley tuˈ , yanico isba Comam yalan ̈ isyaˈtajil coseleloj . Yuxinto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : “ Caw tzˈactiˈn ̈ ebil mac chiah locno yin ̈ hunu teˈ culus , ” ẍiayoj .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yakˈle Comam Jesucristo yun ̈ e sunil anma mach Israeloj chichahnipaxo iscˈulal iscˈul Comam , huneˈ haltebil tet icham Abraham . Hac tuˈ xin cosunil chicochah Yespíritu Comam Dios yu chijayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , huneˈ haltebilcano yu Comam .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chiwacojan huneˈ yechel tiˈ teyet . Hacaˈ yet ay hunu mac chiwatxˈen huno istrato , chaco isbi yin ̈ yumal huneˈ trato tuˈ , hac tuˈ xin caw tˈin ̈ an chucanoj . Caw matxa hunuxa mac chiyu yetantoj , yeb xin machi hunu mac chiyu yanipaxico yakˈbil .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Hac tuˈ yu iswatxˈencano Comam Dios huneˈ istrato tet jichmam Abraham yeb tet iscˈahol . Mach chal yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Tet sunil hacˈahol , ” mach ẍioj . Wal xin caw mach txˈiˈalo yute yalni , haˈ yute yallaxcano tet icham Abraham tuˈ tato huneˈn ̈ e , chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Hacˈahol , ” ẍicanoj . Huneˈ tuˈ yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo chitzoteli .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Haˈ chal yelapno huneˈ chiwaltiˈan , to iswatxˈe Comam Dios istrato yeb icham Abraham , caw xin tˈin ̈ an yutecano Comam . Cuatro ciento treinta habilxa iswatxˈencano Comam huneˈ istrato tuˈ yul isley naj Moisés , yuxin caw mach chu istan ̈ tzenilo isley naj Moisés tuˈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam , yeb xin mach chu yinilo yip .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Yaj tato yu coyijen ley , yuxinto yakˈ Comam Dios huneˈ haltebil jet , caw machim chiyu jalni tato matanil ye huneˈ tuˈ . Wal xin haltebil tet icham Abraham yu Comam yin ̈ yakˈnicano ismatanoj .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Yuxin ¿ tzet chiocnico isley naj Moisés chal tuˈ ? Wal xin caw tzujanxa akˈlax huneˈ ley tuˈ yun ̈ e isyeniloj tato mach yijemo anma . Akˈlax huneˈ ley tuˈ masanto yet ispitzcˈa huneˈ mac titna yin ̈ yuninal icham Abraham , huneˈ mac ay yet ischahni tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios . Huneˈ ley tuˈ , ángel ebnaj akˈn ̈ e tet naj Moisés yun ̈ e yalnilto naj tet con ̈ ob Israel .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Yajaˈ matxa yilalo ay hunuxa mac chioc xolbal , yuto huneˈxan ̈ e mac yakˈcano istrato , haˈ ton Comam Dios .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: ¿ Tom xin caw chicajwa isley naj Moisés yin ̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios chal tuˈ ? ¡ Machoj ! Kˈinalo tato chikˈoji ley tuˈ yakˈni cokˈinal , ¿ chimyu joc cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu coyijen tzet chal ley ? Wal xin machoj .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Chal yul Yum Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Caw sunil mac ayicto yalan ̈ mule , yuxin macta chiyaco yanma yin ̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo chischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios , ” ẍiayoj .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ to maẍto chihul huneˈ mac bay wal janico janma , caw yalan ̈ yip ley ayon ̈ ictoj , yet ayon ̈ ico jechman isyelax mac bay chijaco janma .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Yuxin haˈ huneˈ ley tuˈ jilomaln ̈ e yehi , hacaˈ chu yilni hunu naj chejab hunu nichˈan unin , hac tuˈ con ̈ isbeytzenti ley tuˈ iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yun ̈ e janico janma yin ̈ Comam , cat xin joccano cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Yaj xin xajaco janma yin ̈ Comam tinan ̈ , yuxin matxa ayon ̈ oco yul iskˈab huneˈ ley chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ con ̈ ijbani .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Yu xaheyaco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto yuninalxa Comam Dios heye tinan ̈ .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Hayet yahcano haˈ hewiˈ hehunicanico yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , haxa Comam ayco hacaˈ xilkˈapehal teyin ̈ .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Caw xin machi yoc yin ̈ tato Israel maca mach Israeloj . Caw matxa yoc yin ̈ ta winaj maca ix , yuto caw hunxan ̈ e je yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Yuxin tato ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , caw hacaˈ yuninal icham Abraham jehi , haˈ hunon ̈ chicochah tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios tet icham Abraham tuˈ .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Ay hunxa yechel chiwalan teyet . Kˈinalo hunu nichˈan unin chischah ismajul tet ismam , caw yahawil chuco yin ̈ tzet ay ismam tuˈ , yaj xin yet nichˈanto caw maẍto yip yin ̈ tzet chiakˈlax ismajulo tuˈ , to hacaˈ to chejab yehi .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Yet nichˈanto ay mac chitan ̈ eni , yeb xin ilbiltopaxo huneˈ ismajul tuˈ masanto yet chˈapni istiempohal bay halbilcano yu ismam , cat yoccano yahawo yin ̈ ismajul tuˈ .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Caw xin hac tuˈ je han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ ; yet yalan ̈ tocanoj ayon ̈ ayo yalan ̈ yip sunil tzet chal anma .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Haxa yet yijni isba yapni istiempohal xin , yaniti Comam Dios Iscˈahol , pitzcˈana yin ̈ huneˈ ix ix yalan ̈ yip isley naj Moisés .

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Hul Comam yun ̈ e con ̈ yinilo yalan ̈ ley , yeb yun ̈ e con ̈ ischahni Comam Dios yuninaloj .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Yun ̈ e isyenilo Comam tato caw yuninalxa Comam jehi , yuxin yati Comam Yespíritu Iscˈahol yul janma . Yu Yespíritu Comam tuˈ yuxinto chijal tet Comam Dios yin ̈ sunil janma hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Mam , ” con ̈ chi , yin ̈ caw sunil cocˈul .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , matxa chejabo jehi , to caw yuninalxa Comam jehi . Yu huneˈ tuˈ xin , caw el yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Dios yakˈni huneˈ comatan , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo , Iscˈahol Comam tuˈ .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Yet yalan ̈ to tuˈ yet maẍto cheyohtan ̈ elo Comam Dios , caw chejab heyehico tet huntekˈan chal anma diosalil . Wal xin , caw mach dioso huntekˈan tuˈ .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , heyohtaxa Comam Dios sicˈlebil , chiwalpaxojan teyet tato caw ohtabilexxapaxo yu Comam . ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxinto chexmeltzopaxto yin ̈ huntekˈanxa nan cuybanilehal caw mach tˈin ̈ ano yehicoj , cat heyocpaxo ischejabo hunelxa ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , cheyije kˈin ̈ chiecˈtzelax yin ̈ isbi tzˈayic , yeb yin ̈ isbi ixahaw , yeb yet chishelni isba tiempo , yeb kˈin ̈ chiecˈtzelax yin ̈ hunun habil .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: ¡ Caw chioc yin ̈ incˈulan yet chinnanitijan , wakˈa tato caw nabn ̈ e quinmunlahan texol !

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw chiwalan teyet , lahanojab cheyute henabal hacaˈ innabalan , yuto yet wecˈan texol wute innabalan hacaˈ hex . Wal xin matolo yu ay hunu istxˈojal heyute win ̈ an yuxin hac tuˈ walnitojan teyet , machoj .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Wal xin caw heyohtaxa ta hayet babelal , yet walnicˈojan cuybanile yet colbanile teyet caw yaˈayinan yu huneˈ yabil .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ yabil tuˈ , caw ilwebal teyin ̈ , yajaˈ mach quinhehincˈuln ̈ ehan , mach xin quinheman ̈ cˈotojan yu huneˈ yabil tuˈ . Wal xin caw hacaˈ hunu ischejab Comam Dios satcan ̈ , hac tuˈ yu quinhechahnihan , yeb hacaˈ caw Comam Jesucristo .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: ¿ Tzet yin ̈ yuxin matxa huneˈ tzalahilal tuˈ yul heyanma tinan ̈ ? Chiwalan huneˈ iscˈulal tiˈ teyin ̈ , hex tiˈ caw heyoche heyilti isbakˈ hesat heyakˈni wetan yu iscˈulchˈanil hecˈul win ̈ an .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , ¿ tom ayco inhowalan teyin ̈ yet chiwalnitojan isyelal tiˈ teyet ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Haˈ huntekˈan anma chexmonten tuˈ , caw ayco yanma ebnaj teyin ̈ , yajaˈ xin caw mach cˈulo nabil teyin ̈ yu ebnaj . Ton ̈ e choche ebnaj quexyikˈalo coxolan ̈ yun ̈ e heyanico heyanma yin ̈ ebnaj .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Caw cˈul janico anma yin ̈ cocˈul , yajaˈ tan ̈ e cˈul chiconaco yin ̈ , yeb tato istoholal nabil ju . Aytam sakˈal ta hac tuˈ chinheyutehan yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo , maẍn ̈ etaj yet ayinan tecˈatan ̈ chinheyanicojan yin ̈ hecˈul .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Hex tiˈ caw hacaˈ wuninalan heyehi , lan ̈ an yecˈyaˈ wanmahan hunelxa heyu , hacaˈ hunu ix ix chiaben isyaˈil yet chiwatxˈi iscˈul . Yaj mach chisbej wabenan huneˈ isyaˈtajil tiˈ masanto chiwatxˈicanico Comam Jesucristo teyin ̈ .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Majal ayinan texol tinan ̈ yun ̈ e insaynihan hunuxa tzet chiyu intzotelan teyet . Wal xin caw cˈaynajilo incˈulan teyin ̈ .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Maquex chexmeltzopaxto heyijen tzet chal isley naj Moisés heyalni , halwe wetan : ¿ Tom caw maẍto bay cheyabe tzet chal huneˈ ley tuˈ ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato ay cawan ̈ iscˈahol icham Abraham ; huneˈ naj yeb ix Agar , ix chejab ; huneˈxa naj xin yeb ix Sara , ix caw yixal icham Abraham tuˈ ; ix Sara tuˈ mach chejabo ix .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Naj Ismael , yunin ix Agar , mach cˈaybalo cˈule yu ispitzcˈa naj . Wal naj Isaac , yunin ix Sara , cˈaybalcˈule yu ispitzcˈa naj yu Comam Dios , yuto caw ixnamxa ix yet ispitzcˈa naj , yun ̈ e yijni isba tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios yin ̈ naj .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Haˈ cawan ̈ ebix tuˈ , yechel cabeb istrato Comam Dios ye ebix . Ix Agar , ix mebaˈ yehi , yechel huneˈ trato iswatxˈe Comam Dios bey iswiˈ witz Sinaí , yuxinto sunil macta ayco yin ̈ huneˈ trato tuˈ , hacaˈ ta pitzcˈana yu yoc chejaboj .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Ix Agar tuˈ , yechel istrato Comam Dios yakˈ tet naj Moisés bey witz Sinaí yul ismajul Arabia , yechelpaxo con ̈ ob Jerusalén ye ix . Anma ay yul con ̈ ob Jerusalén tuˈ , ayco yalan ̈ ley akˈbil bey iswiˈ witz Sinaí .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Wal huneˈxa istrato Comam Dios xin , yechel ix Sara yixal icham Abraham yehi , yuto mach chejabo ye ix yalan ̈ ley . Yajaˈ wal huneˈ Jerusalén ay yul satcan ̈ , mach ayoco yalan ̈ chejbanile , han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ xin yuninal jehi .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Hach ix machi hawunin , yeb maẍticˈa chil yin ̈ hunu yunin , tzalahan ̈ . Awan ̈ yin ̈ tzalahilal hach maẍticˈa hawohtajo isyaˈtajil ispitzcˈa niẍte unin , yuto haˈ ix ix hinbilcanoj caw txˈiˈalto yunin ix sata ix ay yichamil , ẍiayoj .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex tiˈ hacaˈ naj Isaac heyehi , uninale halbilcano yu Comam Dios ta chipitzcˈahi .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Yet payxa tuˈ naj mach cˈaybalcˈule yu ispitzcˈahi , caw caj yil naj naj pitzcˈa yu yip Comam Espíritu Santo . Hacaˈ yu iscajlax naj Isaac yu naj Ismael , hac tuˈ xin yepaxo tinan ̈ .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Yajaˈ ¿ tzet ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios ? Wal xin chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Tzumbeto ix chejab yeb yunin , yuto naj yunin ix tuˈ , caw mach chu yakˈni cabo isba naj yin ̈ tzettaj chischah naj yunin ix mach chejaboj , ” ẍiayoj .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Yuxin , hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ mach yuninalo ix chejab jehi , to yuninal ix mach chejaboj .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Comam Jesucristo coln ̈ ehon ̈ ilo yalan ̈ yip isley naj Moisés , yuxin colbilon ̈ xa . Yuxin tinan ̈ lin ̈ bawe heba yin ̈ hecolbanil tuˈ , caw matxa chexmeltzo heyakˈacto heba yalan ̈ ley tuˈ hunelxa .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Wal hanin Pablo intiˈan , caw chiwalcanojan teyet tato cheyije hechahni huneˈ circuncisión , caw matzet chal yelapno Comam Jesucristo teyin ̈ .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Caw chiwalpaxcanojan teyet , macxan ̈ eticˈa chiyijen ischahni huneˈ circuncisión tuˈ , caw yilal isyijenpaxo sunil tzet chal isley naj Moisés .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Maquex chesayilo heyoc cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios yu heyijen tzet chal ley , xaheheqˈuilo heba yin ̈ Comam Cristo yeb yin ̈ iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ , yu Yespíritu Comam Dios ayco jin ̈ , yuxinto caw chijaco yin ̈ janma tato chon ̈ oc cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios , yu chijaco janma yin ̈ Comam .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Yuto han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , caw matxa tzet chaliloj ta ayco maca mach ayco huneˈ circuncisión jin ̈ , wal xin haˈ huneˈ caw yilal haˈ ton janayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam , hac tuˈ xin caw xahan chijil jet anmahil .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Hex tiˈ , caw tˈin ̈ anxaticˈa heyehicoj . ¿ Mac oc akˈocˈule teyet yuxinto matxa cheyije sunil cuybanile caw tohol yehicoj ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Haˈ huneˈ montebal oc teyet tuˈ , mach yeto Comam Dios yehi .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Naweti huneˈ chihallax hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Caw hanicˈn ̈ echˈan yan ̈ al ixim pan chiakˈni sipcˈaho sunil ixim harina , ” ẍi .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Hanintiˈan chicawxi incˈulan yin ̈ Comam Dios tato mach nano chiyu hetxumnilo sunil cuybanile chiwaltotiˈan . Wal mac chioc akˈocˈule teyet yin ̈ heyetanto heba tuˈ xin , caw chiay isyaˈtajil yiban ̈ yu Comam Dios , mach chiyoc yin ̈ macxan ̈ eticˈa anmahil .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ta haˈ jakˈni circuncidar coba chinecˈan walaˈcˈojan , caw machim chitit ishowal ebnaj Israel win ̈ an . Caw matxam xin yelapno chucano iscamical Comam Jesucristo wuhan , hac tuˈ xin matxam chioc ebnaj iscajaˈ isba yin ̈ . Wal xin haˈ huneˈ cuybanile yin ̈ iscamical Comam haˈ chiakˈni chiwaho iscˈul ebnaj win ̈ an .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: ¡ Haˈ ebnaj chˈecˈ akˈocˈule ta cheyakˈ circuncidar heba , kˈaˈcˈulmi ta wiyom ishosnilo ebnaj yetbi isnimanil tuˈ yin ̈ huneln ̈ e !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw awtebilex yu hecollaxcanoj , yajaˈ maẍtaj yu hewatxˈen sunil ismachiswalilal choche iscˈul henimanil . Haˈ wal heyuten heba to cheyakˈle chejaˈ heba teyet hununex , yun ̈ e heyeniloj tato caw xahan cheyil heba .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Wal xin sunil tzet chal ley hunxan ̈ echˈan chejbanilehal chucanoj , chalni hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Xahan chawil hawet anmahil , hacaˈ hayaˈiln ̈ en haba , ” ẍiayoj .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Caw nann ̈ e heyu , yuto ta chexoc hechile heba cat hecˈutxlenayto heba , hex cawex cheyetato heba yin ̈ hacaˈ tuˈ .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Chiwalan teyet hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , beybaln ̈ ewe hacaˈ tzet choche Comam Espíritu . Mach cheyakˈ yub istxˈojal choche henimanil .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Sunil istxˈojal choche conimanil iswatxˈeˈ , chicajwa yin ̈ tzet choche Comam Espíritu Santo , hacpax tuˈ Comam Espíritu chicajwa yin ̈ istxˈojal choche conimanil iswatxˈeˈ . Yuxin chiscajle isba Comam Espíritu Santo yeb sunil istxˈojal choche conimanil iswatxˈeˈ . Chiscajle isba hunun , yuxinto mach chu hewatxˈen tzet choche hecˈul .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Yaj tato haˈ Comam Espíritu Santo chexijbani , caw matxa ayexocto yalan ̈ yip ley tuˈ .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Caw ixtan ̈ ye sunil istxˈojal chi ‑ to ‑ iswatxˈe anma tzujan yinta tzet choche isnimanil ; chiixli , chiwinajli , chiswatxˈen tzettaj txˈixobal , chiskˈaytzenico istxˈojal jin ̈ .

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Chiay jahno sata tioẍ , chiscunn ̈ e yet anmahil , caw chichiwa iscˈul yin ̈ yet anmahil , howaln ̈ eticˈa chu , ton ̈ eticˈa chichichon iscˈul , chaco ishowal yin ̈ yet anmahil . Txˈojn ̈ eticˈa chu istxumni , chaco pohlebahil cat isbosnilo isba .

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: Mach choche yilaˈ tzet ay yet anmahil , chismakˈcamo yet anmahil , ucˈum teˈ , istzann ̈ eticˈa yanico isba xol huntekˈan kˈin ̈ machiswalil , yeb pekˈ chute isba . Caw xin aytopaxo huntekˈan lahan yeb huntekˈan tiˈ chito iswatxˈe . Caw xa ‑ ticˈa ‑ walan teyet yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , mac chiuten huntekˈan tiˈ , mach chiapni iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Wal sunil tzet chakˈ Comam Espíritu Santo cowatxˈeˈ ; haˈ coxahann ̈ en coba , tzalahilal , akˈancˈulal , nimancˈulal , huncuentan ̈ e cocˈul , iscˈulchˈanil cocˈul , yeb xin janayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam .

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: Jinayo coba , cocachni coba yin ̈ istxˈojal . Haˈ huntekˈan tiˈ machi ley chu iscachwa yin ̈ .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Yuxinto sunil mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , caw xaˈisbejcano beybale ikˈbilticˈa yu , yeb tzet choche yanma , yeb sunil istxˈojal choche isnimanil , huntekˈan tuˈ xaelcano yu iscamical Comam yin ̈ culus .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Wal xin yu ayxaco Comam Espíritu Santo jin ̈ , yuxin caw ecˈojon ̈ we hacaˈ choche iscˈul Comam .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Mach loloˈo chijute coba , mach chon ̈ buchwa jin ̈ hununon ̈ , yeb xin machojab chichiwa cocˈul jin ̈ .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , tato cheyila ta ay huno ebnaj juẍta chiaycˈay yin ̈ hunu mule , haxa hex yijomex tet Comam Espíritu Santo , colwahan ̈ we yin ̈ heyinican ̈ . Yaj chewchotan ̈ e chu hetzotel tet , caw nann ̈ e heyu , cˈuxantaxca heyalaxpaxico yin ̈ hunu ilwebal .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Wal xin colwahan ̈ we teyin ̈ yin ̈ ej isyaˈtajil chul teyiban ̈ , hac tuˈ xin chu heyijen isley Comam Jesucristo .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Tato ay mac chihalni ta caw ay yelapno yehi , yajaˈ xin machi nino yelapnoj , caw haˈticˈa chakˈ subchaho isba ischuquil .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Yuxin yilal jilni yin ̈ tzet chicobeybaln ̈ e hununon ̈ , ta cˈul tzet chicobeybaln ̈ e tuˈ jakˈaˈ tzalaho cocˈul , machojab tzet chalico cocˈul yin ̈ hunuxa maca .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Wal xin caw nananta jalni tet Comam yin ̈ tzet chicowatxˈe hununon ̈ .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Haˈ mac chichahni cuybanile yin ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Dios , yakˈab hanicˈo tzet ay yul iskˈab tet mac chicuyni tuˈ .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Mach cheyakˈ subchaho heba , yuto machi hunu mac chu yetlico yin ̈ Comam Dios . Haˈ tzet chicotzˈunu , haˈ chicohatxˈpaxoj .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Tato haˈ istxˈojal tzet choche janma chicowatxˈe , haˈticˈa camical chicochah ispajoj . Wal tato haˈ tzet chal Comam Espíritu Santo chicowatxˈe , haˈ kˈinal mach istan ̈ bal chicochah tet Comam Espíritu .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Yuxin caw machojab chon ̈ siquilo cowatxˈen sunil iscˈulal , yuto ta mach chon ̈ pax jintaj caw chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ cochah ispaj sunil iscˈulal chicowatxˈe .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Yuxin cowatxˈewe iscˈulal yin ̈ jet anmahil hataticˈa hanta chon ̈ kˈoji , yaj ecˈbalto yilal cocolwa yin ̈ macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: ¡ Ilwecˈanabi , han ‑ caw ‑ inan chintzˈibn ̈ etojan ichamta tzˈib tiˈ teyet !

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Ebnaj chischilba yalni teyet tato caw yilal heyakˈni circuncidar heba , to yun ̈ e yoccano ebnaj cˈulal yul sat anma yuxin chal ebnaj , yeb yun ̈ e mach chiakˈlax ecˈoyaˈ yanma ebnaj yinta ebnaj chihalnicˈo iscamical Comam Jesucristo .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Ebnaj chichahni circuncisión tuˈ , caw maẍticˈa chikˈoji ebnaj isyijen tzet chal ley , yajaˈ chischilba ebnaj yalni teyet tato yilal heyakˈni circuncidar heba , yun ̈ e yoc iswinajil ebnaj yet cheyijen yechel circuncisión yin ̈ henimanil .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Walinan xin , caw matxa hunuxa baytet yin ̈ wal wanico inwinajilan , cachann ̈ echˈan yin ̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus . Yuxin caw camominxahan yin ̈ sunil ismachiswalilal yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Haxa huneˈ sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , camnaxapaxilo win ̈ an yu iscamical Comam Cristo .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Caw matxa tzet chal yelapnoj ta chahbilxa circuncisión ju maca machoj , haˈ huneˈ caw aycano yip to pitzcˈanajon ̈ xa yin ̈ iscayelal yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Yakˈab Comam Dios akˈancˈulal , yeb xin tzˈayojab iscˈul Comam yin ̈ sunil mac tzujan yinta huneˈ cuybanile tiˈ , haˈ ton huntekˈan mac tuˈ caw Israel , iscon ̈ ob Comam Dios yin ̈ caw isyelal .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Wal yin ̈ tiempo chito insatatiˈan xin , matxa chiwochehan chinetalaxan , yuto ayxaco islutˈal innimanilan yu anma . Haˈ xin chiyeniloj tato caw ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yakˈabayo Comam Jesucristo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul teyiban ̈ hesunil . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Hanin , Pablo intiˈan , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yuto hac tuˈ el yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Dios . Chintzˈibn ̈ etojan huneˈ hum tiˈ teyet , hex ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios bey yul con ̈ ob Efeso , hex xahechah Comam Dios yin ̈ heyanma .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yakˈabayo Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul yeb akˈancˈulal texol .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Jalaˈwe tzotiˈ cˈul tet Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yuto caw txˈiˈal iscˈulal iscˈul Comam xayakˈ jet , huntekˈan iscˈulal chiyakˈ tet janma chitit yul satcan ̈ yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Yet yalan ̈ tocanoj yet maẍto chiwatxˈi huneˈ yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yoc yin ̈ isnabal Comam Dios con ̈ iscolnicano yu Comam Jesucristo , joccano yeto Comam Dios yeb matxa nino comul yul sat .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Caw chon ̈ yoche Comam Dios yuxinto caw yettax payat con ̈ issicˈnicanilo yu Comam Jesucristo , yun ̈ e joccano yuninalo Comam ; hacaˈticˈa caw el yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Dios .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Yu huneˈ tuˈ yuxinto chijaco ismay Comam Dios yu issakˈalil iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul . Xayakˈ Comam iscˈulal iscˈul jet yu Iscˈahol caw xahan ay yu .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Yu iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios yuxin ay cocolbanil , yu ischiqˈuil Iscˈahol malto yin ̈ teˈ culus yakˈnicano tan ̈ o sunil comul .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Caw isyelo Comam iscˈulal iscˈul jet yuto yakˈcano Comam cohelanil , yakˈnipaxo Comam conabal .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Caw yakˈ Comam johtan ̈ elo yin ̈ tzet nabil yu , huneˈ ewanticˈa yehi . Huneˈ iscˈulal tuˈ caw nabilxaticˈa yu Comam iswatxˈen yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Huneˈ nabilticˈa yu Comam Dios tuˈ , tˈin ̈ an yijni isba yin ̈ istzˈayical bay halbilcanoj yu Comam , tato chishunbaco Comam sunil tzet ay yul satcan ̈ , yeb sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , cat iscancano yalan ̈ yip Comam Jesucristo .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Yuxinto caw yalan ̈ to con ̈ issicˈlencano Comam Dios , yun ̈ e cochahni comajul yinta Comam Jesucristo , hacaˈticˈa nabil yu Comam Dios . Haˈ Comam Dios tuˈ , haˈ caw chiakˈni yijaˈ isba yin ̈ ej tzet caw chi ‑ ticˈa ‑ yal iscˈul .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin yute Comam yun ̈ e han ̈ on ̈ babel cochayto Comam Jesucristo yul janma chicoyelo ishelanil yip Comam Dios .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Yebpaxo hex tiˈ , yet heyaben isyelal cuybanile yet colbanile heyanayto yul heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hac tuˈ yu hehunicanico yin ̈ Comam , yakˈlax Comam Espíritu Santo yin ̈ heyanma , Comam haltebilcanoj . Haˈ xin caw chiyeniloj tato hex tiˈ yetxa Comam Dios heyehi .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Yu Comam Espíritu Santo ayxaco jin ̈ yuxin johtaj tato caw yeli chakˈ Comam Dios comatan . Yet chijni isba yakˈni Comam Dios iscolbanil sunil anma yetxaticˈa yehi yu yalaxicˈo ismay Comam yu ishelanil .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Abebilxa wuhan tato caw ayco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yeb ta caw xahan cheyil sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi .

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: Yuxin mach chinsiquilojan wakˈnihan yuchˈandiosal tet Comam teyin ̈ yet chintxahlihan .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Caw chinkˈanan tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yeb xin tet Comam Dios Mame , Comam caw ay ismay , tato chakˈ Comam hehelanil yu Comam Espíritu Santo yun ̈ e hetxumni tzet chakˈ Comam heyohtan ̈ eloj , haxinwal cheyohtan ̈ elo Comam yin ̈ caw cˈul .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Caw chinkˈanan tet Comam Dios tato chiyakˈ hajlo Comam henabal , yun ̈ e heyohtan ̈ enilo huneˈ iscawxobal cocˈul bay awtebilon ̈ , cat hetxumnilo huneˈ comatan chakˈ Comam jet , han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yuninalo Comam .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Chinkˈanpaxojan tet Comam tato caw cheyohtan ̈ eloj ta machi isbi hanta yip Comam chimunlaco jin ̈ , han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab Comam , yeb xin machi bay cachancan apno yip tuˈ . Huneˈ yip Comam Dios tuˈ caw isyelo yin ̈ sicˈlebil .

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: Yet yakˈni itzitzbocan ̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo xol anma camom , yanipaxcanico Comam Comam Jesucristo tuˈ yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab yul satcan ̈ .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Yocpaxo Comam Jesús tuˈ yahawilo yiban ̈ sunil mac ay yip , mac yahawil , mac ijbalom , yeb yiban ̈ mac yijebil tzet chala . Maẍn ̈ etaj yiban ̈ mac ay yul huneˈ tiempohal tiˈ , to yiban ̈ paxo sunil yahawil yin ̈ huneˈxa tiempohal chihul cosataj .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Caw sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ yacanico Comam Dios yalan ̈ yip Comam Jesucristo . Haˈ Comam Dios anicanico Comam Jesucristo iswiˈehalo yin ̈ sunil anma ayxaco yul iskˈab .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Haˈ yuninal Comam Dios , hacaˈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo yehi , yuxin cosunil istzˈajanil Comam ayco jin ̈ . Haˈ Comam xin chiakˈni tzˈajnaho sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Wal xin , hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ , yakˈcano Comam Dios hekˈinal yu yip Comam Jesucristo , yuto yet yalan ̈ tocanoj camnajexticˈa yu hemul yeb yu istxˈojal chewatxˈe .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Yuto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e yinta istxˈojal tzet ayayo yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ bay tzujanex ; heyijen tzet chal iscˈul yespíritu naj chimunla xol jakˈekˈ , huneˈ chianico yip anma chiman ̈ cˈon tzet chal Comam Dios .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Hacon ̈ paxtuˈan ̈ , han ̈ on ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ , caw hac tuˈ jute cobahan ̈ yet payxa . Tzujanon ̈ an ̈ yinta tzet choche conimanilan ̈ , chicoyijenan ̈ tzet chal conimaniltiˈan ̈ , coyijenpaxojan ̈ tzet chal conabalan ̈ . Caw mulum yu cotiticojan ̈ , yuxin haˈ hunon ̈ an ̈ ayon ̈ ticˈactojan ̈ yalan ̈ isyaˈtajil chati Comam Dios , hacaˈ anma mach ohtan ̈ eho Comam .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Yaj wal Comam xin , caw hantacano chitzˈay iscˈul Comam jin ̈ , yeb caw xahan ayon ̈ yu .

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Yu iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam , yuxinto cochahcano huneˈ cocolbanil , hun xin yu yakˈnicano Comam cokˈinal yeb Comam Jesucristo yet ayon ̈ toco yul iskˈab camical yu sunil comul .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Caw hun yu jitzitzbican ̈ yinta Comam Jesucristo yu Comam Dios , hunpaxo yu con ̈ istzˈon ̈ ban Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo bey yul satcan ̈ .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Yun ̈ e isyenilo Comam yin ̈ huneˈ tiempohal chul cosataj tato caw xahan ayon ̈ yu , yeb ta caw hanta iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam jin ̈ yu Comam Jesucristo .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Yuto yu iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Dios , yuxin colbilon ̈ yu jaco janma yin ̈ Comam . Maẍtajon ̈ jichecan ̈ huneˈ tiˈ , to haˈ Comam san ̈ e jet .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Maẍtaj yu iscˈulal chicowatxˈe yuxinto chon ̈ colchahi , machoj , yuto ta hac tuˈ chimjal coba cˈulal .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Wal xin haˈ Comam Dios con ̈ watxˈeni , con ̈ yanico yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo yun ̈ e cowatxˈen sunil iscˈulal . Yuto hac tuˈ el yin ̈ iscˈul Comam yet yalan ̈ tocanoj .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , nawetij ta hayet yalan ̈ tocanoj hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ chexhallax man ̈ circuncisiónal yu ebnaj Israel . Ebnaj tuˈ chal isba ebnaj circuncisiónal , yuto ayxaco huneˈ yechel circuncisión yin ̈ isnimanil ebnaj .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Wal yet payxa tuˈ caw machijexico yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo ; machi heyoc yin ̈ con ̈ ob Israel , yeb yin ̈ huneˈ trato akˈbilcano yu Comam Dios , yeb yin ̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam . Yuxinto machi baytet yin ̈ chicawxi hecˈul , machipaxo hediosal yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Yet payxa tuˈ , nahat heyehilo yin ̈ Comam Dios , wal tinan ̈ xin ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto caw hitznajexico iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Haˈ iscamical Comam akˈnicano akˈancˈulal coxol han ̈ on ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ ; hunxan ̈ e con ̈ obal jucanoj . Istan ̈ tzencanilo Comam huneˈ cajlebahil hacaˈ peyab yeco coxol , han ̈ on ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Yet iscam Comam Jesucristo istan ̈ tzencanilo huneˈ isley naj Moisés ikˈn ̈ e chejbanile yeb yin ̈ tzet chu isyijelaxi . Iswatxˈencanayo Comam huneˈ acˈ con ̈ ob yin ̈ cabeb con ̈ ob tuˈ , hunxan ̈ e xin yucanayo yin ̈ Comam , hac tuˈ yu yanicanico Comam akˈancˈulal xol .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus yuxinto yakˈcano tan ̈ o Comam huneˈ howal ayco coxol , con ̈ yanico Comam yin ̈ akˈancˈulal yeb Comam Dios , hunxan ̈ e nimanilehal con ̈ yutecanayoj .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Comam Jesucristo hul akˈno Tzotiˈ cˈul yet akˈancˈulal teyet , hex caw nahatticˈa heyehilo yin ̈ Comam Dios , yeb xin jetan ̈ han ̈ on ̈ cawilticˈa jecojan ̈ yin ̈ Comam .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Yuton Comam Jesucristo , yuxin han ̈ on ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ , xayu cohitzico iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios Mame , huneˈn ̈ e xin Comam Espíritu Santo chon ̈ hitznicoj .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Yuxin hex tiˈ , caw matxa nan con ̈ obalojex tinan ̈ , matxa ton ̈ e chexecˈ cólohi , ayxa heyoc yin ̈ iscon ̈ ob Comam Dios , ayexxapaxico istzˈajo yuninal Comam .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Hex tiˈ lahanex hacaˈ hunu teˈ n ̈ a watxˈebilcan ̈ yiban ̈ xeˈal . Haxa han ̈ on ̈ an ̈ ischejab Comam Jesucristo jetiˈan ̈ xin yeb ebnaj chihalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios , hacaˈ xeˈ huneˈ n ̈ a tuˈ jehan ̈ . Haxa Comam Jesucristo xin hacaˈ chˈen chˈen caw niman yelapno ayayto xeˈo istxiquin teˈ n ̈ a , hac tuˈ ye Comam .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Hacaˈ hunu n ̈ a lan ̈ an islatzˈlaxcan ̈ islocˈal , caw xin cˈulchˈan ischahlen isba islatzˈbanil masan chijcano isba iswatxˈicanoj , hac tuˈ je yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yatutxa Comam jehi . Caw yeton ̈ xa yu hunxa je yebi .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Haˈ tinan ̈ hunxan ̈ e jehi yu xaquexoc yatuto Comam Dios yun ̈ e yehicˈo Comam Dios yul heyanma yu Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Yuton huneˈ tuˈ , yuxin chintxahlihan teyin ̈ . Hanin Pablo intiˈan , caw preso wehan yu ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yu iscˈulalo teyin ̈ , hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Wal xin heyohtaxa tato yu iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Dios , yuxin yakˈ huneˈ inmuniltiˈan yin ̈ walnihan Istzotiˈ Comam texol hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ , yun ̈ e hewatxˈico yin ̈ iscˈulal .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Caw isye Comam tzet nabil yu wetan , yakˈni wohtan ̈ elojan huneˈ ewanticˈa ye yet payat . Haˈ xin tzˈibn ̈ ebilxa nichˈan teyet wuhan yul huneˈ hum tiˈ .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Yet cheyilni xin cat istxumchalo heyu tato wohtajan tzet ewanticˈa ye yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Haˈ huneˈ tzet ewanticˈa ye tuˈ , maẍticˈa akˈlax yohtan ̈ elo anma yet payat tuˈ , yajaˈ tinan ̈ xin xayakˈ Comam Dios johtan ̈ elojan ̈ yu Yespíritu , han ̈ on ̈ sicˈbilon ̈ ilojan ̈ ischejabo Comam Jesús , yeb huntekˈanxa ebnaj ischejab Comam chihalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Huneˈ ewanticˈa ye tuˈ chala tato yu huneˈ cuybanile yet colbanile hex hunex mach Israelo hex tiˈ , chechah huneˈ hematan chicochahan ̈ han ̈ on ̈ Israel on ̈ tiˈan ̈ . Hac tuˈ xin hunxa je yin ̈ Comam , caw ay heyocpaxo yin ̈ huneˈ haltebilcano jetan ̈ yu Comam Dios yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Yu iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios , yuxin yakˈ inmunilan walnicˈojan Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile xol anma yu yip Comam caw munlaco win ̈ an .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Haninan xin islahobal wecanojan xol anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , yaj xin yakˈ Comam iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul wetan , yuxinto chinecˈan walaˈcˈojan teyet , hex mach Israelo hex tiˈ , tato hantan ̈ ecano iscˈulal iscˈul Comam Jesucristo chakˈcano jet .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Comam Dios watxˈen ̈ e sunil sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , haˈ akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan yun ̈ e wakˈnihan heyohtan ̈ elo yin ̈ tzet chiyu yijni isba tzet nabil yu Comam , huneˈ ewanticˈa ye yet yalan ̈ tocanoj .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Yuxin tinan ̈ , haˈ yuninal Comam Dios chiakˈni ohtan ̈ elo sunilal ishelanil Comam tet ebnaj yahawil yeb ebnaj ijbalom ay yul satcan ̈ .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Yaj yijcano isba huneˈ tiˈ yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo hacaˈticˈa nabil yu Comam Dios yettaxticˈa maẍto chiwatxˈi yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Yu hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto xayu cohitzico iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios yin ̈ sunil cocˈul , yuto xajayto yul janma yin ̈ Comam .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
