text2: Caw chiwalan teyet machojab chicabconcan ̈ hecˈul yin ̈ huneˈ bay lan ̈ an yecˈyaˈ wanmatiˈan , to yu iscˈulalo teyin ̈ , yuxin hac tuˈ chiwakˈlehan . Wal xin haˈ caw chianico heyip .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Yuton huneˈ tiˈ , yuxinto caw chinay jahnojan yin ̈ sat Comam Dios , Comam Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Haˈ Comam Dios caw Mame , haˈ chiyeni isbeybal ebnaj mame yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yeb yul satcan ̈ .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Chinkˈanan tet Comam Dios ta yu hanta issakˈalil iscˈul , chakˈ yip heyanma yin ̈ Comam yu Comam Espíritu Santo ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: cat yehicˈo Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma yu heyanico heyanma yin ̈ , yun ̈ e ischˈib hexahann ̈ en Comam , haxinwal hacaˈ isnahatil yehayto xeˈ hunu te teˈ yul txˈotxˈ , hac tuˈ hexahann ̈ en heba .

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu istxumchalo heyu , yeb xin sunil anma yetxa Comam yehi , tato mach isbi hantacano issakˈalil iscˈul Comam Jesucristo .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Chinkˈanpaxojan tato cheyohtan ̈ elo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam tuˈ . Huneˈ iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Jesucristo tuˈ caw ecˈbal yiban ̈ tzet chijohtan ̈ eloj . Hac tuˈ xin caw tzˈajan chucanico iscˈulal Comam Dios teyin ̈ .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Bitn ̈ elaxojab isbi Comam yuto caw ecˈbalto chiyu iswatxˈen yiban ̈ niẍte tzet chicokˈan tet , yeb tzet chicotxumu . Hac tuˈ chute Comam yu ishelanil xayakˈ jet .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Bitn ̈ elaxojab isbi Comam Dios yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo yu sunil anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Yuton Comam Jesucristo yuxinto preso wehan . Caw chiwaltojan teyet : cˈul cheyute heba inkˈanaˈan hacaˈ caw yehi , yuto caw awtebilexxa yu Comam Dios .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Chewojab cheyute heba , cˈulchˈanojab cheyute hecˈul . Xahanojab cheyil heba , niman cheyute hecˈul teyin ̈ hununex , ayojab henimancˈulal .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Hunxan ̈ ehojab cheyute heba yu yip Comam Espíritu Santo , yuto haˈ Comam quexhunbancanoj , yanicanico akˈancˈulal texol .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Hunxan ̈ e nimanile je tinan ̈ , yeb xin hunn ̈ epaxo Espíritu akˈbil jet cosunil . Huneˈn ̈ e tzet ayco yipo janma huneˈ bay awtebilon ̈ yu Comam .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Huneˈn ̈ e Comam Dios Jahawil , huneˈn ̈ e mac bay ayco janma ; huneˈn ̈ epaxo mac yin ̈ bay ah haˈ cowiˈ .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Caw huneˈn ̈ echˈan Comam Dios , haˈ Mame yeco jin ̈ cosunil . Haˈ caw yahawil yeco jin ̈ , haˈ chimunlaco jin ̈ , haˈ ayco jin ̈ cosunil .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Wal xin , caw nananta comunil cochah yu Comam Jesucristo , hacaˈticˈa tzet yoche iscˈul Comam yakˈ jet .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Yuxin chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Yet isto Comam yul satcan ̈ , txˈiˈal ebnaj presowom yito Comam yintaj . Yakˈnipaxcano Comam iscˈulal tet anma , ẍiayoj .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: ¿ Tzet chalilo huneˈ yet isto Comam tuˈ ? Chaliloj tato babel beyayto Comam yul txˈotxˈ .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Haˈ Comam beyayto yul txˈotxˈ , haˈ Comam topaxo yul satcan ̈ bay caw nahat yecanocan ̈ yun ̈ e isnohilo sunil bayejtuˈwal yu yip .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Haˈ xin Comam anico ismunil hunun mac yul iskˈab , yuxin ay ebnaj ayco ischejabo Comam Jesucristo , ay ebnaj xin chihalni tzotiˈ chitit tet Comam Dios . Aypaxo ebnaj chihalnicˈo cuybanile yet colbanile , ay ebnaj xin chiijbali yin ̈ macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , aypaxo xin ebnaj cuywawom yin ̈ tzet choche iscˈul Comam .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Hac ton tiˈ xin yu con ̈ iswatxˈencanico yin ̈ ismunil yun ̈ e ischˈib isnimanil Comam Jesucristo . Huneˈ isnimanil Comam tuˈ han ̈ on ̈ toni .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Yuxinto hunlahanxan ̈ e iscawxi cocˈul yin ̈ Comam , yeb xin caw johtan ̈ elo Iscˈahol Comam Dios , hac tuˈ xin chiyu yikˈni yip conabal , cat istzujcha apno cotxumni hacaˈ isnabal Comam Jesucristo .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Hac tuˈ xin matxa lahanojon ̈ yeb niẍte unin , caw yin ̈ an ̈ e chishel isnabal . Matxa comono chíjato conabal yin ̈ hunuxa nan cuybanile , yuto ay anma tiˈ caw helan yakˈni subchaho anma yin ̈ hunuxa nan cuybanile , hacaˈ chiyu yinito jakˈekˈ hunu tzet ye tuˈ bayejtuˈwalil .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Walxinto haˈ isyelal wal jalni , yajaˈ yin ̈ iscˈulchˈanil cocˈul . Hac tuˈ xin chu cochˈib yin ̈ yet Comam Jesucristo , haxinwal lahanxan ̈ e chon ̈ elico yin ̈ Comam , yuto haˈ Comam caw iswiˈehal yeco jin ̈ , yuto han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ isnimanil Comam jehi .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ con ̈ isnimanil Comam tiˈ xin , caw hunxa je yu Comam . Kˈinalo hacaˈ conimanil tiˈ , caw yetbin ̈ e isba sunil yu cotxˈan ̈ al , caw xin cˈul yecano iswatxˈebanil hunun majan . Hac ton tuˈ xin je yu Comam Jesucristo , haˈ Comam chon ̈ akˈni chˈibo yin ̈ sunil , cat colahnico coxahann ̈ en coba .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Caw xin chiwalan yeb chinkˈanan teyet yin ̈ isbi Comam Jesús : caw matxa chexecˈ hacaˈ anma mach ohtan ̈ eho Comam Dios . Huntekˈan anma tuˈ , han ̈ cˈan ̈ e istxˈojal chiecˈ yin ̈ isnabal , haˈ chiswatxˈe .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Caw xin kˈejholo yecanilo isnabal huntekˈan anma tuˈ . Caw mach chu ischahni huneˈ acˈ beybale chakˈ Comam Dios yuto mach yohtajo tzettaj iscˈulal chiswatxˈe Comam , yuto cawcano yanma .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Yuto lutˈbicanilo yanma ebnaj , yuxin yacanico isba yul iskˈab istxˈojal , matxaticˈa xin yanma ebnaj iswatxˈen sunil ismachiswalilal .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Wal hex tiˈ xin , mach haco tuˈ yu hecuywi yin ̈ yet Comam Jesucristo .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Wal xin caw heyabe tzet hallax yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , hechahnicano hecuybanil caw yel yin ̈ Comam .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Caw bejwecano huneˈ hebeybal ikˈbilticˈa heyu yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , huneˈ kˈaytzen ̈ exico yin ̈ istxˈojal cheyoche .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Yilal hehelnicano heyanma yeb henabal ,

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: cat heyoc heyikˈno huneˈ acˈ beybale watxˈebil hacaˈ choche Comam Dios , yun ̈ e heyecˈ yin ̈ istoholal yeb yin ̈ isyelal .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Yuxin tinan ̈ , caw matxaojab cheyaco lekˈtiˈal , han ̈ eojab isyelal cheyal teyet hununex , yuto caw huneˈxan ̈ echˈan nimanile je cosunil .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Tato ay bay cheyakˈ chiwaho hecˈul , machojab cheyaco hemul . Machojab xin cheyaco hehowal tuˈ yin ̈ hecˈul yin ̈ sunilbal tzˈayic .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Machojab cheyakˈ yub naj matzwalil .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Mac kˈaynaticˈa yelkˈawi , isbejabcano yelkˈawi cat yoc munil . Haˈ xin wal ay ismunil bay chicawxi iscˈul , cat iscolwapaxo yin ̈ anma mebaˈ caw machi nichˈano tzet aya .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Machojab cheyal yajla abix , to haˈ tzotiˈ caw cˈul yoqui haˈ cheyala haxinwal chiswatxˈeco isnabal mac chiabeni , cat xin yakˈni iscˈulal tet mac chiˈaben tzet cheyal tuˈ .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Caw mach cheyaco biscˈulal yin ̈ Comam Espíritu Santo ayxaco teyin ̈ yu Comam Dios . Haˈ huneˈ tuˈ akˈbil teyet yu Comam yun ̈ e yoc yecheloj ta yetexxa Comam masanta yet chiapni istzˈayical bay chitzˈajna cocolbanil yu Comam .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Bejwecano ischiwa hecˈul , yeb istit hehowal , yeb hecajtzacan ̈ , yeb hepohli yin ̈ heyet anmahil . Bejwepaxo hebahwahi yeb sunil tzettaj istxˈojal chewatxˈe .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Wal xin cˈulchˈanojab cheyute hecˈul , tzˈayojab hecˈul teyin ̈ hununex . Cheyakˈnipaxo nimancˈulal teyin ̈ hununex , hacaˈ yu yakˈni nimancˈulal Comam Dios yin ̈ hemul yu Comam Jesucristo .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ yuninalxa Comam Dios je tiˈ , caw xahan ayon ̈ yu Comam , yuxin ecˈojon ̈ we hacaˈ isbeybal Comam .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Xahann ̈ ewe heba hunun tzˈayic hacaˈ yu con ̈ isxahann ̈ en Comam Jesucristo ; yakˈni camo isba Comam jin ̈ , hacaˈ hunu xahanbal caw xukˈ chiakˈlax tet Comam Dios .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Caw yeton ̈ xa Comam Dios , yuxin matxa jeto ay jalni tzotiˈ yet ixloj , yeb tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios , machojab xin chijocheto kˈalomal .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Mach chu heyalni tzotiˈ caw txˈixobal yoqui , yeb suc tzotiˈ , yeb xin maxil caw machiswalil jabeni ; yuto huntekˈan tzotiˈ tuˈ , caw matxa jeto ay jalni . Haˈ jet to jalaˈ tzotiˈ cˈul yin ̈ Comam Dios .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Caw heyohtaxa ta sunil mac chito ixli , maca chiwinajli , yeb anma chiwatxˈen tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios , mach chiapni iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesucristo yeb iscˈatan ̈ Comam Dios . Yebpaxo anma chito ochenico kˈalomal lahan yeb anma chiay jahno tet tioẍ , haˈ anma tuˈ mach chiapni iscˈatan ̈ Comam .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Machojab mac chexakˈni subchaho yu tzotiˈ caw sucal yehi . Yuton sunil huntekˈan machiswalil tuˈ , yuxinto chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban ̈ anma mach chiyijen tzet chala .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Yuxin caw chiwalcanojan teyet , mach chexoc xol huntekˈan anma tuˈ .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Yet yalan ̈ tocanoj ayextoco xol kˈejholo , yajaˈ wal tinan ̈ xin hunxa heye yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , wal xin caw ayexxaco xol issajilkˈinal . Yuxin ecˈan ̈ we yin ̈ iscˈulal yuto ayexxaco xol issajilkˈinal .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Wal xin , yu ayexxaco xol issajilkˈinal tiˈ , caw cˈulchˈanojab cheyute heyanma . Toholojab sunil tzet chewatxˈe , yeb sunilojab tzet cheyala yelojabi .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Caw chelahweco hewatxˈen baytet choche iscˈul Comam Dios .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Mach cheyato heba xol huntekˈan tzet chiswatxˈe anma xolto kˈejholo ayco yanma , yuto haˈ huntekˈan tzet chiswatxˈe anma tuˈ , caw machi nichˈano iscˈulal . Wal xin halwe tet cat heyenilo tet ta machi nichˈano cˈulu tzet chiswatxˈe tuˈ .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Caw txˈixobal jalni yin ̈ tzet chiswatxˈe huntekˈan anma tuˈ yin ̈ ewantajil .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Yuxin yet chiˈel yen ̈ el huntekˈan tuˈ yu issajilkˈinal , caw haban chucanoj . Haˈ issajilkˈinal chianico sunil tzet ye tuˈ yin ̈ haban .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Yuxin chihallax hacaˈ tiˈ : Ilo hawayan ̈ hach wayan ̈ to chawu . Ahan ̈ wano xol camom , cat xin yakˈni Comam Jesucristo issajilkˈinal tawet , ẍi .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Yuxin caw nann ̈ e heyu yin ̈ tzet chi ‑ la ‑ hewatxˈe . Mach chexecˈ yin ̈ sucal , wal xin tzˈajanojab cheyute hecˈul .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Caw mach nabn ̈ eojab chielto tiempo teyiban ̈ , yuto yin ̈ huneˈ tiempo tiˈ caw hantan ̈ e tzet chon ̈ inito yin ̈ istxˈojal .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Machojabtaj issucal cheyu , akˈwe heyip hetxumnilo baytet caw choche iscˈul Comam Dios Jahawil chewatxˈe .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Mach cheyucˈ teˈ uqˈue yu chexyito teˈ yin ̈ sunil istxˈojal . Haˈ wal heyuten heba haˈojab Comam Espíritu Santo nohnayto yul heyanma .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Halwe Salmo teyet hununex , yebej himno , yeb bit chitit yul heyanma , cat hebitn ̈ en isbi Comam Dios , cat heyalni cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ Comam yin ̈ sunil heyanma .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Akˈwe yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios Mame yin ̈ sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ , yin ̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Yijem cheyute heba teyet hununex , hac tuˈ chu heyeniloj tato chexxiw tet Comam Dios .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Hex ixale , caw yijewe tzet chal heyichamil teyet , hacaˈticˈa chiyu heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios Jahawil .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Yuto naj ichamile iswiˈehal yehico naj yin ̈ yixal , hacaˈticˈa yehico Comam Jesucristo iswiˈehalo yin ̈ sunil anma ayxaco yul iskˈab ; haˈ Comam xin Iscolomal yuto caw hacaˈ isnimanil Comam yehi .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Hacaˈojab isyijemal anma ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , hacojab tuˈ chute isba ebix ixale isyijen yin ̈ sunil tzet chal yichamil .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Hex ichamile , xahan cheyil heyixal , hacaˈ isxahanil chiyil Comam Jesucristo anma ayxaco yul iskˈab , yakˈnipaxo camo isba Comam yin ̈ .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Hac tuˈ yute isba Comam , yakˈ camo isba yun ̈ e joc yeto Comam Dios ; con ̈ issajn ̈ encano yin ̈ comul hacaˈ con ̈ istxˈah yu ha haˈ ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: yun ̈ e yapni yuninal tuˈ sataj yin ̈ caw cˈulchˈancanoj , caw matxa nino istzˈilal , machipaxo nino istxˈojal maca hunuxa ismachiswalilal . Wal xin caw yetxa Comam yehi , yeb tzˈajan lahanxa yehi .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Hacaˈticˈa isxahanil chil naj ichamile isnimanil , hacojab tuˈ isxahanil chil naj yixal . Yuxin haˈ mac xahan chil yixal , caw xahan chilpaxo isba chal tuˈ .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Caw machi hunu mac tiˈ chiyahni isnimanil , wal xin chislotze isba cat isyaˈiln ̈ en isba , hacaˈ chiyu isyaˈiln ̈ en Comam Jesucristo macta ayxaco yul iskˈab ,

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: yuto isnimanil Comam yehi ; han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ yetbixa isnimanil Comam jehi .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Yuto chal Istzotiˈ Comam Dios hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Yuxin caw yilal chacano naj winaj ismam ismiˈ , cat xin ishunban isba naj yeb yixal , hac tuˈ xin caw hunxan ̈ e anmahil chucano iscawan ̈ il , ” ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Huneˈ tiˈ niman yelapnoj , yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ chiwalan haˈ ton yin ̈ tzet ye Comam Jesucristo yeb mac ayxaco yul iskˈab .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Yajaˈ hex ichamile hex tiˈ , xahanojab cheyil heyixal hacaˈ isxahanil ay henimanil heyu . Haquexpax tuˈ hex ixale hex tiˈ , yijewe tzet chal heyichamil .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Hex uninale , caw yijemojab cheyute heba tet hemam hemiˈ yuto ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios , caw cˈul huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Huneˈ babel chejbanile akˈbilcano yu Comam Dios ikˈbil haltebanil yu , chal hacaˈ tiˈ : “ Ayojab yelapno ye hemam hemiˈ yul hesat ,

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: haxinwal tzalahilaln ̈ eticˈa heyehi , yebpaxo xin chexnahatli yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , ” ẍiayoj .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Walpaxo hex mame miˈe hex tiˈ , caw mach cheyakˈtij ishowal heyuninal , haˈ heyet to caw cˈul chu hecuyni yeb hecachni , haxinwal chixiw tet Comam Dios .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Wal hex cˈamteˈ hex xin , yijemojab cheyute heba tet hepatrón yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat , xiwan ̈ we tet ebnaj . Sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi , hacaˈojtam tet Comam Jesucristo cheyije .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Wal xin machojabn ̈ etaj yet chexyilni ebnaj hepatrón tuˈ cat hemunlahi yun ̈ e istzalaco ebnaj teyin ̈ , machoj , wal xin munlahan ̈ we yin ̈ sunil heyanma hacaˈ choche Comam Dios , hacaˈojtam tet Comam Jesucristo lan ̈ an heyijeni .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Caw sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi , hacaˈojtam ismunil Comam lan ̈ an hewatxˈeni , maẍtaj ismunil anma .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Heyohtaxa xin , waxan ̈ ca cˈamteˈ on ̈ , maca jet coba cochuquil , caw hacaˈticˈa iscˈulal chihulicˈo jub yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , hacpax tuˈ xin ispaj chicochah tet Comam Dios .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Haxa hex yahaw munil hex xin , hacticˈapax tuˈ cheyutepaxo heba yin ̈ ebnaj hecˈamteˈ . Caw mach howo cheyute heba yin ̈ ebnaj , yuto caw lahan heyehico yalan ̈ yip Comam Dios Jahawil ay satcan ̈ . Wal xin caw machi hunu mac ecˈbal yelapno ye yiban ̈ hunuxa mac yul sat Comam .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yikˈab yip heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo yuto caw aycano ishelanil yip Comam .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Chahwe tzet chakˈ Comam Dios teyet , hacaˈ huntekˈan chiocnico yu ebnaj soldado akˈom howal , yun ̈ e chu hepahni sunil islekˈtiˈal naj matzwalil chakˈ teyet .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Maẍtaj yeb anma chijakˈ howal , wal xin lan ̈ an jakˈni howal yin ̈ yespíritu naj matzwalil chiecˈ satcan ̈ xol jakˈekˈ . Huntekˈan espíritu tuˈ caw ay yip yeb chon ̈ ischej cowatxˈen istxˈojal , yeb yahaw yeco yin ̈ istxˈojal ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Yuxin chahwe huntekˈan yip Comam Dios chakˈ teyet , haxinwal yet chakˈni howal naj matzwalil teyin ̈ chexkˈoji yin ̈ naj . Lahwi hechahni tzet chakˈ Comam teyet tuˈ caw lin ̈ anojabn ̈ eticˈa hex .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Yuxin lin ̈ bawe heba , cáwxeweco isyelal yul heyanma , hacaˈ chu iscawxenico naj soldado issincho yin ̈ yictaj , yeb xin heyecˈ yin ̈ istoholal , hacaˈ chu yanico naj soldado huntekˈan xilkˈape naba chˈen yin ̈ istxam iscˈul yu iscolwa yin ̈ .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Hacaˈojab yanico naj soldado isxan ̈ ab yin ̈ yoj yu isto yin ̈ howal , hacojab tuˈ chu hecawxen heba heto heyalnocˈo colbanile yet akˈancˈulal .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Hacaˈ yanico naj soldado huneˈ chˈen chˈen petan yehi yin ̈ isnukˈ iskˈab yun ̈ e ispahni chˈen lanza yet ayco howal , hacojab tuˈ heyanico heyanma yin ̈ Comam , yun ̈ e chu hepahni huntekˈan isyaˈtajil chati naj matzwalil teyin ̈ .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Hacaˈ yahnato naj soldado huneˈ chˈen chˈen cˈowiˈe yin ̈ iswiˈ yun ̈ e mach chikˈaxpon bala yin ̈ iswiˈ , hac tuˈ xin chu hecolni heba yu huneˈ hecolbanil akˈbilxa yu Comam . Hacaˈticˈa yikˈni naj soldado yespada yet chito naj yin ̈ howal , hacojab tuˈ heyikˈni Istzotiˈ Comam Dios chakˈ Comam Espíritu Santo jet .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Caw machojab chebej hetxahli tet Comam Dios , ayojabexn ̈ eticˈaco hekˈanni tet Comam tzettaj iscˈulal choche Comam Espíritu Santo . Caw nanojabn ̈ eticˈa heyu , machojab chexpax teyintaj . Txahlan ̈ we yin ̈ sunil mac ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Dios .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Txahlan ̈ wepaxo win ̈ an , haxinwal yet chintzotelan chakˈ Comam Dios inhelanilan yeb xin wipan yun ̈ e walnilojan tzet yelapno ye Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile xayakˈ Comam Dios johtan ̈ eloj .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Comam Dios an ̈ eintijan yun ̈ e walnicˈojan huneˈ cuybanile bay chiˈilcha colbanile , yuxin preso wehan . Chiwalan teyet tato caw chextxahli win ̈ an , haxinwal ay wipan walnihan huneˈ colbanile tiˈ xol anma .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Haˈ naj juẍta Tíquico , naj caw yijem iscolwa yin ̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , haˈ naj chiinapno tzotiˈ teyet yin ̈ tzet caw wehicojan , yeb xin tzet lan ̈ an wunihan bey tiˈ .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Chiwatojan naj quexyilaˈ , haˈ naj chihalni teyet hanicˈ jehan ̈ , haxinwal chakˈ naj yakˈlobal heyanma .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yakˈab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo akˈancˈulal texol , yeb hexahann ̈ en heba hununex , yeb xin yakˈbil yip heyanma .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Yakˈabayo Comam iscˈulal iscˈul yiban ̈ sunil macta chiochen Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Hanin Pablo intiˈan yeb juẍta Timoteo , ischejab Comam Jesucristo jehan ̈ . Chicotzˈibn ̈ etojan huneˈ carta tiˈ teyet hex yetexxa Comam Dios yeb ayexxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo ay bey con ̈ ob Filipos , yeb tet ebnaj anciano yeb tet ebnaj diácono .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yakˈab Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul yeb xin akˈancˈulal teyet .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Hunta el chextit yul incˈulan , caw chiwakˈan yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios teyin ̈ .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Yet chintxahlihan tet Comam Dios , caw chitzalacano incˈulan inkˈannihan iscˈulal iscˈul Comam teyiban ̈ hununex .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Yuto haˈ hunexpaxo chexcolwa hepujbanicˈo Tzotiˈ yet colbanile jintajan ̈ , yettaxticˈa heyanico heba yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo masanta tinan ̈ .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Caw tˈin ̈ an wehicojan tato hacaˈ yu yichenico Comam Dios ismunil teyin ̈ , hac tuˈ chu islahnico quexiswatxˈenico yin ̈ iscˈulal masanto yet chihul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Caw yilalticˈa innanihan hacaˈ tiˈ teyin ̈ hesunil , yuto caw xahan ayex wuhan , yeb xin haˈ hunex chexcolwa win ̈ an yin ̈ huneˈ munil akˈbil wettiˈan yu Comam , hac tuˈ xin haˈ hunex chechah iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam . Chexcolwa win ̈ an waxan ̈ ca ayinictojan yul preso maca yet chinocan sata ebnaj yahawil yu incolnihan huneˈ tzotiˈ yet colbanile tiˈ cat walnihan ta caw yeli .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Caw yohta Comam Dios ta caw xahan ayex wuhan hesunil , hacojtam Comam Jesucristo chexxahann ̈ eni .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Caw chinkˈanpaxojan tet Comam Dios yin ̈ intxahan tato caw ecˈna xahan cheyil heba hununex yeb ta caw chiyakˈ Comam hehelanil yeb henabal .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Yun ̈ e heyohtan ̈ en hesaynilo baytet caw cˈul , hac tuˈ xin caw cˈuln ̈ eticˈa tzet chebeybaln ̈ e , haxinwal machi istxˈojal chiilchalo teyin ̈ yet chihul Comam Jesucristo .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Yeb xin sunil iscˈulal chitit yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo ayexico hebeybaln ̈ eni yun ̈ e isbina Comam yeb yu yocpaxo ismay Comam .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan ̈ eloj tato huntekˈan isyaˈtajil chiwiltiˈan chicolwa yin ̈ ispujbalaxicˈo Tzotiˈ yet colbanile .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Caw sunil mac ay yul palacio yeb sunil anma ohtan ̈ eni ta ayinicojan preso isyayil ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Hayet yillaxi ta preso wehan , caw tzetcˈa ebnaj juẍta yihti yanma ispujbanilto Tzotiˈ yet colbanile . Caw matxa chixiw ebnaj yalnicˈoj yuto caw yaco ebnaj Comam Dios Jahawil yipo yanma .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Walca xin yin ̈ caw yeli , ay mac chihalni Istzotiˈ Comam yu chichiwa iscˈul win ̈ an , cat xin ispalcˈon wiban ̈ an chiyute isnani . Aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta tiˈ cˈul tzet nabil yu yuxinto chiyalicˈoj .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Ay mac chihalnicˈo Istzotiˈ Comam Jesucristo yu ay tzet chiyochecoj , mach caw yelo iscˈul chiyalnicˈoj , yuto choche yakˈaco yakˈbil isyaˈtajil wiban ̈ an yulbal ayinictijan yul preso tiˈ . Aypaxo mac xin chalicˈo yin ̈ sunil yanma , caw xin yohtaj tato ayinicojan preso tiˈ yu incolnihan Tzotiˈ yet colbanile yacano Comam Jesucristo coxol .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Yajaˈ machi wocan yin ̈ ta cˈul nabil yu ebnaj maca mach xin , tan ̈ e chihallaxicˈo Istzotiˈ Comam Jesucristo ; wal xin caw chintzalahan yu chihallaxicˈo Istzotiˈ Comam . Yaj xin caw ecˈbalto chintzalahan ,

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: yuto wohtajan tato sunil tiˈ chicolwa quiniscolnihan , yuto chextxahli win ̈ an yeb yu iscolwal Yespíritu Comam Jesucristo win ̈ an .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ chiwochehan yeb ayco yin ̈ wanmahan , tato mach chincanan yin ̈ txˈixwilal , walxinto haˈ intzotelan yin ̈ sunil wanmahan hacaˈticˈa yet yalan ̈ tocanoj . Waxan ̈ ca itzitzinan maca chincaman chiwochehan ta chiillax iscˈulal Comam Jesucristo win ̈ an .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Yuto yulbal yet itzitzinan , han ̈ cˈan ̈ e ismunil Comam Cristo ayco yin ̈ wanmahan inwatxˈenan ; taca chincaman xin ecˈbal caw cˈul chinelicojan .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Yuxin tato yet itzitzinan yin ̈ inchibehaltiˈan , chiyu inmunlahan ninoxa yin ̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yuxin caw mach wohtajojan baytet wal insaynilojan xol cabeb tiˈ ; yuto ay walaˈan tato chincamnahan , cat intohan iscˈatan ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuto ecˈna cˈul huneˈ tuˈ .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Yajaˈ xin , caw yilal itzitzinan hanicˈoxa yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ yu inmunlahan texol .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Caw xin tˈin ̈ an wehan yin ̈ tiˈ , tato chi ‑ to ‑ quinheayojan texol yu incolwahan teyin ̈ hechˈibi , yeb yun ̈ e cam heyaben tzalahilal , yu xaheyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ Comam .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Hayet chinapnihan tecˈatan ̈ hunelxa , cheyakˈ tzalaho hecˈul yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Hachcachann ̈ e chiwaltojan teyet tato cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul hebeybaln ̈ en hacaˈ cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam Jesucristo . Hac tuˈ xin waxan ̈ ca chintohan quexintucleˈan maca machoj , chiwochehan wabehan hekˈumal hesunil tato caw tohol heyehicoj , yeb xin tato caw hun chiyu hemunlahi , yebpaxo xin lahan helahnico hesunil heyanico heyanma yin ̈ Tzotiˈ yet colbanile .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Yeb xin mach chexxiw tet ebnaj caj chexilni . Hac tuˈ chiyu isyenilo isba tato chicˈaycanto ebnaj tuˈ yin ̈ huneln ̈ e , yebpaxo xin hac tuˈ chu heyeniloj tato ayxa hecolbanil yu Comam Dios .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Yuto iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Jesucristo maẍn ̈ etaj janico janma yin ̈ , haˈ wal juni , wal xin yilal jakˈni cabo coba jaben isyaˈtajil yinta Comam .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Hex tiˈ , hun lahan heyakˈni heyip helin ̈ ban heba xol isyaˈtajil hacaˈ intiˈan . Caw xaheyila tato caw wakˈ wanmahan inlin ̈ ban inbahan xol isyaˈtajil texol , tinan ̈ xin lan ̈ an heyabeni tato huneˈn ̈ e haˈ wakˈni wanmahan xol isyaˈtajil .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Yuxin ta chexyiptze Comam Jesucristo , ta chakˈ Comam yakˈlobal hecˈul yu xahan ayex yu , yeb ta hunxan ̈ e heye yu Comam Espíritu Santo , yeb ta xahan cheyil heyet anmahil , cat istzˈaypaxo hecˈul yin ̈ ;

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: ta hac tuˈ , ayojab tzalahilal texol , hunlahann ̈ eojab cheyute hexahann ̈ en heba . Hunlahann ̈ eojab cheyute heyanma yeb hunxan ̈ ehojab tzet chiecˈ yin ̈ henabal ; hac tuˈ xin caw chititcano tzalahilal yul wanmahan heyu .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Mach chisje ta nime winaj cheyute heba cat heloloˈn ̈ en heba yet chewatxˈen hunu tzet ye tuˈ , wal xin chewla winaj cheyute heba . Ecˈbalojab yelapno ebnaj juẍta teyiban ̈ cheyabe .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Machojabn ̈ etaj iscˈulal teyin ̈ chesayicˈoj , wal xin yilal henanipaxti ebnaj juẍtaj .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Lahanojab cheyute henabal hacaˈ isnabal Comam Jesucristo .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Waxan ̈ ca Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , yaj matzet yal iscˈul Comam yin ̈ yehobal .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Wal xin isbejcano Comam sunil tzet yet Comam yehi , yanico isba Comam chejaboj yet ispitzcˈa yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Anma yu yulicˈo Comam coxol , yinayo isba , caw xin yijem yutepaxo isba Comam masanta yin ̈ iscamical , waxan ̈ ca caw txˈixobal huneˈ camical yin ̈ teˈ culus tuˈ .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Yuxin caw akˈlaxcano yip , yilaxcan ̈ yu Comam Dios , yanico Comam huneˈ isbi Comam Jesucristo tuˈ ecˈbal yelapno yiban ̈ sunil bihe .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Yuxin hayet chihallax isbi Comam Jesucristo caw chiay jahno sunil mac ay yul satcan ̈ , yeb mac ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yebpaxo mac ayayto yalan ̈ txˈotxˈ .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Cat xin yalni yu istiˈ tato haˈ Comam Jesucristo , haˈ caw Yahawil yecanicoj , hac tuˈ xin chu yoc ismay Comam Dios Mame .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Yuxinto hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex caw xahan ay wutiˈan , yet ayinan texol caw yijem cheyute heba , hacojab tuˈ xin yet machijinan texol caw ecˈnahojab yijem cheyute heba . Aweco yin ̈ heyanma hexiw tet Comam cat helin ̈ ban heba yin ̈ hecolbanil .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Wal xin , haˈ Comam chiakˈni oco yin ̈ heyanma tzettaj iscˈulal wal heyuni , cat xin iscolwapaxo teyin ̈ yun ̈ e yijni isba hacaˈ choche iscˈul .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Watxˈewe sunil yaj mach chexakˈwi cˈule , machica xin tzet cheyalpaxoj yet chewatxˈeni .

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Hac tuˈ xin , machi mule yeb istxˈojal chiilchalo teyin ̈ yu anma , walxinto caw yuninal Comam Dios cheyute heba . Ecˈan ̈ we yin ̈ iscˈulal xol anma machiswalil yeb caw txˈojcanoj . Wal xin caw chextzejla xol anma hacaˈ istzejla txˈumel xol kˈejholo , yuto hex cheyalicˈo Istzotiˈ Comam Dios chiakˈni kˈinale tet anma . Hac tuˈ xin yet chul Comam Jesucristo caw chiwabehan tzalahilal teyin ̈ , yuto caw wohtajan tato mach nabn ̈ eho quinecˈan texol , yeb xin mach nabn ̈ eho quinmunlahan texol .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca xin caw chiwaco innimaniltiˈan xahanbalil , yun ̈ e istzˈajnacano xahanbal cheyakˈ tet Comam Dios yu heyanma yin ̈ Comam , caw chintzalahan cat inpohniltojan huneˈ tzalahilal tiˈ texol .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Tzalahan ̈ wepaxo hex tiˈ , akˈwe tzalaho hecˈul yin ̈ huneˈ bay chintzalacotiˈan .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Tato caw chiˈel yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chito naj Timoteo quexistucleˈ yet hecal cabe tiˈ hacaˈ chiwochehan , yun ̈ e yilni naj hanicˈ heyehicoj cat yiniti naj tzotiˈ wetan . Hac tuˈ chu istzalacan ̈ incˈulan yet chiwabehan hanicˈ heyehi .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Yuto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e naj Timoteo tiˈ , lahan istxumni hacaˈ intiˈan , yeb xin chaco yin ̈ iscˈul iswatxˈen iscˈulal teyin ̈ .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Yaj wal huntekˈanxa ebnaj xin , haˈ tzet choche iscˈul ebnaj chissaya , maẍtaj tzet choche Comam Jesucristo .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , heyohtaxa hanta iscˈulal chiyute isba naj Timoteo tiˈ , yeb xin ta caw chicolwapaxo naj wintajan yin ̈ jalnicˈojan ̈ Istzotiˈ Comam Jesucristo . Hacaˈ iscolwa hunu naj cˈahole yin ̈ ismam , hac tuˈ iscolwa naj win ̈ an .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Yuxin toxan ̈ e chiwechmahan tzet chinelicojan yin ̈ huneˈ isyaˈtajil ayayo wiban ̈ tiˈan , cat wanitojan naj quexistuclenoj .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Yaj xin chicawxi incˈulan yin ̈ Comam Dios tato chintopaxojan quexwilaˈan yin ̈ lembil .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Chiecˈpaxo yin ̈ innabalan tato caw yilal wanipaxtojan naj Epafrodito quexyilaˈ . Naj juẍta tiˈ , caw chicolwa naj wintajan yin ̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yeb haˈ hun naj chiakˈlen isyaˈtajil wintajan . Naj juẍta tiˈ , hex heyati naj colwal win ̈ an .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Wal xin caw choche naj isto quexyilaˈ hesunil , caw xin ayco yin ̈ iscˈul naj teyin ̈ yuto heyabeloj tato yaˈbiay naj .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Wal tuˈ , caw yeli ay huneˈ yabil oc yin ̈ naj , hanicˈxan ̈ e mach cam naj yu . Yaj xin caw okˈ iscˈul Comam Dios yin ̈ naj iscawxican ̈ naj . Yaj caw maẍn ̈ etaj yin ̈ naj okˈ yanma Comam , caw tzˈaypaxo iscˈul Comam win ̈ an , yun ̈ e matxa cam chislahico biscˈulal win ̈ an yu naj .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Yuxin matxa chiecˈayo yet inchejnitojan naj tecˈatan ̈ , haxinwal chextzalacan ̈ yet cheyilni yapni naj hunelxa . Yu hetzalahilal yin ̈ naj chipax hanicˈ inbiscˈulalan .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Chahwe naj yin ̈ tzalahilal yuto caw heyuẍta naj yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Caw xahanojab cheyil mac hacaˈ naj tiˈ .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Yuto yu ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yuxin etza cam naj . Caw ishin isba naj iscam win ̈ an heseleloj , yuto caw nahat ayexilo win ̈ an .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , tzalahan ̈ we yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil . Hanintiˈan , mach txˈojo chiwabehan intzˈibn ̈ entojan tzettaj ye tuˈ xa ‑ ticˈa ‑ intzˈibn ̈ etojan teyet , wal xin caw chˈocnico heyu .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Caw nann ̈ e heyu tet ebnaj caw lahlonn ̈ eticˈa yecˈ hacaˈ metx txˈiˈ , han ̈ cˈan ̈ eticˈa ismachiswalilal chiswatxˈe , cat yalni ta caw yilal chioc huneˈ circuncisión yin ̈ conimanil .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ , yin ̈ caw yeli circuncidadoxa je yul sat Comam Dios , yuto chijiyo coba tet Comam Dios yu yip Comam Espíritu Santo . Chon ̈ tzalahi yuto yetxa Comam Jesucristo jehi , maẍtaj yin ̈ ej yechel choc yin ̈ conimanil bay chicawxi cocˈul .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Hanintiˈan wal wanico wanmahan yin ̈ huntekˈan chileyal ebnaj tuˈ , yuto caw tzˈajan inwatxˈehan sunil tzet chal isley naj Moisés .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Yuto waxajebixto tzˈayic inpitzcˈahan wakˈlax circuncidaran . Caw Israel wichmaman , yin ̈ yuninal naj Benjamín titnajinan , Hebreo inan , caw Hebreo inmaman yeb inmiˈan , fariseo inpaxojan yin ̈ walnicˈojan cuybanile yin ̈ isley naj Moisés .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Caw ayco wanmahan yin ̈ cuybanile tuˈ , yuxin quinocan incajaˈan macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , caw xin inyijenan ley tuˈ , caw machi hunu mac chu yalni ta mach tzˈajano yu inyijenan .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Yajaˈ sunil huntekˈan aycano yelapno ye yul insatan yet yalan ̈ tocano tuˈ , tinan ̈ matxa tzet chalilo yul insatan , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Yin ̈ caw isyelal , sunil huntekˈan tuˈ , caw matzet chiocnico wuhan tinan ̈ ; haˈ huneˈ caw aycano yelapno yehi , haˈ yin ̈ caw wohtan ̈ enilojan Comam Jesucristo Jahawil . Sunil huntekˈan bejbilcano wutuˈan xin caw hacaˈxa kˈalem ye yul insatan , yu inchahnihan huneˈ inmajulan yinta Comam Jesucristo ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: hac tuˈ xin hunxan ̈ e chiwucanojan yeb Comam . Tinan ̈ xin , cˈulinan yul sat Comam Dios , yuto waco wanmahan yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , mach yuho inyijenan tzet chal isley naj Moisés . Cachann ̈ e yu janico janma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo chon ̈ oc cˈulal yul sat Comam Dios .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chiwohtan ̈ ehan Comam Jesucristo , cat wabenan yip Comam Dios yin ̈ wanmahan , huneˈ yip Comam pitzcˈancan ̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom . Yeb yu wakˈlenan isyaˈtajil hacaˈ yakˈle Comam , yeb incaman hacaˈ yu iscam Comam .

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Chicawxipaxo incˈulal ta chinitzitzbican ̈ an xol camom .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Caw mach lan ̈ ano walnihan tato caw xatzujcha sunil huntekˈan tiˈ wuhan maca caw tohol inxahan , wal xin caw lahbilico wuhan intohan insatajan . Ayco yin ̈ wanmahan intzujnayojan huntekˈan nabil win ̈ an yu Comam Jesucristo yet quinistzujnayojan babel .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , mach lan ̈ ano walnihan tato xatzujcha apno huntekˈan tuˈ wuhan , yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ chiwutehan tinan ̈ caw matxa chinnatijan huntekˈan inwatxˈehan yet yalan ̈ tocanoj ; chiwakˈni wanmahan intzujnayojan huntekˈan ayco insatajan .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu istzujcha apno wuhan , cat yakˈlax huneˈ matan wetan , huneˈ bay awtebilon ̈ yu Comam Dios , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Yuxin sunilon ̈ ayxa yip janma yin ̈ Comam , yilal cotxumni hacaˈ tuˈ , yajaˈ ta ay hunujex nan chu hetxumniloj , haˈ Comam Dios chiyenopaxilo teyet .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Yajaˈ haˈ huneˈ caw yilal , ecˈojon ̈ we yin ̈ huntekˈan tzet xatzujcha apno ju .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ilweto hewatxˈen hacaˈ inbeybalan yeb isbeybal macta chibelwi hacaˈticˈa yu coyenicanojan ̈ teyet .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ay huneˈ tzet tiˈ txˈiˈal elxa chiwalan teyet . Tinan ̈ xin caw chinokˈan chiwalnipaxtojan teyet tato caw tzetcˈa ebnaj ayco ishowal yin ̈ cuybanile yin ̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Huntekˈan ebnaj tuˈ xin yilal yaben isyaˈtajil , cat istan ̈ tzelaxcaniloj , yuto han ̈ cˈan ̈ e istxˈojal choche iscˈul iswatxˈeˈ , haˈ ton xin caw aycanico isdiosalo ebnaj . Caw xin chitzala ebnaj iswatxˈen tzettaj caw txˈixobal ; caw xin han ̈ cˈan ̈ e tzettaj ye tuˈ ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ayco yin ̈ isnabal .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Wal han ̈ on ̈ tiˈ xin yetxa satcan ̈ jehi . Lan ̈ an jechman yayilo Cocolomal yul satcan ̈ , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Haˈ Comam chihelni huneˈ conimanil machi yip tiˈ , hacaˈ xin iscˈulchˈanil isnimanil hac tuˈ chon ̈ elicoj . Yu ishelanil Comam yuxin chishel conimanil , haˈ ton huneˈ ishelanil tuˈ chimunla yiban ̈ sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw xahan ayex wuhan . Caw ay walaˈan chiwilicojan teyin ̈ tinan ̈ , caw istzalabal wanmahan heyehi , yeb xin ispajpaxo inmunilan heyehi . Caw chelahweco xin , toholojab cheyute hebeybal yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Chiwaltojan tet janab Evodia yeb xin janab Síntique tato caw yilal yoc ebix yin ̈ akˈancˈulal , yuto caw isnohxa isba ebix yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Yebpaxo xin , hach wuẍta wet munlawomal caw yijem , chinkˈanan tawet chaẍcolwa yin ̈ ebix janab tiˈ , haxinwal chioc ebix yin ̈ akˈancˈulal , yuto caw colwa ebix win ̈ an yalnicˈo Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile xol anma ; yebpaxo juẍta Clemente caw colwa wintajan , yeb huntekˈanxa ebnaj juẍtaj . Ebnaj tuˈ tzˈibn ̈ ebilxayo isbi ebnaj yul teˈ hum bay ayayo isbi macta ayxa iskˈinal mach istan ̈ bal yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Tzalahan ̈ we yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil sunilbal tiempo . Chiwalnipaxojan hunelxa , ¡ tzalahan ̈ wej !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Caw cˈulchˈanojab hecˈul yul sat sunil anma . Hanicˈxan ̈ e tiempohal cat yul Comam .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Machojab tzet caw cheyaco yin ̈ hecˈul . Halwe sunil tzet cheyoche tet Comam Dios yin ̈ hetxah , kˈanwe tet Comam cat xin heyakˈnipaxo yuchˈandiosal tet Comam .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chiyu yakˈni Comam Dios akˈancˈulal teyet . Huneˈ akˈancˈulal tuˈ , caw ecˈbal sata hanta tzet chiyu istxumchalo yu anma . Huneˈ akˈancˈulal tuˈ , haˈ chicˈuban heyanma yeb xin tzet chiecˈ yin ̈ henabal , yuto caw hunxa heye yeb Comam Jesucristo .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Tinan ̈ xin , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , aweco henabal yin ̈ sunil tzet caw tˈin ̈ an yehi , yin ̈ sunil tzet ay yelapno yul cosat , yin ̈ sunil tzet caw tohol , yin ̈ tzet mach isquistalil , yeb yin ̈ sunil tzet caw yeli , yeb yin ̈ sunil tzet chijoche jabeˈ , yebpaxo yin ̈ sunil tzet caw cˈul yul sat Comam Dios , yeb huntekˈan caw istzan yallax cˈulla tzotiˈ yin ̈ ; haˈ yin ̈ huntekˈan tuˈ cheyaco henabal .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Yijewe huntekˈan cuybanile yeb chejbanile wakˈan teyet , yeb huntekˈan tzet heyabe walnihan , yeb tzet heyil inwatxˈenan . Ta chewatxˈe hacaˈ tuˈ , chioc Comam Dios heyetbihoj , chiyakˈnipaxo Comam akˈancˈulal teyet .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , caw chintzalahan yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yuto quinhenatijan heyaniti hecolwal wetan . Mach lan ̈ ano walnihan ta xaquinhenahuln ̈ etojan , ¡ machoj ! Wal xin ayinn ̈ eticˈacojan yin ̈ henabal , yaj ton ̈ e ton yumi machi yu hecolwa win ̈ an .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Wal xin , maẍtaj yu caw matzet ayinan yuxin chiwaltojan huneˈ tiˈ teyet , machoj ; wal xin kˈaynajinxahan wakˈni tzalaho wanmahan yin ̈ tzet ay yul inkˈaban .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Wohtajan wijlenan isyaˈtajil , ay tiempo machi nichˈano tzet ayinan . Aypaxo tiempo caw cˈul chiecˈ wilaˈan , wohtajan wijlenan wahil , aypaxo tiempo nohnan ̈ eticˈa incˈulan , aypaxo tiempo ay inmelyuhan yeb ay tiempo machipaxo inmelyuhan , yajaˈ kˈaynajinxaticˈahan yin ̈ sunil .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Sunil chisje wuhan , yuto haˈ Comam Jesucristo chicolwa win ̈ an .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Yajaˈ hex tiˈ , caw cˈul tzet chewatxˈe yuto xaheyati hecolwal wetan yet ayinicojan yin ̈ huneˈ isyaˈtajil tiˈ .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Yet welan yul ismajul Macedonia , yet wichenicojan walnicˈojan Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile yul huntekˈanxa nan con ̈ obal , han ̈ cˈan ̈ e hex ay yul iskˈab Comam bey yul con ̈ ob Filipos quexcolwa win ̈ an . Haˈ ton tuˈ heyakˈ ispajo wetan , yuto hechah colbanile yu inmunilan texol . Wal hunmajanxa ebnaj ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam yul huntekˈanxa con ̈ ob bey tuˈ , matzet yakˈa .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Yebpaxo yet ayinan bey con ̈ ob Tesalónica , cayel oxel heyato hecolwabal wetan , yu yoc yin ̈ tzet chiocnico wuhan .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Maẍn ̈ etaj inchahnihan hecolwabal ayco yin ̈ innabalan , wal xin caw chintzalahan yuto ecˈbalto chiakˈlax ispaj selel teyet yu Comam Dios .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Yuxin caw nimanxa tzet chinchahan teyet , caw xapalcˈoni . Sunil tzet heyati wetan yinta naj Epafrodito , cˈuxanxa . Caw cˈul huneˈ tuˈ yul sat Comam Dios , yuto hacaˈ isxukˈal sam hunu xahanbal chijakˈ tet Comam , hac tuˈ issakˈalil huneˈ hecolwabal tuˈ .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Haˈ Comam Dios xin chiakˈni sunil tzet matzet yul hekˈab , hacaˈticˈa iscˈulchˈanil iskˈalomal ay yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ayojab yelapno isbi Comam Dios Mame yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo . Haˈ ton Comam , Mame jin ̈ cosunil . ¡ Hacojab tuˈ !

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Chiwaltojan teyet cheyil heba yin ̈ hecawil hesunil yetexxa Comam Dios bey tuˈ , hex hunxan ̈ e heye yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo . Chalpaxto ebnaj juẍtaj ay incˈatan ̈ an ta cheyil heba yin ̈ hecawil .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Chalpaxto sunil mac yetxa Comam bey tiˈ ta cheyil heba yin ̈ hecawil , yebpaxo xin ebnaj juẍta chimunla yinta naj yahaw Roma tiˈ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Yakˈabayo Comam Jesucristo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul teyiban ̈ hesunil .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Hanin Pablo intiˈan , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Haˈ Comam Dios akˈn ̈ e huneˈ inmuniltiˈan , yuto hac tuˈ el yin ̈ iscˈul . Haˈ hun juẍta Timoteo chi ‑ wet ‑ tzˈibn ̈ entojan huneˈ carta tiˈ teyet hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex yetexxa Comam Dios yeb caw yijemex tet Comam , hex ay bey yul con ̈ ob Colosas . Haˈojab Comam Dios chiakˈni akˈancˈulal yeb iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul teyet hununex .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Hunta el yet chon ̈ txahlihan ̈ teyin ̈ caw chijakˈan ̈ yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: yuto jabehan ̈ iskˈumal tato caw ayco heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin tato caw xahan cheyil sunil macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Hac tuˈ cheyute , yuto ayexico heyechman huneˈ hematan ay bey yul satcan ̈ . Yettax heyaben huneˈ Tzotiˈ cˈul yet colbanile caw yel chala , hatax tuˈ heyichico heyanico huneˈ tuˈ yipo heyanma .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Huneˈ cuybanile halbilxa heyabeˈ , caw lan ̈ an ispujnacan ̈ yabelaxilo yul hunun con ̈ ob yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Caw xin ay iscˈulal chacanoj . Hacaˈticˈa yu texol yet heyabenilo iscˈulchˈanil iscˈul Comam Dios , yeb xin heyohtan ̈ eloj ta caw yeli .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Haˈ juẍta Epafras quexcuynicano yin ̈ huntekˈan tuˈ , caw xahancano ay naj juhan ̈ yuto caw jet munlawomal cobahan ̈ yeb naj . Caw yijem chiyute isba naj ismunla yin ̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo texol .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Haˈ naj halni jetan ̈ tato caw xahan cheyil heba yu Comam Espíritu Santo .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Yuxin hayet jabenan ̈ hekˈumal tuˈ , caw mach chicobejan ̈ cotxahlihan ̈ teyin ̈ . Chicokˈannihan ̈ tet Comam Dios tato caw chiˈakˈlax hehelanil yeb henabal yu Comam Espíritu Santo , cat heyohtan ̈ enilo sunil tzet choche Comam teyin ̈ .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Hac tuˈ xin chu hebeybaln ̈ en tzettaj chisbeybaln ̈ e macta yetxa Comam Dios Jahawil , yeb hewatxˈen tzet choche iscˈul , yeb hewatxˈen sunilal iscˈulal , yeb xin heyohtan ̈ enilo Comam yin ̈ caw cˈul .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Caw chon ̈ txahlihan ̈ teyin ̈ , haxinwal haˈ Comam chakˈni heyip helin ̈ ban heba yu huneˈ yip Comam caw aycano yelapnoj , hac tuˈ xin caw chexkˈoji istecha sunil heyu , yeb caw ay henimancˈulal .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Yeb xin cheyakˈ yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios yin ̈ caw tzalahilal , yuto xayakˈ Comam toholboco conabal yuxin ay joc yin ̈ cochahni comajul yinta macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi , ayxaco xol sajilkˈinal .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Haˈ Comam coln ̈ ehon ̈ ilo yul iskˈab kˈejholo , con ̈ yanico yul iskˈab Comam Jesucristo , Iscˈahol caw xahan ay yu .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Haˈ Comam tuˈ xin , coln ̈ ehon ̈ ilo yet iscam yin ̈ teˈ culus , yakˈnicano tan ̈ o cotxˈojal yu iscamical tuˈ .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Waxan ̈ ca mach chijilico yin ̈ Comam Dios , yaj Comam Jesucristo Iscˈahol Comam Dios tuˈ yen ̈ elo Comam jet , yuto caw Diospaxo Comam Jesús . Haˈ Comam babel yeb caw aycano yip yiban ̈ sunil tzet watxˈebil yu Comam Dios .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Yu Comam Jesucristo tuˈ , iswatxˈe Comam Dios sunil tzet ay yul satcan ̈ yeb sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ ; sunil tzettaj chijilico yin ̈ , yeb sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ mach chijilico yin ̈ . Yu Comam , Iscˈahol Comam Dios xin , iswatxˈe Comam Dios sunil mac ayco yahawiloj , yeb sunil mac caw ay yip , yeb sunil mac ayco iswiˈehaloj . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin watxˈi sunil tiˈ .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Ayxaticˈa Comam Jesucristo yalan ̈ to maẍto chiwatxˈi sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yin ̈ xin Comam tzaban sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Iswiˈehal yeco Comam jin ̈ cosunil ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab , yuxin isnimanil Comam jehi , haˈ Comam yichebanil . Haˈ Comam babel itzitzbican ̈ xol anma camom , yuxin ecˈbal yelapno ye Comam yiban ̈ sunil .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Caw sicˈlebil tzˈajan yecanico Comam Dios yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuto hac tuˈ chiyoche iscˈul Comam .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: El yin ̈ iscˈul Comam Dios tato yu Comam Jesucristo hunxan ̈ e chiyucano sunil tzettaj ye tuˈ yin ̈ Comam , sunil tzet ay yul satcan ̈ yeb tzet ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Yuto cam Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ teˈ culus , yel ischiqˈuil Comam , hac tuˈ xin yu yoccano sunil yin ̈ akˈancˈulal yeb Comam Dios .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Yet payxa , hex tiˈ caw nahat heyehilo yin ̈ Comam Dios , yu istxˈojal tzet chewatxˈe , yuxin chicajtza heyanma yin ̈ Comam . Yaj wal tinan ̈ xin , ayexxaco yin ̈ akˈancˈulal yeb Comam yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo , yet yakˈlax ecˈoyaˈ yanma yin ̈ teˈ culus . Hac tuˈ yute Comam yun ̈ e hayet cheyeni heba yin ̈ sat caw matxa nino hetxˈojal , yeb matxapaxo nichˈano hemul yuto caw yetxa Comam heyehi .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Yajaˈ caw yilal helin ̈ ban heba yin ̈ caw istoholal yin ̈ huneˈ chabilxayto yul heyanma . Mach chepohilo heba yin ̈ tzet ayxaco yipo heyanma yu istzotiˈal yet colbanile xaheyabe . Haˈ ton huneˈ istzotiˈal yet colbanile tuˈ chihallaxicˈo sunil yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , haˈ huninan xin chejbilinan walnicˈojan .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , caw chintzalahan yu hanta chˈecˈyaˈ wanmahan heyu , hacaˈojtam lan ̈ an intzˈajbanan yin ̈ innimanilan hantato isyaˈtajil mach yakˈle Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ isnimanil . Yakˈle Comam Jesucristo isyaˈtajil ju han ̈ on ̈ ayon ̈ xaco yul iskˈab tiˈ , yuxin isnimanilxa Comam je tinan ̈ .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Haˈ Comam an ̈ einicojan munil xol anma ayxaco yul iskˈab , yun ̈ e hewatxˈico yin ̈ iscˈulal , yeb xin yun ̈ e inpujbanicˈojan Istzotiˈ Comam Dios yin ̈ hacaˈ caw yelapno yehi .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Haˈ ton huneˈ tzet mach ohtabiloj huneˈ ewan ye yu Comam Dios yettax maẍto yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yajaˈ wal tinan ̈ xin xayakˈ Comam johtan ̈ elo han ̈ on ̈ yeton ̈ xa tiˈ .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Caw el yin ̈ iscˈul Comam yakˈni ohtan ̈ elaxo issakˈalil iscˈul , huneˈ ewanticˈa ye teyet hex mach Israeloj . Haˈ huneˈ ewan tuˈ , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo ayxaco yipo heyanma . Ayco xin yipo cocˈul ta yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chiapni cocˈulal hacaˈ iscˈulal Comam Dios .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Yuxin haˈ Comam Jesucristo caw chijalicˈojan ̈ tet sunil anma cat cocuynihan ̈ , cat jalnihan ̈ sunil helanile tet . Yuto caw chijochehan ̈ tato chitoholbico isnabal hunun anma yin ̈ Comam Cristo .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Yuton huneˈ tiˈ , yuxinto caw chiwakˈ wanmahan incuynicantojan sunil anma yu yip Comam Jesucristo chicolwa win ̈ an .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Caw chiwochehan cheyohtan ̈ eloj tato caw lahbiloco wuhan inmunlahan heyu , yeb yu ebnaj juẍta ay yul con ̈ ob Laodicea . Yebpaxo yu macta ayxaco yul iskˈab Comam maẍto bay chilico win ̈ an huneloj .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Caw chinmunlahan yun ̈ e yikˈni yip heyanma , yeb yun ̈ e hunlahanxan ̈ e hexahann ̈ en heba hesunil . Chiwochehan caw helan chexelcanico yin ̈ yet Comam Dios , yun ̈ e caw heyohtan ̈ encanilo mac huneˈ mach ohtabilo yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , haˈ ton xin Comam Jesucristo .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Haˈ yin ̈ Comam Cristo chiilchalo sunilal iscˈulal helanilehal yeb nabale .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Chiwaltojan huntekˈan tiˈ teyet yun ̈ e machi mac chexakˈni subchaho yu montebal tzotiˈ , yuto ay mac tiˈ caw helan chutecano isba .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Waxan ̈ ca machijinan texol , yajaˈ ayexico yin ̈ incˈulan , hacaˈojtam ayinicojan texol . Caw chintzalahan yet chiwabenan tato caw cˈul hebeybaln ̈ en tzet choche iscˈul Comam , caw cheyapaxico heyanma yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Yuxin hacaˈticˈa yu hechahni Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma , hac tuˈ xin cheyutepaxo hebeybaln ̈ en tzet chal Comam .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Hacaˈ hunu te teˈ caw caw yecanayto xeˈ yul txˈotxˈ , hac tuˈ cheyute heba yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo , lin ̈ bawe heba heyanico heyanma yin ̈ Comam hacaˈ yu yakˈlaxcano hecuybanil , cat xin heyakˈni yuchˈandiosal tet Comam Dios yin ̈ sunilbal tiempo .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Cheyil heba xin , mach cheyakˈ subchaho heba tet ebnaj choche quexyakˈaˈ subchahoj , chalni ebnaj helanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , yeb cuybanile maẍtaj yecoj , yuto maẍtaj yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo chilo ebnaj huntekˈan tuˈ . Wal xin han ̈ eticˈa iscuywabal yichmam ebnaj chi ‑ la ‑ yala , yeb cuybanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Wal xin caw tzˈajan yecanico iscˈulal Comam Dios yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo ,

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: yuxin caw tzˈajan yecanayo iscˈulal Comam Dios jiban ̈ tinan ̈ , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo . Haˈ Comam ayco yahawilo yiban ̈ huntekˈan ayco yahawiloj yeb ay yip , huntekˈan mach chijilico yin ̈ .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Yuxin caw ayxaco circuncisión teyin ̈ tinan ̈ , yuto caw hunxa heye yeb Comam Jesucristo . Yaj maẍtaj huneˈ circuncisíon chioc yin ̈ conimanil chiwalan , wal xin huneˈ circuncisión chitit yin ̈ Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ con ̈ iscolni yul iskˈab istxˈojal ayco jin ̈ .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Hayet yahcano haˈ hewiˈ , caw hun yu hemujlax yeb Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios . Yebpaxo xin hun yu heyitzitzbican ̈ yinta Comam , yuto caw heyayto yul heyanma yin ̈ Comam Dios akˈn ̈ i itzitzbican ̈ Comam Jesucristo .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Hayet yalan ̈ tocanoj , camnajexilo yul sat Comam Dios yu hetxˈojal yeb yu mach circuncidado heyehi . Yajaˈ tinan ̈ , caw hun yu yakˈnicano Comam Dios hekˈinal yeb Comam Jesucristo . Yuxin yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin yakˈcano tan ̈ o Comam Dios sunilal comul .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Ay huneˈ cocˈas ayco jiban ̈ yet yalan ̈ tocanoj yuto machi coyije huntekˈan ley . Yajaˈ Comam Dios akˈni tan ̈ o huneˈ cocˈas tuˈ ; yilo Comam jiban ̈ yuto pahlaxico Comam yin ̈ teˈ culus yu chˈen lawuẍ .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Hayet iscam Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ culus tuˈ xin , yakˈni aycˈayo Comam huntekˈan yahawil yeco yu naj matzwalil . Isyenicanilo Comam yin ̈ sat anma tato elcano ispixan huntekˈan tuˈ yin ̈ huneln ̈ e . Hac tuˈ yu isyenilo Comam tato kˈoji Comam yin ̈ naj matzwalil .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Yuxin , ta choche ebnaj Israel cheyije isnabal ebnaj hacaˈ yin ̈ tzet chilolaxi , yeb yin ̈ tzet chicˈuxlaxi , yeb yin ̈ tzˈayic caw txahul yul sat ebnaj , maca yet chipitzcˈa ixahaw , maca yin ̈ tzˈayic xewilal ; caw mach chechah heyabe .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Yuto sunil huntekˈan tuˈ yecheln ̈ e yin ̈ tzet xahul coxol , haˈ isyelal yechel tuˈ , haˈ ton Comam Jesucristo .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Mach cheyakˈ hamanil hecachlax hechahni hematan chakˈ Comam Dios , yu heyabento tzet chiyal ebnaj teyet . Chal ebnaj tuˈ ta caw yijem ebnaj , chiyo isba ebnaj tet ebnaj ángel , caw comon chaco isba yin ̈ tzet ye tuˈ mach chijilico yin ̈ . Caw comonn ̈ eticˈa chisnime winajn ̈ e isba ebnaj yin ̈ tzettaj chiecˈ yin ̈ isnabal .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Haˈ ebnaj tuˈ mach huneˈn ̈ eho ye ebnaj yeb Comam Jesucristo , Comam iswiˈehal yeco jin ̈ . Haˈ Comam Cristo chiakˈni jip , chon ̈ ishunbacano cosunil hacaˈ hunu nimanile tzablebil isba isxijil yu istxˈan ̈ al ; chon ̈ yakˈni chˈibo Comam , yuto hac tuˈ chiel yin ̈ iscˈul .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Walex hex tiˈ , camnajexxa yinta Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios , yuxin matxa ayexicto yalan ̈ chejbanile yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ . Yajaˈ ¿ tzet yin ̈ yuxinto hacaˈ to anma yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ cheyute heba ? Chebeybaln ̈ en huntekˈan cuybanile chalni hacaˈ tiˈ :

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: “ Txahul yocnico huneˈ tiˈ heyu , maca xahan heloni huntekˈan tiˈ , maca hetzabni huntekˈan tiˈ , ” ẍi .

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Wal xin huntekˈan cuybanile tuˈ yet anman ̈ e yehi , niẍtejal istan ̈ iloj yet chiocnico ju .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Yeli huntekˈan cuybanile tuˈ , cochantan ̈ e haˈ yehi , yuto chala ta chijiyo coba , cat cocachni coba yin ̈ ej tzet ye tuˈ , yeb cocachni conimanil yin ̈ ej tzet ye tuˈ , yajaˈ mach chicolwa yin ̈ janma yinilo istxˈojal chocheto conimanil .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Wal tinan ̈ , yu xacon ̈ itzitzbican ̈ yeb Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios , yuxin cosayaˈwelo cowatxˈen tzet ye tuˈ yet yul satcan ̈ yehi , bay tzˈon ̈ an Comam Jesucristo yin ̈ iswatxˈkˈab Comam Dios yin ̈ sunil yip .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Caw yilal janico conabal yin ̈ tzet ay yul satcan ̈ , matxahojab chijaco conabal yin ̈ tzettaj ye tuˈ ay yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Hayet iscam Comam Jesucristo , han ̈ ‑ hun ‑ on ̈ con ̈ campaxo yintaj , yuxin coacˈ kˈinal yeb Comam Jesucristo caw cˈuwan yu Comam Dios .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Haˈ Comam Jesucristo cokˈinal yecoj , yuto yet chul Comam cat julpaxo yintaj . Hac tuˈ chiyu istzˈajnacanilo cocˈulal hacaˈ iscˈulal Comam .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Wal tinan ̈ xin , awecano sunil beybale yet yul sat yiban ̈ kˈinal tiˈ , hacaˈ ixloj , maca winajloj , yeb sunil tzettaj caw machiswalil , yeb tzettaj istxˈojal chi ‑ la ‑ heyochecoj . Mach cheyaco heyanma yin ̈ kˈalomal , yuto huneˈ tuˈ chu yoc hediosalo selelo Comam Dios .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Mac chito watxˈen huntekˈan tuˈ , caw chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban ̈ , yuto mach chisyije yin ̈ tzet chal Comam .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Sunil huntekˈan tiˈ hewatxˈe yet yalan ̈ tocanoj , yet ayextoco xol anma chi ‑ la ‑ watxˈen huntekˈan tuˈ .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Yaj wal tinan ̈ xin , bejwepaxcano sunil huntekˈan tiˈ ; ischiwa hecˈul , yeb istit hehowal , yeb henanico istxˈojal yin ̈ hunuxa heyet anmahil , yeb hebuchwahi , yeb tzotiˈ txˈoj chieltiˈ yul hetiˈ .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Caw mach cheyaco lekˈtiˈal teyet hununex , wal xin caw matxa ayexocto yalan ̈ yip huneˈ icham beybal ikˈbilticˈa heyu yeb huntekˈan istxˈojal chewatxˈe yet yalan ̈ tocanoj .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Yajaˈ wal tinan ̈ xin , haxa huneˈ acˈ beybale ikˈbil heyu , lan ̈ an istoholbico henabal , yun ̈ e lahanxa chexelico yeb Comam Dios , Comam con ̈ watxˈeni , cat heyohtan ̈ enilo Comam yin ̈ caw cˈul .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Wal xin machi yoc yin ̈ mac anmahil , waxan ̈ ca Israel maca machoj , waxan ̈ ca chabilxa circuncisión yin ̈ isnimanil maca machoj . Waxan ̈ ca nan con ̈ obal , waxan ̈ ca xin mach cuywomoj , waxan ̈ ca yet isba ischuquil , maca cˈamteˈ ; caw mach chiyoc huntekˈan tuˈ yin ̈ , haˈ huneˈ caw yilal to yeton ̈ xa Comam Jesucristo cosunil , Comam ecˈbal niman yelapnoj , caw xin ayco Comam yul janma .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Wal xin , caw ochebilex yu Comam Dios , saybilex yu Comam yu heyoc yuninaloj . Caw tzˈayojab hecˈul yin ̈ heyet anmahil , caw cˈulchˈanojab cheyute hecˈul , chewchotan ̈ eojab cheyute heba , machojab chexhowbi , ayojab henimancˈulal .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
